2a1(ya): @#/ 'khor thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag
2a2(ya): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas/
2a3(ya): chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang / sku gsung thugs gsang ba mchog gi gnas/ rnam par
2a4(ya): dag pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ depe dang tshad las 'das pa'i sa/ phyi nang med par
2b1(ya): phyogs bcur 'khrigs pa/ rnam par dag par klubs pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med par ye nas rang byung gi gnas
2b2(ya): na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chos kyi sku skye ba med pa spros pa dang bral ba/ don dam pa ma
2b3(ya): bcos pa'i thig le chen po'i ngang la rnal te bzhugs so// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mo
2b4(ya): shes rab kyi ngang las bzhengs te/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings na
2b5(ya): bzhugs pa la glu 'dis bskul lo// e ma ho/ stong nyid rnam par dag pa'i klong yangs nas// snyoms pa'i
3a1(ya): @##thugs rje 'byung bar mi dmigs kyang // shes rab don dam chos sku dag pa las// ma 'gags thabs
3a2(ya): kyi snying rje nam mkha' ston// ho zhes bskal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad
3a3(ya): de bzhin nyid mnyam pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / yum kun tu bzang mos glu 'dis bskul
3a4(ya): lo/ e ma ho/ ma ltar byams pa'i snying rje chen po ni// mkha' ltar go yangs 'byed cing kun la khyab// rigs pa'i snying
3a5(ya): rje nam mkha'i dbyings rum nas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// ho zhes bskul lo// de nas bcom
3a6(ya): ldan 'das gsang ba gsum gyi bdag po des chos thams cad thugs rjes kun la khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
3b1(ya): zhugs so// de nas yang yum kun tu bzang mos glu 'dis bskul lo// e ma ho/ yi ge sku mchog nyi ma lta bu las// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul rdo rje gar mdzad
3b2(ya): cing / brjid pa'i sku mchog rdo rje 'dar ba las// thugs rje rol pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// ho zhes bskul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang
3b3(ya): ba gsum gyi bdag po des chos kyi sku skye ba med pa las/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ sprul pa'i sku dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
3b4(ya): bdag por sku bzhengs pa dang / yum kun tu bzang mo la glu 'dis bskul lo// a ma ho nga ni rang byung ba'i// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// dkyil
3b5(ya): 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yum kun tu bzang mos glu bdis bskul lo// e ma ho bad mcho
3b6(ya): bde ba yi// byang chub sems ni rab spros pas// thugs bskul rgyud sbyangs dbyings su thim// byang chub sems kyi thig le gsal// ho zhes bskul ba dang
3b7(ya): yab kyis bskul ba/ e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yi ge gsung gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// spros pa'i gsung bskul rang rgyud dag/ bsdus pas chos kyi
4a1(ya): phyag rgya'i don// zhes bskul bas/ yum gyis bskul ba/ e ma ho/ rtogs par dka' ba snying po'i don// bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs rgyud bskul//
4a2(ya): 'gro ba kun gyi shes pa bkrol// thugs kyi phyag rgyar bstan pa'o// zhes bskul nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i mkha' nas bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho gzhal
4a3(ya): yas khang dang bcas pa sprul lo// de yang bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas pho brang lhun gyis grub pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs shing thugs rje
4a4(ya): chen pos thams cad la khyab pas/ mtha' dang dbus med par kun tu rgyas shing rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i
4a5(ya): phyir ya shas kyi sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ka ba dang bcas pa/ gcig dang du ma dang bral zhing spros pa med pas dkyil 'khor zlum po/ chos kyi bakhor lo 'gro ba yongs la
4a6(ya): bskor ba'i phyir/ kun gyi pho brang ye shes kyi 'khor lor gnas/ yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa rdzogs shing thugs rje'i rlabs dang ldan pas/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor las 'od zer
4a7(ya): sna tshogs 'phro ba/ ye shes chen po mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' bas ta la'i ljon shing dang / sems can gyi ra ba yid bzhin du skong bas dpag bsam gyi shing gis brgyan pa/
4b1(ya): thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir lha chen po brgyad rnams kyis bskor ba/ mi shigs shing mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje bi ra ba dang / nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i ma ri 'bar ba'i ra bas bskor ba
4b2(ya): sprul lo// de lta bu'i ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhal yas khang der/ lha thams cad kyi gnas su rang bzhin gyi ya na sa bod
4b3(ya): gsal bas nyi zla'i gdan dang // ma chags pad+ma bi gdan sa bon gyi tshul gyis spros par gyur to// khyad par du mi 'jigs pa bzhis bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rtags su dbus
4b4(ya): su sang ga'i khri dang / stobs bcu dang ldan zhing mi dag pa bcu 'dul ba'i rtags su shar du glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtags su lhor
4b5(ya): rta'i khri dang / dbang bcus mthar phyin pas rgyal ba'i rtags su nub tu rma bya'i khri dang / 'phrin las rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtags su byad du shang shang gi khri sprul
4b6(ya): zhing bkod do// der bde bar gshegs pa rigs lnga byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa sprul te/ chos thams cad bdag med pa dang byang chub kyi
4b7(ya): sems dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sku mdog dkar po/ de bzhin nyid la cis kyang bsgyur du med pas rdo rje'i rigs kyi sku mdog mthing nag/
5a1(ya): yon tan gyi gter zad mi shes shing thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pas rin po che'i rigs sku mdog gser lta bu/ chos thams cad chags pa dang chags
5a2(ya): par bya ba med pas pad+ma'i rigs sku mdog dmar po/ 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir las kyi rigs sku mdog ljang khur gnas so// de bzhin gshegs
5a3(ya): pa de dag kyang srid pa'i 'khor lo rgyun gcod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag na ye shes kyi 'khor lo// cis kyang mi 'jigs shing mi 'gyur bas rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag na rdo rje//
5a4(ya): dgos 'dod kyi re ba skong bas rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag na rin po che/ 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pas pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag na pad+ma/ mtha' bzhi gnod pas las kyi rigs kyi
5a5(ya): phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams nas/ mnyam pa'i skyil krung dang / rdo rje skyil krung dang / rin po che'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i skyil krung dang / las kyi rigs kyi skyil krung
5a6(ya): gos bzhugs pa so so rang rang gi gdan gyi steng du sprul lo// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems ma rnams ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor bas sems
5a7(ya): dpa'i skyil krung du bzhugs nas/ rang rang gi rigs kyi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin pa sprul lo// de dag thams cad kyang sku mnyan pa dang / lhug pa dang //
5b1(ya): 'brel ba dang / ldem pa dang / gzhon tshul can dang / gsal ba dang / 'tsher ba dang / lhun byug pa dang / brjid chags pa dang / gzhan yang thun mong gi rgyan dbu rgyan dang /
5b2(ya): rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / snyan cha dang / mgur chu dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / dpung rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / zhabs gdub dang / dar
5b3(ya): gyi cod pan dang / chos gros dang / smad g.yogs dang / smad dkris mdzad pa/ dAr gyi gsang gos dang bcas te 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po sna tshogs su 'phro ba lta bus brgyan nas
5b4(ya): phyogs phyogs su 'khod do// de ltar bde bar gshegs pa rdo rje'i rigs dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / las kyi rigs dang / de bzhin
5b5(ya): gshegs pa'i rigs lnga so so'i btsun mo dang / 'khor gyi sems dpa' dang sems ma dang / so so'i 'khor tshogs til gyi gang bu bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa yum kun
5b6(ya): tu bzang mo'i mkha' nas/ rang rang gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgu rgyan dang bcas pa 'thon te/ ye shes rang snang gi lha tshogs snang la rang bzhin med pa/ lhan ne
5b7(ya): lham me lhang nga gsal bar gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u dang po'o// / de nas bcom
6a1(ya): ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho bcom ldan gsang bdag che// rigs
6a2(ya): kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i// zhi ba dam pa rigs brgya yi// sgrub thabs bdag la bshad du
6a3(ya): gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig khyab bdag rdo rje sems// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas
6a4(ya): dam pa rigs brgya bsgrub pa dod na// bkra shis yid 'ongs dben pa'i gnas// shar ri dma' la lhor gzhol// nub ri mtho la byang ri skyob// mdun na me tog snam bu yod//
6a5(ya): bya rgyal khu byug sgra yang grag/ rtsi shing me tog yal ga bskyed// dri zhim spos kyi ngad ldang ba// 'dod pa'i longs spyod pa sgrub pa'i gnas// dar ni zhi ba bsgrub par bya//
6a6(ya): dkyil 'khor sngags bu gru bzhi pa// dri sna lnga yis chag chag gdab// tshon sna lnga yi srad bu yis// thig ni bcu drug dag tu gdab// de las dkyil 'khor chen po dgu// 'khor
6a7(ya): lo rtsibs brgyad gru chad dang // bar khyams sgo bzhir ldan pa la// phyi rim par khyams sgo dang ni// rta babs rgyan dang khor yug ldan// tshon rna lnga yis legs par bri//
6b1(ya): de la phyag mtshan yig phra bra'am// yang na sku yi gzugs brnyan dgod// thog mar byang chub sems bskyed de// yan lag bdun gyi tshogs bsags la// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rim bsgom
6b2(ya): zhing / rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las// de nyid byang chub sems su gyur// 'byung lnga yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems las rim bzhin bskyed// phyag rgya'i dkyil
6b3(ya): 'khor ldan pa yang // bdag shags lha tshogs bcu phrag bcu// phyag rgya thig le ldan par bsgom// rang sems yi ga a dkar nyid// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la lhung // spre
6b4(ya): brdzu las ni 'khor lor gyur// de yi 'phro 'du'i rang bzhin las// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo la// rnam par snang mdzad kun bzang yum// rigs rnams kun gyi bdag por
6b5(ya): brtags// mi bskyod pa dang sangs rgyas spyan// rin chen 'byung ldan gos dkar mo// de bzhin snang mtha' ma ma kI// 'dod pa'i don grub dam tshig sgrol// rang gi
6b6(ya): rigs kyi cha bzung ste// bu dad pa'i'o tshul gyis 'khor du bskyed// cho ga yongs rdzogs de nas ni// kun bzang rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// 'jam dpal dang ni rin chen dbyings
6b7(ya): spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i dbyings// rdo rje 'chang dang las dbyings ma// shar lho nub byang go rim bzhin// dkyil 'khor gtso bor bskyed bya ste// rdo rje rin chen
7a1(ya): pad+ma dang // sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// sa snying rdo rje sems ma dang // mkhab snying rin chen sems mar bcas// byams pa
7a2(ya): pad+ma'i sems ma dang // sgribasal las kyi sems ma ni// rin chen snyem za ma tog/ klu shing po ti mtshan mar 'dzin// shar lho la sogs mtshams rnams kyi//
7a3(ya): dkyil 'khor gyi ni gtso bor brtag/ khyad par so so'i 'khor rnams kun// shar nas gzung ste gong bzhin bskyed// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha mo sgeg pa mo dag
7a4(ya): dang / rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu 'dzin// de bzhin pa drug pa mo dag dang // rdo rje chags pa mda' dang gzhu// 'dzin dang de bzhin lcags kyu ma// rdo rje legs pa rdo rje dag
7a5(ya): ba dzin mdzad rdo rje ma sgron ma// shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// kun tu bzang po'i 'khor du skyed// rdo rje rin chen rin chen 'dzin// de bzhin du ni 'phreng ba mo//
7a6(ya): rdo rje'i gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od// 'dzin par mdzad dang me tog ma// rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhags pa ma// rdo rje bzhad pa so 'phrang 'dzin// bde ba rlung yab 'dzin pa ni//
7a7(ya): lho phyogs 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor la'o// rdo rje chos zhes pad+ma 'dzin// dbyangs mkhan pi wang 'dzin ma dang // rdo rje rnon po gcod pa'i gro// 'dzin dang rdo rje
7b1(ya): mar me ma// rdo rje sgru ba lce 'dzin pa// rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs ma dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'khor lo na// 'khor lo 'dzin dang gsal bkrum// rma bya ba dzin pa nub phyogs
7b2(ya): kyi/ spyan ras gzigs dbang 'khor du'o// rdo rje las ni rgya gram 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje gar bsgyur ma// rdo rje bsrung ba go cha 'dzin// byug pa ma ni dri badzin ma//
7b3(ya): rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes bya ba// mche ba 'dzin dang dril 'khrol ma// rdo rje khyer tshur 'dzin mdzad dang // 'bebs ma bum pa'i chu 'dzin rnams// byang gi dkyil 'khor
7b4(ya): 'khor lo la// phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor du'o// rdo rje rgyal mtshan chu srin 'dzin// bde ba rgyus 'debs khag kha// dbang phyug rgyal po lcags kyu 'dzin// bde ba tha
7b5(ya): byed mda' dang gzhu// bkod pa'i rgyan ni me tog 'dzin// bde ba rmongs byed phyag rgya bsnol// rin chen bod 'phro rin chen dang // bde bas tsha 'phel dril 'dzin ma//
7b6(ya): shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// sa yi snying po'i 'khor du bskyed// snang ba'i 'od ces rdo rje 'dzin// khrus kyi lha mo bum 'dzin ma// phyag rgya'i rgyal po
7b7(ya): mda' gzhu nyid// 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan lha mo dang // spos kyi glang po za ma tog/ 'dzin mdzad bla re'i lha mo dang // spobs brtsegs kun 'dren lcags kyu
8a1(ya): ni/ 'dzin dang gdugs kyi lha mo rnams// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// nam mkha'i snying po'i 'khor du'o// pad+ma rgyal po pad+ma 'dzin/
8a2(ya): lha mo pad+ma dpal be'u ste// pad+ma dam pa kha dbye'o// lha mo 'jigs byed pa khor lo 'dzin// rdo rje mi g.yo po ti 'dzin// skyon bral phyag na pad+ma'o// thogs med rgyal
8a3(ya): po lcags kyu dag/ 'dzin mdzad skyon bral lha mo ni// rgyal mtshan thogs te nub byang gi/ byams pa'i 'khor du bskyed par bya// rin chen dbang sdud rin po che//
8a4(ya): snga skyabs can gadrub bu 'dzin// grub pa'i las kyis rgya gram bri// rin chen 'dzin zhing lha mo ni// dri me mo yis bum pa 'dzin// dga' ston rgya gram rdo rje
8a5(ya): 'dzin// lha mo sgra sgrogs dung 'bud pa'o// mi g.yo mtha' ni bsam gtan mdzad// lha mo thogs med gser nya 'dzin// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil
8a6(ya): 'khor du// sgrib pa rnamasal 'khor du bskyed// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag kun// gtso bo rigs kyi mdog yin te// dkyil 'khor bye brag re re la//
8a7(ya): rigs kyi kha dog so sor bsgom// dkyil 'khor phyi yi bar khyams la// shar stod lha yi thub pa ste// dkar po pi wang 'dzin par byed// shar smad lha min
8b1(ya): thub pa ste// sngon pa phyag na go mtshon bsnams// lho phyogs mi yi thub pa ste// ser po gseg shang bar bu 'dzin// nub stod byol song thub pa ni// nag po
8b2(ya): po ti 'dzin par byed// nub smad yi dgas thub pa ni// dmar po rin chen sgrom bu 'dzin// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa ni// lhung khum dang chubasnams pa'o// shar
8b3(ya): sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma// lhor sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma// nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// byang du rdo rje dril 'khrol ma// rigs kyi mdog dang ldan pa ni// so /
8b4(ya): so'i gnas su bskyed par bya// de ltar bde gshegs rigs brgya yi// sku bskyed de nas spun drangs la// bzhugs su gsol te phyag btsal bya// phyi nang mchod
8b5(ya): pa ci 'byor dbul// bstod do gsol ba btab nas ni// sngags kyi bzlas pa'i 'phro 'du bya// oM a li kA li dz+nyA na pany+tsA sa twa kro d+ha mu na ya swA hA/ thog mthab o dang
8b6(ya): ha gzhag nas// bar na yig 'bru bcu drug gnas// dam pa rigs brgya 'dus pa'i sngags// thams cad 'grub par byed pa yin// skra ga sung thugs kyi dngos
8b7(ya): grub thob// phyogs bcu dus gsum bde gshegs rnams// nges don dam pa rigs brgyar 'dus// bde gshegs kun gyi dngos grub thob// ces gsungs
9a1(ya): so/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ dam pa rigs brgya sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas
9a2(ya): yang dpal rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa/ kye ma gsang bdag kun tu bzang // gdul bya 'dod chags can dag la// bde gshegs sangs rgyas bzhi bcu gnyis// ye
9a3(ya): shes bskyed pa'i sgrub thabs gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zhi ba sangs rgyas bzhi bcu gnyis// rnal 'byor skal ldan bsgrub 'dod pas// dben zhing
9a4(ya): dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// rin chan ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes// lhag pa'i ye shes glo 'bur can// khyams dang sgo khyud rnam par mdzes
9a5(ya): dbus su pho brang zlum po la// chu shel dag la hU gnas pa// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ ras bal stan la bdug nas ni// shar gyi phyogs su kha ltas te//
9a6(ya): yu la gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // phyi nang med par kun tu gas la// sang ga glang chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha' lding gi khri
9a7(ya): steng na/ nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// rnam snang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rin chen 'byung ljon snang mtha' yas// mchod pa don yod grub pa ste// kun bzangs yab yum 'dod la
9b1(ya): chags/ sems dpa' sems ma mchod tshul can// sa snying nam mkha'i snying po dang // spyan ras gzigs dang rdo rje 'chang // rigs kyi mdog can de dag kyang // rin chen
9b2(ya): myu gu ral gri dang // pad+ma rdo rje rtsa lnga 'dzin// kun bzangs mdog dkar snyam 'dzin// byams pa dkar skya gun d+he'o// sgrib sel mdog sngon po ti 'dzin// bajam dpal dkar
9b3(ya): ljang ut+pa la// la sa sngon mo ma long 'dzin// mA le ser mo rin chen 'phreng // pi wang rgyud 'dren gi rti dmar// nir ti ljang khu cod pan 'chang // me tog ma dang bdug pa mo//
9b4(ya): mar me dag byed dri chab ma// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// thub drug ta krid slob brgyad// thod dbyug bsnams pa gshin rje gshad// stobs chen rdo rje rtse
9b5(ya): gsum mo// rta mgrin thod sbrul pad+ma 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khril// ro langs mi 'pham ral gcig ma// khro gnyer ma ste yum 'di dag/ lcags
9b6(ya): kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rim bzhin thogs pa phyogs kyi bdag/ 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas bakhrigs pa'i bod// zhi ba'i
9b7(ya): tshul dgus bstan pa yis// chags pa can la dngos grub ster// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+huh+ma AH/ thog mtha' au dang a gzhag nas// bar na bcu gnyis
10a1(ya): grong mdzes pa// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis snying po yin// de nas stong nyid yin shes nas// rang rig sems su rnam par brtag/ dag pa'i spyod lam ma
10a2(ya): zhen pa/ snang lam zhe na sgyu mar gnas// dag pa'i yul du longs spyod byed// rang gi sems su rnam par brtag/ rnal 'byor yo byad rnam gnyis po// rang las byung
10a3(ya): zhing rang la spyod// des na rnal 'byor dbang phyug cha// gsang ba'i dgro gsum gsod pa dang // 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi tshems gyur nas// 'gro drug g.yang sa chod pa'o//
10a4(ya): tshad dang ldan por gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis brtag/ bde gshegs kun gyi ngo bo ste// rang las byung zhing rang las grol// zhes gsungs so// bde gshegs
10a5(ya): 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa// a ma sbyi pal kun tu bzang
10a6(ya): de nyid rigs lnga sgrub pa'i thabs// nyon mongs rnams kyi gnyen po che// legs pa nyid du bshad du gsol// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// de nyid rigs lnga pasgrub pado//
10a7(ya): pas/ yid 'angs dben pa'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal byi dor byas nas ni// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i chag chag godag/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i dmigs rten dgod// yul
10b1(ya): gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad sgo bzhi rgyan gyis mdzes// phyi nang med par kun tu gsal// sang ge glang rta rma bya khyung //
10b2(ya): nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad de// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan yin// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas so//
10b3(ya): byang du don yod grub pa ste// rang rang rigs kyi kha dog la// 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje dang // rin po che dang pad+ma dang // ral gri g.yas na 'dzin mdzad cing // g.yon pa dril
10b4(ya): bu bsnams pa'o// yum dang yab dang gnyis med 'khril// de ltar brtan pa thob pa dang // gsang ba'i snying po lnga yis sbyang // oM tsU tra hri hA/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
10b5(ya): thams cad ni// don mtshon rgyal ba rigs lngar 'dus// rigs lnga dpa' bo 'bru lngar 'dus// ba bru lnga yi ge ar bsdus shing // de nyid skye med klong du thim// bde gshegs
10b6(ya): dgongs bcud nges don 'dis// sku lnga ye shes rnam lnga yi// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bde gshegs 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las//
10b7(ya): de nyid rigs lnga bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas lang zhus pa// spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang //
11a1(ya): bde bar gshegs pa kun bsdus pa'i// gsang chen rigs gcig sgrub pa'i thabs// legs pa nyid du bshad du gsol// spyi dpal chen
11a2(ya): pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' che// gsang chen rigs gcig bsgrub 'dod pas// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas nas
11a3(ya): ni/ dri zhim spos kyis chag chag gdab// mthing kha hUM yig dmigs pa'i rten// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sku mdog dkar po
11a4(ya): shel ltar dag/ g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brtan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan par bsgoms// de mi spyi bo mgrin pa
11a5(ya): dang / snying la gnas ni gsum po ru// 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje'i stang // oM dang A dang hU dag gi/ yig 'bru gsum gyi 'phro 'du yis// bad gshegs sku gsung thugs bskul
11a6(ya): zhing / khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sgrib pa rnam gsum sbyang phyir bzlas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// rigs brgya rigs lnga ji snyed
11a7(ya): rnams// gsang chen rigs gcig 'di la 'dus// snying po yi ge 'bru gsum gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// zla gcig zla drug bcu gnyis kyi// lhun
11b1(ya): gyis grub pa'i sa la sbyor// gter chen thob pa zla ba gcig/ brtan pa thob pa zla ba drug/ stobs su gyur pa bcu gnyis yin// 'thun par kun la spyod la 'jug/ dngos grub thob
11b2(ya): par gdon mi za// nos gsungs so// bde gshegs 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsang chen rigs gcig bsgrub pa'i le rtse lnga pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas
11b3(ya): yang zhus pa// a ma spyid pa la kun tu bzang // rigs lnga'i bye brag so so nyid// rnam par phye ste bsgrub pa gang // phyi ma'i don du rim bzhin gsungs// kun tu ba
11b4(ya): pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' che// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin rigs mchog bsgrub 'dod pas// hUM chen gser gyi mdog 'dra ba//
11b5(ya): de bzhin rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtsa la gtad par bya// dmigs pa yul gsum gsal ba dang // mkhas pas rnam par snang mdzad nyid// sku mdog dkar po 'od zer ba bar//
11b6(ya): gsal ba tsher lhun phyug gzi byin 'bar// phyag na gser gyi 'khor lo bsnams// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// rnam par snang mdzad nyid du
11b7(ya): brtag/ ces gsungs so// de bzhin rigs mchog bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje rigs mchog bsgrub 'dod pas/
12a1(ya): mtshon gang hU yig shel gyi mdog/ rdo rje rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// de la dmigs pa gsal brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar
12a2(ya): gyur pa dang // mkhas pas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sku mdog mthing kha bod du 'bar// g.yas g.yon rdo rje dril bu bsnams// glang chen bsnol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// de
12a3(ya): ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// mkhas pas rdo rje sems dpar brtag/ rdo rje rigs mchog bsgrub pa'o// rin chen rigs mtshan
12a4(ya): de bzhin gshegs// rin chen 'byung ldan pasgrub 'dod pas// hUM chen bcom gser gyi mdog/ rin chen rigs kyi sa bon to// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// de la dmigs
12a5(ya): pa rab brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // mkhas pas rin chen babyung ldan nyid// sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar// phyag gnyis rin chen dril bu
12a6(ya): 'dzin/ shugs 'chang rta yi khri la bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid du brtag/ rin chen rigs
12a7(ya): mchog bsgrub pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs// snang ba mtha' yas bsgrub 'dod pas// dmar po hUM gi ngo bo las// pad+ma rigs kyi
12b1(ya): sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// de la dmigs pa rab brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // mkhas pas snang ba mtha' yas nyid// sku mdog
12b2(ya): dmar la 'od zer 'bar// phyag gnyis pad+ma dril bu bsnams// rma bya ba snol ba'i gdan la bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na//
12b3(ya): snang ba mtha' yas nyid du brtag/ pad+ma'i rigs mchog bsgrub pa'o// las kyi rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs// don yod grub pa bsgrub 'dod pas//
12b4(ya): ljang khu hU gi sa bon las// las kyi rigs kyi sa bon te// sna yi rtse la gtad par bya// de la dmigs pa rab brtan nas// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang //
12b5(ya): mkhas pas don yod grub pa nyid// sku mdog ljang khu ba bar ba las// g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon dril bu// gsal 'tshar lhun stug gzi byin 'bar// mkha' lding
12b6(ya): shang shang khri stengs na// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// de ltar gsal zhing brtan pa des// tshad dang ldan par gyur pa na// don yod grub pa nyid du brtag/ ces
12b7(ya): gsungs so// las kyi rigs mchog bsgrub pa'o// bde gshegs 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya rkyang pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
13a1(ya): zhi ba'i skabs te dang po'o// // de nas dpal kun tu bzang po de chos thams cad stong pa chen po sku gsung thugs mi dmigs
13a2(ya): pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la bzhugs pa la/ yum kun tu bzang mo skad cig gis gsang ba'i yum khro mo gnam zhal mar gyur nas/ gsang ba'i glu 'di blangs te bskul lo// ho
13a3(ya): yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus// chos kyi dbyings las dam tshig nye bar bzhengs// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i glong // mi gnas mi dmigs chos kyi
13a4(ya): dbyings nas bzhangs// zhes bskul bas/ dpal kun tu bzang pos stong pa nyid kyi ngang las che mcho ga ha ru ka'i skun mngon par phyang nas/ gsang ba'i yum gnam zhal
13a5(ya): ma la gzigs te rol pa'i chas sna tshogs mdzad do// de nas yum gyi rol pa chen po'i gla 'dis gsol ba btab bo// tshogs chen gaunyis rdzogs don dam dbyings kyi lha//
13a6(ya): longs spyod rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku// che mchog he ru bskal bzang dpal tshon khyod// thabs kyi rol pas bde chen dbyings nas bzhangs// zhes bskul
13a7(ya): bas cho 'o phrul chen pos rnam pa kun la khyab par mdzad do// de nas yum gyis yab la yang cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i glu ba ris gsol ba btab bo// ya shas sgyu ma rnam par
13b1(ya): rol pa'i ske// thabs dang shes rab che la mnga' brnyes pa'i// thugs rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas// pad gshegs bde bar gshegs mdzad sku bzhengs shig/
13b2(ya): zhes bskul bas drag po 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs so// da nas yum kun tu bzang mo 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu glu 'dis bskul
13b3(ya): te gsol ba btab bo// a ma ho/ yid bzhin sku mchog nyi ma lta bu las// byams pa'i byin brlabs cha mchog gar mdzod cig/ gzi byin sprin phung rol pas bsgyings/
13b4(ya): pa'i sku// thog med che mchog rol pa'i cho ba phrul ston// e ma ho/ yid bzhin gsung mchog nam mkha' lta bu las// snyan pa'i byin rlabs cha mchog brjod mdzod
13b5(ya): cig/ yan lag rgya mtsho mi zad bkod pa ga srung // sang gi sgra yis gsang sngags rgya mtsho ston// a ma ho/ ya shas snying po nyi ma lta bu las// ye shes byin
13b6(ya): rlabs cha mchog bde mdzod cig/ thig le spros bra la rnam par mi rtog thugs// rnam grol de nyid nges pa'i tshe ba phrul ston// mi shes bla na rmongs pa dam bying 'khor ba
13b7(ya): rnams/ sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bcings pa thabs kyis khrol// ma rig mun pa ldongs pa don gyi phye// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rol pa'i rlung gis sgrol// nad dang
14a1(ya): 'thun par sman gtang ji bzhin du// gdul bya'i dbang du sku bzhengs 'gro ba sgrol// zhes bskul lo// de nas 'jigs byed chen po
14a2(ya): dpal che mchog he ru kas chos nyid brdal ba chen po'i ngang / kun gzhi ya nas bangs pa'i dbyings nyid las skye ba'i cho 'phrul du/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin yum gyi mkha' klong rnam
14a3(ya): par dag pa 'byung ba rnam pa lnga brtsegs pa ni/ a ya ra su ke ra zhes pas/ kun stong nam mkha'i rang bzhin yi ge e yis mtshan pa dang / 'jig rten 'dags byed rlung gi dkyil 'khor
14a4(ya): yam gis mtshan pa dang / thams cad skyed byed khrag gi rgya mtshor yis mtshan pa la 'dod khams gnas rigs nyi shu rdzogs par gsal pa/ 'dags byed brtan pa'i zhing chan gyi
14a5(ya): sa gzhi sum gyis mtshan pa la gzugs khams gnas rigs bcu bdun rdzogs par gsal ba/ 'byung ba'i drod snyoms bskal ba'i ma ri raM gyis mtshan pa dang / bajig rten brtan byed
14a6(ya): keng rus kyi ri rab ka gis mtshan pa la gzugs med skye mched mu bzhi rdzogs par gsal ba/ kaM rus ri rab chen po'i kha la rin chen mu tig 'bar ba bkram pa la nyan thos kyi
14a7(ya): theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ rin chen as ma gar ba ba khrigs pa la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i brag gtams pa la byang chub sems
14b1(ya): dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ de lta bu'i steng na ye shes lnga ldan pan d+ha 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang mtha' dbus med pa kun tu khyab pa/ ta la'i skyed shing dang gser gyi tsong
14b2(ya): cotsong 'khril ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po gcig la yongs su rdzogs pa dgu dang ldan pa/ brjod par dka' ba'i dur khrod chen po rak+ta'i rba glong 'khyil pa// rus pa'i phung po 'khrol ba/
14b3(ya): khrag zhag gi zham chu ba bab pa/ ban+d+ha gsar rnying brtsegs pa'i pho brang / lha chen tshangs pa'i ka gdung / lha bran gyi dral drab/ zhing gi rkang rtsibs kyi gral bu/ zhing lpags
14b4(ya): kyis thog phub pa/ zhing chen rlon pa'i 'phan gdugs dang rgyu ma'i lnga ldis brgyan pa/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang rta babs chen po bzhis brgyan pa/ dur khrod kyi ma ri dmar nag dang rdo rje
14b5(ya): ra bas bskor ba la phyi 'i thag pa gsum yongs su rdzogs pa/ dbus kyi pho brang rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i sa gzhi la paM las pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma stong du brdal ba la rnal
14b6(ya): 'byor gsum gyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ de lta bu'i ma chags pad+ma 'bar ba'i khar thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i steng du lha brgyad klu brgyad bsnol ba'i gdan la/ byol song
14b7(ya): gtso bo brgyad kyi khri bshams pa ni/ dpa' brtul chen po stag gi khro dang / bajigs byed chen po seng ge'i khri dang / gdug pa chen po gzig gi khri dang / gtum pa chen po
15a1(ya): dom gyi khri dang / stobs kyi rgyal po glang po che'i khri dang / brjid pa'i rgyal po ma he bi khri dang / 'jigs pa'i rgyal po chu srin gyi khri dang / zhe sdang gi rgyal po sprul
15a2(ya): gyi khri sta khyad par ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byol song gtso bo chen po brgyad kyi khri stangs su// srid pa'i 'khor lo log pa'i lam gyi dra ba gcod pa'i 'khor lo'i gdan la/
15a3(ya): chos kyi sku las longs spod rdzogs pa'i sku dpal cha mchog ha ru ka zhes bya ba/ dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dbus sa rnams yongs su gnon pa// phyag
15a4(ya): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi g.yos dang g.yon na/ zhi ba'i lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du bsnams pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang rje bor gyur pa/
15a5(ya): rgyal byed chen po lcags kyi chas dang / bas khrab dbang gi cha sa dang / gcan gzan gzig gi chas dang / sprul pa rdo rje'i chas dang / gdug pa sbrul gyi chas dang / dbab po
15a6(ya): stag gi chas dang / gzi mdangs zhing lpags kyi chas dang / dmar gsal khrag gi chas dang / rtsal chen sang ga'i chas dang / gtum pa dom gyi chas te/ dpal gyi
15a7(ya): chas bcus brgyan pa'i skur yongs su bzhengs so// de ltar 'jigs byed chen po'i sku dang / gzhal yas khang la chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la
15b1(ya): yum dang 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces bstod do// a ma ho// chos kun sku la yongs rdzogs chos kyi sku// sprin med mkha' la skar tshogs brgyan pa'i sku// rdzogs
15b2(ya): pa chen po che mchog he ru ka/ rdo rje phyag 'tshal he ru ka la'o// zhes bstod pas/ yab cha mchog gis yum khro mo ga nam zhal ma la dgyes pa chen po'i gzi mdangs kyis
15b3(ya): gzigs te/ yum gyi sku la dgyes pa'i mchod pa phul bas/ yum gyi mkha' las byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las/ sprul pa'i khro bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa phyogs bcu
15b4(ya): thams cad du 'phros pas/ 'jig rten gyi drags pa can lha chen po nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa thams cad bsgral te btul/ tshar bcad nas slar phyogs mtshams brgyad
15b5(ya): du bdus pas/ shar du thugs las sprul pa badz+ra ha ru ka zhes bya ba dang / lhor sku'i sprul pa gshin rje gshed po dang / nub tu gsung gi sprul pa dpal rta mgrin dang /
15b6(ya): byang du 'phrin las kyi sprul pa rdo rje gzhon nu dang / shar lhor yon tan gyi sprul pa brjod pa'i stobs can bla mad he ru ka dang / nub byang du las kyi sprul pa 'jigs pa'i stobs
15b7(ya): can dregs pa kun 'dul dang / byang shar du las kyi sprul pa gyad kyi stobs can stobs ldan nag po dang / lho nub tu rigs 'dzin rdo rje chos la sogs pa so so'i 'khor tshogs yum
16a1(ya): dang bcas pa bangs te/ khams gsum srid gsum pa jigs par byed pa'i khro bo'i tshogs gzhal yas khang pho brang dgu dang bcas pa yab yum gyi mkha'
16a2(ya): las sprul te gsal bar gyur to// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo sngon 'byung gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas
16a3(ya): rigs bzhi he ru kas dpal chen po la phyag dang bskor ba byas te zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ sangs rgyas kun gyi yab chen po// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa yi//
16a4(ya): gdug byed log lta can rnams la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis// 'khor ba'i gnas ngan ji ltar gdul// dpal chen yab
16a5(ya): kyi bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // cha mchog yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs bzhi khro bob tshogs// drags pas la ngas pa'i ru rnams//
16a6(ya): zhi bas thul bar ma gyur nas// sangs rgyas thugs rdzas khros pa ni// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// bka' bzhin du ni
16a7(ya): bsgrub par bya// gang zhig khro bo bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod chen po rab bajigs pa// gnam sa gru gsum par gnas pa// ri ni sog po khros pa 'dra// shing dang
16b1(ya): gcan gzan rgya ba'i gnas// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas de ru// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// ba su ta yi rgyu ma yis// thig ni bcu drug dag tu gdab/
16b2(ya): de la dkyil 'khor chen po dgu// kun kyang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad par khyams sgo bzhir ldan// de dag phyi khyams sgo rnams dang // sgo rgyan lcags rir ldan pa ni// tshon sna lnga
16b3(ya): yis legs par dri// dur khrod brgyan dang mchod pa'i tshogs// dkyil 'alor brgyan rnams legs par dgod// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // so so'i lha tshogs ldan par
16b4(ya): bsgom// khyad par byol song khri stengs su// ye shes sems dpa' babs gyur te// spro bsdu cho ga gsum sbyor bas// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la//
16b5(ya): 'jigs pa'i dbu ni nyi shu gcig/ bde gshegs zhi ba bzhi bcu gnyis// phyag tu bsnams nas zhabs brgyad bgrad// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// rnga ma
16b6(ya): brjid skur bskyed mnyes pa'i yum// khro mo gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// stong pa bco brgyad dbyings dang sbyor// g.yas pa thabs mchog
16b7(ya): gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag stobs byed pa'i// yab yum gnyis med sbyor byas te// mkha' la khro bo 'chol pa spro// slar yang khro ba'i sprin 'dus nas//
17a1(ya): phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir bdus pa las// so so'i dkyil 'khor gtso bor bskyed// rang rang rigs kyi 'khor rnams kun// gsal zhing ma 'dres rdzogs
17a2(ya): par dgod// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo che mchog yab yum la// che mchog rigs bzhi yab yum dang // drags pa 'dul ba'i khro bo bcu// ta krid sgo ba ba'i dang
17a3(ya): bcas/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// badz+ra he ru ka yab yum la// khrag 'thung rigs bzhi yab yum dang // kai ri ma dang 'phra man ma// rta gdong sgo ma bzhi dang bcas//
17a4(ya): lce yi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gshin rje gshed po yab yum la// gshed bzhi'i gshin rje yab yum dang // phyogs skyong gshin rje pho mo dang // gshin rje'i sgo ba bzhi dang
17a5(ya): bcas/ nub phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo rta mgrin yab yum la// bkab nyan 'phra men sprul pa dang // zin gnon khro rgyal yab yum dang // pad+ma'i sgo ba
17a6(ya): bzhi dang bcas// byang gi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum la// sras mchog rigs kyi phur pa bzhi// khro bo bcu dang de yi yum// za byad bcu dang gsod
17a7(ya): byed bcu// phur pa'i sgo ba bzhi dang bcas// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// bla med he ru yab yum la// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam pa lnga// ye shes las kyi rje mo
17b1(ya): dang / srid pa'i sman mor bcas pa'o// nub byang dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la// dregs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// byang shar mtshams kyi
17b2(ya): dkyil 'khor du// dpal chen stobs ldan yab yum la// sngags bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba bskyed// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// rigs 'dzin phyag na rdo rje la// grub
17b3(ya): pa'i rigs 'dzin brgyad dang bcas// dkyil 'khor phyi yi khyams la ni// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad bskyed// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // ging
17b4(ya): chen bco brgyad lang ka dang // ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar ma brgyad// sa bdag mo ni sum bcu gnyis// pho nya drug cu rtsa gnyis dang // ba bum phrag yangs pa'i ma khab bgro ma//
17b5(ya): dpal gyi bka' nyan thams cad dgod// de ltar ting 'dzin lha yi tshogs// sku bskyed spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// gus pa'i sgo nas phyag btsal te// mchod cing bstod la
17b6(ya): 'phrin las bcol// tshogs dang lhag ma'i mchod pas mchod// sngags kyi baizlas pa 'phro 'ud bya// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ thog mtha' au
17b7(ya): dang phaT gzhag nas// bar na grong khyer bcu drug gnas// khro bo spyi bsdus snying po yin// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed// ces gsungs so// bde gshegs
18a1(ya): 'dus pa'i rgyud la/ khro bo 'jigs byed chen po'i bsgrub pa yang dag par spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor de dag gi/
18a2(ya): bsgrub pa bsdus pa yang dag bshad// dben zhing dgon 'chigs na ru// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhal phye nas// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams bya// de nas bskyed pa'i don la
18a3(ya): 'jug/ dang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// gnyis pa kun tu snang gi ngang // rgyu yi ting 'dzin rim pa las// 'byung ba lnga yi rim pa brtsegs// de lteng sa b+h+rUM las gzhal las
18a4(ya): khang / rigs rnams so so'i dkyil 'khor kun// kun kyang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bcas// phyi rol khyams chen gcig nyid la// sgo bzhi brgyan dang dur khrod dang //
18a5(ya): rdo rje ra ba me bod kyi// rim pa dag gis yongs su bskor// de nas gdan gyi dbye ba ni// drags pa bgro drug byol song ste// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su gding // rgyu yi/
18a6(ya): ye shes sems dpa' las// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// cha mchog he ru'i skur bskyed bya// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad pa// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du brgyad//
18a7(ya): rtsa ba'i zhal gsum mthing nag rngam// lhag ma sna tshogs pa yi mdog/ rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge'u chung dang // 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma che// ral gri dgra sta zhags pa ni// g.yas pa'i phyag tu
18b1(ya): rim shes bya// b+han dmar zhing dbyug thong gshol dang // nyi ma zla ba ri rab dang // mechu rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams// de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag na'o// gnam zhal shes rab
18b2(ya): dgyes par 'khril// dur khrod ches kyis sku brgyan cing // 'bar ba'i gar dgu ldan par bskyed// ya ba yum gnyis med byin rlabs las// mkha' la khro bo tshol pa spro// slar bdus
18b3(ya): dkyil 'khor brgyad la dgod// gtso bo rnams kyi skur brtag bya// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dang // so so'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba las// dkyil 'khor 'khor tshogs spro bar bya//
18b4(ya): gtso bo che mchog yab yum las// dregs pa phyogs skyong ba dul byed bcu// badz+ra he ru yab phum las// ka ri chen mo brgyud rnams spro// 'jam dpal gshin rje yab yum
18b5(ya): las/ phyogs skyong bcu gnyis 'khor dang bcas// pad+ma dbang chen yab yum las// zil gnon khro bo chen po brgyad// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum las// 'jigs pa'i khro buH/
18b6(ya): khro mor bcas// bla med ha ru yab yum las// ye shas rje mo bcu bzhi'o// dregs pa kun bdul yab yum las// chags pa dbang tshan sde brgyad bcas// stobs ldan nag
18b7(ya): po yab yum las// drag po sde brgyad 'khor gyis bskor// grub pa rdo rje badzin pa la// grub pa'i rigs 'dzin rnam pa brgyad// phyi khyams dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad//
19a1(ya): phyi yi lcags ri khor yug la// mkha' 'gro ging dang lang ka dang // ma sring ba bar ma pho nya dang // mkha' 'gro 'bum phrag yangs pa rnams// rang bzhin dpal
19a2(ya): gyi bkab sdod pa'o// de ltar ngo bo gsal bskyed nas// sku dang gsung thugs byin brlab cing // ye shes lnga yis dbang bskur la// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs te// mchod bston/
19a3(ya): 'phrin las bcol bar bya// yang na chos nyid de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang gsal dang la gzhag/ yang dag pa yi lam 'di la// gang dag 'jug dang mos pa de// lhun gyis grub
19a4(ya): pa'i sa la sbyor// tshe gcig nyid la the tshom med// ces gsungs so// bde gshegs bdus pa'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// /
19a5(ya): / de nas yang dag de nyid don// shin tu bsdus te bshad par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas de ru// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du 'gro ba'i
19a6(ya): las byas nas// ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag las// 'byung ba yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang // ke rus ri nab rtse brgyad las// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // tshom bu dgu
19a7(ya): yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dregs pa nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// kun la khyab par shes par bya// gdan stangs rgyu yi byin brlabs las// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag
19b1(ya): dbu gsum phyag drug pa// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs brgyad// dbus kyi zhal ni sku dang mtshungs// g.yas pa dkar dang g.yon pa dmar// rdo rje de bzhin ka pA la'i// bye brag
19b2(ya): rnam pa gsum gsum nyid/ phyag drug gis ni 'dzin par mdzad// dur khrod chas kyis lus la brgyan// gnyis med yum dang lhan cig sbyor// bskal pa'i ma dpung klong na
19b3(ya): bzhugs// 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'jigs par bsgom// yab dang yum gyi thugs ka nas// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// mthing nAg hUM gi 'phro
19b4(ya): thadu las// shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ gshin rje gshad ni de bzhin lho// nub tu rta mgrin rgyal po ste// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu'o// shar lho bla mad he ru ka/ nub byang dregs pa kun
19b5(ya): bdul yab// byang shar stobs ldan nag po'o// lho nub rigs 'dzin grub pa yin// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi la// che mchog rigs bzhi yab yum dang // rigs
19b6(ya): bzhi khrag 'thung chen po bzhi// gshed bzhi sbyor ba'i yum dang bcas// las kyi zas mchog bka' nyan dang // de bzhin rigs bzhi'i sras mchog dang // dbyings kyi yum
19b7(ya): dang rigs 'dzin bzhi// dregs pa'i sde dpon bzhi bzhi dag/ me long nang gi gzugs bzhin du// snang lam nges so sor rtog/ gang zhig de ltar goms pa dang //
20a1(ya): 'dzin las rgya mtsho langs la sgyur// mtshams med spyod pa'i skye bos kyang // bsgrubs na 'grub par gdon mi bya// zhes gsungs so// bde gshegs
20a2(ya): 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa shin tu bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // khri bo spyir bsgrub pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// / de nas
20a3(ya): yang rigs bzhi'i he ru kas nus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ phyogs bcu'i bde gang shegs thams cad kyi// yon tan 'dus pa sgrub pa'i thabs// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol//
20a4(ya): de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// cha mchog yon tan bsgrub 'dod pas// dur khrod dben pa'i gnas chen du// dkyil 'khor gyi
20a5(ya): dor byas nas kyang // bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab/ khrag chen thal chen bsres pa yis// mthong nag hUM yig mkhas pas bri// de nyid dmigs pa'i rten du bzhag
20a6(ya): yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // 'byung ba rnam pa lnga brtsegs shing // kai rus chen po'i ri rib steng // 'jigs pa'i
20a7(ya): dur khrod dkyil 'khor ni// rtsibs bzhi gru chad khyams dang bcas// sgo bzhi rgyan dang bcas pa la// phyi nang med par gsal ba'i nang // lha brgyad klu brgyad
20b1(ya): bkrol ba dang // byol song gtso bo brgyad kyi steng // dz+ha las che mchog he ruka/ khro mo gnas zhal yum dang bcas// yon tan 'dus pa'i sku yin te// 'khor
20b2(ya): dbus su bskyed par bya// bcom ldan rak+Sha ha ru ka/ smag nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo de bzhin pad+ma dang // sti ra'i rgyu zhags 'dab chags khyung // ba su
20b3(ya): 'dren zhing yum dang bcas// shar gyi rtsibs la mkhas pas bskyed// dpal chen gu h+ya ha ru ka/ ser nag mthing nag dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen thod khrag dgra sta dang //
20b4(ya): rgyu zhags stong gi 'jig rten rnams// bzung nas yum dang sbyor ba mdzad// lho yi rtsibs la bskyed par bya// bcom ldan bi sha ha ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing kha dkar//
20b5(ya): pad+ma ban dmar 'jig rten dang // dgra sta de bzhin gshol bsnams nas// shes rab yum dang bcas pa ni// 'bad pas nub kyi rtsibs la bskyed// bcom ldan ya k+Sha he ru ka/ ljang
20b6(ya): nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// sna tshogs rdo rje thod khrag bcas// ral gri dgra sta zhags pa dang // thong gshol thogs nas yum dang sbyor// byang gi rtsibs la bskyed par bya//
20b7(ya): phyi rim lha yi snam pu la// phyogs skyong 'dul ba'i khro bo che/ 'khor lo trail shul bsnams pa yi// dkar po'i mdog can shor du'o// dgra sta thod dbyug thogs pa yi//
21a1(ya): mdzugs pa jigs pakar bsgyud rgyu// dmar po rdzu mi rmugs pa can// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs smra'o// rdo rje rgya mdul bu badzin// snang khu byang du brgyud
21a2(ya): par bya/ ma dpal dbyug tho bsnams pa yi// dmar po mdog can shar lho mtshams// ral gri zhags ldan nag po che// lho dang nub kyi mtshams su bskyed// dmar skya ban+d+ha Ta
21a3(ya): yab bsnams/ nub byang dag gi mtshams su 'o// dgra sta de bzhin rtse gsum bcas// mthing kha byang shar mtshams su bskyed// sngo skya mda' gzhu bgengs pa dang // dud kha tho ba
21a4(ya): zhags pa bsnams// stang dang 'og tu bskyed bya ste// rang gi 'phrin las mtshan dang ldan// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rim bzhin thogs pa'i ta krid bzhi// ba
21a5(ya): gsal rngams pas bskyed byas la// gsang sngags 'di yang bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ thog mtha' au dang phaT gzhag nas// bar na grong khyer bcu gnas
21a6(ya): pa/ che mchog 'khor bcas snying po yin// sku gsal 'od zer 'a phro 'du bya// de nyid sems nyid yin shes na// logs na che mchog bsgrub tu med// dad ldan 'bad pa'i sgrub pa
21a7(ya): pos/ yon tan rigs 'dzin thob par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las// che mchog yon tan bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
21b1(ya): / de nas 'khor gyi nang nas badz+ra he ru ka bzhengs te 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ thugs kyi bsgrub pa bshad du gsol// dpal chen yab kyis
21b2(ya): bka' stsal pa// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa pos// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa// dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas pa la// khrag chen dag gis
21b3(ya): chag chag gdab// ro ras dag la hA gnas pa// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa// khrag gi
21b4(ya): rgya mtsho 'jigs pa'i dkyil// kai rus chen po'i ri rab kyi// stang gi 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// ye shes chen po'i gzhal yas khang // phyi dang nang med kun tu gsal//
21b5(ya): 'bar ba'i 'khor le rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir ldan// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas mdzes// babar ba'i khro bo mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he stag dang
21b6(ya): gzigs// gtum po dom gyis spar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chan la sogs bzung // nyi zla pad+ma zhing gi gdan// rim gyis gsal bar bskyed stangs su// hA la sa badz+ra ce
21b7(ya): ru ka mthong nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum rab tu brgad// rdo rje khaT rje'u chung g.yas// sti ra'i dbyug pa thod khrag dang // rgyu ma'i zhags pa g.yon
22a1(ya): na bsnams// kro d+hi shwa ri dgas par 'khril// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ thugs kyi rang bzhin 'dus pa yi// dkyil 'khor gtso bor bskyed par bya//
22a2(ya): bcom ldan bud+ha he ru ka/ smug nag mthing kha dmar ba'i zhal// sti ra'i dbyug pa rdo rje khyung // rgyu zhags b+han dmar ba su 'dzin// bud+ha kro d+hi shwa rir bcas// shar gyi rtsibs la
22a3(ya): bskyed par bya// bcom ldan rat+na he ru ka/ sar dmar mthing kha dmar ba'i zhal// rin chan byi dbyug dgra sta dang // 'jig rten thod khrag thong gshol bsnams// rat+na kro d+hi shA
22a4(ya): ri ra bcas// lho yi phyogs su mkhas pas bskyed// bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka/ dmar nag mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma becon dgra sta dang // stong gi 'jig rten la
22a5(ya): sogs pa// 'dzin par mdzad cing yum dang ljon// nub kyi rtsibs la bskyed par bya// bcom ldan karma he ru ka/ ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// sna tshogs rdo rje
22a6(ya): ral gri dang // dgra sta la sogs de bzhin du// bzung nas kro d+hA shwa rir bcas// mos pas byang gi phyogs su'o// dkyil 'khor lha yi snam bu la// ke seng 'phra man
22a7(ya): 'di dag dgod// ke ri ba na dmar byi dbyug ste// rtse ri mda' gzhu 'gangs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// pe ta byi za rdo ba phyar gnag/ pu ka dmar ser byis rgyu
22b1(ya): 'dren/ g+ha sa ma rung dmar khrag lung ldang // sme sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsan d+ha ser skya mchog lus 'brel// seng nga ser mo zhing za ser/ bya kri dmar mo lag bsnol stag/
22b2(ya): sril nag mo byis ldag wa// shAn mthing kha sha 'grad spyang // kri ta dmar po dung kr-i rgod// kang ka dmar mo zhing chung ngur// kha kha kha ro ban gri ga nag/ hu mthing lcags
22b3(ya): kyu ban dmar 'ug/ rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren// phag gdong sngon mo mche zhags sdom// dmar mo spre'u gdong lcags sgrog sdom// thal byed ljang khu dril ba khrol sbyang
22b4(ya): 'bar 'phro gsal bas thams cad 'phros// dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i gnyen por brtag/ gsang ba'i snying po 'di yang bzlas// oM ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo hUM phaTaH/ thog mtha'
22b5(ya): AM dang phaT gzhag nas// bar na 'bru bdun grong gnas pa// khrag 'thung lha rgyud srog snying yin// zhe sdang can gyi snod dag gis// ba bar ba gtu mo khro rngam pa'i gzugs//
22b6(ya): drag shul can gyis spyad pa'i phyir// dgra ba gags gdul phyir bsgrub par bya// thugs kyi rigs 'dzin thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs 'dus pabri rgyud las// yang dag
22b7(ya): thugs kyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed pos 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma spyi dpal
23a1(ya): kun tu bzang / u yi sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // dpal chan yab kyis bka' sprul pa// 'jam
23a2(ya): dpal sku yi bsgrub pa la// dur khrod chen po'i so phyogs su// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas pa la// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// khrag chen go ro tsa na yis//
23a3(ya): mthing nag hUM yig mkhas pas bri// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur ba dang // dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa// khrag gi rgya mtsho 'jigs
23a4(ya): pa'i dkyil// ke rus chen po'i ri rab kyi// stang na dur khrod gzhal yas khang // rtsibs bzhi gru chad khyams dang ldan// sgo bzhi lcags ri'i bcas pa yi// phyi
23a5(ya): dang nang med chos kyi dbyings// ma he chu glang zhing gi gdan// de stengs 'jam dpal gshin rje gshad// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku yi sprul pa trAM
23a6(ya): las bskyed// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brgyad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus nag zhal// rdo rje ral gri dgra sta g.yas// sdigs mdzub mdung thung ban
23a7(ya): dmar g.yon// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la brgyan// pe ta nag mo sku la 'khril// dgra sta phyar nas dung khrag stob// sgrol yum a ka dza ti ma// be dur mdog sngon
23b1(ya): gsal la 'tsher// tri shul g.yang gzhi g.yas na 'phyar// thod rlon tsat+ti g.yon na rtog/ 'jigs byed yab yum 'di dag kyang // dkyil 'khor gtso bor brtag par bya'o// ya ma rA dza ga sha
23b2(ya): rje gshed// zhal gsum dkar dmar mthing gi mdog/ ba khor lo tri shul lcags kyu dang // kha T+wAM dgra sta rgyu zhags thogs// g.yu yi ral gcig sku la 'khril// sgrol ba'i yum
23b3(ya): mchog re ma ti// mdog nag ral gri ne'u le 'dzin// shar gyi rtsibs la bskyed par bya// myos byed 'i bar bgashin rje gsher// zhal gsum dkar rdzo sar nag zhal// be con ral gri dgra
23b4(ya): sta dang / ban dmar 'khor lo lcags kyu bsnams// gtum mo ser nag g.yon du 'khril// sgrol yum khrag gi bdag mo ni// sU gri tsit+ta zhags 'dzin gnag/ lce yi rtsibs la bskyed
23b5(ya): par bya/ gshin rje gshed po ma ru rtse// zhal gsum dkar sngo dmar ba can// be con dbyug tho kha TA dang // thod khrag 'khor lo rgyu zhags 'dzin// lha mo 'od zer sku la
23b6(ya): 'khril// sgrol yum gling bzhi gtsug 'byam ma// mi snying thod khrag thogs pa ni// nub kyi rtsibs la bskyed par bya// ral po tshar dgu gshin rje gshed// dkar dang
23b7(ya): dmar dang dbus mthing zhal// be con rgya gram gtun shing dang // thong khrag 'khor lo rgyu zhags bsnams// sbyor ba'i yum dang gnyis su med// ldang nag sgrol byed mgo 'cha
24a1(ya): ma/ dgra sta thod khrag thogs pa ste// mkhas pas byang gi rtsibs la bskyed// de nas phyi yi snam bu la// phyogs skyong gshin rje bcu gnyis dgod//
24a2(ya): gshin rje nag 'joms mthing nag zhal// rdo rje rtse lnga dgra sta thogs// nag mo ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// gshin rje phya sangs dkar ser mdog/ tshe bum rdo rje thong
24a3(ya): gshol 'dzin// shel gyi gdong dgu dgas par 'khril// de bzhin kong tse zag 'joms nyid// rdo rje brag nag me 'khor lo// shal mig khro mo yum dang sbyor// a ba glang
24a4(ya): mgo smug cing ga nag/ kha baM kha dang lcags kya dag/ bzang nas dka rda skya mche gtsigs ldan// sro nag 'jigs byed ya ba ti// ra la gri lcags kyu thogs nas ni// dred kyi/
24a5(ya): a ba shams gnyis med 'khril// gshin rje mig dmar smug nag mdog/ ral gri sti ra'i dbyug pa 'chang // khrag gi ral gcig sku la sbyor// dmigs pa zhes bya dud pa kha/
24a6(ya): thod 'phreng lcags sgrog dmar po sdom// pus 'gro nag mo yum dang bcas// gshin rje rtol pa sngo nag mdog/ spu gri ban+d+ha khrag bkang dag/ 'dzin zhing spyan gsum yum dang
24a7(ya): sbor/ bdud 'joms gshin rje skrag cing gnag/ rdung byad tho ba ban+d+har bcas// skrag nag ral gcig dges par 'khril// chos kyi rgyal po dkar zhing bo tsher// rdo rje rtse gsum
24b1(ya): khram shing bcang // rdo rje ral gcig gson nas sbyar// gshin rjeb par ba dmar ba che// kye 'grub rtsis byang gtun shing nyid// lag tu thogs nas maH/ dgra tshal/
24b2(ya): dbyug ces bya gshin rje'i mtshan// mthing nag dbyug pa she rde'u// bzung nas phag mgo ma dang sbyor// gshin rje gshed gyur padi dag kyang // zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs kyis/
24b3(ya): rang gi gnas su legs bzhugs par// khro chen gtso bor dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor sgo rnams su// dkar zhing 'tsher ba bya rgod mgo/ rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang //
24b4(ya): mthing nag 'bar ba stag gi mgo/ dbyug pa zhags pa thogs pa dang // le brgan 'bar bkang ka'i mgo/ me yi pad+ma lcags sgrog bcas// spyang khu'i mgo can ldang zhing gnag/ rgya
24b5(ya): gram shel gyi gri gug 'dzin// shar nas gzung ste bkod nas kyang // 'bar gsal sgyu yi 'phro 'du bya// gsang sngags snying po 'od yang bzlas// oM a kro d+hi ka ya
24b6(ya): man+ta ka ha na ma tha b+han+da hUM phaT/ thog mtha'i o dang phaT gzhag nas// bar na bco lnga grong mdzes pa// gshin rje'i lha rgyud srog snying yin// skur gsal 'od zer 'phro 'du bya/
24b7(ya): ting dzin kyang du gyur pa dang // gshin rje gshed kyi lha rnams kun// mkhas pas rang gi sems su brtag/ sku mi rigs 'dzin thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs 'dus pa
25a1(ya): rgyud las/ 'jam dpal sku'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dpal rta mgrin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
25a2(ya): e ma spyi dpal khro bo'i rje// pad+ma gsung gi sgrub thabs gang // spyi dpal yab kyis bka' stsal pa// pad+ma gsung gi sgrub pa pos// ri bo 'dus pa'i sa phyogs su// dkyil 'khor
25a3(ya): byi der byos pa la// khrag chen mtshal gyis hUM yig bri// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
25a4(ya): khang // lha chen brgyad kyi ka ba la// gza' chen brgyad kyi gdung ma bre// rgyu skar nyi shu'i thog gis phub// sbrul nag klu yi bla rer bcas// phyi nang med par gzhal yas khang // klu
25a5(ya): chen brgyad kyi khri stengs su// pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po ni// sku mdog bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// kha T+wAM rdo rje sbrul zhags g.yas// dril bu d+haH
25a6(ya): dmar lcags sgrog g.yon// dbu gtsug rta mgo rta skad 'tsher// zhabs bzhi gdug pa'i klu rnams gnon// yum chen e ka dza ti ma// dmar nag spyan gsum sdang mig bgrang //
25a7(ya): phyag gnyis kha T+wA~M yab la 'khyud// g.yon bathod khrag gtso la stob// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gsung // yang dag bsdus pa'i skur bskyed bya// rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang //
25b1(ya): byi la dang ni pu shud mgo/ sku mdog bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// lcags kyu phur bu lag char 'dzin// shar nas gzung nas rim bzhin du// 'khor lo rtsibs la brtag par bya// dkyil
25b2(ya): 'khor lha yi phyi khyams la// ye shes khro bo zil gnon pa'i// khro chen phyag na rdo rje dang // 'khor lo de bzhin rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu bsnams// de bzhin las kyi khro bo dag
25b3(ya): zil gnon pad+ma spu gri dang // dbyug thol n+do dgra stA dang // sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// ye shes ma mo thams cad kun// zil gnon khro bo chen po ni// sdigs 'dzub lcags kyu sbrul zhags
25b4(ya): dang // lcags sgrog kha T+wAM rnge'u chung ba dzin// ye shes khyung chen zil gnon mdzad// rdo rjes dang me khyung dang // nam mkha' chu rlung de bzhin khyung // g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin
25b5(ya): du'o// ngo rgyud zil gno ni khro rgyal gtso// rdo rje thod skam rgyu zhags dang // dung khrag thod pa rlon pa dang // zhing gi dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o// srid pa'i mo brgyud thams cad kun//
25b6(ya): zil gnon rdo rje ral gri mda'// zhags pa de bzhin sdig mdzub dang // gzhu rnams phyag na go rims bzhin// 'jig rten srid pa'i klu rigs bzhi// rang bzhin gyis ni zil gnon
25b7(ya): ba'i/ phyag na dkar sar dmar ba'i sbrul// de bzhin khra sngo nag po 'chang // gza' chen brgyad po zil ka non pa'i// khro rgyal gtso bo'i phyag nyid na// rdo rje ral gri zhags pa dang /
26a1(ya): / dung khrag dbyug pa khyung bsnams pa// zil gnon khro bo 'di dag kun// g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// sku ni bskal pa'i me yi mdog/ dbu gtsug rtam
26a2(ya): ljang lu yi// skad kyis gdug pa so sor 'dul// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gdul bya kun// ma lus zil gyis gnon par byed// rang rang yum dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// dkar dang ser dang de
26a3(ya): bzhin dmar// ljang khu'i mdog can 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rim bzhin thogs pa'i sgo bar bcas// 'bar gsal rngam pa lhan nar bsgom//
26a4(ya): gsang ba'i snying po 'di yang bzlas// oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT gzhag nas// ba ra na bcu bzhi grong gnas pa// pad+ma lha brgyad snying po
26a5(ya): yin/ 1dbang gi thugs dam rgyud bskul zhing // khrag 'thung lha tshogs dgas pa dang // rnal 'byor nyams chags sdig sgrib 'byang // ye shes lha dang gnyis su med// gsung gi dgre
26a6(ya): 'dzin thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ pad+ma gsung gi sgrub thabs kyi le'ubu ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpal rdo rje gzhon nus 'di
26a7(ya): skad ces gsol to// e ma spyi dpal khro bo'i rje// 'o phrin las sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// phur pa 'phrin las bsgrub 'dod pas// gnam
26b1(ya): sa gru gsum par gnas pa// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// mthing nag hUM yig mkhas pas bri// yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang //
26b2(ya): dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // rtsibs bzhi sgo ba'i sa dang bcas// de nang dregs pa khyo shug dang // phyogs skyong nyi zla'i gdan stengs su// hUM las rdo rje gzhon nu ni//
26b3(ya): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// sku mdog bai DUR+Ya yi mdog/ rtse dgu rtsa lnga'i rdo rje che// phyag g.yas de bzhin g.yon pa na// kha T+wA~M kha dang ma dpung bsnams// mtha'
26b4(ya): gnyis ri rab phur 'dril zhing // zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dur khrod chad kyi sku brgyan nas// kha T+Ta thod pa khrag gis bkang // phyag tu bzung nas dgas pa'i yum// rgyas
26b5(ya): 'dabs ma dang lhan cig nyid// 'phrin las 'dus pa'i skur bsgom bya// gtso bo yab yum byin rlabs las// 'khor lo'i lha tshogs bskyed bya ba// shar du bud+d+ha kI la ya//
26b6(ya): dkar dang de bzhin dmar ser zhal// zhal gsum dkar dmar mthong gi mdog/ rdo rje dgra sta rgyu zhags dang // ral gri thogs pa 'dzum zhing skrag/ lce phyogs rat+na kI la ya//
26b7(ya): dkar dang de bzhin dmar sar zhal// bang dang dgra sta ral gri dang // becon bsnams te gru bzhi'i gzugs// nub tu pad+ma ki la la// zhal gsum dkar ser dmar ba'i gzus
27a1(ya): ral gri mdung thung mdab dang gzu// mtshan mar 'dzin pa dbang gi dbyibs// byang phyogs karma kI la'i zhal// dkar dmar ljang kha'i mdog can te// mdung
27a2(ya): dang gri gug lcags kyu dang // ral gri thogs pa drag po'i sku// 'jigs byed chen po 'di dag kun// mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// rdo rje gshog pas nam mkha' khengs// gru gsum
27a3(ya): e yi gdan la dgod// phyi yi khyams la dgod bya ba// 'jigs pa'i khro bracu yum dang ldan// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// tshangs la sogs pa zhabs bzhis gnon// rtsa ba'i
27a4(ya): phyag gis rdo rje dang // thod khrag dkrug cing mtha' gnyis kyis// ri rab phur bu 'dril mdzad cing // rdo rje'i gshog pas nam mkha' khyab// hUM mdzad sngo skya sar dmar zhal// mdab gzhu 'ges
27a5(ya): shing sgra 'byin yum// be con thogs dang sprul pa yi// 'phra man phag dang smigs bu'i mgo/ rnam rgyal dkar po sngo ljang zhal// rdo rje dung khrag snyoms ma ni// ral gri 'dzin zhing sprul
27a6(ya): pa yi// 'phra man stag dang bya rgod mgo/ dbyug sngon dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// me dpal dbyug thob dzin mdzad cing // rdo rje sngar mo lcags kyu'o// sprul pa g.yag dang bya reg
27a7(ya): mgod tagashin rje sngo skya ljang sngon mdog/ thod pa'i dbyug pa dgra sta thogs// dur khrod bdag mthod dbyug 'chang // sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i gdong // ljang sngon glug nag mi g.yo/
27b1(ya): mgon/ ral gri dang ni zhags pa bsnams// rdo rje ga tun khung tho ba 'dzin// sprul pa gzig dang khwa gdong ma// rta mgrin dmar dkar sngo ba'i zhal// spu gri zhags pa badzin
27b2(ya): mdzad cing // rdo rje gtum mo spu gri'o// sprul pa byil pu shud mgo/ 'dod rgyal dmar sar ljang khu'i mdog/ ba dan rdza yab 'chang dang yum// rdo rje snyems ma tho bas brdung /
27b3(ya): sprul pa spyang dang khra yi gdong // bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ldang dkar dmar// rdo rje rgya gram dril bu bsnams// rdo rje rlung ba byin dgra sta thogs// sprul pa sang ga pha wang mgo
27b4(ya): dkar dmar nag pa'i zhal mdog can// khams gsum rnam rgyal rdo rje sbrul// rdo rje gsod byed yum gri gug/ 'phra man dom dang sre mo'i mgo/ stobs chen dud kha nag
27b5(ya): dang ldang // tho ba phyag na bsnams pa ste// rdo rje skul byed rtse gsum 'dzin// ched dang byi gdong sprul pa'o// lcags kyu 'dzin dkar bu shud mgo/ zhags 'dzin gser mdog skya
27b6(ya): ka'i gdong // srin bya'i gdong dmar lcags sgrog thogs// dril 'khrol ljang khu khra gdong ste// ma lus gsal bar sku bskyed la// gsang sngags snying po pa di yang bzlas//
27b7(ya): oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya sarba big+ha nan ba hU phaT/ thog mtha' IM dang phaT gzhag nas// bar na bcu gnyis grong mdzes pa// spros bsdus phur pa'i 'phro 'du bya// baphrin
28a1(ya): las rnam bzhi pa las la sbyar// dgra bgegs gdug pa tshar gcad nas// 'a phrin las rigs 'dzin thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las//
28a2(ya): phur ba 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bla med he ru kas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma spyi dpal khro bo'i rje// spod gtong
28a3(ya): ma mo sgrub pa'i thabs// 'phrin las las la bskul ba'i phyir// rim bzhin bdag la bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // dpal chen yab kyis bka'
28a4(ya): stsal ba/ ma mo spod gtong bsgrub 'dod pas// dur khrod chen po'i sa phyogs su// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas nas ni// khrag chen dag gis chag chag gdab// thal chen gyis ni
28a5(ya): hU bris la// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir mdzes/
28a6(ya): zhing chen bla bres brgyun pa'o// zhing chen zhing chung gdan stengs su// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ sku ni mthing nag 'jigs tshul can// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus
28a7(ya): mthing zhal// rdo rje sbrul khyung sbrul zhags g.yas// ban+d+ha zhing g.yab ga 'u g.yon// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// srid pa'i ma mo zhabs bzhis gzi re//
28b1(ya): yum tshon kun tu bzang mau ni// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khril// dbu gcig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// pha rol phyin drug
28b2(ya): phyag rgya yis// rdo rje dril bu dril zhags dang // ban+d+ha bdud rtsigayang bzhi bsnams// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// gnyis med bde bas ya ba dang sbyor// mkhas
28b3(ya): pas cho ga ji bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gtso bor bskyed par bya// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam pa lnga// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po
28b4(ya): na/ rigs kyi mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// de bzhin g.yon na thod pa'o// rnam snang gsal dang 'od gsal 'bar// mnyen gsal 'bar dang yang gsal g.yos//
28b5(ya): bkrag gsal 'bar zhes bya ba yi// ming gi mtha' dang yang dag ldan// shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng gdong ma// sku mdog dkar mo shel ltar dag/ dgra sta dang ni
28b6(ya): gtun shing brdeg/ seng ge mchog chen thams snyod// lho yi mkha' 'gro ban glang gdong // sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// me dpal dbyug pa tho ba dang //
28b7(ya): tha ma stag mo'i zhing chung snyod// nub kyi mkha' 'gro pud ka'i gdong // sku mdog dmar mo mdzes tshul can// zhags pa dang ni tril shul// lce spyang la ni zhing chung
29a1(ya): rgod/ byang gi mkha' 'gro byung chen gdong // sku mdog ljang khu bod du 'bar// dbyug zo de bzhin rgyu 'phreng 'dzin// spyang mo'i kha ru zhing chung stod/
29a2(ya): nam mkha'i mkha' ba gro rdo rje'i mchu// sku mdog gtso ma'i gser ltar dngas// rgyal mtshan dang ni spu gri'o// tha ma 'ug pa'i zhing 'dzin pa'o// srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum
29a3(ya): yum/ sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// 'khor lo rin chen g.yang gzhi rngab// thod khrag tshe bum lcags kyu thogs//
29a4(ya): dkar mo nyo zla'i thod 'phrang can// zangs lcags dkar na ga zhags pa 'phen// rdo rje nyi ma'i mdog dkar zhing // phyag na shel gyi spu gri thogs// rdo rje khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i/
29a5(ya): sngon mo thod pa khrag can 'dzin// rdo rje bdud rtsi dmar mo ni// lag tu bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin// ljang nag rdo rje srid gsum ma// lag na zhing lpags rgyal mtshan thogs/
29a6(ya): dkar mo srid pa'i rgyal byed ma// lag na sgra yi zhags pa thogs// sngon mo dbyings phyag rgyal mo ni// lag na zhing gi dbyug pa'o// dmar mo bdag nyid chen mo ni//
29a7(ya): lag na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'dzin// ser mo chen mo gcig pu ma// lag na mau yi ge yang gzhi rdeb// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// lag na ban+d+ha zlum po thogs
29b1(ya): mthing nag chen mo mche ba can// lag na ban+d+ha sul mangs bsnams// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ni// lag na ban+d+ha lcang lo 'chang // ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag na
29b2(ya): ban+d+ha rgya gram thogs// srid pa'i ma mo chags byed ma// mthing nag mi snying rlon pa ni// 'dzin dang de bzhin cha snyoms ma// dmar mo thod pa khrag gis bkang // 'dod pa'i
29b3(ya): khams kyi dbang phyug ma// mdog sngon bdud kyi khram bam thogs// a ka dza ti ral gcig ma// dkar mo kha T+Ta kha mi ro// gling bzhi kun gyi spyi phud ni// dkar mo lcags kyu
29b4(ya): 'od 'phreng 'chang // rin chen srid 'degs mdog sngon mo// lag na g.yu yi ga'u'o// pad+ma gar dbang la brgan mdog/ thod pa khrag bkang thugs kar 'dzin// de bzhin rnga
29b5(ya): gar dbang phyug/ ser mo ma yi dkyil 'khor can// ha ra ting dkar mo chen mo ni// lag na mi yi 'khor lo thogs// dun ting nag mo khro mo'o gzugs// la ga na sa yi dkyil
29b6(ya): 'khor thogs// dngos po cha byad dmar mo la// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo ga sar gyi mdog/ lag na rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dzin// bdag
29b7(ya): nyid ma dang gcig pu ma// dbyings phyag rgyan gyi rgyal mo ni// zhing gi rgya zhags ga yang gzhi rde bas// srad bu'i zhags pa thod pa 'dzin// skam pa mo dang phor thogs
30a1(ya): mo// g.yang gzhi ma dang za ba mo// gsod byed ma dang skul byed ma// de bzhin dri ma snom byed ma// srin mo chen mo 'di dag kyang // dkar sngo dmar dang ser
30a2(ya): ba'i gzugs// thod pa sna tshogs 'dzin mdzad ma'o// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// lag na ban+d+ha dkar po thogs// lho yi nag mo kha 'byam ma// lag na ban+d+ha sngon po thogs/
30a3(ya): nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'dza ba ma// lag na ban+d+ha dmar po thogs// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// lag na ban+d+ha ser po thogs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring // dkar mo
30a4(ya): rdo rje rgyu gsum thogs// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i zing // sngon mo mi mgo tho dbyug thogs// dmar mo g.yag mgo klu yi sring // dmar mo sprul na gzhags pa
30a5(ya): nag mo sder thogs gnod sbyin sring // ser mo ne'u le'i rkyal ba thogs// mkha' 'gro'o tshogs bcas gsal bskyed la// gsang sngags snying po 'di yang bzlas// oM
30a6(ya): gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka hUM/ gu h+yadz+nyA Na kro d+hi shwa ristaM/ ma mo yo gi ni ru lu ru lu hA b+h+yo hUM phaT/ au dang phaT kyi thog mtha' rten// ba ra na n+ya brgyad grong gnas pa// ma mo 'khor
30a7(ya): bcas srog snying yin// ma mo rnams kyi zhal du yang // bdud rtsi blug la las la dgye// sbod gtong las sgrub 'grub par 'gyur// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las
30b1(ya): ma mo sdong gtong ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dpal dregs pa kun bdul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen
30b2(ya): thabs la mkhas// 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa'i thabs// ma rungs gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gas
30b3(ya): nas kyang // dpal chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten mchod bstod bsgrub 'dod pas// gdug rtsub lha 'dre gnas pa'i gnas// dkyil 'khor byi dor
30b4(ya): byas nas ni// khrag sna tshogs pa'i chag chag gdab// sna tshogs khrag gi e bris la// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa
30b5(ya): dang / dur khrod pabar ba'i kan yas khang // 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi par khyams dang // sgo bzhir bcas pa gsal ba la// gdug pa'i gcan gzan 'dab chags 'khor//
30b6(ya): shin tu 'jigs pa bskyed nas ni// dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dub ni// dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// kham nag sgyug nag mthing na gzhal// dang po rdo rje du ba zag
30b7(ya): dang // lha brgyad de bzhin klu brgyad kyi// mgo bo de bzhin phyag gnyis pa'i// 'og ma na ni 'dzin pa'o// dregs pa'i sgong khar zhabs bzhis brdzis// yum chen
31a1(ya): khams gsum kun 'dul ma// rdo rje dung khrag thogs nas ni// dregs pa 'dul ba'i gnyen por bsgom// ma rungs padul byed de yi 'alor// dregs
31a2(ya): pa'i sde rnams bskyed bya ba// mthing nag ma hA de ba ni// gri gug dang ni tsit+ta 'dzin// rtse gsum thong khrag bcas pa yi// u ma de ba'i yum dang ldan// gshin rje nag po srog gi
31a3(ya): bdag be con thod pa'i dbyug pa 'chang // gsod byed nag mo'i lag pa na// srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // mthing nag bdud rnams kun gyi bdag/ khram shing bdud
31a4(ya): kyi ska re'o// bdud mo nag mo ra ma ti// khram bam dang ni nad rgyal thogs// nag po glog 'phreng srin gyi gtso// thog dang srid pa 'khrug pa'i 'od// 'dzin dang srin mo khrag
31a5(ya): migs// dmar nag phrag pur thod pa 'arkyang // gnod sbyin me dpal mthing nag g+ha// rin po che dang mtshon 'dzin pa// min mo nag mo de laM yum// sU gri spyang mo
31a6(ya): phyag gnyis na'o// gza' bdud chen por gul// dud kho mda' gzhu sbrul zhags bsnams// gnam sman thog gi za yug ma// dmar skya thog dang ser ba'i babs//
31a7(ya): klu bdud nag po mgo dgu pa// dud la sbrul zhags nad rgyal thogs// klu mo nag mo zhes bya ba// mo gzugs klu bdud cha lugs can// srid pa'i lha rnams kun gyi
31b1(ya): gtso/ sku dkar ma drang dang shel gyi gri// gnam gyi lha chen skyes bu'i bdag/ dkar po ldan dkar ral gri 'dzin// sku mdog dkar po spyi yi bdud// dar mdung ba la
31b2(ya): gri phyag char ba chang // ma mo srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// me long 'khor lo 'dzin pa dkar// sngags srungs e ka dza ti ma// mthing nag g.yu sbyang tsit+ta 'dzin// dpal
31b3(ya): ldan nag mo 'gyogs byed ma// mtshon gyi gru gu nad rgyal thogs// dmar nag rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// khrag dang yungs kar thun 'bebs pa'o// srog zan dmar po btsan
31b4(ya): gyi rje/ bas mdung mda' dang gzhu yi mchog/ srid pa'i btsan rgod dmar po ni// sha ka lang zangs kyi zhags pa bsnams// mu stegs ka la nag po ni//
31b5(ya): rtse gsum thod pa khrag can 'dzin// mthing nag bgegs kyi rgyal po ni// kha T+wAM thod khrag lag tu 'chang // dmu badrud yongs kyi rje bo ni// mthing nag shag lang mda' dang
31b6(ya): gzhu// tshangs pa lha rnams kun gyi gtso// spu gri nyi ma'i zhags pa thegs// pheM brgyud rgyal po yongs kyi bdag/ mdog dkar zhags pa spu gri 'dzin// gsang ba sku lha'i
31b7(ya): gtso bo dkar// rdo rje dang ni ru mtshon 'phyar// mgon po ma hA kA la ni// mthing nag beng dang gri gug thogs// dregs pa'i sde dpon sum cu po// sna tshogs gos kyo
32a1(ya): re ra la'ang // 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis 'khor dang ldan// sprul pa yang sprul bsam mi khyab// gsal 'tsher 'bar ba'i skur bsgoms te// snying po 'di yang /
32a2(ya): bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT gzhag nas// bar na grong khyer brgyad gnas pa// 'jig rten mchod bstod bsgrub pa'i sngags// dregs pa
32a3(ya): can gyi sde brgyad kyis// bstan pa bsrung zhing sku dgra 'dul// 'gras pa'i dgra rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las// 'jig rten mchod bstod bsgrub
32a4(ya): pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas dpal stobs ldan nag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen thabs la mkhas/
32a5(ya): dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa'i thabs// gdug pa ma gus bsgral ba'i phyir// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // dpal chen he rus
32a6(ya): bka' stsal pa// dmed pa drag sngags bsgrub 'dod pas// srog chags bsad pa'i shul 'dra'i ni// dmar po khrag gi mdog 'dra'i ngos// dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa bar ba
32a7(ya): la/ srin po khros pa'i gzugs bris la// dmigs pa brten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // shin tu 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor
32b1(ya): ni/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi sgo bzhir bcas// rab tu gsal ba'i dbus nyid du// bdud bgegs nyi zla pad+ma'i khar// lha mchog stobs ldan nag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
32b2(ya): bzhi bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i zhal// phyag na rdo rje dung khrag dang // lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// zhabs bzhi drags pa pho mo gzir// 'byung ba lnga
32b3(ya): yi bdag mo ni// mkha' bdags sa gzhi gnon pa'i phyag/ zhal nas 'byung ba lnga pa char ba'i// yum dang gnyis med sbyor byed pa'i// drag sngags gtso bor bskyed par bya//
32b4(ya): drag sngags sde dpon bco brgyad po// rang gi sngags las bskyed bya ste// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// thod pa gri gug 'dzin mdzad cing // thod pa gri gug 'dzin yum ldan
32b5(ya): bdud nag me ba bar zhes bya ba'i// khram shing bdud zhags thogs pa dang // khram shing thod rlon pa dzin pa yi// yum dang srin mo gsod byed ni// ral gri thod 'chang de yi yum//
32b6(ya): gri gug mi mgo thogs pa'o// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po ni// mdog sngo ral gri der nag 'phyang // dar nag zhing lpags 'dzin pa'i yum// ma hA de bsku mdog dkar// ba dan
32b7(ya): shal gri 'dzin pa dang // thar pa nag po zhes bya ba// mchod dang thun gyi gtor ma 'chang // mthing nag rtsan pa zhes bya ba// dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogs// mu stegs
33a1(ya): nag po zhes bya ba// kha T+Ta kha dang tri shul ba dzin// du ba 'jug rings gza' yi gtso// nag po khram shing dgra sta 'chang // klu rgyu la sogs ma med ces
33a2(ya): bya/ dmar po bum pa rus sbal ldan// rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba// mdog dkar shel gyi dar dkar ba dzin// mdog ser bgong po yongs kyi gtso// sprul pa'i lag pa
33a3(ya): 'gyed pa dang // mdog dkar rdo rje legs pa ni// dkar dang dmar ba'i ru mtshon thogs// 'jig rten btsan gyi rgyal po ni// btsan gyi mdung dang gri 'dzin pa'o// dregs pa dmod
33a4(ya): pa'i mtshon cha can// srin po'i gzugs can mtshon cha thogs// kha nas dmod pa'i drag sngags zlos// gang la dmigs pa'i srog lus gcod// de lta bu ru gsal brtan pas//
33a5(ya): snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ thog mtha' au dang phaT gzhag nas// bar na grong khyer drug gnas pa// dmod pa drag sngags snying po yin// da
33a6(ya): nas drag sngags gang 'dod bsgrub// gdon mi za bar 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje'i brag kyang tshal bar 'gas// zhes gsungs so// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las//
33a7(ya): dmod pa drag sngags bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas dpal chen po ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / dar sprul zhing 'dus pa'i baphor
33b1(ya): khro bo dang khro mo rnams dang / grub pa'i rigs 'dzin gyi tshogs lhun gyis grub pa dang // phyag rgya chen po dang / che la dbang ba dang / sa la gnas pa ste/ so so'i bsgrub pas grub pa'i
33b2(ya): sku la rus pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / zhabs gdub dang // dpung rgyan dang // stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs dang / dbang gi thor
33b3(ya): tshugs dang bcas pa/ phyag tu rdo rje dang dril bu bzung ba sha stag ste/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho rigs 'dzin dang bcas pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'i rjes su yi rang
33b4(ya): zhing mngon par dgab 'o// khro bo dgos bsgrub kyi skabs de gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad budus
33b5(ya): pa zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po le'u bco brgyad pazhi khro 'dus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas
33b6(ya): dang bod kyi le tso ba bI ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po khri srong lnga ba tsan gyi phyag dpa rin po che gter du sbas pa'o// skal ldan las 'phro can dang
33b7(ya): 'thad par shog/ gte rgya/ sgra sau rgya/ gtang rgya'o// rgya rgyargya/ @rgya gar skad dub+hag wan a tha ga ta saH
34a1(ya): b+hi ru tan+dan ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka la
34a2(ya): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang / dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / phyi nang rgya khyon med pa'i rgyan gyis
34a3(ya): brgyan pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka/ 'tshor khro bo dang / khro mo dang rigs 'dzin pho mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bajig rten gyi dregs pa can pho mo rnams kyis brko/
34a4(ya): te thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i nang nas/ rigs 'dzin pho mo rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan spyi dpal rje// slob dpon
34a5(ya): slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang // smin par byed pa'i lam dang ni/ phyag rgya sgrub pa'i thabs la sogs// rtsa ba'i rgyud du ma gsungs pa// phyi ma'i rgyud ni chen po 'dor// sems can rnams
34a6(ya): la sman pa'i phyir// gtso bos rim bzhin bshad du gsol// a la la ho/ zhes phyag dang bskor ba byas te zhus so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'i//
34a7(ya): / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru kas/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gsang
34b1(ya): sngags sgo ni slob dpon te// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas na// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// bad
34b2(ya): gshegs rjes 'brang slob dpon gyis// de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing // sngags rnams ma 'dres so sor mkhyen// shes rab gsal zhing
34b3(ya): brtson pa grus che// phyi nang rgyud shas cho ga skongs// thabs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs la// gang dang gang la ma rmongs mkhyen// las kyi bye brag thams cad la// lhag chad med pa'i thabs
34b4(ya): mkhas shes// gsang ba mchog gi thabs rnams sbed// tshe mchog he ru'i slob dpon yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// shin tu 'dus pa chen po
34b5(ya): 'di las 'da' bar mi byed pa// yan lag dam tshig mchog tu len// spyod pa'i bye brag thabs yin pas// mi spong mi 'dor thabs srung ba// mdog dkar gzugs dag stobs dang
34b6(ya): ldan/ ga pur dri ldan ri mo 'chang // rtag par sems can don la dga'// sems can sgrol ba'i thabs la mkhas// skad gdangs dung sgra yod pa ni// khrag pa thung ha ru'i slong
34b7(ya): dpon yin// phyi nang chos la ma rmongs mkhyen// khyad par shes rab phun sum tshogs// rig pa'i gnas mchog ma 'gags shes// chos spyod bcu rnams
35a1(ya): lhag par brtson// slob dpon 'khur zhing mched la gdung // sems can ci dga'i spyod pa byed// thabs kyi bye brag rnams la mkhas// gcig gam
35a2(ya): thams cad mtshan nyid yin// don mthong dga' pa mtha' dag yod// gshin rje gshed po'i slob dpon yin// lam gyi thabs rnams khyad par ston// rtag par zlos
35a3(ya): shing 'phro 'a dga'// snying po sngags la dad mos che// blo gsal rig pa khyad par yod// spyod lam rnam bzhi sang gar spyod// gla gar rol mo rnams la dga'// mchod pa'i bye
35a4(ya): brag thabs mchog mkhas// lung bstan bka' bzhin byed cing bzo// spun la gdung zhing sems can 'dad// pad+ma dbang chen slob dpon yin// phyi nang rnam rtog
35a5(ya): mi skye zhing // rgyud dang mdo sde dag la mkhas// thabs mkhas ting 'dzin drod tshad brtson// sde snod gsum la ma rmongs dang // rtog bcas the tshom ma lus sel// gsang ba
35a6(ya): sbas pa'i thabs rnams mkhyen// dad pa rnams la skyo dra ba med// gsang ba'i sde snod drug rnams kun// rtog bcas snod ngan rnams la sbed// gsang ba'i chos rnams
35a7(ya): sems la 'chang // 'bad pa'i stobs kyis man ngag tshol// rtsa bar bcas pa srung byed pa// rdo rje phur pa'i slob dpon yin// thos brtson yon tan kun
35b1(ya): gyis brgyan// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum// de yi thabs kyi 'dul thabs rnams// de yi spyod pa ma 'gags mkhyen// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// rjes su bathun
35b2(ya): ba'i thabs mchog gis// ji ltar ji ltar 'dul mdzad pa// thabs mkhas dad ldan ting 'dzin gsalo// gnyis med blo ldan brtul zhugs cha// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i slob dpon yin
