109a2(ya): chags ldan pa la// sngon du yis brjod po bzhin// zhi ba chen po'i thabs kyis byung // de nyid grub pa'i mthar thug go/ zhe sdang can gyis rang gi yid//
109a3(ya): dang 'khon du 'dzin pa chen po'o// sku gsung thugs kyi mthu dang stobs// rtog pa drag shul cher spyod cing // ma nges phyogs kyi dbang gyur pa// sna tshogs
109a4(ya): bstan pa'i de bzhin du// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kyis sbyang // blo zhan rnams kyis de mi rtogs// byis pa rnams la sngar ma rtogs// tshig gis smi brjod
109a5(ya): bsam mi khyab/ chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste// mong du brjod pas shes mi 'gyur// rnam par rabartags pas de mi rtogs// sems dang sems can 'a
109a6(ya): ba dang / lam dang gru dang bzhon pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' bla na med// shes rab ting 'dzin gnas dag gis// bzang zhing zab pas gting du pag dkag/
109a7(ya): sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang chos// dang por 'khor 'jug sems can te// sgrol zhing bskyod de pa che// rgan mkhas gsal bar gnas der phyin// zla bral
109b1(ya): rmad byung rab sogs 'phags// gting rdzogs gab pa phra zhing 'khyug/ sems can mthar phyin sangs rgyas te// de bzhin gshegs yab yum dang sras// bdag
109b2(ya): ga dung srog nor bran dang ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin la sa bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyu dang rkyen dang ba zas bu zhes// thabs dang shes rab
109b3(ya): byang chu ba che// dab med ma nor 'da' ba ra da ka'// mi zad snying rje gzi ba rji de dang // sna tshogs thams ca de 'byung ba dang // mdzad pa'i tsho ga sa ni lam yin te//
109b4(ya): 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba longs spyod che// cho'u phrul phyag rgya bsnyen pa gnyis// bsgrub gnyis tshogs gnyis rdzogs po la// yul gyi 'dod pa dmigs pa dang //
109b5(ya): rol zhing bsgrub pa 'bras bur 'byed// rmin mthong don gru ba kun la sa log/ rang bzhin byen pa sna tshogs 'byung // mtshan ma brtan pa rnam par 'du// rab byer
109b6(ya): ba dod pa lhag 'dod sbyor// lhun grub pa yis shes pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bra sa bu zhos// 'dod pa'i 'bras phu 'ukhral ba'i gzhi// mtshano ma yul dang
109b7(ya): sems las byung // rtog pa rus gsum dngos po yin// don nyid phyogs bzhi log pa'o// mun dang gdug dang bskyed pa dang // gdung dang yun 'jug
110a1(ya): nyon mongs snga// rgyu 'dus de rkyen mtshan ma dang // las dang rnam rig phung po lnga// mthong thos tshogs dang myong rigs pa// phul la spyod pa
110a2(ya): dbang po lnga// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // dus kyi skad cig rgyu drug gis// sa bon rtsa bu myu gu dang // sdong po ya la ga yan lag dang // 'dab ma me tog 'bros bu
110a3(ya): smin// rI sa dang skam pa rkyen bcu gnyis// gzugs mthong sbra thos dri tshor zhing // ro myong reg byed chos shes pa// skye ba'i bye mched brgyu gnyis so// mthong snang ma nor thos dang grags// gsal 'tshe
110a4(ya): rnams dang tshim pa dang // ro mya nga bro dang byed par 'os// shes dang shes bya rtog pa dag/ rang bzhin chos nyid bco brgyad de// spyong chos mtshan nyid bcu gcig ni/
110a5(ya): 'du shes sgyur dang dbang du byed// rnam g.yo sgro 'dogs 'gal ba dang // rtsub 'chal chags dang gnod par sems// log lta gzung 'dzin spyod pa yis// 'bras
110a6(ya): bu rdzogs dang rim pa dang // blo bur gnas bsgyur lnga yin no// dka' thub snyoms 'jug spyod pa dang // gdung zhing spong ba lam lnga'o// bzod gdung nyams 'dod rtsod
110a7(ya): chags kyis// gnas pa drug tu 'gyur ba ni// du sa dang rus dang rang bzhin gyis// rang gis mu bzung lta ba gsum// shes pa gcig gis rgyu dang lam//
110b1(ya): kun rdzob don dam tshul gnyis so// mdun du brtag dang gzhan gyi rabang // yongs su grub par rang bzhin tshul// rims 'jug rkyen sbyin mngon 'byung dang // thams cad
110b2(ya): rdzogs pa thabs chen bzhi// rgyu lam pa shar pa rtog pa dang // ba bras bu la gan sa rmos lnga ste// mi ga dang rna ba skye ba dang // 'o chi 'pho dang ni rdzu 'phrul te//
110b3(ya): gzhan blo shes pa rig pa'o// 'pho 'jug bltam dang rab tu rtsom// mnyam sbyor nges 'byung dka' ba spyod// byang chub tha rud btul chos ston cing // tshe 'phrul 'da'
110b4(ya): byed skra ga rung ba sda ma// da bang mdzad chen po bcu gnyis so// mi g.yo chos snang rdzu 'phrul dang // kun rdzob rjes bstan bsam gtan dang // byi na brlabs skye ba
110b5(ya): chos nyid stobs// yon tan 'bras bu cho ba phrul gyis// bcu gnyis dag tu bstan pa yin// nang dang phyi dang phyi nang dang // stong pa chen po don dam dang // 'u das rgyas
110b6(ya): 'dus ma byas dang mtha'// de las 'da' dang dus gsum bral// bla 'dor med dang rang bzhin stong // chos kun rang gis mtshan nyid stong // mi dmigs dngos po me/
110b7(ya): pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang dngos med pa'i// ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa ste// ye shes stong pa bco brgyad de// mi gos mnyes mi sgrib pa// rdzogs dang ma g.yos mnya
111a1(ya): pa nyid/ gnyis med rnam dag kun legs dang // sgyur dang rdzogs chu rig pa rtse// bcu gtsigs mi yon tan yin// rngam chad dang chos nyid dang /
111a2(ya): longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa dang // 'byung byed tshogs 'byor mthong skam da // mi slob mthar byin par chad med// 'bras bu longs rdzogs mkhyen pa dang // khyab dang chom
111a3(ya): 'byung kun tu dbang // dges 'dod tshang ba 'azlas su drug/ ma lus rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni// 'bras bu chen po drug yin no// de la rdzogs pa 'bras bu'i chos// mnor
111a4(ya): gtan la phebs pa dang // the tsom med cing glo skur bral// thabs dang shes rab nges pa'o// rlabs chen khyab pa brjod las 'das// sbom po mnyam nyid dus gzhan
111a5(ya): dang // gnyen po grangs dang gzhan don bsgyur// kun rdzob che ba de nyid dang // bdag nyid mngon par 'phags phyir ro// rigs dbapa'i rjes shing 'dus pa dang /
111a6(ya): mnyam rgyur tshang ba'i tshogs chen ni// rnam dog sprul pa rbag shul dang // dbyangs ldan dka' mdzad mtshan ma 'joms// gsang byor chos sgron rtse bar shes// mnam tha rgyur
111a7(ya): bskyoda'i bo ba'i tshul// gzhan don 'byung ba'i tshul bcu gnyis// 'phrin las bdud rtsi thig le dang // spyod pa'i rgyun dang rig pa 'dzin// tha bas da rgya la 'byung ba
111b1(ya): 'byung / rdzogs pa nyid dang mngon par rtogs// mi zad rgyu dang kun tu snag/ de bzhin nyid kyis bcu gnyis so// chos nyid nan tan rtog pa dang // mnyam nyid gsal
111b2(ya): dpe don byed dang // don byed rang gi ngo bo dang // snang mdzad sprul pa phyag rgya dang // kun 'u byung rgyu dang snang ba nyid// bco brgyad kyis ni ye shes du byung // lhun grub yongs
111b3(ya): rdzogs rtsa la sbyor dang // rig pa 'dzin dang lung rje na tho ga/ mtshan ma'i rtag sa dang spyod pa kun// gsang sgo rigs can bka' sdod la// sems 'dun bcu gcig rnal 'byor
111b4(ya): yin/ 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bde sdug bye brag ma nyam mi ma nyam// grub pa chen po bzhir 'gyur ro// la sa dang thugs rje sems dang chos// dbyings dang ye shes
111b5(ya): bra bas shes rab/ rgyu nang 'bras bu sbyor ba lnga// bden pa mthong dang rdzu 'phrul tho ba// dmigs pa rag dang bdag nyid che// gnyis med ma skyes dngos grub bo//
111b6(ya): gzhan yang khyad par zi cu gcig dang // ba slab bcu che ba nyid shu dang // ma gro nga dang bsgom pa'i wang pya dang // sems la su byung ba la rgyad cu dong // lnga po cu rtsa
111b7(ya): gnyis gang ba shar dang // ba dud pa zhi gnyis sgrib ga yang sa drug/ mi dge mtshams me ra yan la ka bcas// ma lus rtog pa ba sa ma pa kun// gzhi la ma 'bru
112a1(ya): bu 'di yis las// byed pa thams cad blo yin no// bya ba rnams kyang de nyid do// blo dang bral na ci rigs su// mngon par mtho dang nges
112a2(ya): par legs// nyan thos rang rgyal bya nga chub lam// bla me sku dang ya shes ldan// ma lus 'di las 'byung ba ste// de bzhin byed kyis shes par gyis//
112a3(ya): gzhan du nga yis bshad pa med// ma bshar pa nyid yang dag bshad// sku dang ga su ba du thugs gcig laso// bye ba dpag mad bsam mi khyab// gang la gang
112a4(ya): du gang snang yang // ra las gzhan du srid ma yin// de nyid kho nar rtog pa bgyi// de la sa gzhan du skyes bu'i blo// ched du chu ba dang shin tu chung // mchog dang dam
112a5(ya): dang shin tu dman// rab dang tha ma bar pa yis// sna tshogs srid dang mthong ba yis// thos dang rigo dang myong dang tshor// spro dang bskyed dang 'gag pa yis//
112a6(ya): rtog pa ji snyed snang ba dag/ byang chub sems kyi dbadu sgyur ba dag/ 'phrin las na nga dang phyi rol dang // gnyis me rang dang gzhan la khyabo// gang gis spyod pa 'dir
112a7(ya): bstan gyis// de dag khyed kyis legs par nyon// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed par byed pa las/ tshul
112b1(ya): gsum leg sa pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rab tu ba shad bya ba// phyi ma'i dus na skyes bu'i tshe// mkha' stong goms pa che
112b2(ya): ba dang / phyi nang chos la sbyang ba dang // ston bya chos sku mthong ba dang // yang dag snying po'i don shes shing // 'phrin la sa spyod pa nus pa yis// gnas pa shes pa yo/
112b3(ya): byad dang // 'khor rnamasau phun sum tshogs pa ni// ma lus kun gyi thun mong ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pas bgrod pa dang // rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa dang // shar lho
112b4(ya): nub byang phyogs cani mig/ dbyangs dang rdzas kyi mtshan nyid ldan pa dang // bsam pa dang ni sbyor ba dag/ rang gizhi de mi dmigs shing // ma lus kun gyi don 'dod
112b5(ya): ba/ phun sum tshogs pa'i shes pa'o// yum ni mtshan nyid ldan pa dang // phyi nang mi 'gru ba mtshan nyid pa sogs// sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan ldan// 'khor
112b6(ya): le ga sum gyis sgyu rtsal shes// gnas bskur shes pa yid bzhin no// 'tsho ba dang ni mched sbyin ni// bag lnga dang ni ze du da rtsi lnga// skye ba bdun pa'i yo byad dang //
112b7(ya): nad dang bar bcod kun bzlog pa// yo byad phun sum tshogs prasgrub pa'o// yum dang las byid dul rgyag gsum// bka' sdod mchod pa stod la sogs/
113a1(ya): 'khor du brten pa'i dam pa ste// bya ba phyi nang rim pa la// klag dang mchod bstod sbyin pa rnams// rab tu rgyas par bya ba'o// nga yis
113a2(ya): tho ga mar bshad pa yi// i drang steng 'og bar snang dang // phyogs kun legs par ba rtag pa ste// rdo rje pad+ma rgyal mtshan te// de dang ldan pa phyi mtshan nyid//
113a3(ya): chu dang me tog bcas pa dang // sa ro ga seg ma gyo mo dang // rul pa sna tshog sa sla ra nyung dang // dur khrod rdza sa dang ldan pA ra ba rtag sa// sna nga dang mi
113a4(ya): snang mngon mi mngon// legs blangs snang ba thob pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin ni// mnyes pa mchog gi sbyang ba yis// phyi nang mthun pa'i gzhal
113a5(ya): las khang // snang cha byin gyis brlab cing bzung // tshogs ba sogs bdud 'dul mchod sbyin dang // sdig pa sbyang ba'i las bya zhing // tshogs ba sogos pa la 'bar
113a6(ya): pa dang // 'phrin la sa bachol zhing rtsod pa bzlog/ tshogasna chen mgron dang lan chags gzhal// bsod nams spel dang rnam pa bzhi// he ru ka dang mthu stobs
113a7(ya): can// dbang chen dbang dang thugs rje can// so so'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btang // phyi dang nang gi sa bkra bya zhing // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang bsdus pa'i// tshar bcad rnams
113b1(ya): kyis bsreg par bya// smon lam dang ni blo bskyed nas// phyi rol phyogs bzhi skyong ba dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon po las// 'thun pa'i sa la rten btsugs te//
113b2(ya): mchod pa dang ni bstod pa dang // bskul zhing btsol la de bzhin bya// mtshan ngan snod du dmigs pa'i gzugs// smod pa'i tshigs dang bcas te bri// gtum por
113b3(ya): rdzas dang bcas pa ste// rang rgyu de ba sam pa can de dgug/ rdzo ba rlung stobs can gyi sa ma na na// phyi rol e dbyibs can du gzhug/ he ru ka yi ting 'dzin du//
113b4(ya): za byed rnga ma stabs ldan pa dang // sprul pa khro bcu bang bskyed de// phyogs bcu'i dre gas pa 'khor dang bcas// ba ra gcod byed pa 'phra mo ma na na// sum+b+ha
113b5(ya): ni zhes bya 'ang brjod// ma rungs pa yi byang bu la// 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs bris te// rang bzhin gnas nas dgug cing gzhug/ phyi rol khab kyis
113b6(ya): sgor bstan te// de yis gnod pa zlog par byed// nang du bskrad cing bsdams pa la// chos kun stong pa'i ngang nyid las// rang snang ye shes mkha' bzhin
113b7(ya): bsgom// nyi zla'i steng du yi ge hUM// spro dang bsdu pa'i sas byas te// badz+ra d+h+rig ces bya ba yis// rdo rje sems dpang gsal byas te// bka' bsgo bskrad dang bkyi ma sogs
114a1(ya): bya rigs kyi gtso bo dgu rnams kyis// sprul pa'i tshogs bcas gsang ba dang // phyag mtshan mtshon char ba ldan pas// kun tu bzung
114a2(ya): ba'i las bya'o// de nas stegs bu gang sbyar te// rdo rje rgyal por ra ba zhengs nas// mtshan ldan snod du dri chab sbyar// rang 'byung ba du da rtsi ye shes lnga//
114a3(ya): byin gyis rlabs te chag chag gdab// gtso chen ya ba yum so sor bzhengs// sti ra'i rgyus pa gsum sgril gyis// byang chub sems chen dkar dmar bsgo ma//
114a4(ya): shar dang nub kyi phyogs nas then// rdo rje mkha' gsang gnas su gsung // de nas beskul zhing legs gdab pa// steng du ye shes pho brang bzhengs// sa gzhi che
114a5(ya): la gdab pa ni// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang logs bzhi ru// thig ga dab spyi ru bshad pa'o// pho brang chen po dkyil 'khor dgu// gru bzhi sgo bzhi bcas pa
114a6(ya): la// 'khor lo rtsib brgyad par mtshams dang // mu khyud gru rmad 'dod 'byung las// cha gu rdzogs pa'i thig tu gdab// phyi rol khyams dang sgo khar bcas//
114a7(ya): dur khrod 'bar ba rab dang // 'byung ba chen po gnas pa dang // he ru ka rnams dgongs su gsol// rin chen 'bru dang so dang rdo// rab 'bring tha mar sbyar
114b1(ya): ba'i rgyu/ 'di ni dur khrod thal chen las// byang sems dkar dang sbyar ba'ing shar// dri chen gyis sbyar lho ru ste// dmar po dang sbyar nub tu'o// dri chus sbyar ba byang du ste//
114b2(ya): kun gyi phyogs song sbyar ba dbus// sku la yeng zhes lngar byin brlabasau// oM hUM traM hri haM gi sa ni// 'od kyi 'phro 'ud bya ba'o// pho brang lte ba mthing nag stau// gcod byen
114b3(ya): rtsibs rnams dkAr ser dmar// ljang khu dag tu bri bya zhing // khyams dang gru chad sgo rnams ni// rang gi rigs kyi phyogs kyi dbye// thod 'phreng gdung dang mu khyud de//
114b4(ya): mdzes pa'i mtshan ma rab tu bri// phyi rol khang pa 'di bzhin te// rigs dang mtshan ma'i kha dog dbye// de ltar gnas pa snang ba bzhin// ma nor tshangs dang rdzogs
114b5(ya): par bri/ de dag byin gyis brlab pa ni// e yaM ra suM ka r+ra nr-i// yi ge sa bon 'phro'adu las// stong zhing bkod dang gsher ba dang // brtan dang sreg pa bstod pa yis//
114b6(ya): stong nyid snying rje snying por bcas// 'dzin pa gsum la sa ra ngo byung ba// nga yi gnas chen 'di ltar bsgom// rigs kyi da pa la rmen he ru ka/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa
114b7(ya): rag/ 'di ru byin gyis brlabs par bya// de la rgyan tags gsol ba ni// mtshan ldan lcang lo ka pa la// grangs dang mthun pa phyogs dgu'o//
115a1(ya): pags pa chen po'i bla re bre// sgyu mas dra ba dra byed do// don snying rnams ni phan bu phul te// rak+ta zhal bu skyems su drangs// phyi rol ba srung ba'i rgyan
115a2(ya): rnams ni// ral gri phur pa mda' dang sa dung // phyogs mtshams ba su ta yis bres// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal thabs kyis// long shes dbyings nas dgongs su gsol//
115a3(ya): bdag nyid 'jug pa'i sgo dbye zhing // gsang ba'i ming phul gsol ba ga dab// gus pa'i phyag btsal mchod pa 'bul// nye bar bsten cing ba stod pa bya// phyi rol
115a4(ya): bsgrub pa'i grogs rnams kun// snga ma las ni phyi ma bzhin// dam tshig rtog pa bsre bya zhing // phra ba dang ba cing dang sdug pa dang // bskrad dang bcad pa dag tu bya//
115a5(ya): skya bos su song zhing sems bskyed de// sdig pa ma lus bsha gas byas nas// rim pa sa gsol ba ga dab byas te// gnang ba tho ba nas me tog dbul// lha dang
115a6(ya): 'brel pa brtag par bya// de yi rjes bsrungs dam tshig skrag/ mig phye nas ni dkyil 'khor bstan// slar yang mchod cing bstod byas te// sgrub pa po rnams gral
115a7(ya): bar shams nas// ji ltar rig pa'i mnga' gsol nas// bshags sbyang sbyang ba ma lus byas// de nas gtso chen rgyal po la// dur khrad chen po'i cha sa brgyad
115b1(ya): gsol// ma lus byin la ha ga ga dab cing // dam tshig bcar ba nyi shu bya// byin rlabs bca' ba dab pa cing thugs dam bskor// rigs kyi dngos gru bra tshul bzhin slang //
115b2(ya): rdo rje 'chang gis lha rnams bsnyen// las kyi rgyal pos tshul bzhin bsgrug/ kun sbyor gsum dang 'byung ba lnga// bkod pa gcig dang mdzes pa bzhin// kun tu khyab par
115b3(ya): rab bsgom te// gtso chen cho ga gsum dang ldan// yab yum yongs su rdzogs pa bskyed// sngon du bshad pa de bzhin no// gang dang rjes su bshad
115b4(ya): bya ba// de nyid kyang ni dus 'dir bshad// gtso chen dkyil 'khor yab yum bcas// bskul dang spro dang bsdu ba dang // dbab dang skyil dang g.yo ba dang // nges par
115b5(ya): bu byung ba bdag gis ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams brgyad du// rdzogs pa'i lha tshogs dkyis byung ste// phyi rol tu yang 'khor rnam sra sprul// rang bzhin
115b6(ya): gnas nas de nyid dgug/ de dag gnyis su med par bya// slar yang las kyi lha sprul te// mnyes bya kun gyis mnyes par bya// de nas ma lu sa 'khor dang bcas pa
115b7(ya): kun/ sku gsung thugs su gsal btab ste// slar yang srog gi dkyil 'khor la// chu shel dkyil 'khor gzugs tshad tsam// de nyid la ni rang gi dngos//
116a1(ya): byang chub sems dang na rgyal 'dzin cing // de nyid kyang ni pad+ma'i steng // rin po che'i tshul du gnas// myu'i stong du sa bon nyid// rang na
116a2(ya): ming tshig zing po bkod// mthing ka'i 'od byer 'phro bar bsgom// myong byed pad+ma'adab brgya du la// rdo rje dkar po rtsi gsum la// kun gyis gsung 'byungs pan te//
116a3(ya): rang sngags dmar po sa bon 'od bcas bsgom// tshungs pa'i gnas su rtsi ba brgyad pa'i// 'khor lo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// sku yi sa bon rang sngags bcas/
116a4(ya): zer dkar po'i 'phro 'a du bsgom// de nyid bstan byed tshig gi gsal// 'phro 'du ye shes rang gi rgya// phyi rol phyogs mtshams thams cad du// 'phags pa'i
116a5(ya): tshogs kun mnyes par bya// tshur 'dus rnam rtog 'ag chags byung // gzugs dang zla dang po dang bcas// dri ma'i ting 'dzin rig pa nyid// rlung gi yid lags
116a6(ya): ba yis// gnas gsum rnam par drug pa sbyang // de ni dang po'i bya ba'o// de yi 'og tu bsgom bya ba// sngar ba shad las su rung ba na// dam tshig ye shes gnyis
116a7(ya): med pa'i// tshogs kyi dus gcig badren po la// kun gyi ye shes ngo bor 'gyur// gnyis med brtan par gnas pa ste// ma lus nye bar gyur pa'o//
116b1(ya): tha ma'i dus su gnas bsgyur te// rdzas dang lha dang cho 'phrul de// dkyil 'khor kun tu tho rangs dus// bsgrub chen rnams kyis rgyan btags so// 'phro 'du 'od kyi phyi dang
116b2(ya): nang / snod bcud ma lus thams cad kyis// yon tan bcud ldan ma lus pa// thams cad ma lus gnas 'di ru// mkha' gsang dngos grub chen por bsdu// de dag kun
116b3(ya): gyi dus chen du// bzlas pa'i skyon bzhi spang ba ni// lha dang dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang // dbyangs dang dngos grub 'phrin las kyis// chos nyid snying po shes pa brgyad//
116b4(ya): gnas skyong dus su bsam pa'o// nye dang spro dang thim pa gsum// bar ba'i dus su bsgom par bya// sgyur ba gsum bzhi btsal ba bcu// gar sbyangs yan lag dgu dang
116b5(ya): bcas// de ni tha ma'i dus su spyod// rdo rje dril bu nyungs kAr dang // mar me dang ni phyag mtshan dang // dpal rdzis 'khor lo dbang mchog dang // zas bcud tshegs 'jam des
116b6(ya): dang // zla rgyus phrom dang 'phar ma dang // dpa' bo rnams kyis dngos grub sbyin// lha dang slob dpon sgrub pa'i grogs// rim bzhin phan tshun bshags sbyang bya// bkra/
116b7(ya): shis dang ni smon lam gyis// gla blangs mchod bstod lhag chad skang // gtor sba sa gzir dang mnan par bya// brasnga dang bar chad bsrung ba dang // chos nyid mau dmigs blo
117a1(ya): brtan de// yul mchog dam pa de mnyes bya// 'di byas das kyi bsnyen pa ste// sgrub pa chen po gcig yin pas// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/
117a2(ya): nyid kyis sku gsung thugs su 'grub// bsnyen pa chen po'i sbyor ba'o// 'di dag kun gyis thun mong bsrung // mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni//
117a3(ya): phyir bshad 'byung ba chen po lnga// nang du drag po'i mtshon cha lnga// gsang bar rigs kyi khro bo lnga// de nyid ye shes rnam lnga'o// de las tshig tu brjod bya ba//
117a4(ya): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sems kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku// spros med rnam dag dngos dang bral// brdal ba chen po'i ye shes kyis/
117a5(ya): phyogs bracu ma lus kun tu khyab// snod bu cad snang ba dpag tu med// tham so cad rang gi ngo bo stong // 'di las ma bltos chos gzhan med// rang gi sems
117a6(ya): nyid snang cha los// gzhan snang 'khrul pa tsamo nyid las// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i rtog pa de// gnyis med ngang du mtshams bcad byas// e dz+nyA na maN+Da la shu
117a7(ya): n+ya ta ma hA ma hA ra hU/ yang rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba ni// dbugs kyi rang bzhin stob dang ldan// thams cad g.yo zhing ma lus 'deg/ dngos po 'thor zhing mtshan
117b1(ya): ma 'joms// thog med shugs kyi 'phrin las mdzad// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad du// rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang // ma rig pa yi sgrib pa tshogs//
117b2(ya): thams cad gtor zhing ma lus sbyangs// blang dor yod med dgag bsgrub dang // sprang blang rtog pa ji snyed kun// rang gi sems kyis mtshams gcad bya'i// ya a ha/
117b3(ya): kar+m+ma spa ra na swa b+ha ru tra hUM/ baM Ta rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyun 'bab pa// rang gi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor te// chu bo dang ni gtsang zhing dang // yan lag brgyad ldan yon tan
117b4(ya): rdzogs// bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyun// bag chags rtog pa'i dri ma 'khru/ gzung 'dzin las kyi gnas ngan sbyong // gnyis snang 'khor ba'i rgyun lam
117b5(ya): gsal// ye shes chen po'i rba rlabs kyis// ma rig mtshan ma'i rnyog ma grungs// dngos dang dngos min sgrib pa'i tshogs// gsal zhing sbyangs pa'i
117b6(ya): mtshams gcad bya'o// baM ma hA maN+Dal mu tra b+hA sa ma ye hU/ raM Ta'abar ba'i rgyal po me yi dpung // bdag gi drod kyi rang bzhin te// gas la zhing bsreg
117b7(ya): pa'i mthu stobs ldan// snod bcud khams kyi rang bzhin kun// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bar ba yis// nyon mongs rnam rtog pu da shing bcas// ma lus
118a1(ya): sreg byed chab yis// gnas ngan len gyi phung po bsregs// ye shes me dpung 'bar ba yis// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro// bska
118a2(ya): pa'i metshan kha dog lnga// ma lus bsregs te mtshams gcad bya'o// hUM badz+ra po ta yA dz+wA la swa b+hA ba ma hA tsar+ya hU/ kha/ khams gsum brtan pa'i sa gzhi ni// bdag
118a3(ya): ni sha las gyur pa ste// brtan zhing mi g.yo rnam par brjid// 'jig rten mu thu chun kun gyis kyang // gzhig cing smad par mi nus te// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba//
118a4(ya): dpal ldan stong gsum srid pa'i gzhi// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyis// rgyal ba'i bzhugs nas pho brang ste// gzhal med khang chen rab tu brtags//
118a5(ya): mi 'gyur mi shig yongs su rtogs// bdag nyid chen po'i mtshams gcad bya'o// bru ma ra ya sa ma yai g+hA ha la rtsa na sa mra a lang ka hUM/ ye shes 'byung ba chen po lnga/
118a6(ya): bsreg dang gtor dang bkru ba yis// cis kyang gzhig par mi nus pa'i// stong pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// ji bzhin 'dod pa rabo bsgrubs pa'o// mtshams kyi
118a7(ya): dkyil 'khor snyun gyis grub// tshig tu brjod pa'i don bsam zhing // phya nang gsang ba de nyid kyis// snod bcud rnam rtog rab sbyang bso// bar gcod 'dul ba'i
118b1(ya): mtshams bcad de// de nas nang du mtshon cha lnga// mi bzad 'bar ba'i mtshams bcad pa// he ru ka yi thugs ka nas// rdo rje 'khor lo tho ba dang // ral gri phur pa'i
118b2(ya): rang bzhin dag/ hUM oM phaT a ha las 'phros// steng 'og phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bla// thams cad mtshon cha'i rang bzhin te// 'o gnas sa gzhi bltams pa la//
118b3(ya): steng nas sprin 'khrig char du 'beg/ rang snang rlung bskyed thogau ltar rgyu// phyogs mtshams thud 'phro me ltar 'bar// rdo rje 'brar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ 'khor lo
118b4(ya): babar ba bsgyur zhing gcod// tho ba 'bar ba 'byor zhing brdung // ral gri 'bar bas gcod cing gtub// phur pa 'bar bas 'debs shing 'big/ bar gcod byed
118b5(ya): pa bgegs kyi tshogs// ma lus rdul du brlag pa ra bya// o dz+nyA na tsakra dzA la hUM/ dz+nyA na badz+ra dz+wa la hU/ dz+nyA na trig rna dz+wa la hUM/ dz+nyA na ki la dz+wa la hU/ nang du khro bo rogs lba ni//
118b6(ya): shin tu khro zhing gtum pa ni// zhi bas 'dul bar mi nus to// thugs rje chen po'i thabs mchog gis// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// sku yi cha lugs 'khor bar
118b7(ya): mdzad// rgyu'abras gnod pa de 'dul phyir// rigs kyi khro chen 'bar ba lnga// dbus dang phyogs bzhi dkyil 'khor rnams// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun
119a1(ya): gyis/ dngos po rdzas snang mtshan ma kun// sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma 'phrin las khrag 'thung ste// thams cad dpal chen he ru ka/
119a2(ya): khro bos tshogs ni nam mkha' gang // khro bo'i tshogs kyis sa gzhi khyab// khro chung tshogs ni sku ltar 'khrug/ dam tshig can ni dbyings nas bzhengs// sangs rgyas khro
119a3(ya): bo gti mug 'dul// rdo rje khro ba zhe sdang 'joms// rin chen khro bos nga rgyal 'joms// pad+ma'i khro bos 'dod chags 'joms// 'phrin las khro bos phrag do ga 'joms// dri
119a4(ya): za ga shin rje klu rnams dang // phyogs mtshams gnas pa bgegs kyi tshogs// 'jig rten phyogs bcu gzhan du byer// 'di ni dpal gyi pho brang ste// bgegs zhes bya ba'i
119a5(ya): ming yang med// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ mahA bud+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma maN+Da la bi dza ya ban tsa kro d+hA hU phaT/ hU/ khro rgyal kun gyi ye
119a6(ya): shes ni// zhe sdang nga rgyal phrag dog gis// 'dod chags gti mug ngang gis dag/ gti mug dpal chen he ru ka/ chos dbyings ye shes ngang du gsal// kun tu
119a7(ya): ma bcos mtha' dang bral// zhe sdang dpal chen he ru ka/ gzugs brnyan ye shes ngang du gsal// ma nor ma lus mkhyen pa'i ngang // nga rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/
119b1(ya): mnyam nyid ye shes dang du gsal// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i lta ba bral// 'dod chags dpal chen he ru ka/ rtog pa'i ye shes ngang du gsal// chos sku'ubya chub khong du chud
119b2(ya): phrag dog dpal chen he ru ka/ 'phrin las sna tshogs dang du gsal// thams cad ma grub gang yang med// chos sku spros bral cho ga'i mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs
119b3(ya): sku'i he ru ka/ sprul sku khro bo khro mo'i tshogs// rang bzhin mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku// 'phrin las mngon par byang chub sku// thams cad sku dang ye shes la// bgegs su rtog
119b4(ya): pa gang yang med// bsrung ba bya dang srung byed med// gcad bya gcod byed gang yang med// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med// 'di la gsil du ga la yod// rang gi sems dang
119b5(ya): gzhan gyi sems// thams cad ches sku'i ngang du gcig/ chos sku kun bzang he ru ka/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/
119b6(ya): oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya ban tsa bo d+hi ma hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ad ma ko&ha/ bsrung ba chen po'i sbyor ba'o// de nas bde bar gshegs rnams kyis/
119b7(ya): yon tan ma lus rdzogs pa yi// byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgrub pa che// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i lung bshad pa// thog mar 'di la rtsom pa yis// nga yis sngon du
120a1(ya): rab bshad pa'i// mtshan nyid rab rdzogs skyes bu ni// dpa' zhing brtul bad blo dang ldan// rigs bzang yon tan rgyan dang ldan// ma lus thog pa de
120a2(ya): yis ni// thabs dang shes rab grogs bzangs btsal// ji srid spang bya ma lus pas// sangs rgyas drang srong sgrub pa dang // rdo rje 'phraman sbyar gnas dang // dur khrod
120a3(ya): chen po mngon du rgyu// dam tshig can gyi grogs byed cing // bkra shis rdzas kyis rab brgyan pa// 'byung chen dang ni drag chen dang // mi dang mi min dgra med cing // phun
120a4(ya): sum tshogs pa'o gtsang ma dag/ legs par brtags te nges bzung zhing // kun la snang ba thob pa dang // thabs kyis gang bas legs par sbyang // yo byad mchog gis
120a5(ya): bsnyen bkur zhing // thog ma bar dang mthar rdzogs pa'i// mi zad gter dang ldan par bya// sngon 'gro dkyil 'khor gru gsum la// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phur pas
120a6(ya): btag// phyogs bcu kun nas bsrung bya zhing // zhe sdang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje khro bo'i lus ngag gis// ting 'dzin byin rlabs rab tu bskor// gzhal med khang
120a7(ya): pa legs par bsgom// mchog dong dman pa bar ba yis// yul gsum mchod pas kun mnyes nas// sgo gsum gyi ni nyes pa sbyong // rang gi rigs kyis snang
120b1(ya): brtags nas// phyogs bzhir rten bzhi mnga' gsol zhing // 'phrin las ji ltar mngags pa gsol// nang du bya ba'i rim pa dang // gsang shing bya ba rnams kyis spyad//
120b2(ya): dur khrod bdag po der dgug cing // bsad dang mnan dang bsrung bar bya// de nyid gzhi ru gyur sa gzhir bya// lus kyi tshad ldan mnyam pa la// dri bzang mdog bzang rnams
120b3(ya): kyis brdar// shes rab grogs kyis rab gcad de// gnas lnga mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs// dri dang rgyan gyis rab bgos te// rgyu dang kha drog tshul ldan pa'i//
120b4(ya): thig skud rdo rjer byin rlabs mdzod// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma che// oM dadra hUM zhes bya ba yis// oM hri a dang phaT kyis brgyan// 'u bru lnga dang ni byang chub sems// oM AH
120b5(ya): hUM gi rang bzhin gyis// cho ga gsum dang ldan pas gdab// mkha' dang gsang ba'i 'phro 'udu yis// dkyil 'khor dgu 'am lnga las ni// bcu drug cha yis phyi zhing
120b6(ya): gsal// zhi dang shin tu zhi dang khro// rnam grangs kun tu khyab pa'o// rin chen ye shes tshon sna lnga// nga bshad bzhugs pa'i pho brang bzhengs// bsnyen par snang ba
120b7(ya): bshad bzhin du// sku rdzogs phyag mtshan snying po las// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma yis// rdzas kyi khyad par mngon par dbyung // phyi nang gsang ba'i bum pa'i rdzas
121a1(ya): khyad par 'di la bsngags pa yis// ye shes lnga ldan dbus su dgod// sku gsung lhun grub shar du ste// yid bzhin gter ldan lha tshogs lta bu'o//
121a2(ya): khams gsum sgrol mdzad nub tu'o// cho 'phrul rtags 'byin byung du'o// mi shigs mdzod ldan shar lho ste// srid gsum yongs sgrol nub tu'o// dug gsum gtan
121a3(ya): drug nub byang du'o// mtshan ma spros bral byang shar du'o// so so'i ming gi mtshan ma dag/ rigs kyi rdzas mchog rnam pa lnga// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rdzas kyi rnam
121a4(ya): pa de sbyor bya// kha dog rigs dang mthun pas bcings// dur khrod bsrung ba'i rdzas kyi bskor// thun mong mchod rdzas rgyas par bshams// zhi ba g+ha na ta na'i dus// phyogs
121a5(ya): bzhi dog na rab bstan pa'i// dur khrod rdzas dang mar me dang // yum dang yab dang rgyu mchog sngags// nga yis sngon bshad rigs brgya dang // brgyad phyed lnga dang gcig nyid
121a6(ya): kyis/ gnas mchog gsum du 'bru gsum gyis// ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du gsol// ye shes lnga dang sku mchog dang // yab yum thun mong dbu rgyun gsal// dgug
121a7(ya): gzhug bstim pa tshang byas nas// dam tshig dbang can rnams kyang mngag/ rnam par rtog pa kun sbyangs te// mnyes pa dam pas nye bar bya// oM A tra hA sarba pan tsa
121b1(ya): a mr-i ta/ ra sa ya na ta na dza ya/ g+hA ya sid+d+hi hUM hri tha/ sgra na rnams thams cad bdad rdzi lnga// bye ba sna tshogs sku gsung thugs// gsang ba'i dngos gra ba nye ba yin// sman dang
121b2(ya): lha dang dam tshig lha rnams ni// kun dang rgyas ldan dam pa sbyang // steng rdzogs mchod bstod ting 'dzin gser// bskrad dang bsrung dang bar chad bzlog
121b3(ya): rtags rdzogs bstan pa lnga dbye zhing // rigs lnga'i dam tshigau dbab pa ni// rdzas mchog rnam pa lngar dbye ba// dbus su sems 'das rtsa ba brgyad// ga pu ru cu gang dza ti dang //
121b4(ya): gu ra kum sug smil ling shi dang // ka ko la tha ga rdo rje dang / Nasha dri rim dang bcas te bkon// shar du dri shin a ru ra// a ka ru dang dza ti dang // du ru ka ni sogs pa ra dgod// lho ru ma sa snying sna tshogs
121b5(ya): no ka rnams dang tsi tra ka/ ka ko la ni sog par dgod// nub tu pad+ma rak+ta dang // tsan dan li gi skyu ru ra// rgun 'brum star bu lo phyogs dgod// byang du dri chu sna tshogs dang //
121b6(ya): gur ku ma tse phon la sogs te// rtsa ba lo ma me tog 'bras// lus bcud dbang po yan lag dang // rtsa khrag tshu la sogs pa kun// shar lho nub byang phyogs dang dbus//
121b7(ya): rang gi rigs dang 'khor du dgod// ya ra las ni bskyed dang bsregs// dbus su a lam nyi zla la// oM hUM sra a ha zhes pa// dkar mthong ser dmar ljang khu dbus/
122a1(ya): shar lho nub byang rim bzhin bskyed// bod ldan rgyud lnga skyong byed cing // snod bcud rab btus mtshan ma ni// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma ral gri
122a2(ya): 'phro 'ud dang // sku lnga yum dang bcas pa yis// gsol ba'i snod du bslangs nas kyang // rdo rje pad+ma'i 'phro 'udu dang // so so'i rigs kyi snying po dang // tshogs lnga ye
122a3(ya): shes lnga dang bcas// changu chu 'o ma rin chen chu// mtshams bzhin so so'i bud la sbyong gis// rtags dang ldan par gyur pa dang // gnyis med gsang chen rigs gcig gi/
122a4(ya): / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsgom// oM sarba pa no tsa a mr-i ta/ badz+ra tsit+ta sa ma yAM hU/ zhu ba'i ngo bo nyid du bya// sbyor ba'i nus rtags rdzogs pa dang // mtshan stong dngos
122a5(ya): grub blang la sogs// shes rab kyis ni thabs mnyes bya// pho brang mchog la rdzas kun brdzus// mnyam nyid thugs la bstim zhing sbyang // zhing dang rgyu yang rab tu dgus
122a6(ya): gnas ngan sbyang zhing brod pa bskyed// ye shes sku lnga'i 'phro 'du las// 'phrin las gsum gyis don kun rdzogs// lha dang dkyil 'khor rdzas rnams kun// dur khrod chen po'i
122a7(ya): gsang ba mchog/ dpal gyi khro rtags cha lugs bsgyur// pags pa g.yang gzhi mchog keng rus// dri mchog bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgom// dkar dmar sems kyi
122b1(ya): thig le bri// rdo rje ging chen chas su gzhug/ mkha' gsang thabs dang shes rab kyis// byin rlabs bdud rtsi 'khyil ba las// gtso chen dang ni 'khor gyi tshogs// rang gi
122b2(ya): rigs dang mtshungs pa yis// le shes bdud rtsi dbab par bya// sbyang ba'i bsnyen pas nyung zhing bsdus// mtshan rtags las su rdung pa dang // mtshan ma dbyings su sbyang ba'i
122b3(ya): phyir/ gtso 'khor rim bzhin phyag rgyas dbab// btag btsag sbyar dang sbyang ba ni// sher lho nub byang phyogs rim bzhin// sngags baphreng bcas pas mo thar
122b4(ya): phung ste// bdug bcing bskrad dang bsrung ba dang // glu bro gar dang mchod bstod byo// khro chung rgyal stong thabs kyis// yon tan brjod cing zhi bas bskrad// yi ge 'bru dang
122b5(ya): gzhu dang brtu le// 'phrin las rnam bzhi sreg byang las// rdzas kyi phrad kyis mnyes par bya// mtshan ldan yum de rgyan byas nas// bzang po'i snod du rgyas btab
122b6(ya): nas// rdo rje rgyal po nga yis bzung // stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang // sems gsum dag pa'i byin rlabs dbag/ phyi nang 'byung ba yongs rdzogs pas// dur khrod rgyan
122b7(ya): rdzogs gzhal yas khang // pho brang chen po dgu bsam nas// rang gi gdan steng sa bon gyis// nga nyid che mchog he ru ka/ rnam zhal dbyings ma dang sbyar bas//
123a1(ya): phyogs kun tu ni dkyil 'khor dpung // phyogs mtshams brgyad du 'khor bcas dgod// bdud rtsib khyil dang pad+mar 'khyil// de yi pad+ma 'dab ma la//
123a2(ya): rgyal ba rigs bzhi yum dang bcas// steng 'og hUM dang pad+ma 'khyil// rlung dang me yi sbyor ba las// gzhal med khang pa brgyad dbus su// gtso chen brgyad kyi dbu gsum
123a3(ya): brdzis// de dag nyid kyi he ru ka/ zhabs bzhi yis ni rab tu mnan// mkha' mnyam glong gi zhabs brgyad kyis// he ru ka brgyad da bu gnyis mnan// dbu phyed rngub pa'i
123a4(ya): b+ha ga la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad dbu brgyad rnams sbyor ba// rdzogs byed he ru ka nyid ni// dbu ma'i ljags la sa nu sbyor// thugs kha'i nyi ma'i dkyil
123a5(ya): 'khor la// bum pa'i dbu la 'bru dgus bskog/ bdi ni sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor bdun// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor brgyad dang ldan// he ru ka yau nga rgyal ldan// ye shes dkyil
123a6(ya): 'khor tshogs dgug cing // bostims mchod cing bstod byas nas// bya ba chen po der 'jug pas// bdag nyid mer sbyang sngags dang bcas// ting 'dzin ma dpu du rlung gis/
123a7(ya): bskyed// don rtag dang dang ldan pa ni// ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsi dang // mu tig dkar po dri med ldan// dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bzhugs shing dul// mnga' mdzad
123b1(ya): bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i// 'phro 'du gsum gyis don chen bsgrubs// de 'dra'i sbyor ba dpag med kyis// rim bzhin thabs kyi yan lag las// brtson 'grus stobs kyis
123b2(ya): 'bad pa snang // sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'i phran las rnams kyis gtsor byas nas// 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri// gzugs snang 'phel ba rab tu ston//
123b3(ya): de la mchod bstod rgya chen bya// ting 'dzin pa skyed cing bar chad bzlog/ sngags pa mchog gis gzung bar bya// 'dod pa rdzogs nas dkyil bar bya// oM AHhUM sarba
123b4(ya): pan tsa a mr-i ta/ hUM hri pra/ brgya ru brgyad kyi sa ting 'dzin bskyar// pho brang chen por dbab bya zhing // o a mri ta sa ma ya pra beng ga la pheM pheM hUM hr-i we/ bar du spogs
123b5(ya): rashing ting 'dzin gser// dngos grub gnyer shing gsol ba gdog/ pho brang dgu yi steng bzhugs nas// las dang mthun pa'i dbang rnams bskur// phyogs bcur
123b6(ya): gnas dang nye ba'i lha// lhag 'gyur bla ma dus gsum mchod// de bzhin bdag gis dngos grub blangs// re dogs spangs te phyag rgya spelo// dmigs med gsum
123b7(ya): / gyis de la sbyar// a hi su ga d+harma ka ya ni a mri ta sid+d+hi hU~M hri tha/ nyi ma'i rdo rje hUM ldan bcas// rin chen dbang po'i sgo la thim// ri ga mchog kun gsol snang ba dang //
124a1(ya): rdo rje slob mas me tog gtor// rim pa bzhin du dbang sbyin pa// bkul tshig dbyangs dang sngags pas bcas// phyi nang rnang ba de nyid tshul// yul gsum ma
124a2(ya): phyir gsum du'o// mchod rdzas chen po brdar ba yang / bsreg cing mchod de gtor chen la// 'phags pa mchod cing nyid longs spyod// ri lu lkugs gsum za ma tog/ thog ma'i
124a3(ya): rjod gzhug bsnyen cing bskur// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas la sogs// bskal pa grangs med skad cig gis// mnyam dang chos lhag
124a4(ya): yon tan rdzogs// 'phrin pas rnam bzhi legs bshad cing // phyi nang kun mnyes gtang rag gtang // gnas bsrung lha gzhan der mi bstod// kun gyi don du bsngo bya zhing // mtshan ma
124a5(ya): spos bral dngos yin no// byang chub sems kyi yon tan te// mnyam nyid rtogs pa kho nas 'grub// nyon mongs dug rnams dbang du 'gyur// ye shes lnga yi longs spyod las/
124a6(ya): rdzas kyi dug rnams smos ci dgos// dpe don brda dang brtags yin no// gdul bya'i rigs la kha dog lnga// brtul ba yon tan gser lta bu// rnam dag dpe
124a7(ya): mtshon dkar po ste// chags chen dbang yin dmar por snang // 'phrin las sku mdog ljang bu'o// don ldan mi 'gyur mthing nag ste// ma
124b1(ya): lus sku mdog dri yin pa// thams cad ro gcig de yi ro// dngos po rdzas su snang ba'i btud// rang bzhin yon tan che ldan las// bsgrubs pa'i nus pa bsam mi khyab//
124b2(ya): ma lus rang gi tshul du 'das// rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes bstan// sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal ba med// don rtags chos dang sman gyi sa ni// dpal gyi mdzad pa de sbyor ro//
124b3(ya): hUM zhi khro rgyal ba ye shes sku// 'gro la phan mdzad thugs rje can// srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gcig pu// lha yi lha rnams dgongs su gsol// bde bar gshegaso pa kun
124b4(ya): the dus pas// sprul pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas// ma lus 'dus pa mkhyen par gsol// bdag ni rgyal srid longs spyod dang // rang 'dod nan cher mi sgrub cing // 'gro
124b5(ya): gzhon don du 'ab de rtsol na// kun gyi dpal du 'gyur bar bya// kun mkhyen ye shes spyan ldan pas khadag gzhan kun gyi lhag bsam mkhyen// spyan sngar bdag gis
124b6(ya): dam bcas pa// sun 'byin slu bar mi bgyi'o// khe dang dregs pa 'jig rten chos// g.yo sgyu ngan pa'i sems spangs nas// kun tu bzang po byangang chub sems//
124b7(ya): don dam kun rdzob tshul bzang ngo // sems can thams cad bdud 'gyur te// bdag la gnod pa rab sbyar kyang // shes rab snying rje 'brel mas bskyang //
125a1(ya): yi dam lha dang bla ma dang // mchod bzung theg pa cher gnas pa// srog gi phyir yang mi spong bsgrug/ snang sems rmi lam sgyu ma la// 'chi bas
125a2(ya): 'jigs pa ma mchis te// skye bo gzhan gyi don 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yis// rang dbang du ni skye ba blang // bdag ni gcig pu'i zho bode la// myur bgro'i spro
125a3(ya): ba ma mchis pa// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skye zhing // byang chub sems kyi dga' ba spyad// shes rab thabs kyis don mdzad mo// 'gro ba'i
125a4(ya): las kyi 'dul skal la// so so'i blo dang skad bzhin du// ji ltar 'tshams pa de bstan no// rnal 'byor mchogo lam zhugs pa yis// skyes chen rig pa 'dzin pa
125a5(ya): rnams// nus pa ji srid shugs kyis ni// brtson 'grus 'ab pas bsnyen bkur ro// gsang ba theg pa tha med la// rab sdang gdug po'i tshul 'chang ba/ nus muH
125a6(ya): drug rgyal ci yod kyis// myur du sgrol ba grags tsam mo// dka'i dus chen 'di nyid nas// zag chen tha med thug gi bar// dpal chen bde bar gshegs rnams kyis/
125a7(ya): ji ltar dam bcas de bzung ngo // zhes brjod don rnams dam bcar b.lung // dam tshig chen po'i bsgrub pa'o// / de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// kun
125b1(ya): tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ he ru ka dpal bde ba che// 'di la bye bar 'dod pa yis// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// skyes bu rnams kyi don ba shad pa// smin gro la thob pa ma
125b2(ya): gtogs pa// tshig gcig tsam yang ma bstan te// rang gi rgyud smin 'dod pa yis// skal bzang mchog ldan de yis ni// srog lus blo dang rdzas rnams kyis// phul mchog
125b3(ya): mnyes byas 'dod pa blangs// bum pa gsang ba gsang chen dang // theg pa kun 'dus lta ba ba di// rim pa rnams kyi dang po'o// las dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang // sa
125b4(ya): bcu kun spyod mnyam gzhag srid// mngon par gnas pa'i rim bzhin du// phan nus cho ga lam mchog dang // rgyal thabs spyi lug thabs chen yin// dang po
125b5(ya): las can de smin pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sprul pa 'jig rten pa sa ma gyur tshe// lha klu'i dbang pos dngos dbang ba skar// dag sbyong chen po
125b6(ya): sangs rgyas che// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal byas nas// sa bdog lha mis lags brjod nas// bkrang kos bum pa de dbang bskur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad
125b7(ya): dgongs// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis// sangs rgyas kun gyis blangs pa yis// brtan pa'i snod phul de dbang bskur// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal de byung gis//
126a1(ya): spyi bor bum pa yid bzhin bteg/ 'khor lo yo byad sna bdun gyis// mngon par bstod pa de dbang bskur// dka' thub spyod pas gnas 'gyur na/
126a2(ya): khyed kyi bsam gtan 'di yis ni// mthar thug don chen ma thob pas// rang gi 'od gsal de gzung la// rang dga'i gan su khyod song la/ byang chub mchog spyod dem
126a3(ya): // tshig rdzogs dam pas de dbang bskur// longs spyod rdzogs rgyu rgyal rnams kyis// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i shes rab stabs// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi rol mdzod ma//
126a4(ya): rig pa chen mos de dbang bskur// mngon byung de nyid la dor nas// phab tsod gting dpag dka' ba dang // zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog/ spros med mtha' las yong mi dmig/
126a5(ya): 'dus ma byas shing spun gyis grub// bdud rdzi skyon bral mchog thob pa// de ni rab rdzogs de dbang bskur// rim pa bani yis de rdzogs te// de nas gong du thog ma byas/
126a6(ya): rang dang gzhan gyi tshul snang las// sku dang ye shes tshogs byung ba// dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i 'phrin las yin// dur khrod chu gling ri dang ldangs// dus ni rgyas dang 'byor
126a7(ya): pas// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas nyid du// gsol ba snang dang chos 'byung zhing // yon tan rab rdzogs 'phel dus der// byang chub sems ldan rgyud sbyang zhing //
126b1(ya): skyon spang yon tan rdzogs pa der// yon tan de nyid thob 'dod pa'i// skyes bu blo ldan slob ma yis// rigs bzang sems kyis rab bskul ba'i// rigs rgyud bstar ba'i spyan rdza ru// /
126b2(ya): brtag dang blang dang byin gyis brlabs// skyong zhing song ba sngon song ba'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa lha rnams dang // slob ma sta gon bya ba las// rjes su bsnyen pa le gsau ba shad
126b3(ya): nas/ byang chub sems rjes bzung ba yiso// thig bris tshon ni rin chen 'ubra// dri sogs ting nge 'dzin gyis bris// ye shes chen po nyer bsnyen pa// slar yang bzhi yi lam
126b4(ya): sbyangs te// pho brang sgo ru me tog sbyin// gsol ba gdab cing spro bskyed ni// lus la dag byas snying po bsgom// nang du rdo rje chen po gzung // ku sha so shing bsrung skud sbyin//
126b5(ya): de dag mtshan nyid rdzas bstan nas// las kyi chu yis gtsang sbra spyad// cho gas yongs su smin pa dang // yol ba'i nang du dam tshig skrag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes dpeb//
126b6(ya): me tog 'phreng ba lha la der// rang gi rigs su gyur pa brtag/ gsol ba btab pas mo ga phye nas// gzugs brlan gtso 'khor legs par bstan// de nas
126b7(ya): sngags pa'i sa la gzhag/ me tog 'phreng bas de dbang bskur// lha dang bum pa dbu rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming la sogs// rig pa chen po'i dbang bskur ro//
127a1(ya): rdo rje slob dpon gnang ba'i dbang // seng ge pad+ma'i khri stengs su// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs dang // phyag mtshan dang ni dam tshig gsum// dbugs
127a2(ya): dbyung lung bstan phyir mi ldeg/ phyi ltar bshad pa'i bum dbang ngo // bum pa'i chu mchog bdud rtsi lnga// btung ba'i dam pa blud pa ni// rang rdzas bum pa gsang ba'o// bde
127a3(ya): ljon lus kyi bumo pa ni// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi// chu yis ye shes sems dag pa// shes rab dag pa'i bum pa'i// phyag rgya lus kyi bum pa las// sems
127a4(ya): kyi chu rgyun babs pa yis// thabs mchog gsang ba dag byed pa// sbas pa'i bum pa bzhi pa ste// thun mong gsang ba khyad par dang // rab tu sbas pa de dag gis// lus
127a5(ya): su 'dzin pa'i phyogs kun smin// thabs dang shes rab nges par dbag/ las kyi nyes gsum dri ma sbyang // sgrib tshul sa dang lam gyis sbyang // bsod nams ye shes
127a6(ya): tshogs kyi lam// dam tshig ye shes sbyor ba'i lam// gzugs brnyan mthong ba de nyid lam// kun tu gnas 'gyur bsgom pa'i lam// nges par thob pa mi slob lam//
127a7(ya): dang po sangs rgyas sa yin te// gnyis pa mos pa bstod bya'o// dang por rab tu dga' ba nas// bzhi pa brgyad pa'i bar du 'gro// phyi yi rgyud dang skye'i ma dang // 'phrin
127b1(ya): las bzhi dang grub chen brgyad// thun mong yan lag thabs chen dang // dang po'i las kyi spyod pa bstan// gnyis la rdzas spyod rnal 'byor te// gsum pa la ni bden pa gnyis//
127b2(ya): kun rdzob spyod gsum mthar thug la'o// kun tu sgra ni ji ltar gtang // sdom pa ma yin drang ba dang // tshig tsam yan lag tshogs kun bstan// ku sha la sogs gtsang sbra yis
127b3(ya): lces dang me tog dor las brtag/ lus kyi brda dang phyag rgya bstan// mgo la dbu rgyan cod pan te// dag byed rdzas kun lus dang phyi'o// dam tshig rdo rje dril bu dag/ lag tu bskur
127b4(ya): te nus pa dbyung // dur khrod chas rnams lus kun lo// phyag rgya phyag mtshan lag la'o// dbugs dbyung yon tan spro ba bskyed// sgrub rdzas lung sbyin bskur phyir ro// don dang
127b5(ya): phyir mi ldo gau la bstan// rgyan gyi khyad par rang gi gnas// ri ni chen nye bar rin chen brgyad// bkra shis nye ba'i bkra shis kyis/ tshul mthun ma lus rdzas kun gyis//
127b6(ya): sngags tshig smon lam rnams kyis sbyin// tshad med bzhi yi dgongs pa dang // rang gis bstan pa'i lha rnams bstim// dag pa'i yon tan rgyud lnga skyong // kun grub ye shes
127b7(ya): lnga rjes 'dzin// phyag rgya dam tshig grub pa lnga// slob ma rjes su smin par byed// sgo gsum sgrib pa'i dri ma 'bru// 'phrin las nus shing 'bras bu thob// de nyid la bcu dbadu
128a1(ya): bzhi 'joms// rang bzhin gnas dang bsags pa dang // don rab sa dang lam gyi rjes// sangs rgyas pa yi yon tan ldan// thun mong dang ni mthar
128a2(ya): thug pa'i// dngos grub kyis ni gzung 'dzin ston// bdud 'joms 'phrin pa'i yon tan ni// chu ni blo mnyes dri ma dang // dang po'i sa la dri ma 'khru// zhe sdang nga rgyal grogs
128a3(ya): su sbyong // lam sgom rigs gnyis dngos grub yin// nyon mongs rtog ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// ming bdag rdo rje dril bu yis// phyi nang mtshan ma gnas ngan len//
128a4(ya): rang bzhin g.yeng ba lnga nyid dang // gnyis brgyad par gyi dri ma sel// 'dod chags phrag dog rnam dag pa'i// rigs su byed cing 'bras bu ni// mthar phyin pa la mngon phyogs
128a5(ya): shing // snang sogs thun mong grub pa'o// 'chi bdag gnod pa'i bdud 'joms byed// gsum pas g.yeng ba pho brang dang // sa bcu tha ma nges gsal bas// sa lam
128a6(ya): gong ma de btsun byed// brtul zhugs kyi ni me tog brtan// sku dang dbu rgyan dam tshig gis// bum par brtan pa bka' stsal to// lu sa brtan rdo rje dril bus byas// bdag
128a7(ya): po'i dbang gis dbugs dbyung ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la phyogs// 'bras bu dngos grub brtan par byed// lha dang 'brel ba'i bdud 'joms nus// me tog gis ni 'bras bu
128b1(ya): zhing dbu rgyan chu yis rgyus mthun byed// rnam smin rdo rje dril bu yis// ming gi skyes bu rab tu byed// 'bras bu dri med brtan pa bzhi// ngas bshad yon tan ma lus pa// 'dri yis
128b2(ya): 'bras bur gyur pa ste// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rten 'brel gyis// mthar thug bus pa 'byin pa ste// nga yi bstan pa dang po'o// de nas rim pa gnyis pa ni//
128b3(ya): nga dang sangaso rgyas thams cad kyis// rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang // gnas mchog dam pa 'di nyid du// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rab
128b4(ya): bsdus te// he ru ka dpal yab yum gyis// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang bslang ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che//
128b5(ya): kun rdzob kyis ni don dam mchog/ rang gi rigs su sgrub pa las// dbang mchog chen por bskur ba ni// nga dang nga yi sras rnams kyis// rgyud chen dam pa de bshad do//
128b6(ya): gnas ni yab yum gsang ba'i mkha'// khyad par lhan cig skyes pa dang // dur khrod zhing dang sngags las skyes// rang gi rigs dang rigs ngan dang // mtshan ma can dang
128b7(ya): stobs can dang // gar mkhan tshil pa gdol pa mo// g.yul mo mda' mkhan ma la sogs// rgyud sbyang yon tan phun sum tshogs// nga yis brdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ldan//
129a1(ya): 'di ni gnas kyi dam pa'o// gong gi yon tan de rdzogs nas// pad+ma'i chu rgyun 'bab pa dang // he ru ka la gsol btab nas// gnang ba thob pa dus su
129a2(ya): brtags// yab yum gnyis med gsum blang yul// bum pa'i yon tan rdzogs pa dang // bzlos pa'i rnal 'byor brtul zhugs can// longs spyod 'dod pa len pa'o//
129a3(ya): thog mar lus kyi dkyil 'khor ba rtag/ rgya ni 'dom gang de nyid do// legs par bcas pa sgo bzhi ste// snang ba lnga ni kha dog yin// d+hU ti dbu ma tshangs pa'i thig/ g.yas g.yon//
129a4(ya): gnyis ni rdo rje gdung // ka ba rkang brgyad de nyid ni// yan lag bzhi ni rta babs yin// rtsa ba'i snying ni pho brang ste// snying gzhan snod bzhi bcas pa ni// pho brang chen po brgyad yin no//
129a5(ya): sha dang rus pa rtsig pa ste// khrag dang chu sar zham bu yin// pags chen phyi yi khor yug ste// ba spu mo ri 'bar ba'o// dbang po yul bcas gdan dang khri// skra dang mig ni
129a6(ya): rgyal mtshan mthong // phung po lnga ni gtso chen lnga// 'byung ba lnga ni yul chen lnga// rnam par shes brgyad yum dang bcas// rigs kyi gtso chen brgyad yin no// sems dang sems
129a7(ya): las byung ba dang // snang ba dang ni de las skyes// rtog pa'i rang bzhin ma lus pas// zhwa dang khro dang rnal mar gnas// thams cad ma lus de yi 'khor// bza' dang btung ba bdud
129b1(ya): rtsi lnga// mnyes pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs yin// lus la rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor des// lung nas gnas de shes pa// rjes su snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// b+ha ga sogs pa'i
129b2(ya): gzhal yas khang // de la rtags gzung sbyang ba dang // byin brlabs bskrad dang bsdug pa bkru// mchod dang mnyes par dgyes par bya// phyi rol tu ni gdong bkab nas//
129b3(ya): gsol ba gdab cing bskor nas su// phyog btsal me tog dbul bar bya// dam tshig gi ni rdzas kyi dbab// mig phye mthong rtags brtan cing brtags// nang rol tu ni gtso chen /
129b4(ya): dang / khams gsum bdag po mnyam sbyor bas// bzhi dang drug gi 'khor lo dag/ rim gyi pha ba ste sbyin par bya// dkar dmar sar dang rgyun drag dang // tsha skor 'bar dang ming
129b5(ya): byin rlabs// sgra dang bde dang thang ba dang // rnam par mi rtog longs spyod dang // bde thob 'od dang gsal ba ste// 'phreng ba chu dang dbu rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming dang ni// brtul
129b6(ya): zhugs lung bstan phyir mi ldog/ dbugs dbyung gsang ba'i dbang yin no// ga pur tsan dan bdud rtsi lnga// dbab phyir khro bo'i tshul du bya// sems chen dbab pa de yi thabs//
129b7(ya): bad+ma gtso min gsang ba'o// nod pa de ni sprul pa'i gnas// rdo rje pad+ma 'dus padag/ skyon yon gsum gyis sgo gsum mtshan// 'gro pa'i sgor dbab thas shing gsang /
130a1(ya): de nyid rnam pa bzhi yin te// rang bzhin chu 'bab bum pa las// ro myong ba ni gsang ba yin// rtog med lam du gsum pa ste// gnyis med ye shes bzhi pa yin/
130a2(ya): pad+ma gtso ste snang ba dag/ phyi nang gsang gnas ngag gi lam// yul gsumu rgyu la dri ma med// sgo gnyis pa yi sbyor sngags te// dang po'i sa la sleb par spor// dgongs dang
130a3(ya): nges dang ji ltar min// sbas dang ma lus ldan pa dag/ rnal 'byor chen po'i don yin no// sbas dang sbyor dang rigs pa dang // zhi dang khro sogs brda rnams bstan// rtsu ba
130a4(ya): yan lag bcas pa dag/ longs spyod thams cad rab tu blangs// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // gtso bzung thugs dam paskang ba las// gzhal yas khang gi dbus
130a5(ya): dag tu/ bde byed yi ge gsang po'i rgyun// rdo rje pad+ma rab skyes pa// sems can gnyis 'dres bde bar gsal// thims sbyor bsam pa lam dgongs pa// ngag gi sar sgrib de dag
130a6(ya): la/ thabs dang shes rab stobs kyis ni// bcu gnyis pa ni mngon du byed// thabs kyis phung po'i bdud 'joms shing // nyon mongs bdud ni shes rab kyis// gnyis
130a7(ya): su med pas s+phota ste// spro ba pos ni lha rnams te// 'joms byed nus pa mthar thug gis// 'bad rtsol dri med thabs shes rab// rgyu mthun len pa ngo bo nyid// rnam
130b1(ya): par bsnyen pa'i rim pa ste// yul gsum mnyes tshul dul ba'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun tu bstim pa ste// rim pa chen po de bstan no// de nas rigs
130b2(ya): kyi dkyil 'khor de// ngas sngon phal ba'i 'khor rnams la// khyod kyis srog chags bsad pa dang // ma sbyin blangs shing mi tshangs spyad// brdzun tshig smra ba byos zhes bshad//
130b3(ya): de la kha cig dngang ba dang // skrag par gyur pa de bshad de// rgyal bas gyur pa kun blangs nas// rab tu spros te dgongs bshad pa// rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs dben pa//
130b4(ya): lus kyi ri bo dgon pa'i gnas// rang byung sems ni sgrub pa yis// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bde ba'i bdag/ sbed pa'i snang ba dbang thob dus// yab yum phyi nang bla ma yis// gong
130b5(ya): gnyis rdzogs dang gsang tshig la// mos shing nye gyur slob ma ste// rten bzang tshe 'phel la sogs min// 'kho lo bzhi yi dkyil 'khor dang // shes rab phyag rgya'i dkyil
130b6(ya): 'khor te// bzung dang sbyangs dang byin gyis brlabs// byin gyis brlabs bya gong du brtag/ lha dang sngags kyis lung bstan nas// ngas bshad mtshan nyid kun ldan pa//
130b7(ya): bcu drug nyi shu lnga yi bar// lhan cig zhing dang sngags las skyes// ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// 'di la rnam rtog yad ma yin// lha dang dkyil 'khor rngon bzhin te//
131a1(ya): gsang ba'i 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba'i mdapa la rang gi gnas// rtswa yi yi ge'i rnam pa bzhi// sngon du bshad pa rab bstan de// g.yas
131a2(ya): g.yon dbus gsum mtshan nyid brtag/ rgyal ldan mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dris gos mchod tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// ma lus lhag pa'i lha ru bsgom//
131a3(ya): o hUM phaT dang a yis ni// rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlabs// gnas gzung bajug par gsol gdab ste// brtul zhugs blangs dang dbab par bya// de nas de yi rigs kun la//
131a4(ya): dga' zhing gus pa'i sems bskyed de// phyag btsal nas ni me tog dor// shes rab sangs rgyas mig phye ste// lus kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus bstan// chags chen glu gar rol
131a5(ya): mo'i brda// mtshan nyid bzhi sogs rgyun dbab dang // dang po'i sgo sbyor rdo rje dgod// bskyod pa'i sgra ldan hUM phaT 'bod// so sor gnas bsgyur nges pa bskyed// lus kyis mi
131a6(ya): gtong ngag gis smras// pad+mar 'thung byed phyir mi ldog/ bum pa 'phreng chu dbu rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming bud+d+ha la zhugs// dam tshig dbugs dubyang lung bstan no// phyi rim
131a7(ya): mthong ba'i ye shes phyi// shes rab bde chen srog 'khor srog/ 'bab cing myong ba nang gi ste// zhing bde skad cig snang bzhi yis// kun tu bde thob gnas pa'o// phyi ru brda
131b1(ya): 'phrad bum pa ste// pad+ma rdo rje phrad gsang ba// rab bde gsum pa ye shes bzhi// gnas kyi sems kyi blang bde'o// bud med sgyu ma sems kyis brdas// mtshan nyid rnam pa'i
131b2(ya): lus kyis kyang // shes rab skal ba med pas kyang // rlung sems 'gog pa'i sems kyis kyang // bde chen skad cig mthar thug mtshon// sems sbyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes
131b3(ya): bsgyur// ma chags pad+ma can du 'gyur// sems rigs rang bzhin 'od gsal brtan// rtsa gnyis kyis ni gzung 'dzin 'gog/ gcig gi so las rnams kun la ldog/
131b4(ya): 'od zer 'phro dang bskyod dang 'bar// 'bab cing skyes gang bde chen sku// de nyid rtsa lnga rlung bcu yis// las su kun byed sprul pa'i sku// steng 'og sgo dang bar rnams su//
131b5(ya): rlung dang sngags kyi de nyid kyis// rab sbyar 'byung dang rngub pa dang // bzlas dang rigs dang sgyu ma'i tshul// bde dang gsal las mi rtog las// rgyun ma chad pa'i ye shes kyis//
131b6(ya): 'khor bar 'das tshul ma lus shing // ma nor ya shes de 'bras bu// phyi rol smig sgyu du ba dang // srin bu glog dang mar ma dang // nam mkha' lta bu rim bzhin bu byung // bsnyen
131b7(ya): rdzogs rim pa lnga dag gis// skad cig 'dra dang 'dra bcu gnyis// rang rig bdud rtsi lnga spyad nyid// de yi 'dod yon lnga nyid spyad// bde spyod cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi//
132a1(ya): mgrin snang la skye ba dang // gsung smras gnas can bcu drug las// yar phel mar 'grib byung byed pa ni// mya sogs kyi sogs bcu drug dang /
132a2(ya): sum cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// brgyad kyis byed dang bzhi nyid kyis// ka tsa Ta shes la shrAk+Sha/ oM.A/ d+hu dang nga gis ni// 'khor lo dbus su de nyid kyis// thabs dang
132a3(ya): shes rab gnyis gnyis spyod// ting 'dzin lha dang lus dang rtswa// dbugs rlung bcu dang thig le ste// tha mal sems dang byang chub sems// del de bsnun rim par rdzogs//
132a4(ya): gnas dang 'tha nga ga tu'oH// byams cad sa klu'i nus bAn// dang po dang ni ba rgya gcig pa'o// rlung 'dzams drug rgya tho rmuH// bcu ga nyis pa yi rig pa 'dzin/
132a5(ya): sprul pa'i bar 'khor lo// nyon mongs rdzub tsal bdud bzhi 'joms// dam tshig 'khor lo badra'i gnas// rdo rje denab ting de 'bab pa'i// sprul pa'i chos spyad bdang
132a6(ya): rnam rmin rgyu mthun chos kyi sku// dri med skyes bu na tshogs byed// de yi rjes su rnal 'byor des// 'di ni shes rab ye shes kye// rim pa gsum par 'gyur ba yin// ngas
132a7(ya): rngon mthar thug bstan pa la// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams kyis// ngag gsal ba yi yo ge 'grub// rnam par rtog pa de rags lan// de la don yod ma yin//
132b1(ya): rang gi rang rig ye shes de// theg pa'i lta ba spyi 'byam ste// thugs mchog 'gyur med de la gnas// dus gsum dus med dus kyi mchog/ sems nyid gang shes bla mar mos//
132b2(ya): bsam gyis mi khyab de yi sras// gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// rang gis gsang chod mi ral to// de nyid gang thong mig phyed pa'i// gong stobs lam nus dkyil 'khor 'thog/
132b3(ya): kun la dbang bsar rang rig pa'i// rtsal rer sogasadabang ma chog/ lta ba theg pa spyi 'byams kyis// khong du chud pa'i rnam grangs yin// de nyid gsang ba gnyis pa ste//
132b4(ya): gsum rdzogs brjod las bsam mi khyab// mnyam nyid la shes chen po ste// gcig dang du mar 'dzin las grol// 'od gsal bzhi dang lam 'bras bu// sems nyid chos nyid ngo bo nyid//
132b5(ya): thabs gsum dang ni shes rab gsum// snang ba gsum dang stong pa gsum// ma lus zung du 'jug pa ste// dbyer med yi ge 'khor lo nyid// rdzogs pa chen po'i sa zhes bya//
132b6(ya): bcu gsum de ni brjod las 'das// de la bstan bya yod min zhing // ston par byed pa med nyid bstan// snang dang srid pa ji snyed brda// rnam par rtog pa de yi rdzas// dgongs pa rang rig de
132b7(ya): yi rdzas// 'gran zla med pa de yis nus// kun gyi mchog gyur 'bras bu yin// rim pa 'di bzhi tshogs pa ni// rten 'gyur gcig gis shes gyur gyis// kun la dbang gyur nges pa'i tshig/
133a1(ya): kun mkhyen ye shes go 'phang snyems pa'i rna bas// ji ltar 'bad pa grub pa ste// phyogs kun brnyes bya dam tshig ste// ma rdzogs pa yi rdzogs bya min//
133a2(ya): rdzogs la ma rdzogs de bzhin no// sku gsung thugs dang khyad par dang // spyi dang khyad par thun mong bcas// rdo rje 'cha ba mi smad cing // des gsung mthun pa'i bka' mi rdzab// der
133a3(ya): rtogs dpun la'ang khro ba yin// kun tu byams pa der mi bya// byang chub sems kyang rab tu bzung // gzhan don phyogs kun sun mi 'byung // gsang ba yum min der mi brjod//
133a4(ya): sguskur gyur lus la mi brdal te// legs bshad som gnyis ga la bya// brtan mangs rab ldan rjes bzung min// tha mal rtogs pas bskyed mi bya// lhag par mos pa sun mi dbyung //
133a5(ya): bzhes rab brtan la smod pa spang // ngas bshad gang min cung mi dor// gang gis de la bar gang bya zhing // yang dag sa la sbar la sogs// nga yis thog ma tha ma par// bshad pa de la mi 'da' zhig// gal te rnam
133a6(ya): lhog gyur na// brjod pa'i tshig 'dis rab tu sbyangs// oM/ bde gshegs kun 'dul rgyal bzhi khro'i ngang // chos sku spros bral bde chen gdod nas dag/ longs spyod rdzogs sku bsam
133a7(ya): bdas brjod mi lang // sprul sku 'gro don rdzogs mdzad bdag la dgongs// oM kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka/ 'gro 'dul thabs kyi gtso brgyad 'khor dang bcos// yon tan sku
133b1(ya): gsung thugs dang 'phrin las bdag/ 'dod yon kun rdzogs lha la phyag 'tshal bstod// oM dpal ldan zhi khro dbang phyug gsang ba'i tshogs// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid mchod pa'i
133b2(ya): tshogs// sku gsung thugs mnyes nam mkha' gter mdzod kyis// bud med mchod sprin mchog sbyar mchod par bzhes// oM thog med dus nas 'khor bdas bdag gzhan tshul/
133b3(ya): gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig nyid kyang // las kyi bukhral pas tha dad so sor gnas// gnyis 'dzin log l+h+wa' yid kyis tha tshomu byung // ma rig bag la nya la gyi rnam rtog gis//
133b4(ya): rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod zab mo gting ma phyin// thabs dang shes rab ya bral blang dor spyad// che mchog gsang ba'i dam la 'gal zhing nyams// 'bras bu'i don tshan sgrib pa'i rgyur gyur
133b5(ya): pa// gnod gyo do zhi ba'i sems skyed lam sbyangs nas// rtsa ba yan lag sku gsung thugs kyi gsang // thun mong bye brag khyad par bsam mi khyab// ji ltar gdams pa'i gzhung
133b6(ya): bzhin ma rtogs pa// bde gshegs rgyal bzhi khro 'khor dang bcas// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyed la bzod par gsol// ye shes rtsal gyis sangs rgyas lam ston cig/
133b7(ya): dus gsum rgyun du mi 'bral dgongs mdzod cig/ ces brjod tshig gis mnyes shing sbyang // mchod rdzas chen po de bsgrub bo// de nas byin gyis brlab
134a1(ya): bya'i phyir// phur pa'i rdzas kyis bsgrub pa ni// gzhan gyi don la 'bad pa dang // rang gi dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// yi ge lnga las legs byung ba'i// sa
134a2(ya): gzhi mdzes par 'od lngar ldan// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// kun shong yangs pa thog ma nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// yon tan tshogs
134a3(ya): rdzogs rnal 'byor gyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas bgegs rnams bzlog/ khro bo 'i tshul dang ldan pas bsgrub// kha dog lnga ldan srad bu ste//
134a4(ya): nang sngags yi ge lnga byin gyis// rdo rje khu tshur las kyi bya// pho brang dgu yi rgyan brtags kyis// mkha' las byin rlabs sna tshogs byung // gnod pa'i sbyor ba rgyun gcad phyir// 'jug
134a5(ya): pa las kyi sgo gsum bya// de la rdzas kyi dam pa ni// 'phrin las chen po rigs bzhi yi// phyag mtshan gser dngul zangs dang lcags// shug pa gser shing tsan dan dmar//
134a6(ya): chu shing tsher ma can gyis ni// rgyu yi don 'grub de bshad pa// gtso chen dgu dang rab sbyar ba'i// khros pa'i zhal dang phyag mtshan bcas// khru bzhi pa'am gsum du bya// lhag pa'i
134a7(ya): lha rnams de bzhin du// khru gang ba dang mdzub gang sogs// rigs dang mthun zhing grangs dang mnyam// rdzas kyi gtso bo mchog tu bya// rang gi gnas su gtso la phyogs// mdzes
134b1(ya): pa'i gdan du dgod par bya// don dam phur pa dgug cing bstim// phyag btsal mnga' gsol dgug cing bstod// he ru ka sogs 'khor dang bcas// nges par byin gyis slab
134b2(ya): cing dbab// zhi dang rgyas dang dgug pa dang // drag shul spyod pa'i gnas dag tu// kun rdzob las kyi phur pa yang // grangs dang mnyam pa de bzhin du// rang gi dbyibs
134b3(ya): ldan mdun du dgod// sngags pa'i rdzas kyang rab tu brtan// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyu 'am 'khor// rdo rje las byed grangs dang mnyam// sngon bshad tshul dang rab ldan pas// 'dod
134b4(ya): pa'i phur pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// de la dbang dang dngos grub blang // ye shes khro bo der gshegs nas// rtags dang mtshan ma ston par byed// de la dngos gzhi chen po yis//
134b5(ya): sgrub pa'i lha rnams rang sngags la// kI li kI la ya sarba big+haM nan ba hUM phaT/ ces sngags sngon du ston par bya// gser gyi ba tha ga gzigs pa dang // mgal me klad la
134b6(ya): bskor ba dang // lcags kyi cha tsha gdab la sogs// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i rnam pa 'phro// yon tan lha rnams sku gsung thugs// gnas gsum du ni rab tu bskor// badri
134b7(ya): ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // b+had tra tsar+ya su ka dang // brgya byin byang chub rgyal po yis// ma lus don gsal byed par 'gyur// bsgrub pa cher spyod de yi
135a1(ya): gnas// 'phrin las bzhi la gang sngags bzung // rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin dang sngags// dmigs pa dag dang dgod ched kyis// las kyi rim pa
135a2(ya): der spyad de// phyogs brgya dgu gsum sum rtseg gi/ kha khyer mi zad phur pas bskor// drag po'i rdzas rnams kun kyang bar shams// bum pa 'am yang na ban+d+ha'i snod//
135a3(ya): lhung lor bcas pa skam mi rlon// grangs dang mnyam pa dbus su dgod// gzhan yang ji ltar bshad pa yi// rdzas mchog dam pa sna tshogs dgod// he ru ka chen dgu rnams kyis//
135a4(ya): so so'i 'khor gyi khang bu rnams// 'di rjes phur bu 'od kyis mdzes// cho ga sna tshogs brten par byed// de 'dra'i ting 'dzin 'dzin ldan pas// nang du gzhug cing drang bar
135a5(ya): bya/ sngon bshad de bzhin tshogs bsags nas// rim pa bzhin du yang dag rdzun// bsgrub pa de yi ting nge 'dzin// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas su// snod kyi
135a6(ya): 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // las bzhir gnas pa de gsal bya// bcud kyi sems can thog ma nas// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor de// rang la sngags pa'i phyag mtshan/
135a7(ya): dang / lhag par phur bu 'dzin par bsam// gdod gnas dag pa dang zhes bya// de dag rab tu bstim byas nas// dkyil 'khor gtso bo 'khor dang bcas// spyi dang bye brag
135b1(ya): sngags rnams kyis// phur bu'i ming gis spos te bsgrub// rang lhar gyur pa'i rtagasu byang nas// thams cad spyir dril bsgrub par bya// las grub nas pa ru gyur pa dang /
135b2(ya): so so'i dmigs pa mdun du bya// las kyi phur pa mnga' gsol te// bye brag dgu yi ting 'dzin gyis// phur bu bskor ba zhes bya ste// che mchog gtso bos snying la gdag
135b3(ya): badz+ra he rus mgrin pa ste// gshin rjegashed kyis klad pa la// rta mgrin can gyis blo sras gsang // rdo rje gzhon nu 'dus pa'i gnas// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos lag
135b4(ya): g.yon to// dregs 'dul gyis ni rkang g.yon pa'o// stobs ldan nag po lag pa g.yas// rdo rje sems dpa' rkang g.yon lo'o// 'khor rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du// rang gi
135b5(ya): phyogs bcur bskor te gdab// las rgyud rtsad nas brgyad pa dang // gsang sgo thibs kyi mnan pa dang // dug lnga sbyinas gzhom pa dang // 'gro ba stong dang dpral ba dang //
135b6(ya): srid pa'i skye rgyun bcad pa dang // 'phrin las chen po bzhi spyad phyir// so so'i gnas su gdab par bya// rtsa ba snying por rtso mnga' bzhi// kha dog so sor bstan pa las// yan
135b7(ya): lag rnam pa brgyad du gsal// g.yon 'dab chos nyid rtso gsum ste// 'od po zla kham stong pa'i dbyibs// g.yon 'dabu rgyud dang rtsa gsum ste// dmar nag sbrul bzhin
136a1(ya): bya/ 'khyil ba'o// lo 'dab yon tan gcig pu gnas// smug nag sgrol mabazhin du'o// steng du ye shes gcig gnang bas// mthing kha 'khor lo lta bu ste// kun
136a2(ya): gzhi rnam rtog nyon mongs yid// yid dang sgo lnga'i rnam sems gnyis// brgyad kyis dbus gnas dang ma ni// mdog dkar rta lnga bzhin du bsgom// tshe yi dang ma brgya zho 'dra//
136a3(ya): khrag gi dang ma mtshal gyis mgo/ drod kyi dang ma me long gi/ ngad dang zin pa lta bu ste// rnam shes dngas ma'i 'od kyi dkyil// rang lhar gsal ba'i phyag mtshan te// ri rab phur pa rdo
136a4(ya): rjes brgyan// hU phag ldan 'chir gsum la// gtar tshan chu 'dus bzhin du bsam// sgrub pa po li thugs khar thim// zhi khro lha rnams sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las
136a5(ya): rbod gtong dang // bstan mchod drag shul rig pa 'dzin// so so'i dus la bab ces brjod// pho nya bskul zhing rbad gsad bya// lcags dang seng ldeng bya thur dang // skyer ba
136a6(ya): tsan dan mchog phur gyis// gti mug gsal zhing 'dod chags rkam// zhe sdang gsad cing phrag dog gdul// nga rgyal sgril zhing smad pa dang // thal 'byin dgongs pa
136a7(ya): byang chub sems// rtog pa dang ni grugs rje yi// bdag gzhan ma lus bsgral bar bya// 'di yis gal te rtags med na// sngar bzhin bsnyen bsgrub spogs par bya//
136b1(ya): de nas rtags dang ldan pa dang // sngar bzhin las la sbyar bar bya// bsgrub pa de nyid byin gyis brlabs// nad dang gdon dang bar chad phyogs// rang bzhin ma lus zhi bar byed// tshe dang dbang
136b2(ya): glang longs spyod tshogs// rab tu 'phel zhing rgyas par byed// log lta bgegs dgra mi mthun phyogs// ma lus dbang du sdud par byed// drag shul can dang gdug pa'i sems/ sgrol
136b3(ya): zhing mngon du spyod la sogs// thams cad 'grub pa 'bras bu ste// byin rlabs phur pa'i sgrub pa'o// de nas tshe yi lung sgrub pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i rngon
136b4(ya): 'gro dang // stegs bu'i spyo de nyid la// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor ling rtse dgu// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de// shar du rdo rje rtsa brgyad de// lho ru rin chen zur brgya
136b5(ya): bri// nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// byang du ral gri lce brgyad de// mtshams bzhir thig le gling brgyad de// dbus rnams zla kham kha sbyor te// mtshan bzang kun rdzogs rnam pa ni/
136b6(ya): phyi nang lte ba rdzogs mthun spyad// oM AHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta A yu dz+nyA na bruM/ zhes pa'i sngags rnams bris pa ni// so so'i rigs kyi mdog dang bstun// dkyil 'khor rnams
136b7(ya): kyi dbus su'o// byang chubo sems dang rdzu 'phrul che// rtags dang ldan pa'i brang rgyas te// gtso bo rnams kyi grangs ldan pa// 'bru bcud zhal zas tshogs las bsham//
137a1(ya): rin po che yi rgyun rtags kyis// legs par brgyan pa bdud rtsi yi// bcud dang bcas pa der brtsams nas// ngar 'phan za rab cag gis brgyan// nas 'bras
137a2(ya): 'bru yis brgyan par bya// 'bru lngas byin rlabs gzungs lag gdags// rigs chen lnga yi gtso bo yis// so so'i phyag tu bzhes nas ni// che mchog he ru ka nas ni// badz+ra he ru rdo rje mchog
137a3(ya): rat+na he ru gshin rje gshed// pad+ma he ru rta mgrin dpal// karma he ru gzhon nu mchog/ rang gi rigs kyi sa gsang sngags la// badz+ra A yu She dz+nyA na hUM phaT// ces brtag bsnyen
137a4(ya): ba'adzab tu bya// de nas mtshams bzhi gtso dang sngags// de bzhin du ni bya ba yin// rigs kyi thugs gsang rin po che// zla kham gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus// oM hU
137a5(ya): traM hri ha rnams ni// zla ba la ni 'od gsal na// 'khor 'das kun gyi byang chub sems// 'chi medo che yi rang bzhin te// 'gyur med rdo rje'i lam nas byung // shangs kyi rlung
137a6(ya): snyosgoms steng nas skyegs// spun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor te// kun tu bzang po che dbag med// he ru ka mri sgyu gsung thugs// dus gsum rgyal po yo ba dang yum// sras
137a7(ya): deng 'khor bcas rdo rje'i tshe// rin chen srog las nyi zla'i 'od // 'phro 'du 'phreng ba rab gsal ba'i// snying po gsal ba'i bsnyen par bzang // khyad par bdag nyid gsang
137b1(ya): yis// dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs ka nas// dkyil 'khor zla kha ma ga zu'i steng // tshon gang ye shes sems dpa' ste// so so'i rigs bzhi 'khor dang bcas// yab
137b2(ya): yum rnams kyi thugs khar 'phros// phan tshun 'phro ba'i 'khor lo yis// 'og min gnas nas ye shes klong // rang bzhin yang dag thugs kyi dkyil// byang chub
137b3(ya): sems kyi 'tsho ming tshe// gnyis su med pa'i 'phro 'du bya// phyogs bcu dus gsum 'jig rten khams// snod bcud che brtan dkyil 'khor yin// 'gyur med skad
137b4(ya): cig mi 'bral ba// lha rnams kun la bstod cing bsku lo// tshe dbang dngos grub gsol zhes brjod// slar yang brten pa'i ting 'dzin sgro// rtags dang yon tan yongs
137b5(ya): rdzogs nas// 'od dang sgrub pa'i rdzas la bstim// de ni tshe sgrub bsnyen pa'o// de nas sgrub pa chen po ni// rab rdzogs lhags la lus kyi tshe//
137b6(ya): ye shes sems dpa' srog gi tshe// rigs kyi lha mo gzugs kyi tshe// 'dod yon lnga ldan longs spyod tshe// srid par gnas pa yum gyi tshe// bsam pa tshe srog dpal
137b7(ya): gyi lha/ bkod pa zas nor bcud kyi lha// bzlas pa rgyun chags ngag gi lha// hru las rdo rje sro go dang ldan// a las 'gyur med tshe dang ldan// baM las rdo rje lu gu rgyud//
138a1(ya): 'di ni bcings pa'i las yin no// rdo rje snga mas pa phyag rgya las// mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bya// bsam gyis mi khyab spros te dgug/ rlung sgo
138a2(ya): gnyis nas hUM skyes kyis// khyad par skye 'gro mang po'i tshogs// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bstan// skar mda' bzhin du blangs pas mnan// skye 'gro srog gis bsdus pa/
138a3(ya): las/ bstims te dbang don byas byas pas// rab tu spel ba'i ting 'dzin ni// kun gyi yum 'gyur phyag rgya yis// ma lus mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma// thugs kha ru sku
138a4(ya): mchog tshon gang las// gzi ma dngas gtar bas a yu ba stim// sku gsung thug kyi sngags 'di dag/ so sor 'bum du bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra AM yu she dza A yu dz+nyA na tshe br-i/
138a5(ya): 'di ni sku'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra a mri ta ma hA b+ha dra tshe bru/ 'di ni gsung gi snying po'o// oM badz+ra A yu she ma hA puN+ye pu d+h+ye a pa ra mi ta dz+nyA na bruM/ zhes pa thugs kyi snying po'o//
138a6(ya): rgyu yi tshe ni lus la ste// phung po lnga la rab tu thim// gsung gi tshe ni ga la ste// dri med dbyings la rab tu thim// thugs kyi cha ni yid la ste/ byang chub mchog gi sems la thim/
138a7(ya): rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po las// a b+hi Shits+tsha a zhes pa// kun tu brtsam par bya ba'o// skal ldan bsnyen pa mchog gi lung // bdud rtsi 'tsho med glan gyi mchog/
138b1(ya): dbang mchog dam pa rigs kyi tshe// byin rlabs phur pa sprul pa'i tshe// zla bam rdo rje dbang gi tshe// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu bla na med// rin chen srog gi gzhal yas khang // la
138b2(ya): brgan gsung gi dkyil 'khor du// kun tu bzang pos rgyas btab nas// he ru ka yi rtsal skyed de// gshin rje gshed kyis bsdu bar bya// rta mgrin dbang gis bsrung
138b3(ya): ba ste/ rdo rje gzhon nus dbab bya ste// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos gtsor bya zhing // dregs po 'dul bar bskrad pa ste// stobs ldan gyis ni rab tu dgag/ rdo rje chos kyi bstim
138b4(ya): ba ni// so so'i rigs kyi 'phrin las yin// ma lus 'khor bcas tshe la bskul// phyag mtshan re re bum pa brtsams// bkod pa'i rdzas la rab tu thim// rin chen
138b5(ya): tsit+te'i dbyibs kyis blangs// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'byung ba rnams// rim gyis sdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// du sa bzhi mnyam pa'i dus la dgug/ kun gyis btsal ba'i rdo rje'i
138b6(ya): tshe// khams gsum kun 'dus grub pa'i rtagaso// phyi nang 'byung ba'i bcu len po// lha mo'i tshogs kyi dngos grub ster// legs par gsol ba btab gyur nas// /
138b7(ya): bsgrub pa po la bstims pa yis// skye shi med pa'i don gsal byed// rig pa 'dzin par grub par 'gyur// byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa che// dus gsum sangs
139a1(ya): rgyas kun gyi lam// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus rgyud// rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab bsdus pa// thog ma med nas tha ma'i bar// rgyun mi chad
139a2(ya): pa ngas bshad do// skal med rnams ni log par rtog/ kha cig 'jig tshogs lta bo 'dzin// kha cig bdag med phyogs 'ga' tsam// kha cig rang gi snang ba 'dzin// kha cig kun
139a3(ya): rdzob don dam lta// kha cig bdag gzhan bzang ngan 'byed// kha cig thabs kyis cha la spyod// kha cig res 'ga' shes rab ston// 'di ni tha dad ma yin te// thams cad gcig/
139a4(ya): las byung ba ste// gcig tu ma lus 'dus pa'o// ma 'ongs dus su rgyud 'di nyid// shin tu rnyed dkar gyur nas ni// skal bar ldan pa 'ga' zhig las// skal med dag gis
139a5(ya): rtsod par byed// de nyid dus su 'di rnyed pas// rang rgyud tsam du mi brtan te// rtsa ba yan lag bshad pa dang // lung ba shang sgrub thabs mtha' dag gis// don bzang nges
139a6(ya): par gtan la dpag/ de ltar snod ldan rigs kyi sras// dad brtson ldan la phyi bzhin ldan// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab
139a7(ya): tu 'byed pa las byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po'ang bstan pa'i khre'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rab tu phan gdag pa'i// las che ni rab tu
139b1(ya): bshad pa ni// rten dang ldan pa sngar bzhin no// rten 'brel rnam pa lnga yin te// rjes su bsgrub dang thal chen dang // gnas sbyang ba dang bsgral ba dang // gshad chen bgegs
139b2(ya): rnams 'dul ba ste// dang po srid pa'i bam rgan yin// ston pa 'khor dang gnas dang dus// yo byad ji ltar ngas bshad bzhin// tshul dang mthun pa'i las kyis sbyang //
139b3(ya): snang zhing srid pa'i dur khrod klong // thugs rje chen por rol tsang gzigs// 'khor ba'i skyabs gling chen po las// rigs drug 'khor ba ma lus 'dul// rgyu drug
139b4(ya): 'dres pa'i rnam shes bsregs// dus gsum mtshon gyis bsad pa ni// rtag chad mtha ro shi'i ri rlong gnas// gti mug chen po'i rgyu blangs te// byang chub sems su
139b5(ya): gsal ba'i phyir// rgyu mchog chen po btsal bar bya// ye shes spyan dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// rdo rje 'gros dang 'dzin tshul te// drang po rigs brgyud mtshan dang ldan//
139b6(ya): skye ba bdun par brtag par bya// khams gsum dbang du bsdus pa dang // srid gsum zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'gros kyis btsal bar bya// yid bzhin nor bu
139b7(ya): gau ter 'byed pa// dgos 'dod skong ba phyag rgya'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// ma mo'i 'dzin tshul stabs kyis btsal// phung po gshe dang dpral
140a1(ya): ba'i phyir// seng ldeng bur rab sor brgya la// stobs chen khro bo'i skur bsam ste// gsang rdzogs brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// gson dang ga shin
140a2(ya): gyi bdud dang bgegs// gzugs dang mtshan mar bcas pa ste// phur bu rdul te rol mo dril// khung bur mnan na sa ro stod 'azer// rdo rje de nas rdo rje gar gyis bzlas//
140a3(ya): rdo rje 'gros kyi khur nas ni// gnas su 'ongs te phyi mtshams bcad// de nas dam srimanan par bya// sgo nas phyi rol 'dom gang du// mkha' 'dra'i khung bu zus nas ni//
140a4(ya): ru ra khrod gnas kyi thod pa la// nang du dam sr-i'i snying po bri// dur khrod rkang gi phur bus gdab// nang du stegs bu tshul bzhin brtsegs// sgrub rdzas mchod pa stong rdzogs bar
140a5(ya): bya// de la gzigs dang rnam pa drug/ dngos grub gshin dang slob ma dang // lha dang ru drab sgrub pa'i rdzas// dang por dngos grub lta ba ni// skye ba bdun pa lta bu ste/
140a6(ya): yid bzhin nor bu ches lhag pas// khyad par bsgrub pa mi dgos te// mchog dang thun mong rim pas 'grub// tshe 'das nyid du gzugs pa ni// spyang tha ga spyad nas/
140a7(ya): 'khyams pa de// thugs rje chen pos gzung phyir ro// phung po nyid la rnam shes dgug/ gang dag 'di la gzhan brten dang // 'di nyid gzhan la brten pa rnams//
140b1(ya): he ru ka ni dran tsam gyis// thams cad zed cing brlag par 'gyur// 'gro drug rgyud lnga'i sgrib pa sbyang // bag chags sbyang phyir bro bzhis gdul// shar du ngan song gnas
140b2(ya): kyi bro// dri chen steng du bzhag cing gdung // lho ru sha chen dkyil 'khor la// khrag 'thung rol po'i tho brdung ngo // nu ba tu rta gdong zhal gyi bro// pad+ma rak+ta'i steng du'o//
140b3(ya): byang du dri chu'i maN+Dal steng // gdul spong rtags kyi zo brdung ngo // de ltar bro bzhi spang byas nas// rang gi longs spyod skal thogs te// slob ma'i ngo bor blta ba ni// bag
140b4(ya): chags sgrib pa bkru ba'i phyir// sman spos bdud rtsi chab kyis bkru// mos btsos brtse gdung shes pa yis// sems bskyed yon dbul me tog dor// gsol ba btab
140b5(ya): ste dkyil 'khor gzhug/ mig phye lha ngo bstan par bya// phyag btsal yon dbul dam tshig skrag/ byin gyis brlab te snod sbyangs nas// phan dang nus dang rig pa dang //
140b6(ya): sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las lnga ru byin gyis dbab// de nas lha yi ngo bor blta// dkyil 'khor dbus su khri steng du// skyil mo krung bcas
140b7(ya): shar du blta// de nyid phyag rgya'i tshogs chen bsgom// rdzas kyi rnam grangs ltos nas kyang // rigs kyi lha rnams rnam par bkod// gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs//
141a1(ya): dran pa'i thad kar bkram nas kyang // rang gi gnas su thig le dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas kyi mnga' gsol ba// rdo rje rgyal po las mkhan dang //
141a2(ya): 'dzin ging sgrol ging rdo rje byin// stobs pa dang ni rkang mgyogs dang // ji ltar rigs pa mnga' gsol nas// snyun smras dpal gyi chas rnams gsol// rtags rgyan gdab cing
141a3(ya): rdzas gzhan dgram// dngos grub ci 'dod dmar byang btsal// cha mchog dngos la gtsor bskyed cing // rigs chen brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bstims// thig chen btab nas thig la
141a4(ya): btab/ cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs bya zhing // 'dzab bzlas rdo rje'i bsnyen pa bya// byin phobs rtags gsum byung ba na// dngos grub blang zhing dbang rdzogs bskur// ru
141a5(ya): dra'i ngo bor bzung ba la// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor gsal// bskang rdzas ji snyed pa dang bcas// phung po tshogs su phul nas ni// bam chen bam pos bskang ba dang //
141a6(ya): phung po rdul du bshig nas kyang // sha khrag rus pa bskang byas yang // byang shar mtshams su bsgral bya ste// ru tra bsgral ba'i zhing yin pas// pho nya dbug 'dzin btang nas
141a7(ya): kyang // dgra bgegs rnam shes dgug cing bstim// lha dang dpral phyir rdzas kyis bdug/ 'jig rten dreg pa'i slong las brag/ srid gsum lha 'dre'i dmag dpung
141b1(ya): dbab/ lus la rigs drug yi ge dgod// ngan song dgag pa'i snying po bzlas// sbyang bsdu dang grub pa lnga// skong ba lnga yi dgongs pabyu// byang chub lam la bgrod
141b2(ya): pa'i phyir// ba su ta ni byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje thig ni chu tshal gdag/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i skos kyi gdab// phung po gnas lnga bkru ba'i phyir// mtshon cha lnga yi char
141b3(ya): bzhin 'bab// he ru ka yi gnas bcud dang // dur khrod gnas brgyad rdzogs pa'i phyir// ro yi bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'o// dbang ldan gnas pa'i phyogs
