141b4(ya): su bsgral// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis// dngos grub log rtogs phral nas kyang // rdo rje sbyin phyogs ma nor bar// shal phur gnyis kyis rjud nas bzud
141b5(ya): nges par brtag pa'i gzhi ma la// cung zhig bstod de steng 'og bsgyur// bzhin phyogs gar ba lha legs nyes brdeg/ de nas rdzas su blta ba ni// lha dang bdud rtse mchod
141b6(ya): rdzas dang // dngos grub rgyan dang sbyin sreg rdzas// de la lha ru lA~M ba ni// don snying drod dang dbang po dang // sha khrug rus pa pags pa smra// yan lag nying lag thod
141b7(ya): tshal dang // sgal tshigs rtsib ma ro dag dang // gnas skabs bzhi yi byang chub sems// gnas rgyu phyin pa'i lam gsum ni// pho brang dgu yi lha rnams nang /
142a1(ya): gnyis med mthun pa'i rdzas su bsgo// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i rdzas su bya// rtsa ba lnga las brgyad yin te// mngon pa phyi dang thas pa nang // bshi/
142a2(ya): bcu'i yan lag tshang bar bsko// dam rdzas smon sbyor mchod pa'i rdzas// bza' dang btung dang myang dod klog/ lha ma dang chad dang 'dug pas bya// dngos grub rdzas kyang de nyid do//
142a3(ya): dur khrod rgyan du bya ba ni// ban+d+ha gling bu mchog phur dang // bla ra rgyan mtshan ba dan gdugs// mar me khu ba zhag la sogs// 'phreng ba chen por bya ba'o// sbyin sreg hom du
142a4(ya): bya ba ni// de nyid bdud rtsi'i cha ga chag gdag/ thig pa zhi gdab pa'i le rtsa dgu// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte ba la// 'phrin las chen po bzhi dag gis// kha dog dbyibs
142a5(ya): dang mtshan ma dag/ sgyid 'bye brag pa sngags pa bya// slar yang mtshams gtsang rim pa lnga// bar du gcod pa'i bdud rnams bzlog/ snod gsang mtshan gsal brjod cing dgra
142a6(ya): rdzas rnams so sor bsngos nas kyang // phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su// ma nor so sor dgod par bya// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod dgu la// rmad du byung ba dgu dgod de//
142a7(ya): 'bar ba chen po gnas rnams su// brjod pa'i tshul gyi sa gsal bar bsgom// phyag rgya gzhan yang legs par bkod// b+han+d+ha snying la sogs pa kun// he ru ka nas rim bzhin
142b1(ya): du so so'i gnas su dgod par bya// spyan drang bstan pa nyid du bya// ma lus mchod pas mnyes pa dang // bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis mchod bya zhing // ye shes lha dang me lha
142b2(ya): dang // slar yang sbyangs pa'i cho ga dang // bo chad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du// rab tu rdzogs par bya bas so// sbyin sreg lha rgyud dag par bya// 'phrin las rnam bzhi la
142b3(ya): sogs pa shad// mkha' 'gro mchod dang gzir gnan dang // mi zad gter du sbas la sogs// las kyi rgyal po sa rim bzhin spyad// 'di ni dam tshig chen po ste//
142b4(ya): rdzas mchog bam gyi las yin no// bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bya// de las gzhan pa bsreg pa'i las// rnal 'byor chen po bya ba ni// gzhan dang
142b5(ya): mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// yo byad phun sum tshog par bya// phyogs skyong sbyin gtong lan chags gzhal// bka' ba sgro mtshams bcad sngar bzhin bya// pho brang dgu pa
142b6(ya): zhes su gsol// gnas dang yo byad byin gyis brlabs// mchod rdzas sna tshogs 'tshogs pa rab sham// sgrub pa'i rdzas ni bum pa bzang // rgyal rdzas mtshan nyid
142b7(ya): ldan pa dag/ lha yi grangs dang ldan pa dang // las kyi cho ga rdzogs pas bkod// de nas dmigs pa gang yin po'o// ming gzugs mtshan mar ldan pa la// rgyan dang
143a1(ya): ducha lugs mdzes par gdags// rnam par shes pa dgug byas nas// rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs dgu yis// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
143a2(ya): bzhengs// chos dbyings rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te// spyan drangs bzhugs la mos phyag 'tshal// mchod gshegs 'phrin las btsal ba yis// 'od zer dra bes srid gsum
143a3(ya): gyis// nyon mongs dri ma ma lus gsal// rin chen shel sgong ltar bsam la// sdug bsngal rnams la skyo bskyed de// thugs rje rigs drug gnas nas dgug/ chu
143a4(ya): skyes bzhi bdag bzhi la brten// a nri su tri pre du zhes pas// dbus su rigs lnga'i snying po bri// lha dang rigs lnga lcags kyu a// phyi rol 'dab ma bzhi la'o// mchod sbyin
143a5(ya): gyis ni lan chags gzhal// gsang sngags drag pos gshed dang dpral// bdud rtsi dri chus phyi nang bkru// rigs lnga dbang b+ha'i yum la bskur// ye shes lha dang gnyis med
143a6(ya): pas// ngo bar stong pa nyid du bya// rigs drug gnas nas rton pa ni// slar yang dngas su byas nas ni// pho brang chen po'i drung du khrid// zlo bzhi dbye bar gsol ba gdag
143a7(ya): gnang ba thob nas phyag btsal zhing // yon phul nas ni skyabs su gsal// ye shes lnga dang sku sngar bya// gzugs sku dngos su thob bya'i phyir// gos sam ras sam
143b1(ya): shin shu na la// za tshogs snying po mong spel bcas// gnas yul dag tu legs par dgod// sangs rgyas zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor gdugs// khyod kyi steng dang 'og tu sbyin//
143b2(ya): thugs rje tshad med bzhi ldan nas// khro bo 'jigs byed skur bstan nas// gdug pa can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// so so'i snying po brjod nas ni// gnas kun byin gyis
143b3(ya): brlab par bya// nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos phyir// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas ni// sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya// de nas smrar yang byin dbab cing //
143b4(ya): rdo rje'i dgongs pa la bzhugaso nas// bsnyen par sngags kyi 'phro 'udu las// rdo rje las ni rdzogs par spyad// mchod cing bshags te skong zhing bcol// khrag 'thung
143b5(ya): bdun brgya nyi shu la// bstod bskul gyis ni dmigs pa dgug/ bka' sdod pho nya dam brdar zhing // bskrod dang bden pas bar chad bsal// slar yang bkru dang bkur ba
143b6(ya): dang / phung po khams dang lhar sbyar te// smon lam bsngo ba la sogs kyis// 'gro ba'i don la bskur bar bya// de ltar lnga 'am bdun la sogs// zla ba phyed dam rtsi rig
143b7(ya): kyis// las dang nyon mongs pag/ chags sbyang // de ni rdzal bzhin bsreg bya ba// pho brang dgu yoM steng nyid du// ka tha lnga 'am brgyad kyis bteg/ rnam bzhi las kyi
144a1(ya): ho bzang du// bzhi 'am brgyad kyi me mar spang // 'byung ba lnga yi yam shing las// mchod sbyin dngos po bsreg spyang thim// gnod thig rnam
144a2(ya): rtog zhi ba dang // tshe dbang longs spyong rgyas pa dang // log lha mi mthun dbang bsdu dang // dmigs pa drag po bsgral 'dod dang // gang la sngags pa der spyad do// zlum po
144a3(ya): gra gsum zla kham e// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rnal gri dkar ser dmar dang nag/ 'o ma can dang 'bras bu smin// kha dog dmar dang tshar ma can// bramo ze rgyal po smad
144a4(ya): 'tshong ma// rme ba can la blangs pa'i ma// snga dro nyin gung phyi dro dang // srod kyi dus su shar lho dang // nub dang byang nas rim gyis spar// bsreg rdzas su mA cu rtsa gnyis ni/
144a5(ya): bsangs te byin gyis brlab la dbul// ye shes lha dang me lha dang // thun mong thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang // slar yang me lha'i lha tshogs dag/ dkyil 'khor dgu
144a6(ya): yI lha dang sbyar// shAn+ting puSh+Ting pa shang dang // ma ra zhes pas mtha' bsgyur te// lha dang me lha'i snying pos sbyangs// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// gang
144a7(ya): gis sgor zhugs de bzhin sbyang // gsang ba'i chos gsum ma mthong zhing // lha sgom spyod la ma sbyangs pa// tha ma pa dang mos pa tsam// rnal 'byor nyid du sbyang
144b1(ya): bar bya// de la bzlog pa rang gi lha'i// zhing khams rnam par dag pa ste// lha dang gnyis med lam bstan gshegs// khyad par lta ba goms pa de// ji ltar
144b2(ya): ma nor hom khung du// ji snyed ma lus lam shing gis// gnyis med ye shes me sbar te// ma rig rnam rtog sregs shing sbyang // rang byung rgya rkyen bral ba'i phyir//
144b3(ya): bsod nam ma tshogs las ma ltos pas// de nas snying po byang chub pa'i// mi rtog/ ting 'dzin rgyun du bsgom// gal te de ltar min pa ni// sku gdung bgos te tshwa
144b4(ya): tshar gdag/ sngar ba shad tshig gis tshogs chen bsags// bzlog pa'i skems pa de dag ni// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ste// skye med dbu ma'i snying por

145a1(ya): bdi bstan// ji ltar ba shad pa'i gnas chen du// phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan bsam// sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs byas te// dkyil 'khor dgu

146b2(ya): chen po'i ngang // chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa ni// phyag rgya chen po'i gnyis med pas// dam tshig chen po'i dus la babs// oM ka re ka re ra tse sa ma ya kar+m+ma sa ma ya snyam//

146b6(ya): snang / snying rje'i bsod nams mthar phyin pa// sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid dga' ba'i mchog/ btang snyoms yal bar mi 'dor ro// oM mahA ka ru ni ka ma hA me tri/ swa b+hA

147a1(ya): yis// 'gro ba bsgul ba'i phyogs su lta// dur khrod bdag pos sdig pa'i phyir// oM sarba pA paM karmA he ta ba sa ta sha ma ma tang ka ru dra hU phaT/

149a7(ya): gos pa med// ma chags rang bzhin dag pas na// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bgyis// oM badz+ra pad+me hUM/ zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas te// 'jig rten kun dang mthun
149b1(ya): 'jug phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rtags// nyi ma zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// oM su r+ya tsan+d+ra hU/ dge dang mi dge chos rnams la// lhag par rten 'brel mi bya ste/

149b4(ya): dga' bde bla na med// ngan song gnas rnams hUM gis dngos// dus gsum rgyal ba hUM gis bskyed// 'jigs byed chen po he ru ka/ zhe sdang khro tshul rtog mi mnga'// log lta
149b5(ya): thabs kyis 'dul bar byed// thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sgrol// rigs kyis rgyal po lnga rnams la// gzugs kyi phung po 'di'i bul gyis// seng ge glang chen rta
149b6(ya): mchog dang // rma bya mkha' lding lngar gyur te// 'jigs byed bkod nas gdan mchog 'bul// ye shes lnga la rol nas kyang // stobs dang mi 'jigs rig pa dang //

150a1(ya): / bar rol nas kyang // mi 'gyur gzugs kyi dngos grub gsol// 'og min pho brang mchog gi gnas// thabs dang shes rab yab dang yum//

150a4(ya): phung po'i lhag ma dag/ mgo lus sku gsung thugs la bzhengs// thabs chen dpag tu med pa dag/ nga dang rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// de dang de las brjod pa bzhin//

150a6(ya): rtogs pa yis// bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bsgral zhing // gzhan du snang la thugs rje yis// bla med pha rol bde ba sgral bya// de ni mthar thug sbyor ba yis// las kyi sbyor
150a7(ya): bskyed pa'o// 'gro rnams 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur pas// las kyi 'phen pa sna tshogs shar// khyad par skye rga na dang 'chi// dus dang dus min 'gyur ba la//
150b1(ya): dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gshis ngan 'gum pa bco lnga srid// blo bur 'byung ba phyi nang las// rtsa ba yan lag sna tshogs las// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa
150b2(ya): yis/ thugs rje tshad med bzhi las ni// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams kyis// ston pa dus las yel na med// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa gsum// rigs kyi thog
150b3(ya): mar 'byung ba ste// many+dzu shri dang ka ru ni// lo ki shwa ra ma hA ni// ma ni badz+ra kan ti ni// sprul pa du ma 'byung zhing mdzod// dus gsum 'byung ba dpag tu med// khyad par
150b4(ya): 'di ni mtshon cha'o// gnod pa rkyen du gyur pa dang // ro dang mche ba me dang chu// dug dad pa steng 'byung ba lnga// gshes ngan yin te gdul bar bya// de yang he ru ka mi
150b5(ya): rigs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las can des// ston du bya ba rjes sgrub cing // bsnyen sgrub chen po bzhir gzhag nas// phan gdags las su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol
150b6(ya): phyogs mtshams brgyad// ho lung mda' gang gru gsum rtsigs// rang rigs kha dog ldan pa la// shug pa tsher ma can la sogs// gdug pa can gyi shing rtsigs te//
150b7(ya): dug dang ke/ tshe nyungs kar sogs// lam shing thugs kyi rdzas su bya// slob dpon cha lugs rdzas su bya// slob dpon cha lugs gnas pa dgu// gtso dang 'khor gyi tshularu
151a1(ya): bya// gdul bya shes pa dgu'am drug/ po chen sgrub pa'i dus bzhin bya// me lha'i cho ga mnyes byas nas// khyad par mtshon gri ma yis gdul//
151a2(ya): yan lag bdud rtsi ku sha dang // til mar ldugs phran rde'u phran// khyad par gsang ba de yi rdzas// rwa dang lcags kyi dug gri gdul// ma ni chu yi sa gdul ba ste// chu ni sa
151a3(ya): yis gdul bar bya// dug la bsngags pa'i sman gyis gdul// sngags la me dang mtshon gyis te// rbab tu shor ba de yi gri// rgod kyi po ga thil gdul bar bya// dom dang
151a4(ya): dred kyi g.yang gzhi dang // rma rnams dang ni rtsos rnams dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri yis gdul// 'di dag ma lus phyi ma'i dus// bud+d+ha a ka ra yis ni// he ru
151a5(ya): ka bzhin gsal bar byed// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi sras// sgrol ba'i rgyu dang mtshungs bshad dang // sgrib dang bsgrub dang mnan pa dang // gnas nas drangs pa las
151a6(ya): kun gyis// bya ba ma lus kun bsdus te// thams cad gdul ba'i las su spyad// dang por shes pa bsgrubs pa'i dus// bar du grangs pa gnas kyi dus// tha mar
151a7(ya): bsreg pa sbyang ba'i dus// dus shes kun rig 'di la sngags// rdzas kyi bya ba tshe dang khrus// dbang dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang // dngos grub cho ga rnams kyis ni// byang
151b1(ya): chub chen por gnas 'gyur nas// gson gyis bskang ba'i las su bya// de nas yon gyi bdag po yis// rdo rje 'chang la dri gsol zhing // de la skur dang legs bshad bya// dri
151b2(ya): zhes bya ba gsang ba'i sgra// de yi gnod pa gdul ba'i las// mthar phyin bsod nams dpag tu med// rang gzhan kun gyi don rdzogs phyir// mdor na drag po'i las 'di dag
151b3(ya): rdzas su bsgrubs dang sbyin par sreg/ gnas nas drangs dang rgyu drug sgral// shin tu gyur pa gdul ba las// tshe 'das gshin la bya ba'i rdzas// rnam pa lnga ru ngas bstan
151b4(ya): gyis/ u rgyan yul gyi skye mchog gis// rdo rje chos kyi ga sung bzhin bsgrub// sham+b+ha la yi shAkya'i rigs// ra dza sri ka de yis mthong // 'gro ba brgyud nas
151b5(ya): longs spyod rtsal// phyogs bzhir rgyud pa de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las rnams nges par bstan pa ni
151b6(ya): le'u sde bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
151b7(ya): khro bo dang / khro mo dang / rigs dang / rigs kyi sprul pa dang bcas pa rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku sna tshogs su sprul pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsa
152a1(ya): to// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung ba yi// he ru ka mi bsgrub pa'o// rnal 'byor gsum gyi bdag nyid can// blo dang dbang po bsam pa'i mchog/ ra
152a2(ya): 'bring tha ma'i rten can gyis// bde bar gshegs pa rgya mtsho che// kun 'dus tshom bu dgu yi gtso// 'khor lo bcas bde mngon spyod// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'di rnams kyis//
152a3(ya): ji ltar bshad pa'i gtso dang 'khor// rang gi sku mdog phyag mtshan dang // pho brang chen po'i bzhugs tshul dag/ sngon du 'dod pa de nyid ni// spros la dga' ba'i gang zag gis//
152a4(ya): rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul du bsgrub// gal te bla rdzus la dga' ba yis// b+h+yo dang dbang po 'bring dag gis// rang gis gtso bo mchog rnams la// rigs kyi gtso bo bzhi rnams ni/
152a5(ya): yum dang grogs su bzlas pa'am// rang rig gcig pu'i tshul dag gis// so so'i 'khor lo la gnas pa// pho brang bsdus pa'i khyad par gyis// rjes su rnal 'byor chu
152a6(ya): du grug/ de nyid kyang ni cher ba rdzus shing / shin tu brdzu 'daga' ba'am// blo dang dbang po mthar gnas pas// 'khor gyi rtsabs brgyad po zang la// gtso bdag chen pa sa
152a7(ya): ko/ sum dang bcas pas dgu bsgoms te// rang gis mtshon byed dang ldan pas// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang du 'asgrubs// rten mchog chag shus cher skyong cing /
152b1(ya): gsang ba'i don du spyod 'dod pas// bsrung dang tshogs bsags bsgrub pa dang // 'phrin las yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ sngags kyis sbyor bas yongs shes pas// shin tu
152b2(ya): myur ba de bsgrubs so// gang zag shin tu brtson ldan pas// rgyun du gyur pa rade nyid kyis// kho na yang dag pa'i dam du// bar chad med par bsgrubs pa ni// rang 'dod lha yi rnal
152b3(ya): 'byor gyis// rdo rje lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// smin byed lam gyi rab sbyang nas// de nyid mthong ba'i nges pa yis// rnam par dag pa'i mthar son nas// lha gzhan log nas mi
152b4(ya): 'tshol te// tsit+ta gsang chen po brang dbus// rten gzhan brgyad ni dngos po yis// sgo brgyad phyogs mtshams pho brang ngo // sems kyi rgyal po he ru ka/ che ba'i mchog ste dbus
152b5(ya): na gnas// sgo lnga dang ni rnam shes dang // kun gzhi nyon mongs yid rnam shes// rang gi rig dang phyogs dag gis// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi gtso bo ste// snang bzhin rtogs
152b6(ya): pa ma lus pa// de yi 'khor du bkod pa'o// snod drug la sogs de yi gdan// bza' btung la sogs mchod pa stobs// mnyes pa'i spyod lam phyag btsal ba'o//
152b7(ya): dga' ba'i bstod pa de nyid de// las kyi phyi rol sha tshil pags// gzhal med khang gi rtsig pa ste// ke rus sgal chags ka gdung dang // tha~Md rus rgyal mtshan ba dan bcas//
153a1(ya): ba sgyu me ri 'bar ba ste// rten dang brten bcas dkyil 'khor la// rtag tu gnas pa rang la gnas// 'gro dang 'ong dang byon zhing gshegs// snang ba sprul
153a2(ya): ba'i sku yin te// de gsal longs spyod rdzogs sku yin// bde chen thob pa chos kyi sku// nyer thob rim pa bar ma ste// mngon par byang chub spyod pa'i sku// mthar thug 'od gsol
153a3(ya): zung du 'jug/ rab brtag 'gyur mod rdo rje'i sku// de nyid shes na gnas pa yin// 'di ni rnal 'byor yi dam rgyun// nar ma 'grub pa'i tshul yin no// 'di dag dang por he ru ka/
153a4(ya): brjid pa'i dbu ni nyi shu gcig/ mdzes pa'i phyag ni bzhi bcu gnyis// rdo rje dbyings mchog bkod pa'o// gnyis pa dus su nga yi sku// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad de// ma mo 'phra
153a5(ya): men bcu drug gis// g.yas dang g.yon du rnam par mdzes// zhal gsum phyog drug brdzus pa ste// zhabs brgyad bzhi dang gnyis kyis brtan// sngags spyod pa la tshe rigs
153a6(ya): // rgyun du grub pa rnal 'byor ba'o// blo mo rim pa de bzhin no// de yang sems kyi rnal 'byor pas// 'dzin las bsgrub pa'i yan lag gis// bskyed dong ba rgyal ba
153a7(ya): tshogs pa// zhwa rnams kun gyi phyag mtshan dang // sku mdog dang ni bzhugs tshul gyis// gdan khri dag gi gnas smi nas/ ji ltar snang ba de bskul zhing // mig gi rnam
153b1(ya): grangs smos pa dang // pho brang gnas kyi mtshon pa dag/ tshe 'bring chung ngu rnams kyis bskul// rnam par dag pa'i don rtogs la// rgyas dang bsdus par brjod pa yis// chen po'i skye ba brjod
153b2(ya): pa dang // bstod pa mchog gis mnyes byas nas// nyes pa bshags shing bskang ba la// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ni// thugs kyis rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus// sprul pa bram
153b3(ya): ze mi thong can// gang gis gang la gang gi phyir// ga bstan de dag don gyis ni// lha rnams dbang btsugs nyes bshags wAr// 'gyod tshangs brjod pa'i bshags pas bskang// /
153b4(ya): bdud rtsi bcud mchog 'dza' gang bcung // ga tsar sbyar chen 'o'i mchod pas kyang // zhi khro dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha dang bcas// bdud bzhi dang ni drug
153b5(ya): dag du// bskang ba yis kyang de rnyed bya// srog tshogs rnam shes brten ldan dgu// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu der dmigs nas// phung po bzhi gnas mchod pas kyang // de dag rab
153b6(ya): tu bskang bar bya// slar yang de yi rdzas la sogs// bam par gyur pa de yis ni// phung po don snying sha khrag snod// rus pa la sogs tshogs kyis bskang // phyi nang
153b7(ya): rin chen las byung ba'i// rgyu mchog rigs kyi yo byad la// ri rab gling bdun gling bzhi dang // gling bran mu khyud rgya mtsho che// 'dod spyod lha dang tshangs par bcas// stong
154a1(ya): dang stong gnyis bar ma dang // stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams// spyi phung bye ba drug brgya'am// mdzes pa gcig gi chad kyis ni// ri rab chen nga
154a2(ya): yang stengs su// mtshams bzhi dbus su rnam par rgyal// khang bzang rnam par bkra ba ni// rang bzhin bzhi lis rnam par brgyan// tshogs kyi bdag po he ru ka/ che ba'i mchog
154a3(ya): gi pho brang gnas// mtshams bzhi lcog ni re re la'ang // rang gi rigs kyi he ru ka/ yum dang khro tshogs sgo srungs bcas// de dag 'khor gyi pho brang ngo // bang rim gnyis pa'i
154a4(ya): phyogs bzhi ru// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las bzhi// he ru ka bzhi 'khor bcas kyis// gnas yin de ni gong gsum la// yid bsdong mchod gtor drag sngags dang // rig
154a5(ya): pa 'dzin pa'i he ru ka/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i gnas su bya// tha ma de la lha rnams kyis// chung ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// mkha' 'gro ma dang ging gi tshogs// ma mo sring mo pho
154a6(ya): nya dang // 'bar ba dang ni sa bdag mo// de dag kun gyi pho brang ste// gling bzhi 'gro ba phal ba'i gnas// de dag rang gzugs pho ka dang // longs spyod sems ldan pa dab chags
154a7(ya): dang / ri dgas gcan gzan phyug dud dang // sa chu bar snang gnas rnams kyang // kun gyis bskang ba'i rdzas su bya// pho mo byis pa yul mkhar dang // lus sems
154b1(ya): ngag gi 'thun blud la// longs spyod 'dra ba'i blung du 'bul// tha ma 'phrin las rnam pa bzhi// gang la dmigs pa de sbyang bya// 'gro don mthun pas brkang pa yin//
154b2(ya): rjes su bcad pa'i 'phrin las ni// bsrung dang mnan bsreg bzlog pa yis// las kyi gzer bzhin gsang thun lnga// 'gyur med kun gyi thun mong ste// 'khor lo thod pa
154b3(ya): pab sreg rdzas dang // gtor ma dang ni thun rdzas kyis// spyi dang bye brag so so yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las la sbyar// 'di dag kyis ni don bsgrub phyir// sngags bsdu ba dang
154b4(ya): bzlas pa dang // skyon yon sgra dang 'khrul dmigs dang // yan lag lnga yi kun shes bya// bza' dang btung dang bgo ba dang // spyod lam yan lag sbyor ba'o// dus bzhi mthun

154b6(ya): rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa byang chub sems dang ni// mi/ shig thig le rnam lnga dag/ smin grol lam la de bzhin sbyar// de dag 'bras bu thob pa yang // bral dang spang
154b7(ya): thob mi gnas pa'o// sku gsum pa la sgom pa la// pi dang lha dang bar gtseng ba drang // gsang ba'i dgra dang rigs drug la// phung po nyon mongs lnga rnams la// de nyid gzer
155a1(ya): gyis mi 'byung zhing // de yi ngang du gsal zhing brtan// ma lus pa dang ye shes kyi// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po mchog
155a2(ya): sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las rbod gtong mchod dang brten// drag sngags rigs 'dzin bsgrubs pa yis// thabs 'di dus gsum thams cad du// rgyal ba rnams
155a3(ya): kyis legs bshad pa// mnga' bdag sangs rgyas gtso chen gyis// rnal 'byor gsum gyi don chen yin// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyad rab tu 'byed pa las/ 'phrin
155a4(ya): las kyi kha bskang ba'i thabs mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan he ru ka/ gsang mchog rnam par 'phrul 'byung ba'i// ting nge
155a5(ya): 'dzin gyis dgongs mdzad de// 'di skad tshig tu bka' stsal to// e ma nam mkha' lta bu'i chos// mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang bral// rnam dag sems kyi dkyil 'khor che//
155a6(ya): chags med yul las 'di brjod do// gzugs brnyan snying rje byang chub sems// nyi ma'i 'od ltar kun la gsal// de nyid kho na las gzhan pa'i// 'khor ba'i sa ni rtogs pa'i yul//
155a7(ya): hUM zhes grags pa'i byang chub sems// cho 'phrul chen po 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsal zhing 'bar 'gro 'od dang bcas// mi 'gyur rdo rje sku yi hUM// e ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// stong
155b1(ya): ba mchog gi dbyings las phyung // mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// bsam 'das gru gsum mthing nag e// ya ni g.yo ba'i cho 'phrul ldan// stobs chen sra ma khregs dbang gis
155b2(ya): rgyal// mi 'gyur mi shig yon tan ldan// ljang nag la gdengs bskyod pa'i yaM// kha ni chu yi dngos po ste// gsher rlan thugs rje kun la snyoms// mkha' mnyam byin gyis
155b3(ya): rlabs chen g.yo// ma lus sdud pa'i dmar chen khams// suM ni rdo rje 'bar ba'i rang bzhin glong // mi dmigs dag pa brjid pa'i stobs// kun shong sra ba'i bdag nyid kyis//
155b4(ya): bcu gsum rdzogs pa'i smyug nag gsum// raM gsal byed sreg pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'bar ba'i stobs kyis dngos po 'joms// 'od chen cho 'phrul dregs pa'i
155b5(ya): bdag/ 'phro 'dus rig byed dmar gsal raM// laM phyi nang gsal ba'i rin po che// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i ri rab 'bar// mtha' dbus phyogs bcu mtha' dang mnyam//
155b6(ya): rim par rtse mor rab rdzogs laM// bru dpal ldan rdzogs pa yum gyi mkha'// zhing khams chen po bsam mi khyab// rnam dag chos rdzogs gzhal yas khang //
155b7(ya): bkod pa tshad med 'o'ad ldan bruM// rab brtan snying po'i tshig 'di'o// a chos rnams sems las gud na med// gdod gnas mi skyed brjod las 'das// bla 'dor med pa'i ngang
156a1(ya): nyid las// mnyam pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// oM ma hA shu n+ya dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ a nyid ma rtogs 'khrul pa las// mkha' ltar
156a2(ya): mnyam zhing snying rje che// ma lus khyab pa'i ye shes kyis// kun la gnang ba de bzhin sgom// oM ma hA d+harmA d+ha du swa b+hA bA At+ma ko&ha/ hUM/ byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin las//
156a3(ya): gdod nas dag pa gsal ba'i rgyu// mthing na ga/ a las phyogs kun gsal// thams cad ma lus rnam 'byung hUM// oM ma hA be d+hA tsit+ta dz+nyA na sa ta ma hA krod+ha hU/ e phyogs kun
156a4(ya): ye nas dag pa la// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ni// kun tu bzang po'i dbyings kyi ngang // stong nyid sems kyi rang bzhin rdzogs// e pa tri b+ha dra maN+Da la hUM/ yalas
156a5(ya): bskal pa'i 'thor rlung ni// bag chags sdug bsngal ma lus gtor// dam tshig sgrol ma dbyings kyi mkha'// bskyod byed dbugs kyi nus par ldan// lam karmA yak+Sha su b+ha
156a6(ya): tri maN+Da la d+hu/ kha las khrag gi rgya mtsho ni// 'dod chags 'khor ba kun sbyangs nas// pad+ma gsang ba dbyings kyi mkha'// chags gni khrag gi rang bzhin gnas// a ma
156a7(ya): tra su ka rak+ta maN+Dal hUM/ hUM suM las gru gsum skal ba'is// rjen rgya gram mi bdag ter// sangs rgyas spyan ma dbyings kyi mkha'// gti mug shi 'i dpung du bzhom/
156b1(ya): oM ma hA ba tig sna maN+Da la hUM/ kazhe ljang ma spangs kun gyis sbyangs// dkar zhi bar tshe ba byang chub sems// ye shes gsang ba'i dbyings kyi yum// lhag par snang ba rus
156b2(ya): pa'i ga zhi// oM ma hA kau ni ri dzi kun ta shi kha ma t+yA la hUM/ de nas khrangs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// ska yi dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa// 'khor dang myang ngan 'angs pa'i chos//
156b3(ya): gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis// bdag dang gtsug tor man chad du// lhun grub yongs su rdzogs pa mthong // 'dod khams khrag gi rgya mtshor rdzogs// kang rus gzugs
156b4(ya): med khams su'o// ri rab kha bad nor bu'i 'od// dman pa'i theg pa gsum rdzogs pa'i// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa la// bya spyod rnal 'byor las rnams rdzogs// pad+ma
156b5(ya): las kyi rnal 'byor gsum// nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dbang phyug yum ni yab dang bcas// nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sbyod phyir// dpal gsum 'jigs byed gdug
156b6(ya): pa can// gtum pa'i stobs dang brjid pa dang // 'dzin dang zhe sdang rab sbyor las// b+hag gzig seng ge dom dang glang // me dang chu srin sbrul gyis ni// lha dang kAr bcas rab
156b7(ya): tu spel// dur khrod chen po brgyad kyis bskor// he ru ka yi gnas bcur ldan// yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang // tshig brjod 'di yis gsal bar bya// hU
157a1(ya): nam mkha' mtha' mnyam gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor chen po pho brang dgu// theg pa rim dgu rdzogs pa'i rtags// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam
157a2(ya): bar mdzes// tshogs brgyad gnas su dag pa'i rtags// chos sku spros med zhi ba zlum// ye shes bzhi ldan gru chad bzhi// bar khyams dang ni sgo bzhir bcas// phyi rim bskal pa'i
157a3(ya): me ri 'bar// rin chen sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro// nang gi thod pa tshar gsum brtsigs// mthu chen bdud kyi mgo bcad pa'o// 'jigs byed khro bo'i gzer chen btab// ka gzhu nyi ma zla bas
157a4(ya): brgyan// rnam thar brgyad kyis them skas 'brel// phyogs skyong bcu ni bla re klubs// lhan ni dbang phyug rgya la mtshan 'phyar// gdug pa sbrul gyi zar chags// sbrul chen rigs lnga'i
157a5(ya): chun po 'phur// gnam lcags gzer chen btab pa la/ ban+d+ha 'jigs pa'i gzer chen ldan// zhing chen g.yang gzhi bar bskyabs// zhing chung pags pa khra la la// ba su ta yi zhags
157a6(ya): pas sbre la// dri chen dri chu'i zham bu 'bab// kang ka dur bya 'phur zhing lding // seng stag dom dred mchong zhing rgyu ga/ nyi zla gza' skar 'khrug cing 'phen// ye shes lnga ldan 'od zer 'phro//
157a7(ya): bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa// zhi khro rgyal ba'i pho brang mchog/ bruM bi shA bi shud+d+he b+han+d+ha ga ta dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la hU/ de ba ma hA nA ga ma hA ru tra ti za baM/ ma sun+ya maN+Da la/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Da/
157b1(ya): la/ paM pad+ma maN+Da la hU/ hU s+pha ra na phaT/ sa ha ra na hUM/ gzhal yas khang chen 'bar ba la// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha'// gnas dgu rdzogs pa'i pho brang la// dbus kyi gdan
157b2(ya): steng yi ga gi// 'phro 'du 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ che ba'i tshe mchog gyur pa ni// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// dus gsum sangs rgyas rdzogs pa
157b3(ya): gsal// zhal ni gsang ba'i dur khrod de// sman 'bar he ru ka yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gis ni// sangs rgyas bzhi brgya rtsa gnyis te// rang gis rigs mtshan yongs su rdzogs//
157b4(ya): dur khrod chen po'i rgyan gyis brgyan// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// oM shri ma hA he ru ka hUM phaT/ b+h+yo hU/ kun tu bzang mo dbyings kyi yum// kro d+hi shwa ri dbang phyug ma/
157b5(ya): rnam par thar pa'i dbu dgu ldan// stong pa bco brgyad phyag rnams kyis// g.yas pa rdo rje ma mo brgyad// g.yon pa dril bu 'phra men brgyad// gtso chen 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'dzin//
157b6(ya): zhabs bzhi mnyes sbyor sku la 'khril// oM ma hA kro tri shwa ri dz+wa la ni b+h+yo hUM/ yab yum gnyis su med pa las// mkha' gsang byin rlabs cho 'phrul las// paM ma hU a a phaT
157b7(ya): ces pa yis// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM rdo rje// pad+ma ma chags zla ba aM// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // nyi zla mkha' gsang gnyis su sbyor// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa
158a1(ya): b+hA ba At+ma ko \u0f85 hu/ hUM bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung ba ni// rang byung ye shes 'od zer 'phro//
158a2(ya): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ b+h+r-i/ khro mo 'dod chags ye shes che// he he dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs che// rin chen pad+mo rgyas mdzad pa// gnyis med 'khril ba'i sbyor ba

165a3(ya): sdo dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug be con gtun shing dgra sta g.yas// ban dam ru rgyu zhags 'khor lo g.yon na bsnams// bdud 'dul nag po khra mang shing ban+d+ha g.yon// sring
165a4(ya): mo mgo 'phyang dung khrag dgra sta 'phyar// nag 'joms mthing nag rdo rjes ste bsnams// nag mo ra la gcig yab 'khyud dung dmar stobs// bya sangs dkar po bum pa rdo rje
165a5(ya): sha la/ shel gyi gdong dgu yab 'khyud zangs gri thogs// brag 'joms dkar sar brag dang 'khor lo 'dzin// shel mig khro mo lcags kyu dung dmar stobs// glang mgo
165a6(ya): smug nag khaT+Ti lcag sa kyu bsnams// dkar skya mche gtsigs dkar mda' dung dmar stobs// yab ti rdzo nag ral gri lcagasu kyu 'dzin// dregs kyi ab sha khra ma shing ban+d+ha thogs//
165a7(ya): mog dmar smug nag ral gri dbyug pa g.yas// khrag gi ral gcig g.yas g.yon dung dmar stebs// dmigs bdud kha lcags sgrog 'phreng ba bsnams// klu mo spus 'gro
165b1(ya): gtso la dung dmar stobs// tel pa sngo nag spu gri rak+ta 'dzin// spa nA gsum mche gtsigs bar+N+Na rak+ta stobs// bdud 'jo ma sa smug nag tho ba pa na dmar bsnams// rmug nag
165b2(ya): ral gcig yab la dung khrag stobs// chos rgyal dkar ser rdo rje khram nag 'dzin// rdo rje ral gcig zhags pa dung dmar stobs// 'bar ba dmar po rtsis byang gtun shing
165b3(ya): 'dzin// kang ka dmar po pad+ma lcags sgrog 'dzin// ljang nag sbyang mgo rgya gra ma dril bu 'dzin// bde bar gshegs bsku mchog 'dus pa'i gtso// rang rigs phyag rgya'i
165b4(ya): mchod pa bzhes su gsol// nub phyogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams 'dus pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal po'i sku// dmar nag dbu
165b5(ya): gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon rdzo dbus dmar zhing // phyag drug rdo rje kha T+wAM sbrul zhags g.yas// dril bu ban dmar lcags
165b6(ya): sgrog g.yon na bsnams// e ka dza ti kha D+haM dung khrag stobs// sprul pa 'phra men las kyi rgyal po gnyis// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar na ka 'a bar//
165b7(ya): phyag gnyis so so rdo rje thong khrag dang // rdo rje ri rab phur ba 'dzin zhing bsnams// dpal chen sprul pa'i zil gnon khro bo brgya do// dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
166a1(ya): bzhir bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mchog rta skad thengs gsum 'byin// zhi ba'i lha rnams zil gnon rta mgrin no// phyag drug 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen g.yas/
166a2(ya): pad+ma ral gri dril bu g.yon na bsnams// brkyang bskum zhabs kyis zhi bar rigs lnga gnon// mi 'pham khro mo sku la dgyes par 'khril// las kyi khro mo zil gnon khro bcu ga non/
166a3(ya): phyag drug pad+ma dbyug thog spu gri g.yas// kha TA dgra sta rgya gram g.yon na bsnams// khro gnyer dmar mo sku la dgyes par 'khril// ma mo zil gnon dbyings kyi yum drug
166a4(ya): gno no// phyag drug sdigs mdzub lcags kyu 'phrul zhags g.yas// lcags sgrog rnga chung kha T+wAM g.yon no bsnams// ro langs dmar mo sku la dgyes par 'khril// khyung
166a5(ya): rnams zil gnoni rigs lnga'i khyung chen bsnams// phyag drug rdo rje sa dang me khyung g.yas// nam mkha'u chu rlung bya khyung g.yon na bsnams// spyan gcig dmar mo sku la dgyes
166a6(ya): par 'khril// pho rgyud zil gnon dregs pa'i lha brgyad gnon// phyag drug rdo rje thod rka mu rgyu zhags g.yos// dung khrag thod rlon zhing dbyug g.yon na bsnams// rdo rje las
166a7(ya): byed dmar mo skul 'khril// mo rgyud zil gnon ma bdun sring bzhi gnon// phyag drag rdo rje ral gri mda' ni g.yas// zhags pa sdigs 'dzub gzhu ni g.yon na bsnams//
166b1(ya): gshin rje las byed dmar mo skul 'khril// klu rnams zil gnon gdug pa sbrul brgyad gnon// phyag drag sbrul dkar sbrul ser dmar po g.yas na bsnams// sbrul la
166b2(ya): sbrul ljang nag po g.yon na bsnams// klu mo las byed dmar mo ska la 'khri li// gza' rnams zil gnon nyi zla gza' brgyad gnon// phyag drug rdo rje zhags pa ral gri g.yas//
166b3(ya): dung nag ser ldeng dbyug pa khyung nag g.yon// gnod sbyin las byed dmar mo sku la 'khri la// yum chen rnams ni kha T+wAM thod khrag stobs// sgo bzhi'i pho nya dkar ser dmar
166b4(ya): ljang mdog/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu 'dzin// dus gsum bde gshegs gsung gi dbang phyug tshogs// rang rigs phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su
166b5(ya): gsol// byang phyogs dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sku mdog
166b6(ya): mab+h+ring // dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon pa kho T+wAM me dpung ba bar ba bsnams// tha ma gnyis
166b7(ya): ni ri rab phur pa dril// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs kha T+wAM thod khrag stobs// sangs rgyas spangs mchog bud+d+ha ki la la// nga bu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sdo dbus dkar zhal//
167a1(ya): phyag drug dang po rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// sras mchog rin chen rat+na ki la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar
167a2(ya): g.yon dmar dbus se nas// phyag drug dang po be con dgra sta bsnams// bar ma gnyis na rin chen ral gri bsnams// dbang gi sras mchog pad+ma ki la ya// dbu gsum g.yas
167a3(ya): dkar g.yon ser dbus dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung thung bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// 'phrin las sras mchog karma
167a4(ya): ki la yA// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po dung dang gri gug bsnams// bar ma gnyis na lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin// kun
167a5(ya): gyi tha ma ri rab phur pa 'dril// sku smad gser dngul zangs lcags phur pa ni// gru gsum 'bar ba e yi gdan la bzhugs// sku chen dmar skya ser dang dmar ba'i zhal/
167a6(ya): g.yas g.yon dang ba rdo rje dung khrag 'thung // bar ma gnyis ni mda' gzhu 'gengs shon 'phan// rdo rje sgra 'byin be con thod khrag stobs// yab yum sprul pa bag dang smigs
167a7(ya): bu'i mag/ rnam rgyal dkar bsngo dang ljang ser zhal// bar ma phyag gnyis 'khor la sngol shul ba snams// rdo rje skem ral gri ban dmar stobs// yab yum sbrus
167b1(ya): pa sta ga dang bya rgod mgo/ dbyug pa sngon po dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// bar pa'i phyag gnyis ma dpal dbyug pa bsnams// rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ba na da mar stobs/
167b2(ya): yab yum sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ gshin NAM gshed po sgro sgyu ljang ljon zhes// g.yas g.yon par ma thong du byug dgra sta bsnams// dur khrod bdag mo dbyug rdza
167b3(ya): dung dmar stobs// ya ba yum sprul pa dag ba'ug pa'i mgo/ mi g.yo mgon ni ljang sngon smug na ga zhal// bar po'i phyag gnyise ral gri zhags pa bsnams// rdo rje
167b4(ya): gtun khung tho ba dung khrag stobs// yab yum sprul pa gzig dang khwa ta'i mgo/ rta mgrin dmar po dkar dang sngo ba'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis spu gri zhags pa thogs/
167b5(ya): rdo rje gtum mo sgyu gri dung khrag stobs// yab yum sprul pa byi ba bung bud mgo/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar dang ljang khu'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis ba dan rnga yab bsnum/
167b6(ya): rdo rje mda' skems thod pa dung khrag stobs// ya bo lum sprul pa sbyang ki khra yi mgo/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ldang nag dkar dmar ljang khu'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis
167b7(ya): rgya gram dril bu bsnams// rdo rje rlung 'byin dgra sta dung khrag stobs// yab yum sprul pa seng ge pha wa mgo/ khams gsum rnam rgyal mthing la dkar dang dmar
168a1(ya): ba'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis rdo rje sbrul zhags bsnams// rdo rje bskul byed bya khyung dung khrag stobs// yab yu ma sprul pa dom dang
168a2(ya): sre mo'i mgo/ stobs chen dud kha mthing nag ljang khu'i zhal// bar ma gnyis na tho ba zhags pa bsnams// rdo rje bskyod byed rtse gsum thod khrag stobaso// yab yum
168a3(ya): sprul pa dre da dang byi ba'i mgo/ khro bcu rnams kyi phyag gnyis dang po yaM sa// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dung khrag drakrag/ tha ma phyag gnyis r-i re ba phur pa 'dri la//
168a4(ya): thugs kyi sras mchog 'phra men khra thabs tshogs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rang gi mtshan ma dang // rdo rje ri rab phur pas 'dzin zhing 'deb// sgo bzhi bsrung mdzad 'phra
168a5(ya): min sgo ba bzhi// pu shud mgo can dkar po lcags kyu thogs// skye ka'i mgo can ser po zhags pa 'dzin// sran bya'i mgo can dmar po lcags sgrog 'dzin// khra yi
168a6(ya): mgo can ljang khu dril bu 'dzin// dus gsum bde gshegs 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// shar
168a7(ya): lho'i dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs pa'i gtso// bcom ldan mngon rdzogs bla med he ru ka/ dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon rdzo dbus mthing zhal// phyag drug rnga
168b1(ya): rje sbru la khyung sbrul zhags g.yas// ban+d+ha nA dpags ga'u g.yon na brtsams// kun tu bzang mo nyid bzhi mkhab bzhi'i klong // dbu gcig zhal lnga phyag drug phyag mtshan
168b2(ya): bsnams// rdo rje dril zhags bdud rtsigayas na bsnams// dril bu ba dan g.yang gzhi g.yon na bsnams// shar phyogs khro mo seng gdong rnam snang gsal//
168b3(ya): phyag drug dang po rdo rje ban+d+ha ra wAn// bar ma gnyis kyis dgrasta gdun shing brdeg/ tha ma'i phyag gis seng ge mchog chen skrong// lho yi mkha' 'gro 'od gsal ba lang
168b4(ya): gdong // phyag drug dang po rin chan ban+d+har ldan// bar ma gnyis na me dpal du byug tho bsnams// tha ma'i phyag gis stag mo zhing phran snyod// nub phyogs mkha'
168b5(ya): 'gro mnyen gsal rud la'i mdog/ phyag drug dang po pad+ma ban+d+har ldan// bar ma gnyis na zhags pa tril shul bsnams// tha ma'i phyag gis zhags pa zhing chung
168b6(ya): snyod// byang phyogs mkha' 'gro khyung gdong yang gsal g.yos// phyag drug dang po rgya gram ban+d+ha bsnams// bar ma gnyis na dbyug zo rgyu mtshan 'dzin// tha ma'i
168b7(ya): phyag gis sbyang ki zhing chung snyod// nam mkha' mkha' 'gro bkrag gsol rdo rje'i mchu// phyag drug dang po 'khor lo ban+d+har ldan// bar ma gnyis na rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzi/
169a1(ya): tha ma gnyis kyi gdug pa zhing chung skod// dbyings kyi yum chen rtag pa'i rgyal mo snga// dbu gsum zhabs bzhi rang rig sku mdog gsal// srid
169a2(ya): pa'i bde 'gro dbu gsum sku mdog mthing // phyag drug dang po 'khor lo rin po che// bar ma g.yang gzhi ban+d+ha dmar gyis bkang // tha ma gnyis ni tshe bu ma lcags kyu 'dzin//
169a3(ya): nyi zla thod 'phreng mdog dkar 'ja' 'od gsal// phyag gnyis zangs lcags snying 'phro zhags pa 'phen// nyi ma khros ma mdog dkar klu gri 'dzin// khrag 'thung khros ma
169a4(ya): srin mo thod khrag 'dzin// bdud rtsi khros mo dmar mo bum pa bsnams// bde sbyor khros mo ljang nag sti ra 'phyar// srid pa'i rgyan byed dkar mo dgra zhags 'dzin//
169a5(ya): sngon mo dbyings phyug zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// bdag nyid dmar mo rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'phen// gcig spyod ser mo zhing pags g.yang gzhi brdeg/ dkar mo mig
169a6(ya): gcig ban+d+ha zlum pa thogs// nag mo mche gtsigs ban+d+ha ser po thogs// dmar mo dbang sdud ban+d+ha sbram po 'phyar// ser mo las mkhan thod pa rgya gra ma thogs//
169a7(ya): srid pa'i tshigs byed mthing nag mi snying ba snams// srong pa cha rloms dmar mo thong khrag 'dzin// 'dod khams gtso mo sngon mo khram shing bsnams// ra
169b1(ya): gcig dmar mo kha T+wAM me ri 'dzin// gling bzhi spyi bud dkar zhal lcags kyu thogs// rin chen srid 'debs gzha' mo ga'u 'dzin// pad+ma gar dbang le brgan thod
169b2(ya): khrag thags// rdo rje gar dbang ser mo ban+d+ha 'dzin// ha ra ting dkar mo mo yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo sa yi dkyil 'khor thogs// sharting dmar
169b3(ya): chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// srin mo rkam ma dkar mo shel phur thogs// srin mo phor thogs sngon mo thong khrag
169b4(ya): 'dzin// srin mo g.yang gzhi thod pa ban+d+ha 'dzin// srin mo za bdamar mo zhing pags sdig/ zin mo gsod byed ser mo lcags kyu thogs// srin mo dmar ser
169b5(ya): thod khrag zhags pa 'dzin// srin mo sdom byed sngon mo swa le 'phyar// dkar mo mche gtsigs thod pa skam po thogs// nag mo kha 'bya ma ban+d+ha sngon po thogs//
169b6(ya): dmar mo chu 'jibs ban+d+ha dmar po thogs// ser mo las mkhan ban+d+ha ser po 'dzin// lha li sring mo dkar mo rdo rje bsnams// gshin rje'i sring mo sngon mo thod dbyug
169b7(ya): thogs// klu yi sring mo dmar mo sbrul zhags thogs// gnod sbyin sring mo ser na gne'u le 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa'i ma mo zod gtong ba dag/ rang rigs
170a1(ya): phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/ nub byang dkyil 'khor 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa
170a2(ya): kun 'dul ni// dbu gsum phyag drug kha ma na ga smag mthing zhal// dang po phyag gnyis rdo rje dung khrag dkrug/ g.yas g.yon phyag bzhi lha brgyad kra brgyad mgo/ khams
170a3(ya): gsum spyi 'dul phyag g.yas rdo rje 'khyud// phyag g.yon dung khrag gtso bo'i zhal du stobs// lha chen mthing nag gri khu ga tsit+ta g.yon// gtso mo dbu ma rtse gsum
170a4(ya): thod khrag bsnams// se nga ge glang chen bshi bas pa'i khri la bzhugs// ya ma ra dza mdog nag be con g.yas// g.yon na thod dbyug ma he chu glang chi bas// sgrol
170a5(ya): byed nag mo srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// bdud po skong rje mthing nag khram shing g.yas// g.yon na dgra sta bdud rtanag po chibs// na ga mo re ti khram shing na de
170a6(ya): rgyal bsnams// dre rta dmar mo rkang ga sumachibs su chi bas// nag bo glog 'phreng glog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin// sbal mgo khrag mig khrag phor zhal du 'dzin// yab yum
170a7(ya): gnyis med 'brug dang rnga mong chi bas// ya kra me dbang mthing na ga rin chen bsnams// g.yon na mtshon thogs sta gseng rngam pa chibs// mon mo nag mo phyag
170b1(ya): g.yas spu gri bsnams// g.yon na sbyang ki lcags kyi phag mo chibs// srid pa'i rgyal mo mdog dkar 'khor lo g.yas// g.yon na me long 'brug mo sgra chen chi bas
170b2(ya): e ka tsa ti smug mthing tsit+ta g.yas// g.yon na g.yu byang dre'u rta nag po chibs// nag mo mgyogs byed g.yas na mtshon drug bsnams// g.yon na nad rgyal
170b3(ya): so bya nag pa che bas// rdo rje bdud 'dul mthing nag khrag thun g.yas// g.yon na ma dung byung dre rta nag po tshabs// srog zan dmar po ba se mdung dmar po g.yos//
170b4(ya): g.yon na mda' gzhu chibs su rta dmar chibs// skyes bu dmar 'bar sha lang g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na zangs zhags chi bas su rta dmar chibs// bgegs
170b5(ya): kyi rgyal po mthing ne ga kha T+wA~M g.yas// g.yon na thod khrag chibs su rta nag chibs// ka la nag po phyag g.yas rtse gsum bsnams// g.yon na thor khra ga chibs
170b6(ya): su rtsal chen 'chi bas// dmu bdud nag mo g.yas na shang lang bsnams// g.yon na mda' gzhu mu rta mchod rgod chi bas// gang ba bzang po dkar po
170b7(ya): g.yas/ g.yon na shel gyi snam ru dkar po chibs// spyi du nga rgyal po mdog dkar ru mtshon g.yas// g.yon na ral gri rnga
171a1(ya): rta gro bo tsha bas// rnam rgyal dkar po g.yas na ldan dkar bsnams// g.yon na ral gri chibs surta dkar chi bas// tshangs pa dkar po g.yas na
171a2(ya): nyi zer bsnams// g.yon pa spu gri seng ge dkar po chi bas// rdo rje khyung rgyal dkar po bdud zhags g.yas// g.yon na spu gri ba glang sna ring chi bas// rgyal bu sku la
171a3(ya): mdog dkar rdo rje g.yas// g.yon na ru mtshon tsar kham pa tshabs// le gos ldan nag po gri gug g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na beng chen bdud rta nag po chi bas//
171a4(ya): gza' bdud rgyal po mdog nag skya slad sprul// phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon na sbrul nag bsnams// thog gi bu yug dmar skya thog ser 'phen// yab yum gnyis
171a5(ya): med 'brug tshon yid mgyogs tshobs// klu bdud nag po sbrul zhags nad rgyal ba rnams// zla blud sbrul gyi chu srin sngon po tshabs// yakra na ga mo nad rgyal dug thun
171a6(ya): bsnams// sku smad sbrul 'khyil ru sbal nag po mnan// 'jig rten las byed dregs pa can gyi tshogs// rang rigs phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol//
171a7(ya): byang shar dkyil 'khor sngags lha'i tshogs// bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan drag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug mthing nag drag po'i zhal/
171b1(ya): phyag drug dang po rdo rje dung khrag dkrug/ phyag bani 'og ma lha klu tsit+ta bsnams// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo zhal gcig sku mdog mthing // g.yas g.yon phyag gis mkha' 'degs/
171b2(ya): gzhi gnon// 'chi bdag mthing nag thod pa gri gug bsnams// btsun mo nag mo gtso chen yab kyi tshul// bdud mo nag mo kha rlangs tri shul g.yas// nag mo khrag
171b3(ya): 'jag khram ba thod rlon bsnams// gsong byed nag mo ral gri thod khrag g.yon// srin mo nag mo gri gug mi mgo bsnams// gnod sbyin sngon ga ral gri ru mtshon bsnams//
171b4(ya): ral gcig sngon mo zhong pags dar nag bsnams// lha chen dkar po ban+d+ha shel gri bsnams// thar pa nag po mchod gtor thun gtor bsnams// rje btsan nag po dang
171b5(ya): na gzhags pa bsnams// yakra nag po kha T+wAM gri lug bsnams// har mdzes dkar po shel gri dar dkar bsnams// yaM shud dmar po mdung dmar ral gri bsnams//
171b6(ya): rdo rje mdzes pa dmar po ru mtshon 'phyar// pheMnya lag dgu mdog ser sprul par gyed// khyab 'jug nag po khram shing dgra sta bsnams// gzhon nu gtum po bum pa ru
171b7(ya): sbal 'dzin// sngags kyi bdag po dregs pa ban+d+ha bsnams// kun kyang zhing pags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dgra dang bgegs kyi snying la gzer//
172a1(ya): spyod pa'i mtshon cha lha yi chu chen bsnams// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol/ lho nub dkyil 'khor rig pa 'dzin
172a2(ya): pa'i tshogs// grub pa chen po brgyad la dbang bskur zhing // bu thun 'jug theg pa rab ston byang chub sems// phyag rgya phyi nang lhun gyis grub pa dang // rnam par smin dang tshel
172a3(ya): dbang ba dang // man ngag lung ston shes rab rgyu spel zhing // dam tshig dbang bskur nyams pa bskong mdzad pa'i// rgyal tsha ba rigs 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' rnams//
172a4(ya): rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// 'di dag ngang gi phyag rgyu ste// dang po'i mchod pa chen po yis// gnyis pa rab tu bstod bde// yon tan rtags bcas tshig gis
172a5(ya): mnyes// gsum pa 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// bzhi pa nyon mongs lnga nyid de/ lnga pa sgrol ba skye 'chi med// drug pa 'bral med sbyor ba de//
172a6(ya): bdun pa dug gsum phung pos mchod// brgyad bdug lnga sman yin te// dgu pa rmad byung mchod pa che// bcu pa dam tshig bdud rtsi ni// bcu gcig pa ni zhal zas
172a7(ya): tshogs// bcu gnyis gtsang sbyor lhags ma ste// 'di dag gis ning dang bcas// dus gsum rgyal ba kun mnyes 'gyur// de yis grub pa bya ba dag/ kun gyis
172b1(ya): mthar phyin yon tan tshogs// ma lus bskyod byed nyid yin no// kye ma dpal ldan he ru ka/ dpal chen nga yi dgongs chen po// rigs brgyad sku li rab mdzes pa'i/
172b2(ya): rten 'gyur gcig gis sgrub pa'i sa// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las rbod gtong grub mchod dang // rmod pa drug shul bden bya rnams/
172b3(ya): rdza dgu reg pa'idzin dang bcas// zhi dang khro dang thun mong bcas// pho nya las kyi byed pa dag/ nga yis bshad pa gang yin pa// ma 'ongs dus na gtsor bstan pa'i//
172b4(ya): byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// phyi dang nang dang sbas dang gsang // thun mong khyad par bye brag rnams// gang gis rdzogs pa rnams la bstod// ces
172b5(ya): bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ lha nges par du byung zhing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
172b6(ya): / de nas he ru ka rigs lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po khyod
172b7(ya): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las kyi khyad par dang / rgod gtong dang / pho nya dang / smod pa la sogs pa/ khro bo khro mo drag shul spyod pa'i las
173a1(ya): bya/ nges par bzung ba 'di dag bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa'i lus ni gang / dus ni ji tsam zhig na/ tshul ni ji lta bu/ yon tan ni ci zhig
173a2(ya): yod pa lags/ bdag cag gi the tsom bcad du gsol/ zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye ma he ru ka yi tshogs//
173a3(ya): 'khor dang bcas pa kun nyon cig/ phyi ma'i dus na nga yi sku// sprul pa thun mong sdang ba 'di// chos sku mnyam pa nyid gyur tshe// thos pa dang ni rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu rnams
173a4(ya): kyi yid la gnas// rin chen dgu yi sprul pa'i gzugs// 'jam dbyangs lha dang bcas pa yis// legs bkod nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ston// kun tu bzang mos kur snang
173a5(ya): zhing / 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs bcas kyis// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro'i gnas dag tu// gsang ba'i rgya yis btab byas pa// lo ni brgya dang nyi shu ni// kun
173a6(ya): bzang dgongs pa skong byed pa// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams la gnang // yan lag phyogs bcur rgyas par byed// rdo rje gsang ba'i myu gu yis// khyad par bsam gyis
173a7(ya): mi khyab pa// gdul bar bya ba rnams la ston// mtha' 'khob sham+b+ha li zhes par// de yi gtso gyur 'jig rten mgon// shwa ra b+ha gi lho yi bu// rnam sbrul bkod pa mchod dag
173b1(ya): gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin// dbang sgyur yongs rdzogs der 'byung gis// khyed rnams bshum par ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan
173b2(ya): bdas he ru ka yum dang gnyis su med pa sku'i zhing bkod pa dang ba cas pa rmos kyi dbyings su thim par gyur te/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can rnam sa dang bcom ldan
173b3(ya): bdas nyid kyi gsung rjes su sgrub cing thugs zhi ba chos kyi skur mthong bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do// bde bar gshegs pa
173b4(ya): thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ phyi ma nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / khro bo chen po mngon par rdzogs
173b5(ya): par sangs rgyas pa'i yod bzhin gyi yon tan chen po nges par bstan pa'i skabs te gnyis pa rdzogs so// // bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i
173b6(ya): rgyud rab tu 'byeng pa'i lde mig lta bur bshad pa rdzogs so// / zhi ba la le'u bcu/ khro bo la bdun te bcu bdun yod pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob
173b7(ya): dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gan sa dang / bod kyi mo tsa ba bi ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / bcom ldan
174a1(ya): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
174a2(ya): cad kyi sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// dus gsum gyi 'dod pa ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub par nus pa/ yid
174a3(ya): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che gter mi zad pa'i dbyings lta bu/ srid pa dang zhi ba'i chos ma lus pa skad cig tsam la thugs su chud pa/ ye shes kyi thig le chen po sna tshogs su rnam
174a4(ya): par 'phrul pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang ba ste/ 'og min gyi gnas thun mong ma yin pa'i gnas nam mkha'i khams kyi ltos chen mo rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i dbyings/
174a5(ya): rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog chen po/ yon tan chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pho brang / ye shes kyi gzhal med khang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / 'dod pa'i
174a6(ya): yon tan rgya chen pos mdzes shing / rnam par bkra bar byas pa// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur
174a7(ya): bde na bzhugs te// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus par gyur pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa'
174b1(ya): chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bu byung gnas chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar
174b2(ya): grub pa chen po dang / de dag gi yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig can ma dang / rdo rje dbyings ma dang / bzod pa chen mo dang / dam
174b3(ya): tshig gi lha mo dang / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / ba ja ma dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dab du phyug dang /
174b4(ya): lag na rdo rje dang / sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / byams pa dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings phyug ma dang
174b5(ya): rin po che'i dbyings phyug ma dad / pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma dang / las kyi dbyings phyug ma dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin po che'i sems ma dang / pad+ma'i
174b6(ya): sems ma dang / las kyi sems mi dang / de dag gi yang 'khor gyi dam par gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang /
174b7(ya): rdo rje chags pa dang / rdo rje mdzes pa dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rnom
175a1(ya): po dang / rdo rje smra ba dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje las dang / rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan
175a2(ya): dang / dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bkod pa'i rgyan dang / rin chen 'od 'phro dang / snang ba'i 'od dang / phyag rgya'i rgyal po dang / spos kyi glang po dang / spobs pa brtsegs
175a3(ya): pa dang / pad+mo'i rgyal po dang / pad+ma dam pa dang / rdo rje mi g.yo ba dang / thogs med rgyal po dang / rin po che'i dbang rjud dang / grub pa'i las dang / dga' bar ston
175a4(ya): pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i mtha' dang / de dag gi byang chub sems ma sgeg pa mo dang / bdug pa ma dang / lcags kyu ma dang / me 'od ma dang / 'phreng ba ma dang / me
175a5(ya): tog ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / rlung yab ma dang / dbyangs mkhan ma dang / mar me ma dang / sgra sgrogs mo dang / gsal ba kra ma dang / gar skyur ma dang / chu
175a6(ya): 'dzin ma dang / dril 'khrol ma dang / 'bebs byed ma dang / bde ba rgyas 'debs ma dang / bde ba za byed ma dang / bde ba rmongs byed ma dang / bde ba cha 'phel ma dang / khrus
175a7(ya): kyi lha mo dang / rgyal mtshan gyi lha mo dang / bla ri'i lha mo dang / gzugs kyi lha mo dang / lha mo dpal be'u ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / skyon bral ma dang / mdangs
175b1(ya): can ma dang / skyabs can ma dang / dri meng ma dang / sgra sgrogs ma dang / thogs med ma dang / gzhan yang lha'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / mi'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
175b2(ya): lha ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / yi dwags kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang / byol song gi byang chub sems dpa' dang / dmyal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
175b3(ya): gzhan yang rdo rje lcags kyu can dang / rdo rje zhags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog can dang / rdo rje dril bu can dang / de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i nim mkha'i khams ma
175b4(ya): lus pa khyab pa'i zhing khams kyi bkod pa dang / gzhal yas khang gi 'khor lo la snang ba dang / ya ba dang yum gyi snang ba gnyis su med pa dang / thabs kyi rang bzhin
175b5(ya): du snang ba dang / shes rab kyi ngo bor bzhugs pa dang / de bzhin du de dag so so'i rang bzhin/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
175b6(ya): pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / re ga dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam
175b7(ya): par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam parang shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
176a1(ya): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / zad
176a2(ya): bar gyi khams dang / ma lus par snang ba'i khams la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
176a3(ya): gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ bsngos pa'i rdul phra rab kyi tshad du gyur pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab
176a4(ya): tu 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang / dri ma dang bcas pa dang /
176a5(ya): sems dang sems las byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / rgyu'i tshogs dang / gzhi'i khyad par dang / lam gyi khyad
176a6(ya): par dang / thabs shes rab kyi byed pa dang / mthong ba dang / goms pa dang / spyad pa dang / thob pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'gog pa dang / bgrod pa
176a7(ya): dang spangs pa dang / sbyangs pa dang / bsgyur ba dang / shes pa dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / dbang du gyur pa dang / so sor rig pa dang / rtogs par bya ba
176b1(ya): dang / klong du gyur pa dang / bskyod pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / brtan pa dang / phyogs dang / dus dang / khams dang / rig pa dang /
