176b4(ya): snang ba la sogs pa yul dang / snang ba dang / dngos po dang / srid pa dang / zhi ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la reg ma lus shi nga yang dag
176b5(ya): par gzigs pas rnam par gzigs par mdzad do// de nas yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo la sogs pa ji snyed du 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di nyid
176b6(ya): kyi don dang ldan pa'i chos rnams rang gi ngo bo stong par mthong ba ni/ dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gzhag gis brtag par dka' zhing gzhal bar mi nus pa bzhin du mthong
176b7(ya): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// oM chos dbyings don dam spros bral rang bzhin las// gzugs dang mtshan ma'i 'dzin pa mi mnga' yang /
177a1(ya): @stong pa'i shes rab ma 'gags spros bral ba'o// chos sku lhun grub mnyam nyid bzhengs su gsol// A gdod nas dag pa'i ye shes tshogs
177a2(ya): las grub// bsam gyis mi khyab mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// hUM/ rnam par dag pa'i smon lam mthus grub cing // byams
177a3(ya): dang snying rje'i thugs kyis rab bskyed pa'i// sna tshogs rigs kyi rang gi mchog gyur yum// sprul pa skra yi rigs kun dbyung du gsol// hrI ma 'gags skye med ngo bo stong
177a4(ya): nyid sgra// yan lag drug cu gsung dbyangs dpag med pas// bstan pa rgya mchis sa'i bye brag tu// kun gyi lam gyur sde snod gsungs shig/ ha ta mi 'gyur thugs
177a5(ya): kyi dgongs pa dpag mod las// gnod sdig zhi de pa' dod pa'i don rgyas dang // pha la pa dbang sgyur gdug byed tshar gcod pa'i// kun gyi don spyod 'phrin las de mdzod cig
177a6(ya): ces bskul bas/ de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ sku gsung thugs kyi gnas thams cad na sa 'od zer gyi dra bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes
177a7(ya): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i bod zer gyi dra ba chen po bkye ste/ nom mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa de dag gis kyang phyogs
177b1(ya): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i khams thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar bzhugs na sa lham me/ lhang nge/ lhan ne mthong bar gyur to// de ltar 'dug pa'i
177b2(ya): khyad par du yang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bkod pa'i gnas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
177b3(ya): sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas de dag gi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin
177b4(ya): du shar gyi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba'i gnas na/ yang
177b5(ya): dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par
177b6(ya): mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen yod
177b7(ya): ba'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad na/ sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi
178a1(ya): thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas
178a2(ya): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsu thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
178a3(ya): na yang sangs rgyas de dag gi yang 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
178a4(ya): sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+ma brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul
178a5(ya): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams kyi
178a6(ya): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+ma can gyi gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
178a7(ya): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi
178b1(ya): nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul dang bral ba'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
178b2(ya): sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar
178b3(ya): gyur to// de la sogs pa phyogase bcu'i nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs shing 'byam klas pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag
178b4(ya): gi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar rang nyid 'dug par mthong bar
178b5(ya): gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cid na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang / so so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs
178b6(ya): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bkod par gzigs so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad sems can gyi khams
178b7(ya): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang / khams dang / bag la nyal gyi khyab par gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa dang / zhe sdang gi dbang du gyur pa dang /
179a1(ya): nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur pa dang / phrag dog gi da bdud gyur pa dang / ser sna'i da bang 'du gyur pa dang /
179a2(ya): khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa la sogs pa rnams kyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir// gdul bar bya ba'i 'khor kha cig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bzhugs par mdzad do//
179a3(ya): de bzhin du kha cig la ni rdo rje'i rigs dang / kha cig la ni rin po che'i rigs dang / kha cig la ni pad+ma'i rigs dang / kha cig la ni 'phrin las kyi rigs dang /
179a4(ya): kha cig la ni sbyin pa chen po'i rigs dang / kha cig la ni khro bo chen po'i rigs la sogs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
179a5(ya): dang bcas po'i rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab par rab tu bstan to// de nas phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba'i gzhal med
179a6(ya): khang na rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag so so'i gtso bo chen po rnams la/ so so'i 'khor rnams kyi rang gis bstan pa'i sde snod gsung dbyangs mi zad
179a7(ya): pa'i yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams zhu zhingab 'gro ba'i sems la snang bar gyur to// de dag thams cad kyi gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang rje'o//
179b1(ya): kun tu bzang po nyid la zhu zhing 'dri ba sems can la snang gyur nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen kun bzang mchog
179b2(ya): du sa gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las dang // yon tan dalag ma da ji snyed pa// ma lus khyod kyi thugs la gnas// blo ldan
179b3(ya): rnams kyis bsgrub bya ba// nyid kyi sngon du rtse ba dang // phyi ma phyi ma rab 'byed pa'i// rgyud rnams su ni legs pa shad las// ma tshang ba rnams kha bskang ni//
179b4(ya): the tshom mo nyi ga cad pa'i phyir// ma lus rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis ni// ji ltar rigs pa'i yan lag rnams// thugs rje chen pos bstan du gsol// zhes gsol te/
179b5(ya): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs zhi ba chen po las phyung ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
179b6(ya): la sogs pa phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu chen po rnams
179b7(ya): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba ma lus pa bstan pa dang / rigs dang po thams cad kyi
180a1(ya): dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la rab tu rtogs te/ mngon sum du 'gyur bzhin du phyi ma'i dus kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu rnams kyi don du dgongs
180a2(ya): pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar gsol pa/ kye ma kun tu bzang po yi// sku dang gsung dang thugs nges pa// rang bzhin gsang ba'i mtshon nyid ni// rdo rje gsum
180a3(ya): las 'gyur med kyang // ma lus sems can khams snang ba// dus gsum rdo rje sangs rgyas gsum// thugs kyi dbang phyug gnas gyur pa// kun tu bzang po chu
180a4(ya): 'phrul tshe// 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar che// bsam pa'i yul las rab 'das te// ma lus 'khor ba'i chu ba'i rgyun// mya ngan 'das par bar chad med// shin tu
180a5(ya): rnyed pa dka' pa nyid// mngon sum myur du sgrub byed pa// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus rgyud// bstan pa'i mchog gyur gang bshad de// rtogs shing mthong
180a6(ya): bar dka' ba ste// mnyam par 'dod na pha ni don du// mgon mdzad khyod la gsol ba ni// bde bar gshegs zhes gang la bya// thams cad 'dus pa ji ltar bzhag
180a7(ya): rgyud ces bya ba ji lta bu// de la dbye ba ji ltar bshang // rang gi ngo bo ji ltar lags// zhi bar gnas pa ci yi phyir// bcom ldan zhes ni gang la brjod// rigs brgya
180b1(ya): dbye ba ci yi phyir// dam par brjod pa ci zhig lags// bsdu ba'i rim pa ji tsam zhig/ bdag cag de don nyan 'tshal na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol//
180b2(ya): de nas ston pa kun tu bzang // 'khor rnams bskul ba'i don gsan nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// nges par phyung ste bka' stsal pa//
180b3(ya): nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs// gang gis spang bya ma lus spang // thob par bya ba mtha' dag brnyes// mi 'gyur sku gsung thugs rdzogs pa// bde ba
180b4(ya): chen po zhes bya ste// de yul 'bras bur gshegs pa'o// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyi// myur zhing 'jug pa'i bde ba ni// dka' spyad sdug bsngal mi gnas
180b5(ya): pa/ 'dis 'gro lam gyis shes pa'o// sems can bde gshegs rgyu dang bcas// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sems// gaun sa skabs zlo bur tshi ma
180b6(ya): can/ gzhi nyid bde ba 'di gshegs pas// bde bar gshegs zhes brjod pa yin// snang ba bcu sogs gnas pa gsum// ji snyed pa yi bde bar
180b7(ya): gshegs// thams cad ma lus yul de la// 'dus pa'i tshogs pa yin par bshad// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu rnams// rgyu dang thabs dang mthar thug tu
181a1(ya): 'brel ba'i don dang ldan pas rgyud// rang bzhin thabs lam 'bras bu yis// rgyud rnams gsum ni bye brag dbye// ma bcos ma bsgyur ma bslad cing
181a2(ya): skye ba gag rtag chad 'gro 'ong dang // yod med mtha' dang bral ba yis// dbyer med zung 'jug rang ngo tsam// gdul bya 'dod chags can don du// mdzes bya yon tan
181a3(ya): ljon pa yi// tshul dgus phyi rol drang ba'i phyir// ska gsung thugs ni zhi bar gnas// phyi nang gsang ba'i bdud bcom zhing // yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan pas//
181a4(ya): rang bzhin gnyis med don rdzogs la// bcom ldan zhes su brjod pa yin// nyon mongs khams dang phung po dang // dbang po phul dang bcas pa yi// rang gi rigs
181a5(ya): dang byed pa mchog/ legs sbyar rigs brgyar 'gyur ba'o// sgrub byed lus ngag yid gsum ni// mi dge rtsa ba yan lag bcas// bsgrub bya lam gyi khyad par du//
181a6(ya): mthar thug sdom byed dam pa'o// de dag nye bar bsdu ba ni// bsnyen bsgrub las kyi khyad par te// rgyas bsdus rab tu bsdus pa yang // de dag de nyid 'brel ba'o//
181a7(ya): de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// kye ma kun tu bzang po che// dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa ci zhig lags// de bzhin
181b1(ya): rdzogs rim ji ltar gdag sa// rnal 'byor zhes ni ci la bgyi// thabs zhes bya ba ji lta bu// shes rab kyang ni gang zhig lags// don dam kun rdzob ji lta bu//
181b2(ya): dbyer med du ni 'dod pa gang // de kho na nyid ji ltar mthong // gsang ba rang ni ci zhig gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos dbyings
181b3(ya): don gyi snying po dkyil// rig pa'i ye shes sna tshogs 'khor// rang bzhin gzugs brnyan ting nge 'dzin// brda dang tha skad bsam mi khyab// bsgrub bya sbyang ba'i gzhi
181b4(ya): nyid ni// skye gnas bzhi las srid pas na// tshul 'thun paskyed pa'i rim pa bzhis// blo rim rtogs pa bskyed rim mo// de nyid srid pa bar de'o// shis rdzogs
181b5(ya): gyis ston pa rnams// mngon par sangs rgyas tshul bzhin du// sgrub byed de ni rim par 'gyur// rten gyur tha mal shes pa'i rgyud// ma bcos rang bzhin rnal
181b6(ya): ma la// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud// 'bad rtsol dmigs pa mtshan mar bcas// mtshon du yod pa tsam
181b7(ya): nyid thabs// dus gsum mi dmigs de nyid kyi// brda thabs byin gyis brlab se ba dang // gnad du mtshon pas gang rtogs pa// ma maspong shes pa shes rab
182a1(ya): pan/ blo dang blo lo khyad par gyis// don dam kun rdzob ces su bstan// rang bzhin tshogs pa rgyu 'bras kyis// chu dang blam du bam//
182a2(ya): rtag dang skyes bu ji bzhin du// tha dad gcig pa dbyer med do// dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags la sogs// snang dang stong pa tha dad med// thams cad rang gi ngo bos
182a3(ya): stong // gas la bcas de nyid kho na'o// gsang ba zhes bya sku dang gsung // thugs kyi gsang ba mthar thug pa// smras pa dang ni dgongs pa dang // sgra tsam min
182a4(ya): dang nges pa'o// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// kye ma ston pa kun tu bzang // lha zhes bya ba ci zhig lags// de bzhin sngags kyi don chen ci//
182a5(ya): snyid po zhes pa ji lta bu// ting 'dzin zhes pa ci phyir gdags// gzhal med khang zhes gang la bya// mchod pas kyang ni ci zhig bya// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu//
182a6(ya): ye shes kyang ni gang zhig lags// dbang bskuro zhes pa ci phyir brjod// 'phrin las bshad pa'i don ched ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
182a7(ya): mthar thug pa dang gnas skabs su// phan byed nus pa lha yin no// gang las shes dang gang las skyog/ shes shing skyob pa sngags kyi don// yon tan mthar
182b1(ya): thug gang ston pa// thabs chen bshad pa snying por 'gyur// sgrib med yeng shes myur du rdzogs// ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yin// rgya khyon yon tan tshad med pas//
182b2(ya): gzhal med khang par de 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya sgrub byed gang ma nyes pa// de ni kun gyi mchod pa yin// phyi nang gsang ba'i chos rnams la// de nyid rgyas btab phyag
182b3(ya): rgya'o// rtog med bde dang gsal bas khyab// gang la gnas pa ye shes yin// lus ngag yid la nyon mongs pa'i// dri ma 'khrud byed dbang du brjod// zhi 'phel
182b4(ya): chags dang khro bo yis// bsam pa gnas gyur 'phrin las so// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// byang chub sems chen ji ltar lags// rig
182b5(ya): pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu ci// sangs rgyas zhes pa gang zhig lags// de don lta ba ji lta bu// bsgom par bya ba ci zhig lagaso// spyod pa spyad pa ji tsam zhig/ dam
182b6(ya): tshig nod pa gang la bya// brtson pa zhes pa'i dgongs pa ci// sgrub pa yis ni ci zhig 'grub// rgyus gdab kun ni ji ltar 'tshal// bcom ldan
182b7(ya): bdas kyi bka' stsal pa// ma skyes ma 'gags zhi bar gnas// ngo bo dngos mi na gter chen mchog/ snying rje stong pa dbyer mi byed// 'di ni byang chub
183a1(ya): sems chen yin// lus ngag yid gsum rang gi dngas// mi phyed don gyi rdo rje de// chos kun rig pa'i rjes su gnas// 'dzin byed de ni skyes su
183a2(ya): 'gyur// ji snyed dor bya kun spangs nas// blang bya ma lus rab tu mnyes// ma rig thib po rab sad cing // dgongs pas shes bya rab tu rgyas// de la tshul bzhin ma/
183a3(ya): nor mthong // yang dag don rtogs lta ba'o// phyi rol don gyi rtog pa log/ nyon mongs phra ba tsam gyis kyang // mi rdzi goms stobs skyed byed pa// mthong ba nyid la
183a4(ya): bsgom pa'o// dang po las dang bsgom pa dang // brtul zhugs 'chang dang sa nyam gzhag dang // rang gi sems la gang spyod pa// mi skyed ma mthong de spyod min//
183a5(ya): rin chen sa gzhi bzang lta bur// skyon med gzhan bskyeng nus par ldan// nyes pa'i rtsa ba nges par spong // mi 'gal ston po dam tshig go/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs
183a6(ya): chen gsang // rtsom zhing phan 'dogs ma rungs 'dul// bsod nams tshogs dang bskyed rim 'brel// bsgrub bya nyer gyur bsnyen pa ste// mchog gyur pa dang
183a7(ya): thun mong las// dkyil 'khor gsum 'phros cher bsgrub pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'on tshun du// sku gsung thug kyi rdo rje yis// tha dad gcig tu gang
183b1(ya): bsdus nas// gcig gis gcig gsal rgyas 'debs so// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ci// snying rje zhes
183b2(ya): pa gang zhig lags// sems can don du ji ltar spyad// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar spyad// zung du 'jug pa'i spyod pa gang // bdag nyid ji ltar byin gyis
183b3(ya): brlabs// bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// dngos grub ces ni gang la bya// tshe 'di'i grub tshul ji ltar 'byung // bar ma dor ni su zhig grol// skye bar bu rgyud
183b4(ya): la thogs pa gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags so sor rtog pa ste// zhe sdang gsal ba'i ye shes te// gti mug
183b5(ya): chos dbyings sgrung ba'o// nyon mongs pa shes de bzhin no// sems can chos dang dmigs med kyis// slong rje gsum las yangs mi 'da'// sbyor ba goms pa
183b6(ya): brtan byas nas// gsad gso sbyin dang rten pa dang // bzhi yis rnam bsdu khams gsum gyi// bdag tu skad cig tsam gyis 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas
183b7(ya): thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med// gang la bsngags pa'i 'khor ba dang // mi 'phral mi spong dam tshig yin// don dam kun rdzob thabs
184a1(ya): shes rag/ sdu ning stong pa 'khor ba dang // rgyu ngan 'das la sogs pa'i chos// tha dad dbyer med byung 'jug go// rang gis rang rig
184a2(ya): shes de/ rigs mthong rtog pas rang byin brlabs// 'gog pa'i rdo rje dbugs dbyung rngug/ 'jug gnas ldang ba khyad par gyis// 'bru gsum ngar gyi ngo bor gnas//
184a3(ya): kun rdzob pa la bzlas pa yin// mngon shes drug sogs thun mong ste// byang chub rdo rje mechog yin no// smin dang grol bas mthu stobs rdzogs// mngon du gyur
184a4(ya): pas tshe 'dir sgrub// le lo dang bcas par me do// shin tu le los skye ba grang // de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// de dag bsgrub pa'i thabs gang /
184a5(ya): lags// de yi dngos nyid ji lta bu// so so 'dor ba'i rtog pa gang // bsam tan zhes pa ji lta bu// rlung gi rnal 'byor dziH/ lags// de nyid 'dzin pa gang la
184a6(ya): gnas// rjes su dran pa'i yan lag gang // ting nge 'dzin du gang zhig pa shang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkara' stsal pa// rab tu bsnyen pa'i
184a7(ya): tshi ga dang // nye bar bsgru ba dang de bzhin tshe// 'phrin las sbyong bas thabs su 'gyur// byang chub sems gzhi stong pa dang // sa bon tshul du nges 'byung zhing /
184b1(ya): gzugs rtag yi ge mtshan mar bcas// thabs dngos thun mong nyid du 'gyur// mchog tu gyur pa 'di lta ste// phyi nang dbang po yul grub pa// rang gnas shes pa sa so
184b2(ya): sor 'dor// snyoms 'jug thams cad byin gyis rlob// rtog spyod dga' bang rtsa gcig nyid// gsang bcu rab sbyor spro bar bsdu// rang shes rig cing de zad pas//
184b3(ya): mngon gzhi mngon shes lnga la dpa'// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin rlung // 'byung ba lnga dang tshul 'drar snang // gom bu snom byed rtse la gzhag/ rang bzhin byang
184b4(ya): chub sems dpar snang // rang gi snying po gnas su bsam// dbang por lam bsrung zlum por bkod// gzung bya dri ma dang bral bas// de nyid ye shes sems
184b5(ya): dpar gsal// mi 'gyur byang chub sems bsgoms pas// mtshan ma lnga bstan srog gi lam// nam mkha'i khams la so sor bstan// 'od kyi dkyis
184b6(ya): 'khor snang ba yin// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// dngos bsdu gzugs kyi nang du bsam// skad cig ma yi ye shes gas la// sgrib pa ma lus
184b7(ya): sel bar byed// de nas 'khor gyi yang zhus pa// rang rig byang chub sems ni gang // de yi rgyu ni ji lta bu// gang zhig gis ni rkyen du 'gyur//
185a1(ya): 'bras bu 'dod pa ji ltar 'grub// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji tsam na// tshul ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// nges par grub pa byed pa gang //
185a2(ya): nye bar mtshon pa'i repe gang yin// dgos pa yang ni ci zhig lags// mtshan nyid mtshon tshul ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa//
185a3(ya): gzhi dang ngo bo mtshan nyid rnams// ma lus lhun gyis grub bdag nyid// mtha' bral ma spangs ma thob pa// sgro skur dang bral byang chub sems// lhan cig skyes dang
185a4(ya): bdag tu lta// kun tu btags pa'i tshe 'phrul gyis// nyon mongs nyer len mtshungs par ldan// bag nyal kun ldan rgyu yin no// lhan cig byed rkyen bsod nams
185a5(ya): dang // de ma yin dang mi g.yo'i las// legs nyes phra rags mang nyung gis// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor bar sbyararo// 'bras bu lus dang longs spyod dang //
185a6(ya): chos dang 'thun pa'i skal ba pos// ji ltar bsams dang smon lam dang // 'jug pa'i las kyi khyad par byed// dus ni dus gsum thams cad du/
185a7(ya): 'khrul dang ma 'khrul gnas de nyid// 'dod dang mi 'dod la sogs pa'i// gnas skabs so sor 'byung ba'o// tshul ni yang dag log pa dang // nges
185b1(ya): dang ma nges snang mi snang // sna tshogs kyis ni bral ba dang // thob pa'i bde sdug tha dad myong // ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// gcig gis dus gsum dus med
185b2(ya): par// rtogs dang ma rtogs phyogs gcig gis// kun la khyab pa nges par grub// rtswa me 'khor lo la sogs bzhi// rin chen rgyur byed stong sgra dang // gas
185b3(ya): dri ma g.yos sna tshogs lus// mtshon pa dpe yi nye phyogs yin// rang gi ngo bo thog ma yi// rnam par rtog bral rnal 'byor to// rten sogs rgyu 'bras 'gog pa
185b4(ya): la/ log pa dgag pa'i gol ba'o// gcig dang du mar 'dzin pa dang // mtha' brgyad bral ba'i bdag nyid can// brda thabs byin brlabs gtan tshigs kyis
185b5(ya): nyams su myong bas mtshan nyin shes// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// rgyud rnams kyi ni ston pa gang // de dag gnas kyang ci 'dra zhig/ de bzhin
185b6(ya): thugs kyi khyad par gang // 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ji lta bur// dus ni ji tsam zhig nA 'byung // rig pa'i rjes 'dzin ji lta bu// gleng spang zhes bya gang
185b7(ya): zhig lags// don du gnyer ba gang la bya// de dag bye brag dbye ba gang // lam gyi yan lag gang gis bsdu/ bcom ldan 'das
186a1(ya): kyis bka' stsal ba// kun tu bzang po don gyi mchog/ skyon mer thams cad 'dus pa yin// lnga drug gcig gnyis gsum bzhis
186a2(ya): bsdus// gdul bya'i rigs la sna tshogs snang // gsang ba'i b+ha ga nam mkha'i khams// mtha' bral bas ma mi khyab la bzhugs// skal med skye dgu'i
186a3(ya): rigs kun la// nges dang mangs lnga dang ldan// thugs kyi khyad par bye brag med// ma bstan ma gsung+ga sa ra gnas kyang // tha dad sku dang gsung gi tshogs//
186a4(ya): ba dag la nye ba re ston pa ra ma tho nga // nyan pa po ni du sa gsum gyi// sangs rgya sa bya dra tshwa ba se mos dpa 'a dang // nya
186a5(ya): zos rang rgyal skya la sogs// rims bzhin rang la bstan pa 'khod// dus dang bral ba'i dus gsum nyid// dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// rdzogs
186a6(ya): gnyis gsum dang rtsod pa la/ gang rigs tha dad so sor 'u byung // ji ltar mos pa de yi sa 'udul// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dag/
186a7(ya): phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul gyis te// nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang // brtul zhugs 'dzin po'i tshul gyis te// cig car rim dang thod rgal dang /
186b1(ya): dman dang mchog dang bar ma dang // rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i tshul// khas dang mos pa spyod pa dang // lam gyi sa yis yon tan bsdus// dang po pa dang kun tu spyod//
186b2(ya): brtul zhugs dang ni me nyam gzhag gis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa bsdus// mthar thug pa ni thun mong yin// rgyud kun gyis ni gleng bslang ba/ e baM ma yA bud+d+ha/ b+ha
186b3(ya): ga ban kA ya/ bAka tsit+ta/ sa muta ta/ badz+ra ba na ta/ 'di nyid kyi ni sgras brjod pa'i// yon tan ma lus glang gzhi'o// de yi gleng bslang nyid du 'gyur// gzhi dang la ma
186b4(ya): dang 'bras bu dag/ 'di yi don du gzhir byas yin// shes bya ga shis dang lam gang zag/ thob bya 'bras bu dag gis dbye// bsod nams da ni ye shes kyi//
186b5(ya): tshogs dang smin dang grol ba dang // bskyed dang rdzogs dang shin tu rdzogs// rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab phye ba'i// lam gyi yan lag rab tu bsdus// ma 'ongs pa yi
186b6(ya): dus dag tu// byang chub sems dpa' tshul chen po// dpa' bo skyes mchog 'jig rten mgon// kha saum sbyor phun sum tshogs pa yis// dus gsum sangs
186b7(ya): rgyas yab kyi gdung // legs 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa// ji ltar 'byung ba gsungs pa yis// the tshom med par don sgrub 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal bas
187a1(ya): phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thugs kyi dgongs pa gcig tu bsdus pas/ kham sa
187a2(ya): gsum dang 'gro ba rigs drug tu snang ba'i sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i don bsgrub cing ma grol ba rnams sgrol ba dang / ma bsgral ba rnams sgral ba dang / dbugs ma phyin
187a3(ya): pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan khas ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir brtson par spyod cing gnas par bzhugs so// phyogs
187a4(ya): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i tshu lo nye bar spyad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
187a5(ya): thugs kyi snying po gsang ba 'di dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hUM tra hrI ha/ oM hU/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ hU badz+ra d+h+ri ka/ swa rat+na d+h+r-ika/
187a6(ya): oM a ro li ka/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+ri ka/ mu laM ma prA ta/ oM hUM mu d+hA du shAlaM daM shwa ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ kha ra ka ra hi/ ta badz+ra ra ti/ oM bai ro tsa na hU/ oM badz+ra ak+ShaM b+h+ye hUM/
187a7(ya): oM rat+na saHdza hU oM a mi tA b+ha rbi hU/ oM a mo g+he mo dz+nye hi hU/ oM a nan ta b+ha tra hUM/ oM bud+d+ha s+pho tsan hU/ oM bad+ha ra lod+d+hA na hU/ oM mA ma ki d+harma hU~M/ oMrma
187b1(ya): ma ya ta ra naM hU/ e ma sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ ma bcos rang gi ngo za nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes tshogs// gti mug rnam dag rgyal po che// oM e ma rang byung
187b2(ya): bde chen thugs kyi mchog/ bdud las rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas te// zhe sdang mi 'gyur longs spyod gtan hU/ e ma yon tan rin chen dam pa'i gter// yid bzhin 'byung ba zad
187b3(ya): mi shas// re skod nam mkha'i ting 'dzin mdzod// nga rgyal rang gnas che ba'i mchog/ hU/ oM ma rnam dag gsung gi mtha' las 'das// dri med nam mkha' lta bur grags//
187b4(ya): skyon bral chos kyi yi ger rnang // 'dod chags skyon bral bla na med// hI e ma dam tshig don rnams kun bsgrub pa'i// nyon mongs srid 'joms mthar phyin pa// 'phrin
187b5(ya): mos chen po rdzogs mdzad pa'i// phrag dogalas kyi rtsol ba bral ha// zhes chang du brjod pas cheng du brjod pa mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo dam par dbang bskur ro//
187b6(ya): de nas rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams kyang rang rang gi ming gi snying po de kho na nyid kyis phyung ba ni/ oM badz+ra sa man+ta b+ha dra hU/ kun tu bzang po'i
187b7(ya): snying po'o// oM badz+ra d+ha tu sha ri hU/ rdo rje dbyings phyug snying po'o// oM badz+ra satwa drA/ rdo rje sems pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra rA dza hU/ rdo rje rgyal po'i snying po'o//
188a1(ya): oM badz+ra rA ga ra ti hU/ rdo rje chags pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra sa d+hu hU/ rdo rje legs pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ rdo rje sgeg mo'i snying po'o/
188a2(ya): oM badz+ra rU ba hU/ rdo rje bdug pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dza hU/ rdo rje 'gugs ma'i gling ba'o// oM badz+ra tI pa ra sha ra ti hUM/ rdo rje ma sgron snying po'o// oM many+dzu shri ku
188a3(ya): mA ra mu la phreM hUM/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i snying po'o// oM rat+na d+ha ra hUM/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ rdo rje rin chen gyi snying pa'o// oM badz+ri su ts+yai
188a4(ya): d+huhUM/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi stong pa'o// oM badz+ra ka tudz+nyAts+tsha/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra lanAdz+dza/ rdo rje bzhad ze'i snyi'i pa'o// oM mA le drA h+Na/ rdo rje
188a5(ya): ba ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pe tra hU/ rdo rje me tog ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra pa sha hI hUM/ rdo rje zhags pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra su kha hi hUM/ rdo rje bde ba ma'i snying po'o//
188a6(ya): oM lo ki ti shwa ra ya hU/ spyan ras gzigs kyi slong pa'o// oM pad+ma d+ha ra hUM/ pad+ma dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra tik+Sha Na tra hUM/ rdo rje rnon po'i spring ba'o/
188a7(ya): oM badz+ra pa sha hri hUM/ rdo rje smra ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra d+harma ha hUM/ rdo rje chas kyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra tsakra ha hU/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra girti hri hUM/
188b1(ya): rdo rje dbyangs mkhan ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra A mo ka tri gU/ rdo rje mar me'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM hU/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i snying po'o// oM ra ga ra ti rbi hU
188b2(ya): / rdo rje gsal sgron ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra pA Ni sa man ta hUM/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra ka ma ta ru hUM/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra karma
188b3(ya): bahUM rdo rje las kyi sring po'o// oM badz+ra rak+Sha traM hUM/ rdo rje srung ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra yak+Sha tri hU/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra san ti ha hUM/ rdo
188b4(ya): khu tshur gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra nirti a hU/ rdo rje gar sgyur ma'i snying ba'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he a hU/ rdo rje byug pa ma'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he ha hUM/ rdo rje dril bu mchi
188b5(ya): snying po'o// oM badz+ra A pe sha ya hU/ rdo rje 'bebs mi'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra k+Shi ti gad+d+ha yA hU/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra su kha na~MH hUM/ bde ba rgyas
188b6(ya): 'debs ma'i snying po'o// oM d+harma ke du hUM/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi snying po'o// oM ra dza shwa ra ya tA yatraM/ dbang phyug rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM pad+ma hral
188b7(ya): hUM bkod pa dbang gi snying po'o// oM rat+na rasmi hi hUM/ rin chen 'od 'phro'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'o// oM rat+na swa ti ni hU/
189a1(ya): rin chen sems ma'i snying po'o// o d+harma sAd ti ni hUM/ chos kyi sems ma'i snying po'o// oM karma sA ti ni hwA/ las kyi sems ma'i snying po'o//
189a2(ya): oM badz+ra kha gar b+ha hri da ya hUM/ na ma mkha'i snying po'i snying po'o// o a mo ka sha ra ya hU/ bad ba za byed snying po'o// o a mo ka pra b+ha ta hUM/ snang ba mchog gi snying po'o//
189a3(ya): oM mu tra rA dzA te hU/ phyag rgya'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// o pra ti b+hA na rA dza ni hU/ spobs pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// o pra ti swa ni ku Da ni ye hU/ spo bas pa brtsegs
189a4(ya): ba'i snying po'o// oM da bi sho ta ni hU/ khrus kyi lha mo'i snying po'o// oM da bi kau tutraM hUM/ rgyal mtshan lha mo'i snying po'o// oM de bi kun to hri hU/ rba re lha mo'i snying po'o//
189a5(ya): oM de bi ka du ha hUM/ gdugs kyi lha mo'i snying po'o// oM ma hA mai tri sa ma ya hU/ byams pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM mu ka ra ga sa ma hri hU/ bde ba rmongs byed ma'i
189a6(ya): snying zin// oM pun Da rA dza la hU/ bad+ma rgyal po'i snying pa'o// oM pad+ma sa ka la hru/ pad+ma dam pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra a tsa la hUM/ rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i snying po'o// oM
189a7(ya): a mu ka rA dza hU/ thogs medang rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM daM bi b+hai rab hU/ lha mo 'jigs byed ma'i snying po'o// oM de bi ta ka du na hUM/ lha mo skyon bral ma'i snying po'o// oM
189b1(ya): de bi bi dza la hUM/ lha mo rnam rgyal mo'i snying po'o// oM sarba pa ri sho d+hA la hUM/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he dza la la hUM/ bde ba tshe 'phel ma'i snying por/
189b2(ya): oM raHshwa ra mo hU/ rin chen dbang phyug gi snying po'o// o karma lhod de dz+r-i hUM/ grub pa'i las kyi snying po'o// oM ha ha hi b+ha ti ma hU~M/ dga' bar ston pa'i snying po'o// oM a
189b3(ya): tsal la ka sho b+ha hU/ mi g.yo ba'i mtha'i snying po'o// oM dza ya ba te sarba shano hUM/ lha mo skyabs can ma'i snying po'o// oM de bi pra tsa la bi ma le hU/ lha mo dri med ma'i snying
189b4(ya): po'o// oM pa sha pa ta tsi ta si hUM/ lha mo sgra sgrog ma'i snying po'o// oM de bi ka ru na phra ka ri hU/ lha mo thogs med ma'i snying po'o// oM de ba mu ni hU/ lha'i thub pa'i
189b5(ya): snying po'o// oM na Na mu ni tra hU/ o nr-i ye mu ni nr-i hU/ o pre ta mu ni pra hUM/ oM tiR+Ya mu ni k+ShA hU/ oM na ra ka mu ne sru srA hA/ thub pa rnams kyi snying ba'o// au
189b6(ya): badz+ra a gu sha dza/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ba/ oM badz+ra g+han+da ho/ sgo srungs bzhi'i snang ba'o// dang po rgyu yi snying po ste// gsum sogs bskyed pa'i snying
189b7(ya): po'o// ma lus rdzogs pa bzlas pa'i sngags// 'di shang zhi ba'i lha rnams kyi// snying po'i kha skong nyid du ba shar po'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
190a1(ya): de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de ni nga rgyal ldan pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus gnas te// bzhugs pa'i 'dug stangs bstan bya ba// rkang
190a2(ya): g.yas brla dang byin pa'i dbus// g.yon pa legs par gzhag byas kyang // de nyid steng du g.yas bzhag pa// dang po rdo rje'i skyil krung yin// g.yon gyis g.yas pa'i byin
190a3(ya): par mnan// pus mo gnyis ni sar phab pa// zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i sku// gnyis pa pad+ma'i bzhugs sta bA yin// rkang pa g.yas pas g.yon pa yi// baR+Ya yi steng
190a4(ya): du cung zad mnan// de nyid g.yon pa'i 'og tu bzhag/ gsum pa sems dba'i skyil krung yin// g.yon pa yis ni skyil krung byed// legs bcas de yi drung nyid du/
190a5(ya): rkang pa g.yas pa drang por bzhag/ dpa' bo'i bzhugs thabs bzhi pa'o// gau da na stengs rkang pa gnyis ka yis// thur du drang por bsrang bar bya// mnyam zhing
190a6(ya): brtan par bzhag pa ni// lnga pa bzang po'i bzhugs thabs so// mtho gang tsam gyis rkang pa gnyis/ bar bzhag stan la 'dug nas ni// cog pu bar bzhag
190a7(ya): bzhugs pa ni// tsog pu'i 'dug stangs nyid drug pa// rkang g.yas sems dpa'i skyil krung phye // brtan cing g.yon pa sgeg bcas kyang / bdun pa
190b1(ya): rol pa'i bzhugs stangs so// de dag dbus dang phyogs bzhir bstan// dang po sa rigs kyi phyag rgya bstan// gnyis pa yis ni lha mo ste// gsum pas sems
190b2(ya): dpa' rnams kyi'o// bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo rnams// lnga pas phyi rol sems dpa' ste// drug pas bran dang po nya'o// bdun pas 'jig rten skyong rnams so//
190b3(ya): de dag phyag rgyas sor bstan// de nas phyi rol bskor bya ba// goms stabs rnam pa bdun yin te// dang po dbus su rkang ma thebs dang // rting pa mnyam por
190b4(ya): gcig la bcer// rang gi thad kar legs bzhag pa// 'thun pa'i gnas su nga yis bshad// de na sa shar du gshegs na sa ni// g.yas pa'i brla dang pus mo
190b5(ya): bsrang // g.yon gyi byin pa slar bcar nas// bar mtho lnga bzhag g.yas brkyang yin// lhor ni g.yas brkyang de las bzlog/ thad khar bzhag nas g.yas
190b6(ya): g.yon bar// rkang mthil lnga yi tshad bzhag pa// de dag lho nub tu yang sbyar// nub tu zlum po pus mo gnyis// so so'i gnas su lag gnyis gzhig/ chu bya'i
190b7(ya): gshog pa ltar gnas pa// nu ba dang nub byang gnyis khar sbyar// byang gi phyogs su sa ga'i stabs// sor mo rnams ni phyir bstan zhing // pus mo'i lha nga'i thar
191a1(ya): khar kyang // rkang mthil nyi shu rtsa drug khyon// g.yon pa'i brlar ni rkang mthil gtad// rkang gcig yin te byang shar mtshams// g.yon pa'i
191a2(ya): mo g.yas kyis mnan// rus sbal stabs kyis shar lho brtsam/ de dang sbyar la lag pa'i gar// dang po la ni lnga yin te// rdo rje'i gar stabs bsrung ba'i tshul// steng 'og
191a3(ya): gnyis su lan gsum gsum// rdo rje gsor ba de yi ga ra// lag gnyis ro bzung za ba'i tshul// phyogs lha rdo rje ro langs stabs// rdo rje stabs sam gtun shing gis//
191a4(ya): bgags brdung ltar byed gtun shing stabs// g.yon pa'i khur tshur snying khar bstan// g.yas pas rdo rje ba dan 'phyar// dpung mgor bzhag pa ba dan thabs// gnyis pa'i
191a5(ya): dus su sku bstan bya// g.yon pa skur bstan g.yas pa yis// rdo rje 'phen tshul de yi stabs// kha yi steng 'og lag gnyis gdengs// gnyis bcas 'jigs pa ltar byed
191a6(ya): pa/ rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'i stabs// g.yon pa'i rtse gsum snying khar bzhag/ g.yas pa khu tshur dbyig pa ltar// 'degs byed rtse gsum sar 'jog pa//
191a7(ya): stobs chen 'degs pa'i gar stabs so// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bkan te// khar bzhag ha ha yi ge bzhis// rgod tshul rdo rje gad mo'i stangs// g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzu
191b1(ya): mo bsgreng // g.yas brdo ba 'phen tshul ni// rdo rje rdo yi gar thabs so// de las 'khrig ma gnyis mdud pa// rdo rje nags pa'i thabs yin no// g.yon pa dkur
191b2(ya): brten g.yas pa yi// khu tshur mthe bong nang nas ston// sgreng ba rdo rje becon thabs// de nyid las kyi g.yas pa yis// mdung rtse gcig pa'i tshul byed pa/
191b3(ya): rdo rje rtse gcig gar thabs so// de la sa rdo rje gdu bu 'degs// bgegs gsod tshul du byed pa ni// rdo rje ga du bu'i thabs su bshad// gsum pa g.yon
191b4(ya): brkyang dus ni bcu// rang gi kha ni 'og phyogs lhas// gdang sa shing lag gnyis 'khrig mar mdud// kha yi drung bzhag seng ge'i stabs// de nyid la sa ni
191b5(ya): phyogs kun lha// lce 'gyur seng ge glal ba yin// g.yon gyis rdo rje phur bu bzung // bgegs kyi steng bzhag g.yas pa yis// rdo rje khu tshur tho ba lis//
191b6(ya): brdung chu'o rdo rje bro ba'i stabs// rdo rje sgeg ma'i gar dang ldan// mgo ni g.yon gyi phyogs 'dud cing // bskor ba bud med sgyu 'phrul stabs// rdo rje bsnams
191b7(ya): pas slong kha nas// 'du byed rdo rje dril ba'o// khu tshur mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng bzlog/ kha 'gram gnyis bzhag mtsho bo'i tshul// rdo rje mche ba'i stabs su
192a1(ya): bshad// g.yon pa'i khu tshur shugs kyi tshul// g.yas kyi dpung mgor ral gri 'degs// rdo rje ral gri'i thabs yin no// g.yon mdzub mo dang
192a2(ya): g.yas pa le// mtheb mdzub gnyis mdud g.yas mdzub mo// lcags kyu ltar byas lcags kyu'i stabs// khu tshur gnyis kyis g.yas phyogs su// 'degs tshul rdorje
192a3(ya): mdung thung thabs// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yis// khu tshur thag mdung bskor ba'i tshul// lan gsum thag mdung 'phen thabs so// bzhi pa zla ma po'i gar
192a4(ya): thabs ni// rgu nye lag pa g.yon brkyang ga// de drung g.yas pa'i mthe'u chung ba sku ma// kha dag tshul byas rdo rje'i gar// phyogs bzhir sa gnon la sogs pa'i//
192a5(ya): so so'i phyag rgya sa gsal byas la// sgo bzhi byin gyis brlabs pa'i thabs// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas sdigs mjug/ bsgreng ba rdo rje 'khyil ba'i
192a6(ya): thabs// g.yas pa rdo rje snying khar 'dzin// g.yon gyi zil bu rna bar dkro la// rdo rje sgra li thabs su bshad// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis// mthe'u
192a7(ya): chung mdzub mo rdo rje ma du da// 'khor lo bskor ba de nyid thabs// snying khar pad+ma kha 'a byed tshul// pad+ma kha phye'i stabs yin no// g.yon gyis gzhu 'dzin gzhu yi
192b1(ya): tshul/ mda' 'gengs tshul ni g.yas pa yis// rna ba'i drung 'gengs mda' bzung thabs// de nyid 'phen tshul byed pa ni// rdo rje mda' 'phen thabs yin no// rkang
192b2(ya): gcig dang por bshang de bzhin// g.yas dang g.yon sogs lan gnyis bskor// bdun pa rus sbal gar stabs ni// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yi// rdo
192b3(ya): rje snying khar bstod de 'jog/ de dag legs spyang phyogs kun bskor// sa gzhi bsrung ba'i las yin no// de nas bdag nyid bsrung bya ba// dkyi
192b4(ya): 'khor gtso bo'i ngang nyid las// phyi dang nang gi khrus byas te// chos rnams stong pa nyid du bsam// bdag med don la mos par bya// mgrin pa hri las pad 'dab brgyad
192b5(ya): mdun gyi 'dab ma lce yin te// de nyid hUM las rdo rje ni// rtse lnga dkar por ba sam byas la// badz+ra dzA hi zhes pa sa bstan// lag gnyis mthil du a las ni//
192b6(ya): / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsgom// de ste hUM las rdo rje ni// rtse lnga ser mo rnams su bsam// ha sta badz+ra bstan par byas// rang gi snying khar nyi ma las// yi na
192b7(ya): hUM gyur rdo rje ni// sngon po rtse lnga hUM gis mtshan// de las 'od 'phro khro tshogs byung // bgegs rnams tshar bcad tshur 'dus pas// rang la thim pas khro bo'i sku//
193a1(ya): rdo rje 'dzin par grags par 'gyur// mthing la zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// g.yon pa sdig mdzub ma 'bar brgya
193a2(ya): dpal 'bar me dang bcas pa bsgom// ched brjod bstod pa bstan par bya// nga rgyal ldan pas sor mo rnams// phan tshun bsnol te rdo rje bsdams// oM gr-i h+Na
193a3(ya): sa ma ya hUM baM/ de yis rab tu brtan par bya// de nyid mgo yi phyogs lngar bzhag/ oM badz+re dz+wa la a na lArka hU a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma/ de yis rigs bdag dbang bskur
193a4(ya): bslang // rdo rje g.yas pa g.yon g.yon gyis// mthe ba mdzub gnyis la oM hUM bsam// bcud mdung ka nan bcings pa ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'khrig mar bsnol//
193a5(ya): snying kha mgrin pa ldan pa dang // spyi gtsug rgya ba dang lte ba dang // da bral ba la sogs gnas dgur ni// rdo rje mdud pa dam bcas nas// lhag ma lus la dra bar
193a6(ya): bcing // de nas lag g.yon sdigs mdzub sgreng // g.yas pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing // oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ zhes brjod bgegs la rdo rje bskrun//
193a7(ya): sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba de// nang du 'bar ba lta bur bsgreng // oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsam tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ ces pa sa bgegs rnams bzegs
193b1(ya): bar bsam// rdo rje spyan gyi nga rgyal gyis// sor mo bsnol bsdams sa la gzhag/ oM badz+ra na tri ni sar+b+ba bi ga na/ 'od kyi zhags pas bgegs rnams bcing //
193b2(ya): bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar bsam// de nas phyogs kun bsrung ba ni// rdo rje can gyi nga rgyal gyis// sngar bzhin phyag rgyas la gzhag/ oM badz+ra tri Do me b+ha
193b3(ya): ba rak+Sha hU/ 'og phyogs bgegs kun bcings par bsam// rdo rje khu tshur mo ltar bskor// lcags kyu lta bu spyi bor bzhag/ oM h+ya lu hu lu hUM phaT/ 'jigs byed kyis ni
193b4(ya): steng phyogs bcing // rdo rje gnod sbyin nga rgyal gyis// khu tshur mthe bong gnyis brkyang la// mdzub mo mche bltar byas te// oM badz+ra lak+ShA hU~M/ zhes pas steng phyogs
193b5(ya): mnan te bcing // rdo rje gtsug tor nga rgyal gyis// khu tshur gnyis bcings mthe'u chung sbrel// mdzub mo rtse sprad spyi bor bzlog/ oM b+h+rUM badz+re b+har+N+Na baM/ rdo rje zhags pa'i
193b6(ya): ngargyal gyis// khu tshur 'khrig mar 'dud cing bskor// oM badz+ra bA sha hriHde gnyis mtshungs pas shar phyogs bcing // rdo rje ba dran nga rgyal gyis// mthe bo bsnol te
193b7(ya): mdzub mo bsgreng // mthe'u chung ba dan ltar byas nas// oM badz+ra pa tang ke ba ta kaM ni Ni ta thA/ de yis nub phyogs bgegs bcing ngo // rdo rje sa mtshams
194a1(ya): nga rgyal gyis// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhal ngo bstan// oM badz+ra hri ka li ru dam ta/ byang phyogs bgegs kun de yis bcing // rdo rje rtse mo'ing
194a2(ya): rgyal gyis// khu tshur ri bo 'degs lhar bya// oM badz+ra shi kha re ru da mA ta// lho yi phyogs su bgegs bcing ngo // rdo rje las kyi nga rgyal gyis// khu tshur gnyis
194a3(ya): bcings 'khrig mar bsnol// mthe'u chung sbrang te mdzub mo sbrel// oM hUM badz+ra karma/ rje rje ra bas bskor ba ra ba sa ma// rje rje sor mo bsdams byas nas//
194a4(ya): oM druM badz+rad+har+m+mANAM/ phyi mi rdo rje rnamig bsam// rdo rje las kyi nga rgyal gyis// de nyid kyi ni phyag rgyu dang // oM badz+raHrdza sum+b+ha ni hUM/ de yis rdo rje rgyu gram bskor/
194a5(ya): lus ngag yid kyi bya ba rnams// ma lus rdzogs par ldan byas nas// bsrung ba'i yan lago rim bzhin 'gru ba// de nas mkha' la 'khor lo ba sam// mtsha
194a6(ya): ba'i lha rnams rang las sprul// yan lag bcu yis kun ma nyes byas// rten yul de dag rang la bsdu// rnam smin phung po 'od kyis sbyang // bsod nams mthar
194a7(ya): thug de la dmigs// de na sa ye shes tshogs bsgom phyir// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// ye shes lnga dang sbyar te bsgom// rjes la rten la
194b1(ya): gzhal med khang // 'byung ba'i gzhi dang bcas la bsgom// de nas so so'i rigs kyi gdan// gang ltar bsngags pa de bzhin bsam/

194b3(ya): gsal gtan dmigs pa bya// ye shes lha rnams de bzhin dgug/ bar snang khams dang gzhal yas khang // chos bdun drug gis de mnyes bya// de nas
194b4(ya): ma lus bslab bya ba slang // sdom pa dang ni dam tshig gzung // mchod bstod bshags dang 'phrin las bcol// bzod pa'i yul la nyes pa bshags// dus
194b5(ya): rnams kun tu mnyes par bya// de nas rang gi gnas su gshegs// bkra shis smon lam chen po gdag/ de yi dge ba mthar thug bsngo// de na sa bsam
194b6(ya): gyis mi khyab pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su bslab// 'phrin las bzhi la dus sbyar dmigs// phyi nang gsang dang ma nges pa'i// srid pa zhi ba chos nyid
194b7(ya): snang // ma lus khams dang rigs dang blo// bsam pa nyen mongs yang dag brjod// rnam shes yul dang bcas pa dang // phung po rnam grol rigs kyi sku//
195a1(ya): las dang kha dog ye shes gzugs// 'phrin las rigs kyi brgyar bsdus pa'o// ji ltar rigs pa'i tshul dag gis// bla med lam la yang dag
195a2(ya): gnas// rgyu 'bras lnga dang drug la sbyar// zhes bshad rigs brgyar bsdus pa'o// yan lag bshad pa'i kha skong yin// zhi ba chen po'i yan lag gi khyad par bshad
195a3(ya): pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gang du 'dod chags rnam dag pa'o// skye bu gdul ba'i don gyi phyir// zhi ba'i lam gyi
195a4(ya): rnal 'byor dag/ rim pa bzhin du bka' stsal pa// thog mar 'jig rten thun mong ste// rjes su theg pa la zhugs byi// de nyid las kyang khyad par du// bsam
195a5(ya): pa che la rab tu sbyar// de bzhin du ni rab tu dpag/ sngon du song bcas rnal 'byor ba zhis// bskyed pa'i rim pa de mthar du byung // gtan zhing gnas pa dang po las//
195a6(ya): de nyid shes par bya ba'i yul// lus la rten pa'i phung po dang // khams dang skye mched 'byung ba rnams// rigs brgya lnga dang bzhi bcu gnyis// gsum dang gcig
195a7(ya): tu bsdu ba dag/ yongs su shes pas gsung grub pa// de ni rdo rje'i bzlas par 'gyur// de yis sems kyi ting nge 'dzin// mthar thug dang ni rmi lam dang //
195b1(ya): sgyu ma lta bu'i lam la slob// de yis dbang bskur yongs rdzogs nas// rang bzhin 'od gsal snang bar byed// yon tan srid dang zhi la sogs// gnyis su snang
195b2(ya): bo dbyer med pa'i// zung du 'jug pa rtogs par 'gyur// mi slob lam gyis rab tu rdzogs// da ltar dmigs bsha da lam gyi rnams// yan lag phyogs
195b3(ya): gcig tsam nyid las// phun sum tshogs pa ma yin no// de nyid rim pa bstan pa las// khams kyi mngon rkyen phung po yang // sha rgyus rtsa dang pags pa dang //
195b4(ya): pri ti dri ma rgya rus bskang // khu ba rdul dang khrag chu sar// rnag zhag ngar snabs bshang dang gci// mchim klad pa rkang ma ra dang // gnye rgyu mkhal long khris rkang pa//
195b5(ya): glo snying mcher ba pho ba dang // bad kan srin bu phyi dang nang // skra dang ba spu sen mo dang // mgo dang yan lag nyid la ga sogs// snang ba'i phung po khams skye mched
195b6(ya): lhan cig gnas pa phung po yis// phrad par shes par lta ba dang // ma rig bag chags srid len rgyun// nyon mongs tshogs ni bsags la su byung // rtsa ba'i lnga phu rading
195b7(ya): ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas lngar shes bya// skye mched sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// so chu me rlung stong pa nyid// spyan ma gos dkar sgrol ma dbyings// lnga dang
196a1(ya): gcig dang gsum gyis bsdus// khyad par rigs brgya dbye ba yang // gzugs nyid rnam par snang mdzad las// bye brag ring thung phra sbom sogs/
196a2(ya): phyi nang gnyis dang la sogs pa// de nyid gtso bo'i rang bzhin no// bdag gzhan gnyis sogs rnam rin 'byung // kha dog sna tshogs mtha' yas te// 'od snang nus pa don
196a3(ya): grub yin// rig bcas rig med mi bskyod pa'o// tshor phung rin chen 'byung gzugs las// 'dus khris las tshor mi bskyod pa// bad kan rlung sogs rin chen 'byung //
196a4(ya): mtha' yas kyi ni bde bar tshor// sdug bsngal tshor ba don grub yin// btang snyoms rnam par snang mdzad do// 'du shes phung po mtha' yas gtso// mi bskyod rkang gnyis
196a5(ya): par 'du shes// bzhi pa rin chen 'byung ba'o// rnam med 'od dpag med pa yin// mang por snang ba don grub ste// g.yo med rgyu bral rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin 'du byed don
196a6(ya): grub gzugs// khyad par rnam snang lus 'du byed// ngag gi snang ba 'od dpag med// yid ni mi bskyod pa yi gzugs// khams kyi 'du byed rin 'u byung ste// thar pa don
196a7(ya): yod grub pa'o// rnam shes mi bskyod pa yin no// mig dang rna ba rna dang lce// lus kyi rnam par shes tshogs kun// snang mdzad rin chen 'od da pa ka med// don yod mi
196b1(ya): bskyod rang gi gzugs// 'di dag gtso 'khor yab kyi dngos// dang po sum cu nyid du 'gyur// khams kyi dbye bar snang ba yang // lci zhing sra brten byed pa// bud+d+ha lots+tsha nyid
196b2(ya): yin no// brlan dang gsher ba sa rab tu sdud// chu yi khams ni mA ma ki/ tsha dro smin zhing skam byed pa// me ni gos dkar ma yi khams// bskyong 'debs rngub dngar byung ba dag/
196b3(ya): yang dag g.yo byed sgrol ma'i khams// go 'byed langs pa'i yon tan ni// stong nyid mkha' dbyings kun tu bzang // rus pa skra dang bshang ba dang // snying dang mtshan pa rnam
196b4(ya): snang mdzad// spu dang sen mo rnag rin 'byung // so dang pags sha 'od dpag med// rgyus pa rtsib rus don yod grub/ dri ma rgyu khris mi bskyod pa// nang
196b5(ya): gi khams lnga'i dbye ba ni// ri rab rnam snang mdzad byin brlab// shar lho nub byang gling bzhi dang // rims bzhin rigs kyi byin brlabs yin// de dag phyi yis khams so//
196b6(ya): chu khams mA ma ki yi gzugs// bad kan mchi ma rnam snang mdzad// gcin rdul khrag dang kha chu dka/ go rims byin gyis brlab pa'i rigs// phyi rol rgya mtsho
196b7(ya): rnam snang mdzad// 'bab chu chu bo bskyod ma dang // lteng ka rnams kyis rigs bzhir 'gyur// gos dkar ma king me khams la// mgo bo me drod rnam snang mdzad/
197a1(ya): snying la lte ba yan lag dang // lta ba'i ma rnams sa so ris// rdolas byung ba'i gtso bo ste// rgyun bzhag ma shel gtsub shing dang // nags kyi me yis
197a2(ya): phyi yi rigs// rlung khams sgrol ma'i khams rang bzhin// khyab byed rlung ni gtso bos bsdus// srog 'dzin 'thur 'byin rgyu ba dang // me mnyam rim pa'i byin brlabs gnas//
197a3(ya): steng 'og dbus rlung gtso bo ste// phyogs bzhi rang gi rigs phyi rol// kun bzang mkha' dbyings phyi nang gi/ stong pa lnga dang phyogs lngar shes// skye mched sems par sbyar
197a4(ya): ba yang // mig gi skye mched pa'i snying po// de la rigs kyi sngar phye ba// snying po dag ni mi bskyod mthing // ser nag rin 'byung me rang bzhin// 'bras dkar chu ni 'od
197a5(ya): dpag med// g.yo 'gyur rlung ni don grub bo// gzugs snang 'dzin byed rnam snang la// rang byin brlabs pa'i skye mched lnga// rna ba phyag na rdo rje ste// phra rags
197a6(ya): gzugs ni mi bskyod pa// gotsor gyur rang bzhin rnam snang mdzad// bu ga mtha' yas 'od dpag med// g.yo med rtswa ni don yod grub// sgra rnams 'dzin byed rin
197a7(ya): 'byung ngo // sna yi skye mched nam mkha'i snying // phra gzugs rang bzhin nang dbus dang // sna bug dri 'byed rim bzhin du// mi bskyod rnam snang rin 'byung dang // don
197b1(ya): grub mthan yas byin brlabs dang // mU mi skye mched 'jig rten dbang // gzugs dang rang bzhin rtsu ba dang // gtsom ra yi khyad 'dzin rnams// shar dbus lha nub
197b2(ya): byang gi gtso// sgrib pa rnam sel yul skye mched// ngo bo rus ba sha dang pags// re snang lnga ni snang mdzad de// lho nub byang shar rim pa dag/ yid kyi skye mched
197b3(ya): 'jam dpal te// lus la rten pa'i rnamo shes tshogs// kun gyi bdag dang yul du gyur// phyi dang nang dang sbyar ba ni// dbang po yul dang skye mched rnamaso//
197b4(ya): byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor che// gzugs sgra dri ro reg phul rnams// lnga dang bcu ni rlung rang bzhin// srog sel byed rgyu mnyamo khyab byed// lha rnams
197b5(ya): yang dag nges par rgyu// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag tshul// dang po phung po la rten spyod// gnyis pa rnams ni dbang por gnas// myi dang nang gi las kun sgrub//
197b6(ya): rtsa ba gsum ni rten bcas shing // kun gyi rnam shes ma lus gnas// srog 'dzin tshul du brtag par rgyu// dang po srog gi rlung zhes bya// bshang gci
197b7(ya): khu ba khrag 'og rlung // zur du 'dren sel de nyid do// dbang po'i sgo dang yan lag gis// myong reg la sogs mnyam gnas te// za 'thung smra sogs stod
198a1(ya): du 'byin// 'gro nang sdod spyod gyen rgyur grags// khyab 'dzin 'gro ldeg tshogs kun gnas// de la khyab byed rlung du bshad// shar sogs dbus
198a2(ya): gtso rang bzhin gnas// snying 'doms lkog ma lte ba dang // tshogs rnams la ni rab tu rten// yan lag rnam pa lnga nyid kyang // ldang rgyu mig gi skye mched la// snang ba sgrib bral
198a3(ya): yid yul mthong // rol dang 'gying bag sgeg nyams bcas// rjes su chags dang mngon longs spyod// sdug dang mi sdug btang skomo gzugs// phyi nang byed pa'i las kun
198a4(ya): bzlug/ dbus shar na sa brtsams rim bzhin gtso// rna rgyu sgra ste rna ba'i yul// 'u 'ur mgo dang sgras 'byin dang // rtag par rgyun sgra glu dang du// yi ge brjod pa gnas
198a5(ya): rgyu/ chu shing lag dang rol mo sogs// 'phrin las bzhi yi brjod sgra dag/ gtso 'gyur rim pa sngar bzhin no// sna yi skye mched yang dag rgyu// ma lus dri dang yan la
198a6(ya): hU~M/ kun 'dzin nang gi bro zas dri// khyad par dri dag mi bskyod pa// gzhan dag dbus lho nub byang rims// lce yi rnam shes rab tu rgyu// mngar kha ska lan tsha rim gyi//
198a7(ya): dngos rgyu lus kyi yon tan te// bstan nas 'khyud dang sgo reg dang // rngub dang gnyis rab sbyor ba yis// gan sa rnams ga sum dang dbu mo'i gnas// dbus lho nub byang shar
198b1(ya): sogs kyis// go rims kyis ni yul lnga yin// le shes lnga yis rab phye ba// rten gsum dag cing grol ba la// rnam rtog bag tshogs ma lus sbyangs// chos dbyings
198b2(ya): rnam dag ye shes so// dngos po ma lus gzugs brnyan bzhin// cig char snang shes me long 'dra// khams gsum bsam la snod bcud tshogs// sems rtogs dang
198b3(ya): du mnyam de nyid // dus gsum phyi nang chos kyi dngos// ji bzhin ma 'dres rtog pa de// rang bzhin sgo gsum las rdzogs spyod// ma lus grub pa'i ye shes te//
198b4(ya): rang gi rig las byung ba yi/ da bas phung po skye mched khams// gtso bo sa byin brlabs so so'i rigs// yum dang sems dpa' lha mo dang // sems ma thub pa sgo srungs
198b5(ya): te/ dam pa'i rigs ni rnam brgya ste// phung po skye mched yul dang bcas// khams lnga 'byung bzhi rnam dag pa// rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yin// phung po de nyid
198b6(ya): rigs lnga ste// lus ngag yid kyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'chang // gsang ba chen po'i rigs gcig go// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs rnam lnga la//
198b7(ya): khyad par shas che gnyen po ni// rnam dag phyag rgya'i tshig bsgrub ste// zhi ba bsgrub mchog kha bskang yin// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar rnal 'byor
199a1(ya): lus kyi sgra// nges pa'i snang ba thob gyur nas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // 'byung bzhi rnam shes yul dang bcas// dngos grub kun kyi thun mong du// /
199a2(ya): lha dang stong pa rnal 'byor gsum/ rags pa las ni phrar gyur pa// ngag gi sgra dang rdo rje yis// bzlas pa'i sngags kyi de kho na// srog 'gyur kun gyi dngos grub po shad// phung po
199a3(ya): nga bdag rang bzhin can// 'od lnga'i phro 'du dpag med las// shin tu phra ba'i rnal 'byor bsgom// ri rab rtsa yi dmigs pa lta// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge gsum//
199a4(ya): 'ong dang 'dug dang 'gro ba la// mgrin pa snying kha lte gsang gnas// steng du 'gro la sogs pa dag/ dbugs las rig pa nyi shu lnga// bsdus pa'i gzugs brnyan
199a5(ya): steng sgo las// lnga dang bcu sogs phyi dang nang // byang chub sems rgyu mkha' la gnas// 'gro rnams kun gyi rnam shes rten// rtsa ba yan lag lnga dang bcu//
199a6(ya): yul gsum g.yas g.yon dbus la gnas// las bzhi la sogs gsum gyis spyod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das snang ba// ma lus dbugs spro rnam shes kyi//
199a7(ya): rtsa ba nyid kyis byin gyi sa brlabs// nam mkha' dang mnyam sa bon te// kha dog ting nge 'dzin la sogs// spangs pa'i dngos grub dam pa ste// sangs rgyas bya ba/
199b1(ya): chub sems dpa'i tshul// 'od ldan gzhal med khang du bzhugs// sna tshogs 'phrin las spyod pa ni// don chen byed dang steng 'og 'gro// btang skoms gnas dang
199b2(ya): khyab par byed// 'gro dang rnam 'gro yang dag 'gro// rab 'gro ngas 'gro khyad par gyis// lha nyan snom myang reg dang bsam// rang gzhan longs spyod bsam mi byag
199b3(ya): gzhal med khang par gnas pa'i lha// rten byed pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbus// mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin bzhugs// 'og sgo pad+ma bzhi dbus na// go sang gnas rin
199b4(ya): chen 'byung ldan te// steng 'gro bcu gnyis pa yi sar// 'od dpag med pa'i ngo bo nyid// don grub drug cu rtsa bzhi dbus// snyoms mdzad me yi rang bzhin no// khyab
199b5(ya): gnas phyi rol ya na lag brten// rnam snang mdzad pa de bzhin no// 'gro ba zhes bya gzugs la spod// rnam 'gro sgra yin ba 'dag 'gro// dra spod rab 'gro ro myong zhing //
199b6(ya): nges 'gro ngag ste de dag ni// nyi zla rol mo la sogs pa'i// gnas nas gshegs te rang longs spyod// lha dang lha mi 'od zer bcas// 'byung ba ye shes mnga'i bdag gis//
199b7(ya): bskul te bzlas pa gsum du byed// gzhal med khang gi steng sgo la// rlung ma sa dang chu rang bzhi no// rang rang gi ni 'gro byed bzhi// g.yas nas drod bcas steng 'og dam
200a1(ya): pad+ma rigs kyi bzlas pa yin// g.yon na sgom byed dbugs dang bcas// 'od der ljang khu las rigs bzlos// thun mong 'og 'gro sa li gzhi//
200a2(ya): rin chen rigs kyi 'od zer zlos// rin chen shel bag dkar po'i 'od// mi bskyod rang bzhin bzlas pa yin// khyab chen kun 'gro rten pa dang // rten bcas kun tu snang mdzad
200a3(ya): bzlos/ dkyil 'khor kun tu sdus pa'i dus// don nyid mthar byin gnas par bya// 'gro ba'i bzhon pa de nyid shes// sngags zhes bya ba gnyis pa ste// ji ltar sangs
200a4(ya): rgyas kun gyi gsung // yi ge sgra yi brjod pa dag/ lnga bcu'i yan lag kun rnams kyang // rtsa ba ma bskyed gcig yin te// ma bcos pa las gsum du 'gyur// tha ma la
200a5(ya): pa la 'gro 'ong gnas// dang po'i la sa la yang dag gzugs// gzhi yis sems can khams bskyed cing // lam rdzogs dril la phyi napa'agro// rang bzhin grub pa'i bzlas
200a6(ya): pa gsum// nyon mongs kun sbyangs 'phrin las spyod// oM A hU/ dus gsum thams cad 'di legasal// gnas dang rab tu byed pa las// dang po 'o thun la lnga
200a7(ya): yin no// gnyis pa nyi shu rtsa sngar bzlas// gsum la brgya gnyis nyi shu rdzar// bzhi pa la ni dgu brgya ste// lnga pa nyi khri chig stong dang // drug brgya nag gcig dag la
200b1(ya): bzlas// 'di ni shin tu phra ba'i lam// gzhon par bcas te 'phrin las 'grub// gsung tshig ma lus 'di yis bzlos// ngag gi rnal 'byor rdzogs 'dod pa'i//
200b2(ya): lam gyi kha ba skang bshad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yon tan mchog la rab dgongs shing //
200b3(ya): dam tshig rdzas kyi bsgrub pa bshad// rigs lnga'i dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rtsa brgyad yan lag stong dang bcas// byi napa
200b4(ya): gsang ba'i de nyid las// rang bzhin spyad dang bsgrubs las byung // phan dang nus mthu dpag med kyang // tha mal rnam rtog dbang gyur te// dngos su spyad par ma nus pa//
200b5(ya): dri dang kha dog ro bsgyur phyir// rtsu ba lnga las yan lag go/ cha 'thun rgyal blon 'khor rnams kyis// dbye ba bsdu ba rab sbyar te// khrol bu bye ma gong bu la// nga yi dkyis/
200b6(ya): 'khor sbyor ba yi so// byin gyis brlabs te rtags byung ba// sgrub pa'i longs spyod yon tan yin// rang bzhin gnas pa'i yon tan la// longs spyod sgo nas
200b7(ya): bsgrub pa ni// spyi dang bye brag so so ste// dang po rten gyur gang zag ni// nga yi se rab bstan mtshan nyid ldan// khyad par bla ma ma nyes byas shing // dbang
201a1(ya): rdzogs thob cing dam tshig ldan// lha dang mkha' 'gro nyer gnas pa// sgrub 'byor lus srog gtong phod cing // brtul zhugs brtson 'grus ldan pas
201a2(ya): brtsam// 'byung bzhi'i nus brgyas shing 'phel// ston zla gsum ni dus kyi mchog/ dka' thu ba brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang // grub pa mchog brnyas rnam snang rgyu//
201a3(ya): rang dang bla ma kho bskang ga/ don grub byang chub sems kyi rgyu// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // mtshan nyid kun ldan snang mtha' yas// gnas bdun pa dang bu chung dang //
201a4(ya): mtshan nyid kun ldan rin 'byung yin// sangs rgyas ya ba yu ma rang nyid dang // gzhon nu lo brgyad man chod rnams// mi bskyong bsgrub pa bri rgyu yin no// grogs ni mngar
201a5(ya): gsum tsha ba gsum// bzang drug 'bras bu gsum dang ni// yung ba spang rtsi sa rgod shun// ka rag bur khye'u ro tshan// khyi khu dkar mig ma bye'i sha/ so rtog
201a6(ya): bong nga sgyur bar shun// se ru brag shun pa ra ba ta// sar thig sro lo ut+pal sngon// de dag sbyar zhing bsgrubs spyad na// rims nad du ga nad khrag nad sel//
201a7(ya): bdud rtsi tsong zhi bra ga shun dang // ba lu'o lo mtsha ba gsum// sa 'brug can gzan sha sbyar te// bsgrubs shing spyad na mtshan nad sel// bdud rtsi tsong zhi sdig srin dang //
201b1(ya): se 'bru sug smel tsha rigs rnams// sbyar bsgrub mkhal ma'i na da kun sel// bdud rtsi bzang drug shu dag dkar// seng ldeng khan d+ha thang chu dang // ga pur ka ra tso
201b2(ya): mu zi/ ba 'u rgya ru gan ga rgod 'bras// thang kar rdo rje bong bu'i sha/ sbyar te bsgrub sa pas mdzeno des la// mtshe 'bra sa zo sha sbyar sha spos// sbyar zhing bkrus na
201b3(ya): kha spu dang // smin ma skye bar byed pa yin// bong 'bras bong nag spad ba tsir khu// khyi nag phag nag bran mu zi// ka ra sil sman thang chu rnams// chu grang gi sa sbyangs
201b4(ya): bkrus shing spyad// 'brum bu'i nad rnams thub cing sel// bdud rtsi dang ni tsha ba gsum// gan ga rgod mkhris pa bya rgod tshil// mar rling dang sbyar zhag dgur bsgrug/
201b5(ya): dril bu byas te rtag tu rten// grang bas mi tshugs gos su 'gyur// bdud rtsi bya dang rgod rtsi dang // mu zi bla rtsi dro dag sum tsha// mar rnying dang sbyar zhag gsum

201b7(ya): drug srang dang mnyam// bzang drug srang brgyad 'bras gsum mnyam// zla ba bcu pa sgru bas longs spyad na// rkang mgyogs dngos grub rnyed par 'gyur// bdud
202a1(ya): rtsi dug sbyar byang ba'i shwar// ro thal zangs lcags rdo phye dang // wa spyang mdze brag sha rus rnams// shangs che ske tshe yungs kar nags

202b1(ya): sbyor ba mthar phyin khyad par du// gla rtsi mu zi shing kun mtshal// sga tsha ti tsa seng 'phro ma dang // 'gron thal tshil chen lungs kar dang // bdud rtsi sbyar te zhag bdun du// rten na
202b2(ya): klu gdug gdon las thar// cong bzhi gu gul shu thag gnag/ pi ling thul nus gag lhog sel// kar sbrang rtsi sle tres dang // shoshing mngar gla rtsi shu thug dkar/
202b3(ya): sbyar rtan glo nad rnying pa sel// yungs kar sgog sgyu mi rus rling // zhag bzhir rten na 'brum nags la// tsan dan a ru a par gsum// sbyar ba zhig bzhis mig nad sel//
202b4(ya): sgreng rgod mkhris pa sbyar bkus na// za gu thor ba'i na da kun sel// se rgod me tog yungs kar dang // sbyar bas dug nad sel zhing srung // lo nyung kha ser btsong sgog
202b5(ya): skya// sbyar bas sbyar du ga sel bar byed// rgya tshil byi ba'i klad pa dang // 'bras bu gsum dang bzang po drug/ rtsa ba lnga bskos bcud rnams la// dri ro kha dog nus pa
202b6(ya): dang / zhu ba'i rjes sogs legs par btsir// thabs ni srul dang gdul ba dang // dbye dang du byung dang btso ba dang // ba tsir dang skam dang bsgyur ba yis// phye ma ril
202b7(ya): bu lde gu dang // zan dang tshod ma thug pa dang // chang dang mar khu sman dmar dang // 'ag ma phye zan dron 'o ma mar// de dag las gyur rgyal po dang // blon po bram ze
203a1(ya): dmangs ris dang // rigs ngan rdol ba bu chung dang // smyon pa lta bu'i gnas skabs kyis// tha dad bsgrub pa gang zag gi/ blo dang dbang po

203a3(ya): thabs ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i tshogs rdzogs nas// mar dang 'o ma mnyam blugs te// khams dang longs spyod 'thun pa la// kun sbyor rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin// sngags dang
203a4(ya): bcas pas bsgrub par bya// tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum// dkar gsum mngar gsum yan lag bcas// snod bzangs bcas te longs spyad bya// phye ma bcud
203a5(ya): kyis len sgrub yin// sha bzang gsar dang bdud rtsi gnyis// bca' sga bung bu ri yis brgyan// zla ba gcig tu srul zhing bsgrub// sha ltar longs spyod rten cing spyad//
203a6(ya): khyad par gdul zhing bsgrub pa ni// tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum// mar dang phye bzangs gdab cing btso// bshos gtsang lta bur bsgrub cing spyad// sna tshogasa'o
203a7(ya): ma sa sbyar ba ni// de kor grub pa'i longs spyod yin// mngar gsum gyis sel de zhing do// nas brus dang bcas 'thun par bsgrub// bdud rtsi skam legs zhing
203b1(ya): phabs dang // bcas pa zhig gsum mnan cing bsgrub// chang bzhin du ni longs spyad btung // tsha 'bras co zhi mar ning dang // brag zhun dang sbyar sman mar sgrub// mngar dang
203b2(ya): 'o ma tsha 'bras rnams// sbyar ba 'gam phyer bsgrub pa yin// gzhan yang ril bu phye ma dang // sman mar khan+d+ha lde gu dang // gong bu khu ba bcud lan la sogs// dri ro nus
203b3(ya): ba'i skyobs bsdus pa// 'u su sgog sgyu mar rnams te// dang po gnyis pa mngar gsum yin// nus pa tshe gsum rtsa ba lnga// spyir spyad rtsa brgyad yan lag sdong // dkyil
203b4(ya): 'khor sbyor ba'i khyad par gyis// sgrub pa'i khyad par 'bras bu ni// gtsang sme dang bral longs spyod nus// thun mong 'du shing khyad par rdzogs// rtsa ba chen po'i sgrub pa
203b5(ya): yin// rdo rje rigs kyi sgrub thabs ni// rtsa ba rgyu yi khyad par las// mi rta khyid dbya la sogs// srog chags che khra gang rung ba'i// byang chub sems
203b6(ya): kyi rtsa ba dang // gshegs lam bzhugs dang gnas 'brus dang // chub tshil dang rkang mar dang // thal dkar rdo rje mtshan ma dang // cong zhi brag shun la sogs rnams//
203b7(ya): mtshan ldan snod sbyar legs par bsgrub// rtsa ba tsong zhi cu gang yin// rin chen rig su bsgrub pa ni// sngags pa'i rgyu ldan mang zhu bar na// chu tshod kyis ni legs par btso//
204a1(ya): rus dang phral te legs pa rab tsag/ srang bcu 'o ma ma ra bre gsum// mar blug chu tshod bzung zhing bsdu// btsad tshod zin par bsgrub par bya// tho rangs
204a2(ya): dus su longs spyad bza'// blo bur dag tu bza' ba ni// skyes pa bud med mtshan dang ldan// dar gzhon sha tshil legs par dbye// ma rul ba de chu ser dbyung // kham pa'i
204a3(ya): nang bcug me sreg btso// yang na nas tsam sran tsam brdungs// grod pa'i nang du khu ba bsdu// sha za shin shun khyad par bslang // ba glang glang chen rta dang khyi// yan lag
204a4(ya): dag tu gyur pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs su sgrub pa ni// rang dang bla ma'i phyag rgya'i rdzas// khyad par gzhon nu skyon med ni// pad+ma'i rak+ta tshogs tshad de// yan lag a

204b1(ya): btab la bsgrub// yang ni ji chu bsgrub pa'i thabs// rdzu yi dong du cha gnyis bya// bar du gzer gyi them bu gzhug/ do nod nang par rje zhing btung // dang po yis ni khrus bya
204b2(ya): zhing / bar gyi bdud rtsi spyad cing sgrub// tha ma'i rdzas dbyi ru dor// 'bras bu gsum ni bcud kyis len// 'di dag khyad par dam tshig ni// tsha snro sha rul sgog btsong dang //

205a7(ya): rtsi khris pa tshogs tshad dang // skag sbyar sha dug sal bar byed// khyi mig khu dang nyung sa bon// brag zhun mar khu sbar ba yis// lo dug sel zhing srang bar byed//
205b1(ya): ga pur yungs kar pho bya tshan// lug gzhon sla sha bsdus yis// dug nad sel zhing srung bar byed// mar khu rta dkar khrag sbyar bas// stod na sha mdzer nad las thar//

205b7(ya): spre'u sha khyi lung rgyan phran no// nag po brgyad sbyar kla zhi byed// gdon gzhan bdud rtsi nyid kyis zhi// rgyas pa'i las su bya ba ni// bdud rtsi mar khu rtag

206a3(ya): thams cad dbang du byed// tsong zhi byang chub sems sbyar na// po ris thams cad dbang du 'gyur// lteng cu dri ma mar nag gsum// sbyar rten yul khams dbang

206b1(ya): gsum// tsha ba skyes na cu gang ngam// gur kum gtang bar bya ba yin// drin chen la ni dri chu ste// de ma zhun snabs yin te// thig le dkar dmar de nyid do//

207a1(ya): brda ste// a ru ra ni cha bzhi la// ba ru skyu ru phyed phyed do// bzang drug ga pur tsan dan sogs// rtsa ba'i bdud rtsi dang sbyar te// rlung la bu ram dang

207a3(ya): bai rud rtsi dron mo sha chen sbyar// mnan zhing sgrub pa shar bsgrub pa'o// nyung khung gu la ra ma nye dang // lbu ba'i khan d+ha ba du dau rtsir sbyar// gsum mam lnga ru lde gur

207a7(ya): rnam par rgyal ba dang // ri'u ral khye'u tshan dang sbyar// dug rnams ma lus 'joms pa'i mchog/ brgya byin lag dang 'o mar sbyar// bzhin sha kha dog mdangs ldan
207b1(ya): 'gyur// mu zi sgog skya cong zhir sbyar// pad mkhris sel zhing gzhon nur 'gyur// shu thag dkar sbyar de bsgrub na// gzugs mdog la sogs ldan par 'gyur//

211a1(ya): 'byung chen bzhi yi las la sbyar// thabs dang thugs rje las byung ba'i// byin brlabs kyis ni yul rnams kun// chos nyid zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin//
211a2(ya): gnyis med thabs kyis ma lus bsgral// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// sgyu ma'i tshul du gzhan la gnang // byas dang grub pa gang yang med// ma bcos

211a4(ya): sgom bzlas bsgyur ba'i goms stobs kyis// brtse ba dang bcas gzhan gyi don// rnal 'byor tsam du de bshad do// dang po'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// lam gyi
211a5(ya): rtsa ba de nyid la so// rjes su bstan pa'i rnal 'byor ba dag/ byin gyis brlabs kyi khyad par ni// phyi na yon tan mtshan nyid rdzogs// rang byin rlob pa'i nus pa

211b1(ya): lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// gnas dang bcas pa'i dga' ba bzhi// 'khor lo dang bcas gsal byas te// sbyang zhing bgrod pa'i sa dngalam// sku dang ye shes

212a1(ya): ldan pas// yon tan mtshan ma de nyid ni// snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya// rjes su slob ma de nyid kyang // yul dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis//

212b2(ya): nges pa la// smin par byed pa'i gzhi yin te// rjes su spyod pa mtha' dag gis// lam sbyang rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// lus kyi khog pa gzhal yas khang //

219a1(ya): nas sde dang sa nas me// de ltar bdun bskor tshul ba ni// gnas thus pa ni snying gcig dril ba// nyi shu rtsa brgyan dag tu 'phrul// ya nas yo dang ya nas te/
219a2(ya): nas ya dang ya na sa ra// drug drug drug bskor dril ba ni// las pa bskang ste nyer bzhir 'khrul// pa nas k+She ra to ru drug bzlas pa// las kha bskang ba'i drug 'khrul yin// ya nas
219a3(ya): k+She Sha to ru ni ra ni// de yis mgo mjug lnga dang bzhir// bskor ba gcig dril bcu bdun 'khru la// ya na sa ya yi ba ra du brgyad// nyi ma dang po bzlas pas 'khrulo// ya nas me yi
219a4(ya): ba ra du bdun// gan ma thus yin te bdun du 'khrul// ya na sa to ru drug bzlas pa// la sa kha bskang ba'i drug 'khrul yin// ya nas k+She ru rdza 'khrul pa// bzlas pa dbus kyi lte bar 'khrul
219a5(ya): ya nas dza ru bzhi bzlas pa// gnyis pa yin te bzhir 'khrul pa'o// ya ma ra ni shar phyogs kyi// las bsdebs bzlas pa gsum du 'khrul// de ltar g.yon gyi bsnyen pa sgrub na sa//
219a6(ya): g.yas kyis gsad cing rnam shes dpral// bzlog pa g.yas bskor g.yon rje sa dpag/ g.yas su bskor cing 'khrul pa yin// bca' gzhi 'khor lo stegs bu gnyis//
219a7(ya): gzhi dang gnag smug bskor thabs dang // bsnyen pa sgrub gsang sngags tshang bar dgod// dur khrod ro ras legs par btul// snag cha dug sna tshogs pa dang // mi khyir gsum
219b1(ya): grir shi ba'i// khrag dang bsres pas bris pa rgyu// lcags dang mi rkang mi bsad ma da'// de ni smyu gu'i rgyu yin no// 'khor lo rim pa bzhi dang ldan// thi ga bzhi btab pas re mig dgu/
219b2(ya): phyi rim bcu gnyis bcu drug la// sum tu gnyis dang ldan par bya// dbus su ya ma me ta k+She// sha ra du ra dza sa to// lho ru ra dza sa to// nub tu ru na yo ni/ byang du ra ya tsa ni/ gdug pa'i yi
219b3(ya): gaM bcu mnan dgod// phyi rim dbyangs yi ga btu drug dgod// de yi phyi rim sbod 'phre Sha dang // phaT kyis bskor te g.yon yin no// de bzhin yi ge'i bzla sa lugs bzlo ga/
219b4(ya): bskor 'phreng thams cad g.yas su'o// 'khor lo gnyis bris la sbyar te// steng la mnan pa'i 'khor lo bris// 'og la bsreg pa'i 'khor lo la// gtso bo'i skur gsal rdo rje ni/
219b5(ya): rtse lngar 'degs khong seng can// nang nas sngags dpal me 'dra bas// ga'u'i 'khor lo la gzhug bya// yang na lcags sdig me stag bzhin// 'phros nas ga'u'i dmigs la
219b6(ya): bstim// sha zos khrag 'thu 'jus pa 'chos// las bsgrubs dur khrod sha nus btab// ti'i 'dzin dmigs pa gan la brdeg/ 'khrul lugs gong
219b7(ya): ma'i 'khor lodza// ru bzhi'i 'khor lte ba la// lnga ste phyi rim bu rgyu gnyis la// yi ge bcu gnyis zad par bzlas//
220a1(ya): bzhi bskor bcu drug dag tu shes// dang po dbus su 'khrul zhing bskor// ya nas k+Sha dang ya nas ma// ya nas me dang ya nas te//
220a2(ya): dang po'i nyi ma bskon pas so// ru tsas to// te ru na yo/ lo ni ra ya bcu gnyis pa'o// nyi ma gsum pa bzhi pa'o// 'khrul 'khor snga ma bzhin du sbyar//
220a3(ya): ya ma kle ta me/ dbus kyi g.yas su 'khrul ba yin// ya ra ni yo/ ya ra ni yo/ ya ra ru to// dos tsar/ g.yas gas da nyi ma gnyis pa'o// phyi r-im nyi ma
220a4(ya): gsum las medra// yi ge bzhi pa bzhi tshe bzhi// de la ltos na sa ru bzhir bshad// de ni 'khor lo bca' ba'o// da ni dkyil 'khor bca' gzhi
220a5(ya): ni// gnas ni dur khrod kyi g.ya' dang // shan ma ri dang chu gling dang // rkang gcig brag nag ri bo dang // de la sogs pa drag po bsgrub// ro dang ro zas ro
220a6(ya): gos sogs// stag gzig da byi spang lung brde dang // lce sbyong sbrang bu tre la sogs// de dag gnas sar dkyil 'khor bca'// sa ni phung shul dag nas bslang //
220a7(ya): gru gsum rdo rje zla kham la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag gis bskor// sgo bzhi mu khyud bzhi dang ldan// gru gsum rtsel rdo rje bri// dgra bgegs ming rus cha re gzugs
220b1(ya): zla kham bca' lugs gsum gyi rten// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshed chen dgod// rtsibs brgyad phyogs su gshin rje'o// phyag mtshan be tshon la sogs dgod/
220b2(ya): sgo bzhi la sogs gnas rnams su// ci rigs par ni lha rnams dgod// las kyi kha tshar bstan pa ni// a kro bcu 'dun sku yi sngags// hri ti bcu bzhi thugs kyi
220b3(ya): sngags// ka la brgyad ni gsung gi sngags// sa ma bcu ni yon tan no// 'phrin las g.yon gyi bzhi snying dang // rtsa ba phyi nang gsang ba gsum// 'od zer brgyad dang

220b5(ya): ga yu sbyang gdags par bya// g.yas pa sad pa la ka ya// gdags bya phyi ma g.yon gyis 'dren// phyi na gas ngag sum 'od zer brgyad // ru bzhi rnams ni rang
220b6(ya): gzhung ste// 'bru ded g.yon pa skor ru lu gas chung // g.yas bskor 'bru dad ru khugs che// gnam gcig 'du ru g.yas bzhir der// g.yas su her brgyad chen
220b7(ya): ma// las skyong la bskang ro langs sngags// oM ru ra sa ma ra tsa rbaM/ rtsu ba'i dam tshig yang snying sngags// sngar bzhin du ni bskrad par bya/ oM du ya k+She la ra ni/ mo rur sa yon ru
221a1(ya): oM dur sa me tos dza/ sngags 'jug rnams ni sngar bzhin sbyar// ar gtad thabs kyi sgo bzhi ni// ya ma ra/ ya me to// ya ta yo/ ya k+She ga

222b6(ya): ya rbad ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya snying la dun b+h+yo/ kI li kI la yarba da yA/ ya k+Sha ya tsa ni ra ma ya snying la dun b+hau/ kI li kI la yarbad ya/ sngags dang phur pa thun
