226b3(ya): pho nyar bcas te dmigs// dam tshig bstan nas ye shes tshogs// spyan drang gnyis med bzhugs shing mchod// bstod dang bshags byang 'phrin las bcol//
226b4(ya): byar zhud le lo rab spangs pas// yid ma bcas pa'i bsnyen rdzogs nas// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan bri// mchod pa bstar te bsgrub pa brtsam//
226b5(ya): mchog dang thun mong rtags thon nas// 'phrin las gang 'dod de dang sbyar// las kyi lhag chad ma lus bskang // mang nyung rgyun dang du sa tshi gos su// dgongs
226b6(ya): nyams spyod lam bstan par sbyar// snang sems dbang gi snang ba 'byung // de ni phyi ltar bsgrub pa'o// nang bsgrub shes rab ting 'dzin ldan//
226b7(ya): bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal po'i sku// dngos su gsal rdzogs ngo za yis// 'jig rten lha phrin dregs pa can// rtsol med rang dbang nyid du 'du// gzugs
227a1(ya): snang ba dang sgra grag pa// rba na rig dbang gi sku gsudra thugs// yon tan rdzogs te dgos 'dod 'byung // 'gro don 'phrin las bsam
227a2(ya): yas pa// bsam pa dang ni smon pas rdzogs// gsung mchog nang du bsgrub pa'o// gsang bsgru ba dmigs pa'i longs spyod kyis// yon tan
227a3(ya): ma lus rang la rdzogs// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i snang ba'o// shes rab chen pos tha ga bcad pa'i// 'dus ma byas te lhun gyis grub// mkhyen pa thugs
227a4(ya): rje dang bcas pa// chos sku nyid du grub pa'o// don dam kun rdzob snang ba yis// gzhan don mthar phyin sprul pa'i sku// ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyis//
227a5(ya): bskyed rdzogs gsum gyis le sbyang // rtsol med lhun grub gzhan don spyad// 'bras bu gzhan nas mi bcol te// rang la gnas pade nyid yin// gzhan snang
227a6(ya): rnam 'khrul yan lag ste// rang sems dbang gi rgyal po la// btsos shing bsgrub tu ga la yod// las dang nyon mongs bag chags 'dam// skyon gyis ma
227a7(ya): gos pad+ma'i rigs// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag nus pa'i sngags// gtso bor brjod pas gsung bsgrub yin// rang rig sems kyi rgyal po ste// rang dbang
227b1(ya): lhun grub dbang gi rgyal// de dag gsang bar bstan pa'o// oM pad+ma ta krita ha la grib e ka dza ti sa ma ma ru wa ru lu nU N+yo hUM a ra ma dzu/ byi nang gsang ba'i khyad par
227b2(ya): las// gdul bya thabs kyi rim pa las// gsogs 'a phrin las dmigs dang sbyar// lta ba don gyis thag gcad cing // ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// 'phrin
227b3(ya): las yan lag gtsor mi sgrug/ rtogs pa'i ngo bo sems nyid du// snang ba thams cad dbyer med na// thun mong dngos grub ram pa yin// dbang gi dkyil 'khor rang la
227b4(ya): snang // rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang thob// rang rig 'de bar gnas pa ni// dbang gi busgrub pa'i mthar thug ste// mchog gi dngos grub rtsa ba yin// lta ba ting
227b5(ya): 'dzin bsgom ldan nas// sbyor bas la dor rta skad gsum// khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang // dam tshig rjes su bskal ba dang // drag po'i las 'jug dang po yin//
227b6(ya): rang rgyung che ba'i rnga ma skad dang // byin brlabs rdzas len brda skad dang // 'phrin las bsgrub pa'i gyi skad gnyis// lus ngag yid kyi brda gsum ste// se gol dang ni
227b7(ya): thal mo'i brda// spyugs pa dang ni ngu 'bod brda// lha dang bsgom pa'i brda rnams kyis// spyod pa'i rtog pa bsdus pa ste// gsung gi bsgrub pa dpag med kyang //
228a1(ya): ngag gi brda las byung ba ste// ngag gi lus la rab tu rten// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsnyen par bcas// sku dang gsung du dril te bsgrub// dgongs
228a2(ya): pa'i rta skad theng gsum las// spyod pa bsnyen sgrub gsum sbyar te// rdzogs pa'i rim pa dpe yi chos// 'gros dgu dang ni skad bcu gsum// don rtags mtshon pa
228a3(ya): dang sbyar ba// sku gsung thugs su dril te bsgrug/ gsang bsngags bsnyen bsgrub rab rtogs nas// dam tshig can rnams bkol ba dang // dregs pa'i dmag dpung
228a4(ya): gzhom pa dang // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams gdul ba dang // bskyed rdzogs gsum dang dgongs pa bzhi// rtsa ba yan lag gsung la bsdus// dbang mchog
228a5(ya): bsgrub pa'i kha ba skang bshad// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'phrin las bdag/ rab tu sgrub byed bla na med// blo dang ldan
228a6(ya): la nges par bstan// 'khor ba'i sa la snying brtse bskyed// mya ngan 'das la dgod pa dmigs// dge ba'i 'bras bu rdzogs par spyad// bar du gcod pa'i 'byung
228a7(ya): po gsal// dam tshig ldan la'aphrin las bcol// gnas kyi dam pa nges par gzung // gzugs dang rten gyi pho brang brtsig/ bri dang bsgom pa mchog tu sbyor// /
228b1(ya): sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las dmigs pa'i rten la dgod// dngos grub gnyis kyis dmigs par bya// rim pa gnyis kyi gzhir bya zhing //
228b2(ya): bsnyen pa gsum gyis mthar phyung ste// dam tshig lha dang gnyis med bsgrub// mtshan ma gsum gyi sa gtan la dab ba// dus la bab na 'phrin las sbyar// bka'
228b3(ya): sdod pho nya bran la sogs// spro zhing gzugs la gtan par dab ga// gab sbas kyi sa ni gsal ba gsum// mthong bar byas na sa gnas bdun gad ba// ya ba yum
228b4(ya): sras kyi sngags rnams dang // 'phrin las sngags kyis dbab par bya// gzir dang mnan pa'i tshul du spyad// don du ma gyur pa skang bshag sa bya// spogs
228b5(ya): pa cho ga bdun gyis bya// las kyi lhag chad ma lu sa bskang // sdig pa sbyang zhing gnas na sa spar// rtags kyis spro bar gyur ba na// dmigs pa gsum ni
228b6(ya): mtshon gyis bsgral// zhal zas bstab cing mtshon gyis gtug// gnan pa'i 'phrin las ma nor sbyang // bka' sdod pho nya mnyes bya'i phyir// gtor ma rim pa
228b7(ya): bzhin du dbul// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang // dkyil 'khor bsdus te spyod lam bsgo mo// bsrung zhing rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// go cha bgo zhing
229a1(ya): gnas su btag// mdo rje bklag cing mchod rten bzhengs// snying rjer ldan pas rab tu gsang // brnag pa kho na nyid du bya// gzhan yang thugs
229a2(ya): kyi gsang chen 'di// gnod cing gdug pa myur ba sgral phyir// gzhung dang 'thun pa'i gnas dag tu// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// tshad med rnam pa bzhi ldan
229a3(ya): pas/ bar chad med par sgrub pa'i phyir// zangs lcags tsher ma can gyi shing // dbang dang mngon spyod gnyis kyi rgyu// sor brgyad dang ni bcu gnyis tshad//
229a4(ya): mgo dang bskyed pa bcu drug dngos// zur gsum chu srin kha nas du byung // ya ba yum sras kyi grangs dang mau nyam// byin gyis brlab po tshul bzhin bya// dmigs pa
229a5(ya): mi brjed gzungs yang bslab// rtags dang ldan pa'i bsnyen pa bya// dkyil 'khor zla kham gru gsum bcas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sgo khyams mdzes// sgrub rdzas
229a6(ya): yan lag ma lus dgod// dbang byin brlabs kyi sa gzi byin bskyed// rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol// nye bar byed pa'i bsnyen pa dbul// stong nyid snying
229a7(ya): rje'i snying po hU// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba lnga// phyi nang gsang bar rang sngags 'phro// rten gyur gdan dang bcas pa la// 'bar ba'i sku mchog gtso dang
229b1(ya): 'khor/ don dam kun rdzob tshul du byung // zhe sdang rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// sprul pa bye ba 'bum dang bcas// rang sngags phyag mtshan dang bcas pa// zan dang
229b2(ya): po ka bka' nyan tshogs// sprul pa dang bcas 'phrin las mdzad// gnod cing 'gal ba myur du sgrol// dmigs pa drag po'i pho brang du// dgug 'dren rngom
229b3(ya): sgrol pho nya yis// ting 'dzin gsal bas gnas su dbag/ khros pa'i 'phrin las thams cad brtsam// gzugs phu ba lhag ma pho nyas rol// rdul phran tsam yang
229b4(ya): ma lus bsam// de la rang dang dmigs pa yi// lus ngag yid gsum gsal ldan pas// drag shul dpag med spyad gyur na// rdo rje'i brag yang 'joms par
229b5(ya): 'gyur// rigs ldan phung po smos ci dgos// las 'jug 'phang bsreg gnan pas bsdu// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// mngon rdzogs yab
229b6(ya): kyis dbang sgyur te// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid las// brten pa rten dang bcas par bskyed// bdag nyid thig ler mnyam sbyar nas// rnam pa gsum gyi ting 'dzin
229b7(ya): sgom// dmigs med bsam 'das rnam par dag/ ma skyes chos kyi dbyings su snang // snying rjen ma mkha'i ngo bo las// blang dor med par kun tu snang //
230a1(ya): med pa'i ngang la mngon gsal ba'i// dbyings la shar ba yi ge hUM// bdag gi dbugs las gyur pa mi// 'og phyogs rlung gi sa phan
230a2(ya): rten/ bdag gi khrag las gyur pa yi// de sngangs chu yi sa bon rten// ba dag gi sha las gyur pa yi// de stengs sa yi snying po yin// bdag gi drod las
230a3(ya): gyur pa yi// me yi sa bon phyog kun khyab// bdag gi sems kyi ngo bo las// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dbyings las 'byung lnga'i
230a4(ya): rgyu yis bskyed// mkha' la rlung rten 'byung ba lnga// bdag nyid du ni gsal ba las// sa bon las ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// b+h+rUM las thod rlon gzhal yas khang//
230a5(ya): kau zhu thod skam ka gdan byas// lha rnams gdung bris klu rnams bya ma// gza' skar kha bad rgyu skar bral// klu rgyal rigs bzhi sbrul nago brgyan// 'khor lo sa bon
230a6(ya): gyis sbyangs nas// rtsibs brgyad pa ru rab tu gsal// pad+ma'i sa bon 'od kyis sbyangs// bdab brgyad po ru de nyid snang // 'od kyis mtha' dbus rab tu gsal
230a7(ya): gdan gyi sa bon gyis sbyangs nas// ba rnag pa'i dri za grul bum dang // klu dang gau nod sbyin la sogs pa// byin chibs bsnol ba'i mig dan stengs su//
230b1(ya): de stengs pho mo zung bzhi bsgyel// dkyil du rgya mtsho thod 'phreng gnyis// shar dang nub tu mgo bsnol ba'o// rdo rje khros dang dag rnga mo// shar gyi phyogs su
230b2(ya): bsnol te lding // rin chen khros dang ral gcig ma// lho yi phyogs su bsnol te bzhag/ pad+ma khros dang dmar mo gnyis// nub kyi phyogs su mgo bsnol ba'o//
230b3(ya): rnam 'khrul ser mo las kha na gnyis// byang gi phyogs su bsnol ba'o// rgyan gyis brgyan mo me yi phyogs// dbyings phyug ma ni bden bral phyogs//
230b4(ya): bdag nyid ma ni rlung lha'i phyogs// gcig bum ni dbang ldan phyogs// rim 'gro bskyed cing 'khor rnams mnan// b+ha ga bcu bzhi'i gdan stengs na// bdag
230b5(ya): nyid byangang chub thig le las// snying po ye shes mngon du shar// byed pa po ni kun tu bzang // rnam par thar pa'i dbu ldan zhing // ye shes drug gi phyag rgya
230b6(ya): can// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rdzu'aphrul bzhi yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// bdag gi gzugs kyi ngo bo las// rnal 'byor nyid bzhi pa de mchog
230b7(ya): ma/ bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid rtag pa thugs kyi dkyil// 'od zer lnga po rtse nas 'phro// 'byung ba lnga yi zhal mnga' zhing // ye shes drug
231a1(ya): gi phyag rgya can// phyogs mtshams gnon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyis// ma bgrod par ni srid par 'khyams// dus bzhi 'char ba'i b+ha ga la//
231a2(ya): skye 'gag med pa'i klong du thim// srid pa gsum gyis sku brgyan cing // spyi dpal mchog la 'di skad gsungs// hUM/ ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med
231a3(ya): khrag 'byung dpal gyi dpal// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' glong kun gyi gter gyi dbyibs// mkha' klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// skye 'gro kun
231a4(ya): gyi thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dam skong // bcom ldan bde ba'i lam mchog 'di// 'dzum ma dngas bcas pas 'bul lags kyis// dgyes
231a5(ya): pa'i rdo rje gsor nas kyang // re skong bdud rtsi'i char chen phog/ mnyam bzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// 'byung gnas skye 'gro bde bar dbag// rin chen dkyil
231a6(ya): 'jam klong yangs su// sbyid pa la rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ re skong bdud rtsi char chen pho ba// hU/ b+ha ga pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dab brgyad pad+ma'i dkyil
231a7(ya): 'khor ldan// phyi lkugs nang bstan sgo bar bcas// rin chen dkyil 'jam gdan bting nas// bla med rdzu 'phrul lde mig gis// lcags khrol lcags phye gdan la
231b1(ya): bzhugs// rin chen brtsegs pa'i ga'u ru// bla med khrag 'thung sku bsil nas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bag chags bkrus// hU/ mi dmigs pa la dmigs
231b2(ya): pa che// ma chags pa la bde ba che// thar pa bde ba'i b+ha ga'o dbyings// blang dor med pa'i klong yangs su// srid pa'i bag chags bkru ba'i phyir// sbyi dpal rma
231b3(ya): na med pa yi// gsang ba'i blo ldan lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// ye shes chu bo khrus chen mdzod// o/ thabs la sa byung ba dbyings kyi lam
231b4(ya): dbyings las thabs chen bla na med// dbyings dang ye shes sbyor ba las// bdud rtsi chen po'i cher chen spro// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes por mchod// rnal
231b5(ya): 'byor mkha' 'gro tshogs su spro// 'gro drug sgrib sbyong phyag rgya che// mu stegs bdud 'dul za byed che// dbang po gsal byed ye shes sgron// 'dod chags
231b6(ya): byang chub sems su spro// byang chub sems kyi thog le la sa// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas na// thams cad thig le nyid kyi ngang //
231b7(ya): gnyis med sbyor ba'i thig le che// b+his mu dzuH/ jal ra ba haM/ tshigasan ti ha/ b+hi yang mai te ha/ ma sngal teha/ oM 'tha bo d+hi shwa
232a1(ya): ga bang+ga pa hUM hU/ oM badz+ra shAn+d+he pat+ma ka ru tits+tsha/ oM mu dzI ni b+h+yo/ a shan dzi nad+d+ho/ b+hU gdun d+ha nab+h+yo/ 'amun dan rjenar+dz+dza
232a2(ya): oM badz+ra sur+ya bi to ya to yaM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma b+hi to a to ya/ oM badz+ra kha ra ga b+hI to a to ma/ oM badz+ra sringa'agr-i bai to a ta yaM/ oM badz+ra a kau a ke b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra
232a3(ya): ta ka ta ke b+h+yoHoM badz+ra ni la ni la b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra lan+ta lan+ta b+h+yoHoM badz+ra zang 'bram mu rang shang/ badz+ra kha ra ka snying kha ra ka b+h+yoHtrag rag+ma tra ga ragrA b+h+yo/ tra ga
232a4(ya): mun dza rakr-i sha trag rag sha sun+na ma la mun tra b+ha rak+Sha/ pra ga ta sti b+ha b+h+yo/ za b+hi wang g+hi shaM b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hUM ka ri ka/ ba ro da da ro// ni la chu mi ta/ kha g+ho 2/
232a5(ya): da la tsa la/ pad+ma tsan+na/ ma gu ra ga to/ ting paM ting paM b+h+yo/ i a ra li/ bu byi ru li ru la b+h+yo/ tra ga rak+Sha tra ga rakrA b+h+yo/ a ting b+h+yo/ sbyi ting b+h+yo
232a6(ya): s+phun ting b+h+yo/ mun ting b+h+yo/ shan ting b+h+yo/ dun tidza / ha ra ting b+h+yo/ grub ting r+g+ho/ te par b+h+yo a pa ra d+ha la b+h+yo/ d+ha la du na b+h+yo/ d+ha na ma ma ya
232a7(ya): nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhan dang sbyar// gnyis med sbyor ba'i thig le che// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// 'byung ba lnga yi'i phro 'du byung // bdag gi sa yi ngo bo
232b1(ya): las/ sa bon las ni sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bstan ma sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'jigs pa yi dbu gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgo' byed cing //
232b2(ya): pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// dngas ma'i sbyin pa rtag tu gtong // mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dngas pa'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi/
232b3(ya): zhab sa dag gis// sa bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yis// sa bon las ni skar bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro yang gsal
232b4(ya): sems ma'i mchog/ thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum thig ler sgom byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po
232b5(ya): rtag tu gtong // sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ldang khu bai DUR+Ya// zhab sa bzhi brkyang bskum gnod sbyin gnon// bdag gi tshulas sku ba skyed
232b6(ya): pa/ mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ dbu gsum dug gsum dbyings su 'dus// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya 'gyed// dmar mo dbang gi na
232b7(ya): bzas brgyan// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum chu bdag gnon// bdag gi me las sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro 'od gsal sems ma'i mchog/ stobs
233a1(ya): ldan dbu gsum srid gsum sbyor// phyag drug dang sa ma'i longs spyod 'gyed// rin chen sngon mo'i na bza' brgyan// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum
233a2(ya): gshin rje gnon// bdag gi bkrag las sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ rdo rje dbu gsum skye 'gro sgrol// phyag drug sku mdog sna
233a3(ya): tshogs la// btsom gser gyi na bza' gsol// zhalas bzhi brgya byin gdan la bzhugs// bdag gi gsang ba'i thig le las// hUM dang mu la sa sku bskyed pa// gtso
233a4(ya): bobi gdan du 'khor rnams rtsal// snying rtsa dbu ma'i tshe 'phral yin// g.yas g.yon gser gyi 'od chen las// bde 'gro nyi zla thod 'phreng gnyis// snying rtsa phyogs
233a5(ya): bzhi'i dang sa ma las// gsang ba sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// nang gi rtsa bzhi kha dog bzhi// khros ma bzhi dang dge sde bzhi// lte ba po yi rtsa las ni// srid pa
233a6(ya): cha byed cha snyoms bskyed// rgyubs pa gnod kyi rtsa drug las// e ka dza Ti spun drug bskyed// srog rtswa zangs kyi sbu gu las// re ma ti ni ma chad gsu mu byung // bzhang
233a7(ya): kha rlung 'dom rtsa gnyis las// nam mkha'i rgyal dang spyi 'gro ma// mgrin pa dbang po'i rtsa bdun las/ las kyi srin mo mdun du bskyed// lag pa g.yos g.yon stong
233b1(ya): rtsa bzhi/ sring mo bzhi ru bskyed pa'o// smad rtsa la ni dmag gi rgyal// rmyangs pa smad kyi rtsa las ni// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// rang gi gnas la bskyed par
233b2(ya): bya// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// srid pa'i sngon du byung ba yin// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo lnga// sangs rgyas nyid pas shin tu bsgres// bskyed pa'i rje mo bcu
233b3(ya): bzhi ni// pha dang ma med spun bcu gsum// ma mo mkha' 'gro lnga bcu lnga// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// rol pa'i khyad par ci ro yang snang // bdag
233b4(ya): nyid che ba rab tu bsgom// ye shes thig le chen po dang // gsang chen bde ba'i lom mchog dang // man ngag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// ngabyings kyi
233b5(ya): yum chen drug po ni// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// 'od chen kha dog sna tshogs kyis// srid pa bde 'gro chen mo dang // nyi zla thod 'phreng gdan du
233b6(ya): gding / khros pa'i dbang can ma mo bzhi// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// srid pa'i dngas ma brgyad po las// sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi po dang //
233b7(ya): thugs kyi dge sde ma bzhi rnams// mngon sum gdan du gdi nga bar bya// bod chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// srid pa chags byed cha snyoms mnan//
234a1(ya): srid pa rang lugs sdug ma yis// a ka dza ti spun drug mnan// chags pa'i dbang can dmar mo yis// 'dod khams gtso mo spun
234a2(ya): gnyis ma nan// srid pa spyi yi mdo rgyud kyi sa// nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis mnan// dbang po spyi yi mdo gsal gyis// 'jig rten srin mo bdun rnams
234a3(ya): man na// g.ya sa g.yoni thabs dang shes rab kyis// dmag gi rgyal mo spun bzhi mnan// srid po 'jug byed phra mo yis// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad mnan//
234a4(ya): rtsa dang lus la gnas pa de// shis bstan phyir gdan du bting // lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas stong nas drangs// drag po'i sngags kyi sa mnan par bya// hUM mu
234a5(ya): kha le ha ha he he hU phaT na na/ kro d+hi shA ri b+ha ga shan tri na na/ sur+ya pad+ma kha ra ga sring 'gro nan/ mu tri sha na tri dan tri du na tri na na/ ta kaM ta ko ni la ta na tra na na/ ma ma hU~M
234a6(ya): b+h+yon na/ ma maM duSh+TAn/ pad+ma ra// pra be sha naH/ nan phaT/ mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i rtsa gnas la// cha mthun ma mo rnams brdzus te// tsi ta nan/
234a7(ya): Taces pa'i dreg sngags brjod pa yis// tshe mchog sngags kyi he ru ka'i// ral gri rtsa lam nang du zhugs// rtsa yul gnas pa'i ma mo yi// snying
234b1(ya): gshegs khrag chen mngon rdzogs kyi// ljags kyi steng du phul ba yis// mngon rdzogs mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur// ma mo rnam pa ni myos shing 'gribs//
234b2(ya): bdag gi snying khrag zhal du rdug/ lce stengs bzhag pa phyi rol yin// che ba'i nga rgyal 'di skad bskyed// hU tang ni khrig 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni ma mo kun gyi
234b3(ya): yab/ nga ni srid gsum snying rje'i mchog/ nga ni mkha' 'gro kun gyi gtso// thams cad kun gyi snying khrag ba dag/ khyed kyi snying khrag nga la yod// nga
234b4(ya): dbang du gyur par gyis// dza hU ti baM ma ma b+h+yo ma ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ra ka mo b+h+yo/ gdan gyi sku rnams bsgyel nas ni// bdud rtsi chen po khar blugs te// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta
234b5(ya): tsit+ta hU/ de nas gdan las blang bya ste// sgrub pa'i las rnams byed par bsgom// rang lus rtswa yi dkyil 'khor la// ma mo las kyi shi sa bstan//
234b6(ya): / de na sa ma mo thams cad kun// 'jig rten snang ba'i lugs bshad pa// nam mkha' stong pa'i yi ge l+la// ma b+h+ring nag gru gsum yi ge e// ldang nag 'a
234b7(ya): ba'i sa bon las// rdo rje rgya gram dkyil 'khor bskyed// chags pa dbang gi sa bon las// rba glong 'khrug pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// thugs rje 'bar ba'i sa
235a1(ya): khon las// sreg byed 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// snyoms mdzad byams pa'i sa bon las// rab 'jam gdal ba'i gzhi ru chags//
235a2(ya): zhe sdang rol pa'i sa bon las// ri rab brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor snang ngo // yon tan 'bar ba'i sa bon las// khong seng srog gi ljon shing bskyed// e baM ma
235a3(ya): ya'i sa bon las// gling bzhi gling phran rim pa bzhin// yon tan gser gyi ri bdun dang // snying rje rol pa'i mtsho bdun ldan// sprul pa las kyi mkha' 'gro ma/
235a4(ya): ridra ba de la bskor te gnas// nyi zla gza' dang skar ma rnams// ri ra ba de la bskor zhing rgyu// ri rab g.yu yi bum rtse la// 'khor 'das chos dbyings rgyal mo ste/
235a5(ya): mangs pa kun sgrol tsi d+ha brkyang // yum gyi zhabs brgyad bzad pas brdzis// dpag bsam shing dang 'dab shing la// a 'bras skyong gi sgo lnga gA
235a6(ya): shing lo pad+ma lnga 'dra gnas// yum lnga sku yi byed nub bzhugs// ri rtse bum pa'i shing mtshams na// brgya byin rkang pa g.yas g.yon las// gser
235a7(ya): gdugs nyi zla'i 'phreng bas bskor// de stengs rgya mtsho thod 'greng bzhugs// ri rab bum pa'i lcog bzhi la// 'bring gau ri ti'i pho mtshan te// sgo gnas bzhi yi
235b1(ya): cho 'phrul las// khros pa'i dbang chen bu mo bzhi// brkyang bskum zur gyi stabs kyis bzhugs// ri rab lcog bzhi'i phyi rol na// khyab 'jug 'khor lo'i lte ba
235b2(ya): la/ bdud rtsi chu mig bzhi skyes pa// rgyal chen bzhi dang dag sde bzhi// khrus byed phyed nu ba tsam du bzhugs// ri rab bum pa'i gra bzhi na// stobs bzang
235b3(ya): ser skya'i snying kha nas// sbas pa'i mtshan bzhi po ni// gan kyal gnas te bdud rtsi sku// rje mo 'jig rten snang lugs yin// dpag bsam zhing gi rked pa
235b4(ya): la/ phywa mkhan pho bar chags byed dang // cha snyom sa gnyis ni stobs sbyor gnas// dpag ba sa ma shing gi rtsa ba na// ka la ya ga sha o ga mtsham sa na//
235b5(ya): nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis bzhengs// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo la// tshangs pa dkar po'i lag pa la// dza ti spun gnyis ma nyam bzhag sdod// ri rab
235b6(ya): rmang gi 'gram bzhi la// sa bdag pha ga gi lte bana?// gru 'deg sa bzhi ni gyad kyi tshul// ri bdun rol mtsho 'bar ba la// phung byed klu bdun nor bu'i gnas//
235b7(ya): srin mo bdun ni lding thabs 'phyo// pad+ma shing gi sum chan// mgo med snying la bgegs kyi rigs// stong phrag brgyad cu'i cho 'phrul 'gyed// 'dod pa
236a1(ya): khams kyi gtso mo gsum// de steng brkyang bskum brjid pa'i tshul// phyi rim pang rim bzhi po la// rgyal chen bzhi yi spyi bo nas// pad+ma
236a2(ya): brgyad la sring bzhi dang // da mag dpon mo bzhi 'gying ba'i tshul// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// keng rus khros pa'i gdan stengs na// ri brag gru gsum 'bar
236a3(ya): ba la/ bka' sbed nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnas// mdor na ri ra ba rgya mtsho dang // gling bzhi'i lha yi gnas gzhan rnams// ma lus srid pa'i ma mo yi// rgyu dang lam
236a4(ya): dang 'bras bur snang // 'jig rten snang ba'i tshul bzhin no// de nas gsang ba gab pa'i gter// bdag nyid che mchog lus gnas pa'i// rkang pa rlung sogs
236a5(ya): 'khor lo bdun// lus kyi ljon shing rim pa la// yum drug rje mo dman mo dang // ye shes sbas pa'i ma mo sogs// brgyad cu rtsa gsum rtsa le rdzogs//
236a6(ya): gzhung lam srog rtsa ba sgril ma la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rtswa bgyu bas// bshang khwa rlung dang 'doms su med// gzhu dang drag po'i tshul du gnas// rgyal mo
236a7(ya): spu na gnyis g.yas g.yon rtsa// lte ba'i gzhi rtsa kha sprod la// srid po chags byed rgyal mo ga nas// pho nya dngas skegs 'byed rtsa la// thig la dang bcas nang du
236b1(ya): bskor// zas 'ju ba ni cha snyoms ma// lam brgyud lnga yi bag chags ni// sbyong byed snying gi 'khor lo la// rang gi sa bon 'phrin la sa bzhi// kun gzhi
236b2(ya): yid sgo nyon mongs lnga// a sogs sbyangs pa'i yon tan bdun// dbang po bzhi po mi dbang bzhi// rnam shes sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// ma bu sbyor ba'i tshul du
236b3(ya): gnas// snying khar 'khor 'das bskyed pa'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' 'gro ma// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rtsu yi rtsa// 'od ber rtse la rang bzhin gnas// mar
236b4(ya): rtse'i rtsa la mu kha le// gser mdung nyi ma'i 'od chen gnyis// 'phra men ma dang thod 'phreng gnas// nang gi 'od la dgyes sde bzhi// mgrin pa longs spyod cha
236b5(ya): snyoms ma// yan lag bdun gyi kha sprod dbus// srin mo bdun gyi bza' 'atung spyod// rang bzhin bcu drug kha sprod la// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce//
236b6(ya): za byed ma mo yul longs spyod// bde chen 'khor lo byang chub sems// tshangs pa'i gdung bzhi rgya gram bris// rtswa 'dab so gnyis kha sprod gnas// srin po'i
236b7(ya): gnyen po sbas ma bdun// srog rtswa rgyu byed bskyed pa le// snying rje pad+ma gar dbang gnyis// 'dod khams gtso gsum 'dud pa'i tshul// byang chub sems
237a1(ya): lam rtswa stod la// dza ti spun drug gnon pa'i tshul// rtsa smad mkha' 'gro nyi shu brgyad // yan lag bzhi la sring mo bzhi// smad la dmag
237a2(ya): gi rgyal mo bzhi// gsang bzhi tshul gnyis mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// chos kyi mkha' 'gro sna tshogs pa// snying nang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la// rtsa ba mi shigs
237a3(ya): rdo rje'i dbyibs// bye brag lnga yi 'od 'bar ba/ thogs med rtsa la 'byung lnga'i gtso// kun bzang las ni rgyal mo lnga// rig pa las ni dngas ma lnga// kun
237a4(ya): gzhi sems rtsa sgo lnga'i rtsa// gzhi rtsa 'dzin pa'i rtswa yin te// dug rdza mi lce lnga yi gats+tsha// ma reg pa yi rtsa ba las// 'gro ris sa bon lnga yi gtso// rig
237a5(ya): pa ma 'gags rtsa ba las// ye shes chen po'i rtse mo lnga// mngon rdzogs yab kyi rtsa ba las// rigs lnga'i bde chen rtse mor gsal// 'byung ba lnga ni
237a6(ya): srid pa'i bskos// rgyal mo lnga ni sprul par shar// gsang ba'i gter du dngas ma lnga// yon tan sgo lnga'i rnam shes yin// 'khor ba bskyed pa nyon mongs
237a7(ya): lnga// 'bras bu 'gro ba drug tu snang // 'dul byed gnyen po ye shes lnga// 'bras bu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// snying rtsa gcig la 'dab mi lnga/
237b1(ya): de yi rtse mo brgyad du sbyor// nyi zla kha sbyor zhal gyi dkyi la// hUM muM bcud kyi thig le gnas// yum drug rje mo bcu bzhi'i gnas// rang bzhin thig le 'od gsal
237b2(ya): ba/ ye shes yi nos khyab par gnas// dngas ma lnga las rgyal mo lnga// kha dog lnga la zhi 'od 'phreng // gser nyi phra me na rgya mtsho ste// shes rab snying rje'i
237b3(ya): bdag nyid ca na// rnam shes pazhi la ma bzhi sbas// khros pa'i bu mo 'od ri ma la// chos kyi 'khor lo nyi gu la 'o// ste nga 'og da kar dmar blab sa shes
237b4(ya): rab/ rta mgrin dbang gis sgo bsrung zhing // 'byung ba lnga zhig 'od du zhu// ma mo lnga bcus gsang dbang bskur// rnam shes lnga la ye shes lnga// dug
237b5(ya): lnga'i rtsa ba dbang gis bcad// 'gro ba lnga yi bag chags sbyangs// gsal ba'i ye shis kha dog ldan// pho brang rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dbu la
237b6(ya): 'dus pa'i yab yum rdzogs// mdun rgya ba gser gyi nyi ma lo// 'phra men ma dang thod 'phre nyid// 'joms byed bag chags gnas sbyangs pa// sbas ma
237b7(ya): bzhi 'khros ma bzhi// 'od 'phre dgas sde ma bzhi'i bang // mkha' 'gro nyi gu'i dkyil 'khor la// hUM sras drug gi longs spyod mdzad// dbang gi rgyal
238a1(ya): pos sgo bsrung zhing // rgyu gcig dbyings nas phyung nas ni// 'od zer sngags kyi 'phreng ba yis// snying phugs zhal nas sngags kyi 'od// bzhu
238a2(ya): bad+hal gyis ni thig ler 'gyur// thog ska rten la 'dil 'ju// rlu da'ajam gyi sku byung nas// thig la skye med dbyings su thim// bdag nyid la zla'i dran du
238a3(ya): 'di ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste// yon tan gab pa'i gter du bshad// bshad lugs 'di ldan rnal 'byor ni// ma mo thugs kyi dngos grub thog// des na snying gi lung
238a4(ya): zhes bya// de nyid las ni rnal 'byor pa// rnam par grol ba'i lu gas bshad pa// chos nyid ye shes rang byung dang // yon tan bzhi bsdus grub pa'i
238a5(ya): rtsu/ 'khor lo bdun dang rtsa ba'i thog/ rtsa brgyad stong dang 'khor lo brgyad// nyes po gnyis dang rdzogs pa'i lung // rims kyis bshad dang bye brag dbye//
238a6(ya): lta bsgom spyod 'bras 'khor 'das kyi// sa bon so so'i gnas su byung // 'khor 'das sa bon hUM ring spro// rtsa thig bzhi ldan dkyil 'khor na// thig le skye
238a7(ya): 'chi'i sdug brdzal spong // shri ma hA su ka badz+ra ba d+hi hUM ho/ 'bru gcig gtang spyod rnam bzhi li// sku gsung thugs su thag chod de// chags sdang nga rgyal thog/
238b1(ya): dog gi/ gnas bsgyur sgom bsgrub rnam pa las// gti mug chen po yang dag nyid// sku lnga mngon shar gsung lngar grags// thugs lnga yon tan 'phrin las lnga//
238b2(ya): rang gzhan kun gyis grub par snang // rang gzhan gnyis med ye shes dang // mngon rdzogs rgyal po che ba'i mchog/ dpa la 'bar yu ma dang gnyis su med//
238b3(ya): snang stong gnyis med ye shes la// chos kyi 'khor lo'i 'bru bcu po// sna tshogs rig pa'i cho 'phrul rten// gsang ba'i gdung bzhi dges sde bzhi//
238b4(ya): 'khor lo nang gi rtsa bzhi po// rang rig ye shes rgyal po la// sems can chen po lnga yi khri// sprul pa'i tshe 'phral kun gyis mchod// dpal ldeng gsang
238b5(ya): rdzogs bcu bcu bzhi// mi gnas bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan// 'dab brgyad dbus na rtse lnga pa// rgya gram phra bkod sa bon las// 'bru bcud den gyi
238b6(ya): 'phreng bar ldan// gnas 'dzin la pha ba 'od 'phro 'udus// 'bur bzhi mdzes pas thugs rgyud bskul// gtso chen de la gu la bzung // lam du bde ba rgyas
238b7(ya): par bya// 'od zer 'jig rten khams su spro// yul gnyis ma grub stong par gas la// 'od kyi 'khor lo gnas bzhi la// 'dab bzhi'i lte ba rdo rjer bcas//
239a1(ya): yab yum mtshon pa'i snying pos bskor// bod zer gnyis kyi sku rgyud bskul bas// 'khor ba'i sa phan so sor sbyang // 'dus pas rna
239a2(ya): tshogs gcig tu gyur// rlung dang lhan cig phyi rol 'phros// rang lus 'dzin pa'i snang ba sbyangs// snang la rang bzhin ma grub pa// dbyings kyi bum chen
239a3(ya): bco lnga ga// thugs 'od btsam gse rab bsdu// dngas ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kun// rig pa rtsal gyi thig ser bzhu// smin byed stobs dbyings
239a4(ya): ma la bsdu// rtsa ba'i mkha' 'gro bzhi bcu drug/ bsdu thabs le brgan 'bar bar bzhu// stobs kyis 'dzin pa'i ti la bsdu// hU~M chen 'bar bas ri rab
239a5(ya): bsregaso// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal// ma mo rdzogs pa gsum ldan pas// rten gyi gang zag rang rgyud 'grol// rnal 'byor thugs su
239a6(ya): gab pa grol// rnal 'byor grol lugs zhes su bshad// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ khro mo bzhi bcu rab cas pa yi// drag po'i thugs su bshad
239a7(ya): pa ni/ zhu brgyad pa yi dkyil 'khor du// a yi 'azo 'dus stong par sbyang // rdo rje phur bus bsrung bar bya/ byang chub sems kyis chag chag kad
239b1(ya): bsu ta li thig gdab cing // dbus su thig bzhi'i le tshe lnga// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs chen bzhi// rtsib sa re'i steng du rtsibs brgyad pa// rin po che yi phur ba
239b2(ya): rnams// rang rig 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod// phyi rol drag po sngags kyi rdzas// ji ltar bsngags pa bzhin du dgod// de nas stong pa'i ngang nyid las//
239b3(ya): snying rngu sprul pa'i ye shes shar// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi snying por gyur// la gzugs ya shas chen po ste// yaM dbyibs shes rab bdag nyid can// baM klong
239b4(ya): snying rje'i ngo bo ste// ra'abar brtson 'grus nyid du ldan// la mi bsam gtan gdal ba'i sa// ke ni zhe sdang 'joms mdzad brtsegs// b+hU la sa sna tshogs
239b5(ya): gzhal ya sa khang // oM ni gcod pa chen po la sa// pa las chags pa med pa 'byung // a ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid rgyu// me ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid
239b6(ya): rgyu/ ru ni 'joms pa'i yul du bsdogs// hU dang mu la sa ya ba yum gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga tang shri he ru ka hU phaT/ kro d+hi shwa ri sa ma ya hUM dza rnam
239b7(ya): the ra dbu ldan stong pa'i spyan// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang stong pa'i phyag/ dur khrod brgyad du ldan par bskyed// ya ba yu ma ga sang gnas byin brlabs nas//
240a1(ya): mkha' la gas ba'i sum bzhi bskyed// e tshe bzhis gsang ba'i bum// ba ra na/ 3/ dkar mo ka sa'i gnaHna// shArgya

240a3(ya): blamyA kyang // shar gyi 'kho ram rtsibs brgyad la// sbyi dpal bcu mi khro ba ste// 'jug ba kI la phaT/ dkar ba mi hU~M rgyal po shar// rat+nag
240a4(ya): 'jigs byed sbyin tshun 'dzin pa 'o// pad+mos ra ga 5Ta/ gar dab dmar po pad li nug/ ka mA ga rabA kI la sa laT/ gar mi da ljang su rgya
240a5(ya): byum dzA ki sa la phaT/ zlog 'di ser sna me ng+ga can// ka ru kA ba ki la s+ya phaT/ min pa 'jams kyirnam na ba dA+e sar// lak+Sha k+Shas pa

241a1(ya): du sha kI la ya/ gzi 'bar lhung skya gri gug can// 'di dag rim bzhin rtsibs mtshan la'o// ka sha phaT/ rta mgo lcags kyu dkar po

241a6(ya): yin+ma te mtshams bzhi ru// a pa ra dzi ta tiSh+Ta phaT/ 'dod rgyal ljang khu dra byug tho can// a mr-i ta phaT/ ba dung rtsi 'khyil ljang rgya gra ma can// tr-i
241a7(ya): li ge phaT/ khams gsum ldang skya sdig mdzub can// ma hA ba la phaT/ stobs chen du da kha gtun shing 'dzin// de dag bsgom zhing sgo bzhi ru//
241b1(ya): 'jigs byed khro bo bzhi bskyed pa// dza ya phaT/ dkar po khra mgo sder mo thogs// ka ru ra phaT/ skye ka'i mgo can sbrul 'dzi na sngo// rig na phaT
241b2(ya): bya rog mgo can du da ma r-i 'dzin// pra ka shu ga phaT/ pu shu da mgo can lha 'gri gug/ phyogs bzhi'i sgo bzhir rim par ba sa mA// byang gi phyogs kyi
241b3(ya): 'khor lo la// 'phrin las rdzogs pa'i khro bcu bskyed// lcogs bur la rten mkha' la gdon// badz+ra ta krita ki la ya phaT/ b+hi nu thal kha tir 'dzin//
241b4(ya): kha thun ra ka sha ka la phaT/ stobs bzang sngo nag glo gug 'dzin// he ma ra ti kI la ya phaT/ gzi ldan dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin// ru bi su tra ki la pha Tu/
241b5(ya): 'jig rten 'od sdom dpung can// ra ga sha saM tr-i ki la phaT/ stong gsum khyab byed dmar thod khrag/ he he kha rag ki la ya phaT/ hUM sgra dud kha ru du byug 'dzin
241b6(ya): dA dur b+hU ti ki la ye phaT/ shugs sgrol ldang nag lhung khrung 'dzin+da// hU~M ba~M su ki sa la phaT/ skur mda'i gdong ser gyu khwa 'dzin// gang ba ki la la siT/
241b7(ya): glog zin sna tshogs mdzeg 'jab thogs// rigs sha gro Sh+Na ka ya li phaT/ mdapag 'grog rdzo sangs rlung lab thogs// ra sha phaT/ 'jigs rkyen
242a1(ya): dri za dkar stong gsum// gar rtse laT/ stong gsum grags gnag lcags mdung thogs// ru se phaT/ khrag gi mtsho skems dmar lcags sgrog/

242a3(ya): byin brlab// mchod pa gsum stabs mnyes pa'o// o shr-i he ru ka kr-i d+hi shwa ri sa ma ya/ badz+ra ki la ya hU phaT/ yab yum bsnyen pas gsang ba yi// ma mo bzhi bskul
242a4(ya): yum bzhi yis// 'khor lo bcu tshan sum cu gnyis// de yis khrag 'thung lha rnams bskul// so so'i 'phro 'dus 'gro don mdzad// khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag bzhi//
242a5(ya): 'bum phrag bzhi yis so sor bzlas// bsnyen rdzogs bsgrub pa'i las chen ni// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i lte ba la// ling kha nub tu kha blta sa la// tshon skud gsum gyis

243a1(ya): hUM hU/ badz+ra shan+ti pad+ma ka ru ting b+h+yo/ oM ma tr-i ni/ a sha na tr-i ni/ b+ha ga dan tr-i ni/ ka mun dun traM ni/ badz+ra sur+ya bi to ma to le/ badz+ra kha ra ka bi yo tom

243a6(ya): be dz+yo/ kau ma ri b+h+yo/ in+ta ma b+h+yo/ bing ka la b+h+ya/ amr-i ti b+h+yo/ sa Tu n+ya b+h+yo/ d+ha na d+ha ha b+h+yo/ ra kaM sha si b+h+yo/ bag sha si N+yo/ ra ti badz+ra dz+yaM/ ru ti re ma tau b+h+yAM/ e ka dzor b+h+yo/ man
243a7(ya): ha ra d+h+ya/ si ti ka b+h+yo/ ba la be b+h+yo/ ma ran b+h+yo/ a ga ne ma b+h+yo/ ba ra ti dz+yo/ tsa mun ti b+h+yo/ pra ta na b+h+yo/ ba run b+h+yo/ ma hA ka la b+h+yo/ kun pa ka la ma b+h+yo/ ma bo d+ha ra ma b+h+yo /
243b1(ya): de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sku gsum pa de chen ngang nyid las// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gzugs su bstan// 'jig rten rdegs pa 'dul ba'i
243b2(ya): phyir/ stong phrag brgyad cu'i rgyud kyi sde// khyad par sprul pa'i sde brgyad la// lha klu ma mo gshin n+d+he btsan// bdud dang rgyal po gnon sbyin gza'// dbye dang spro dang bsdu la la

244a1(ya): nub tu dbang gi sbyin sreg bya// gdeng chen khro bcu sa so'i sngags// gcod dang phab pa'i sngags kyis brgyan// ra spring nang du lkugs phyes bra ba/

249b4(ya): bsgrub ting 'dzin nus pa ldan// lhag sems bzang zhing las mjug btul// dam gA dpung che zhing dmigs pa drag/ gtsang zhing brtul zhugs che bas the bas//
249b5(ya): gang gis gang la de migs pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma mthong // kun gyis bstod cing dbang bskur dang // phyag dang bsnyen bkur gus pa byed//
249b6(ya): spro zhing rlom pa'i dpa' ga dang ldan// 'di ni 'phrin las nus pa'i rtags// mkhan po rlob dpon rgyal po dang // rje dpon la sogs gong mar 'gyur//
249b7(ya): nye yang dbang dum 'dus rtags// spun grogs pa tshan mnyam gnyis dag/ mnyes nas las byed rung ba'i rtags// zan 'bangs lal g.yog bu tshar byung //
250a1(ya): bkol zhing rbad pas chog pa'i rtag sa// gang yang rung ste bka' nyan tshogs// las byed tshul du byung ba ni// rbad pa'i las sbyor bya
250a2(ya): yin// dmag 'dren sgyogs 'cha' las la 'dzud// da ra' phyar du nga'abung rol mormas// dbu che dag gis grogs byed na// rbad pa las la chud pa'i
250a3(ya): rtags// gsod cing long dzag 'gyed pa dang // shing gcod brag ga sho ga mkhar sgyel dang // mes bsreg chus 'khrud sa sa gnon dang // rlung gis khyer
250a4(ya): dang rang bzhin zhig/ gsad pa'i las kyi don 'grub rtags// sha za khrag 'thung ston mo za// ba sha sa dang longs spyod byed la sogs// don grub gsad las
250a5(ya): zin pa'i rtags// rtog pa thugs rjes bsgral ba dang // zhe sdang nus pas bsgral ba dang // man ngag thabs kyis bsgral ba las// bye brag thun mong khyad par
250a6(ya): ngadag/ so so'i 'thun tshogs man ngag bzhin// bsnyen bsgrub rba da gsad las sbyor la// sbyor dngos rjes kyi bya ba dag/ thog ma bar dang tha ma'i bar//
250a7(ya): rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ 'brel zhing tshang la brtson pas spyad// las 'jug mnan cing gtad pa las// bsnyen bzla ba gnas lugs skye gan sa dang //
250b1(ya): las khung rang gnas gnad 'gro la dang // spyi dang phyi yi skya gcod bya// tshad dang khu gas dang bsti ma dang bcad// kun la man ngag rig ldan bya// gnyen po dngos gzhi
250b2(ya): sgrub pa dang // dril dang dbye dang ga nad bkrol dang // dril dang 'phang ba rgud pa dang // thibs dang gzer dang mtho' la gtad// gzhug dang dkyil dang rjes gcad
250b3(ya): pas// dbabs gnas su bstim par bya// chos nyid bden pa'i lta ba dang // ting 'dzin dmigs pa sal sgom pa dang // dpa' bo brtul zhugs spyod pa dang //
250b4(ya): rab gsang sngags kyi drag shul dang // 'thad rigs bden pa'i tshig stobs dang // rang gshed thabs kyi yon tan dang // bsod nams tshogs kyi dpung bskyed dang /
250b5(ya): gnyen po stobs la sogs pas bzlog/ bsrung bar bya ba'ang de bzhin no// lus gnas dang ni bdag so gnyer// dus rdzas thabs pang rdzas gcad dang // bsrung
250b6(ya): dang nus pa rdzogs pa sa margan// thabs shing rdzas dang sngags dus lha// ting 'dzin ldan pa sa ba sreg par bya// bsha ma dang sgrub dang gshe ba dang //
250b7(ya): phyogs dus ma nor lam bye bas// dbang gzugs mkhyen gsol ldan pa sa 'phang // gzhi gnas spo'am gsar rnying bsgrub/ bsnyen pa basbyar dang drag sngags dar+tha
251a1(ya): rdzas kyis bdug dang shis bskrun// nyams pa gso zhing bkang ba dang // dag krol lnga bye bsnyen bsgrub dang // las sbyor lan gsum
251a2(ya): bsgyur bas spogs// mdo ra ma ma grub bar du ni// brnag cing bsgrub pa man ngag gnang // rang bzhin 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// rang bzhin snang ba rtogs pa ste//
251a3(ya): sde brgyad la sogs lha dang srin// ma lus rang gi sems snang bas// gzhan nas grub pa yod ma myong / sems kyang rtog pa tsam nyid las// dbyi bas dang kha don
251a4(ya): dngos po dang // mtshan ma'i rtsa ba yongs ma grug// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong // de nyid kyang ni des stong ste// mi stong cung zad yod ma yin// stong pa chen po
251a5(ya): chos kyi sku// spros pa'i mtha' 'dzin rung nas spangs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs snying po// 'di nyid ngang la gang gnas pa// 'jig rten dregs pa
251a6(ya): dbang du sbyar// rtsa ba'i 'di yin yan lag gzhan// kun gyis 'di la blta bya zhing // bsgom dang rab tu spyad par bya// gtso bor sangs rgyas bstan la dmigs
251a7(ya): rang sems dpa' dang bde ldan pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs su spyad// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung sbyor ba// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub gzhi// ting 'dzin
251b1(ya): 'phro 'du gsal ba yis// mngon gsum 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub// man ngag the tshom spyad pa yis// 'jig rten rtog pa ngan pa bzlog/ lus sems bde la 'khor
251b2(ya): g.yog pas// rang bzhin rten 'brel rdzas kyis 'grub// baicwol bskul dam bdar chad pa'i grogs// bla srog gis ni dbang med 'gro// bla rtags kyis ni dus
251b3(ya): mi 'gyur// sgrub 'phel dben gnas yo byad yin// yon tan yin te sbyin rnams kyang // bsnyen sgrub tshul mthar ma phyin pas// dregs pa rang la ldog par 'gyur//
251b4(ya): gsang sbyor mi nus dus las g.yol// rten rdzas med la rten mi 'du// pha rol mtshan rtags ma shes pas// dus min phyul bar 'gyur ba yin// gnad la
251b5(ya): ma pheb so las mi byed// dka' ba ma spyad the tshom skyes// gzhan la bsgrags pas 'khor la gnod// bsrung sdom mi ldan don med spyod// bas ma ngan gdug pas
251b6(ya): ngarka'agror khrid// nyon mongs zhe sdang drag po yis// gnyen po sa ma bsgyur ru trar skye// las rim 'chol pa sa rang la ldog/ rkyong pa ya bral sgrub pa yis//
251b7(ya): gnod pa skyed cing las mi 'grub// mkhas par ma sbyangs dmus long 'gro// sngags sdebs med pas lid spyod do// sngar myong med na the tshom yin// de bas grub
252a1(ya): rtags ldog rtags dang // rang gnod gzhan gnod rtags rnams kun// ma nor ma 'khrul gtan la dbab// rlung chub chu chen gshin rje rbad//
252a2(ya): mi dang dud 'gro nag po'i tshogs// las kyi ru tra byung dang 'gro// mtshogs ma mo'i rtag sa yin te// tho ga ser cho 'phrul gnod sbyin no// mgo gtug mi mangs gnon
252a3(ya): sbyin te// mtsho rdzing nya sbrul sbal ldong kru// bya khyin ga tshogs bdud 'gong tshogs// po rigs dmag dpon srog bdag gying // gtsug lag khang rnying rje dang bcas
252a4(ya): rgyal po dang ni skor bdag rnams// mirta zhig gon dar 'phyar ga/ lha btsan byung zhing 'gro ba'i rtags// mtshon cha sgyogs dang 'ur rdo sogs// las kyi srin po mon
252a5(ya): pa'i rtags// ri dwags gcan gzan las gshin rje// kun tshogs pa ni kun gyi rtags// mkhas pas dbye ba sa la rbad sogs bya// ngan pa'i rtags
252a6(ya): byung rang rang gi/ gnyen po'i stobs kyis myur du gzhos// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor spyad// ma mos thun zor las kun spyad// gza' lcam ma sangs
252a7(ya): tshu ro ma 'bab// klu la las 'jug gtad par bya// gnod sbyin gyis ni yo byad spel// lha yi 'khor gyis rtsal drag ste// rgyal po blo bur myo 'bog tu//
252b1(ya): ging zhes bya ba myur mgyogs te// dgra lhar bcas pas cho 'phrul gtong // gshin rje mon pas bla srog rku// gang 'phran bstod pas rdzas mi 'byor// de dag la
252b2(ya): sogs lha srin gyi// bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pas// las gnyer lha tshogs so sor sgrub// rang gi rigs dang las kyi gnyer// ma shes blo bur sbyar mi bya//
252b3(ya): dngos grub kun 'byung log par 'gyur// de bas rdo rje 'dzin gyi bka'// ma nor ma 'khrul legs spyad de// brtson 'grus drag po sa bsgrub par bya// phyi ltar
252b4(ya): 'jig rten dregs pa can// nang du sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// gsang spyod chos sku'i yon tan gyis// 'phrin las sna tshogs grub pa'i// snang ba'i 'dzin pa
252b5(ya): bde gshegs sku// sgra yi rnam rtog de yi gsung // dran rig de ni dam pa'i thugs// tha dad dbye ba yod ma yin// zhes pa'i tshig gi skud pa ni//
252b6(ya): 'jig rten gnas pa'i dregs pa can// sgrub pa kha skong tshul bkod pa'o// de bas ma 'o sa phyi ma'i dus// lnga brgya pa yi skrigs ma la//
252b7(ya): bstan pa mdo sde spyod pa'i dus// u rgyan yul du skyes pa'i sras// lag na rdo rje 'byung gnas ni// tshig dang yi ger ston byed cing // byin gyis brlabs
253a1(ya): hU~Ms rgyu dad// de nas rim pa'i rgyul stan pas// dge slong rda rje 'dzin pa // shAk+Shu nas sgrubs// sgyu lus la
253a2(ya): b+h+yas te// sha ma rje la'i sprul dag tu// rang byung gaN+DIg lege byung chen du// 'ang me pal 'khor dang bcos la ston// de dag rang rig sas
253a3(ya): mos pa'i rnam grangs spyod pa'o// 'bras bu thun mong mchog tu 'dzin// spyi dus rgyal po rgyud kyi mchog/ lung dang rtsa ba yan lag bcas// 'jam
253a4(ya): dbyangs skyes mtha'i rig pa 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan don spyod// sa lam rim pa rdzogs la snang // de nas sprul pa bye brag brgya//
253a5(ya): 'dzam bu gling rnams bye brag brgyar// las dang bsam pa byed pa dang // khams dang rigs 'thun kho na ste// tshul gcig dag gi sbyor ba yis// ldan/
253a6(ya): lag byin gyis brlab pa dag/ 'thun 'jug tha bas kyi 'gro dano spyod// brgyud pa'i dbang dang dngos dag gis// 'dri don rtogs shing spyod pa yin// de
253a7(ya): yi dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu chen po'i gzugs can rnams// phyi rom pa yi chos 'thun pa// rtog ge ngan pa'i tshig smrabs// 'dil phyir rgos rgya
253b1(ya): byed de// ngal lha sbyin rgol dang mtshungs// glags rnyed gyur pa ma yin to// mos spyod don gyi dbang dag gis// rnam par rtog pa gzhis rna la// tha snyad yi ge so sor ston//
253b2(ya): don mthar thug la skyon dang bral// kha cig rnam rtog ngan pas bslus// log pa'i snang bas skad gyur kyang // nyes pa'i lam la dbang ba'i dus// dang nga zhing gnod
253b3(ya): 'gyod yid dag gis// sems dang ldan pa sa 'jug byed pa// dka' thub mthar phyin la sogs 'byung // de lta ba sa na rgyud chen 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis
253b4(ya): bshad pas// bsam gyis mi khyab bsdur mi nus// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// rnal 'byor rnams kyi don sgrub phyir// bsdus pa'i tshul gyis bstan
253b5(ya): par bya// zhes pa'i tshig gi skad pa ni// 'jig rten gnas pa'i dregs pa can// sgrub pa kha skong tshul du bshad// ces bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
253b6(ya): pa thams cad kyis/ byin gyis brlabs kyi cho 'phrul rnam par bkod pa rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag nyid kyi sku la bsdus te/ snod bcud kyi sems can thams cad
253b7(ya): kyi snang ba nus pa'i nang gau dbang po'i bdag nyid can du bzhag par gyur to// rnam pa dang rang bzhin du grags pa'i dngos po thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan la gnas
254a1(ya): par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad he ru ka chen po thugs kyi rig pa chen po'i yon tan dpag tu
254a2(ya): med pa'i don sngar bshad pa las/ ma tshang ba kha bskang ba'i le'u rnam par bshad pa'o// / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i spyi rgyud las
254a3(ya): ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung ga na sa dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba bdag bai ro tsa nas desgyur cing
254a4(ya): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla pa'o// gter rgya swas rgyagatad rgya'o// / rdo rje 'chang la phyag
254a5(ya): 'tshal lo// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta shAn+ti ma hA san du mU la tan trA nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs bzhi pa thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba
254a6(ya): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes rang byung gi rgyal
254a7(ya): po nyid/ gsang ba ma bcos pa'i thig le chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang la rnal te bzhugs so// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mo de nyi de rtsa ba byang
254b1(ya): chub sems kyis 'gro ba thams cad thugs rje'i chus brlan par mdzad de/ dpal kun tu bzang po la thugs rje'i rol pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i glus bskul lo// de nas bcom
254b2(ya): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la rnal ba las/ byams pa chen po'i thugs rjes sad par mdzad de yul sems can la rab tu dmigs pa dang /
254b3(ya): lam la dmigs pa dang / kun tu dmigs pa med pa dang / stong pa chen po la sa rab tu skyes pa'i rtsal ma 'gags pa las byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa brjod pa thams
254b4(ya): cad las 'das pa chos kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yi ge a zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur na sa/ skye ba med pa las sgra 'di phyung ngo // e ma ho chos nyid brdal ba'i klong // e
254b5(ya): ma ho snying rje rgyun chad med// e ma ho gsal ba'i yig 'bru shar// e ma he yon tan dpag tu med// e ya bi la ra bru/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ye
254b6(ya): nas ma bcos rdzogs sangs rgyas// snod bcud rnam rtog gis brtags pa// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya che// nam mkha' rlung chus dang me// gdod nas
254b7(ya): rnam dag yum lnga'i mkha'// ngo mtshar gzhal med sna tshogs pa// dag pa'i ye shes gzhal med khang // gdan khri 'od kyi snang ba rnams// zhi ba rol pa'i ga na mchog
255a1(ya): dag pa chen po'i 'jig rten las// ma dag pa ni yod ma yin// ma rig 'khrul pa'i bag chags las// ma dag pa yi khams su snang // yum
255a2(ya): lnga'i mkha' klong dag pa las// ye shes 'byung chen rnam lnga ste// ye shes lnga las gzhal yas 'od // rtogs pa can gyis shes par bya// zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ba dang /
255a3(ya): snang grags kyi dngos po thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur ma bcos lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'i phyir// 'di ltar snod du snang ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs
255a4(ya): pa'i zhi ba ba mas su byin gyis brlabs so// de yang 'u byung ba rnam par dag pa nam mkha' yongs su dngas pa'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings
255a5(ya): kyi dbang phyug ma'i mkha' klong/ ye shes chen po'i nam mkhar lhun gyis grub par bstan no// de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni sgrol ma'i mkha'
255a6(ya): glong rnam par dag par bstan no// chu'i dkyil 'khor ni mA ma kI'i mkha' klo nga rnam par dag pa'o// sa'i dkyil 'khor ni sangs rgyas spyan ma'i mkha'
255a7(ya): glong rnam par dag pa'o// me'i dkyil 'khor ni gos dkar mo'i mkha' glong rnam par dag po'o// 'di ltar na nga gi gzhal med khang rnam par dag
255b1(ya): pa gdan dang bcas pa/ yum thams cad kyi mkha' klong rnam par dag pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'dus pa ni/ lha'i gzhal yas khanga'ajig
255b2(ya): rten pa'i yon tan las 'das pa ste/ shar phyogs ni shel gyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ lho phyogs ni gser gyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ nub phyogs
255b3(ya): ni paR+Ya rA ga'i rang bzhin la sa grub pa/ byang phyog sa ni in dra ni la'i rang bzhin las grub pa/ dbus kyi cha ni rin po ni sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin las
255b4(ya): grub pa'i ye shes kyi sa gzhi yo ngas su dag pa'o// de'i rtsig par snang ba ya ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin// thams cad kyi rang bzhin mu tig dang
255b5(ya): shal da / ga ser dang / pad+ma ra ga dang / in+d+ra ni la'i 'od du 'phro ba/ 'od zer gyi snang ba sa rtsig pa'i gzhal ya sa khang rdo rje 'khor lo rab tu
255b6(ya): spras pa/ gru chad dang blo 'bur du bcas pa/ rdo rje'i ka ba se brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis smras pa/ dril bu dang / za ra tshags dang / rin po che
255b7(ya): pha gu'i rtsig pa dang / dar gyi lda ldis brgyan pa// yid las byung ba'i mchod pa chen po dang / rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa phul ga rta babs kyi rgyan chen po bzhi
256a1(ya): dang bcas pa// ye shes kyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ rdo rje'i thog phub pa/ zag pa med pa'i phubs chen po gtibs shing / yid bzhin gyi
256a2(ya): nor bu rin po che'i tog 'bar ba dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas 'jig rten pa'i gdan khri'i rtog pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ pho brang gi dbus su lam
256a3(ya): las sang ge'i gdan dang / shar du haM las glang po tsho'i gdan da / lhor g+ha las rta'i gdan dang / nub tu mi las rma bya'i gdan dang / byung du khaM los shang shang gi gdan dang / de dag
256a4(ya): gi steng rnams dang / phyogs dang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu dang grwa rnams su/ skyon rnam par dag pa'i rtags su paM pad+mo'i gdan dang / nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel
256a5(ya): ba'i rtags su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan dang / thugs rje chen pos rjes su bsil bar mdzad pa'i rtogs su zla ba'i ga dan rnams bkod cing sprul te byin gyis
256a6(ya): brlabs so// de nas dbyings kyi yu ma kun tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos dbyings rnam dag ye nas rdzogs pa la// 'gro bo'i don
256a7(ya): phyir cho 'phrul skur brtan pa// 'jig rten snod kyi rnam par rtog pa kun// ye nas dag pa'i gzhal yos khang chen te// me bcos lhan rdzogs lha rnams
256b1(ya): bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam dag gdan dang bcas pa ngang gis gsal// che ba'i tshe mchog dpal chen kun tu bzang // gnyis med rol pa'i lha yi cho 'phrul
256b2(ya): ston/ snang srid chos la snod med gzhal yas nyid// rang byung chen po'i gzhal yas dag pa 'dir// bcud kyi sems can mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i sku// gzugs
256b3(ya): sku zhi ba'i rol pas gang bar mdzod// ces gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang bstan pa'i le'u sku
256b4(ya): dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa la kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzugs brnyan gyi rol pa rnam par dag pa ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
256b5(ya): la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas de ma blag tu snying rje chen po skye ba med pa las byung ba'i yi ge a de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge'i khri'i gdan dang bcas pa'i steng du babs par
256b6(ya): gyur te/ de'i 'od zer gyi rnam pa las gzugs kyi sku dpag tu med pa spros te/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par song nas/ 'gro ba thams cad dag
256b7(ya): pa'i sa la bkod de/ de yang kha cig tu ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// kha cig tu ni sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// la
257a1(ya): lar ni byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis don mdzad do// de bzhin du kha cig tu ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / kha cig tu ni bram ze dang //
257a2(ya): kha cig tu ni khyim bdag dang / kha cig tu ni tshong dpon dang / kha cig tu ni skyes pa dang / bu da med dang / sdig te can dang / byol song la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis
257a3(ya): gshegs nas sems can gyi kham sa ma lus par zad par mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku gsung thugs mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul te/ slar rang gi sa
257a4(ya): bon la 'dus pas/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i bdag nyid du gyur te/ slar yang rdo rje de nyid la gzugs kyi sku 'od kyi rang bzhin can snga ma bzhin du 'phros shing 'dus pa las/ bcom
257a5(ya): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs khar 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten pa/ mtshan bzang po
257a6(ya): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu sa rab tu brgyan cing / bod 'dom gang ba dang bcas pa/ phyogs skyong ba brgyad kyis gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol tu dad
257a7(ya): cing lhags te bskor bas mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid dang ma bral ba/ thugs rje byams pa'i stobs mnyen cing lkug pa
257b1(ya): gzhan yang sku'i cha lugs tshul mnyes pa dgu dang bcas pa bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos rigs kyi phung po yongs su dag pa zhes bya
257b2(ya): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs kha na sa hUM oM swa hri ha zhes phyung ba las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa phyung ste/ hUM mthing ka las bcom ldan
257b3(ya): 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog mthing kha/ rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas mdzad pa'i 'phrin la sa/ sems can
257b4(ya): gyi khams kyi rnam par shis pa'i phung po dag par mdzad nas slar tshur 'dus te/ kun tu bzang po'i mdun du rang nyid ji lta ba'i yum dang lhan cig tu seng ge'i khri la 'khor
257b5(ya): do de nas dpal kun tu bzang po'i dbu'i gtsug tor nas/ oM dkar po las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po 'khor lo dang dril bu 'dzin pa phyung na sa 'jig
257b6(ya): rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyi gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin dag par byas nas tshur byon te/ shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la glang po che'i khri
257b7(ya): la bdag nyid ji lta ba'i lha mo dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du dbu'i g.yas phyogs nas swa las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdo ga ser po rin po che dang dril bu 'a
258a1(ya): pa phyung ste 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ sems can gyi tshor ba'i phung po sbyangs nas/ lho'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs la rta'i khri stengs su rang gi lha mo
258a2(ya): dang 'khod par gyur to// lhag pa'i phyogs nas hri dmar po las snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu bsnams pa 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas
258a3(ya): sems can gyi 'du shes kyi phung po dag par mdzad de/ nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su rma bya'i khri la rang rang gi lha mo dpa' khod par gyur to// g.yon gyi phyogs su ha
258a4(ya): ljang khu las don yod grub pa sku ma dag ljang khu ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ sems can gyi 'du byed kyi phung po dag par mdzad de tshur
258a5(ya): byon nas/ byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la na ma mkha' lding gi khri stengs su rang nyid lta bu'i lha mo dang lhan cig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas dbyings
258a6(ya): kyi yum kun tu ba za' mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// kun bzangs yangs pa thugs kyi bkyil 'khor du// ye shes rol pa sgyu ma'i skar bstan pas//
258a7(ya): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang / phrag do ga ma spangs rgyal ba'i skur bstan pas// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes rnams// rang dag
258b1(ya): rang zhi mnyam pa chen po las/ thabs dang shes rab dbyer med lhun gyis rdzogs// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// zhi ba
258b2(ya): 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rigs lnga rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
258b3(ya): bzang pos thugs ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par 'phul pa yul dang yul de'i bdag po yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skoms par zhugs
258b4(ya): na sa[:]de ma tha ga tu spyan dang / wA gas snyan da nga / sha ngas da // ska dang / thA gas kyi ngo bo 'ad kyi dkyil 'khor las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying
258b5(ya): po mdog dkar po phyag na rin po che'i myu gu 'dzin pa phyung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dag par sbyangs te tshur byon nas
258b6(ya): steng gi phyogs su 'khod do// de bzhin du nam mkha'i snying po mdog ser po ral gri bsnams pa/ byams pa dmar ser klu shing gi g+hu d+he bsnams pa/ spyan
258b7(ya): ras gzigs dbang dmar po pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag na rdo rje ljang khu dril bu bsnams pa/ kun bzang dkar po rin po che ske ma 'dzin pa/ sgrib pa rnam
259a1(ya): sel sngon po po ti 'dzin pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar ser po ti dang u smra ba 'dzin pa rnams byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song na
259a2(ya): sems can gyi rna ba'i rnam shes dang / sna dang / lce dang / lu sa dang / yid kyi rnam shes dag pa sbyangs te tshur 'dus nas/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs dang /
259a3(ya): sha ra lho dang / lho nu ba dang / nu ba bya ta dang / byang gar gyi phyogs mtsham sa dag tu zla ba dang pad+ma'i ste nga du/ ra nga rang gi yum lha mo lA s+ye dka ra mo rgya gra ma' dzin ma dang /
259a4(ya): mA le sngon mo rin po che'i 'phreng ba 'dzin ma dang / girti dmar mo pi wang gi rgyu da'adran par byed ma dang / nirti ljang khu gar sgyur ma dang / 'dug pa ma da kar mo spos sprin 'phro ma
259a5(ya): dang / mdzes ma ser mo me tog 'thor ma dang / gsil byed dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa dang / dag byed ma ljang khu byug por byed pa ste/ de dag lhan cig tu 'khod pa'o//
259a6(ya): de nas dpal kun tu bzang po sa bdud thams cad mthar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de ma thag tu nyid kyi sku'i mdun dang / rgyab
259a7(ya): dang / g.yas dang / g.yon gyi phyogs nas/ dzaHhUM ba ho/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'od dang bcas pa phyung bas khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang /
259b1(ya): gshin rje gshed ces bya ba dang / rta'i dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / bdud rtsi thal sbyor zhes bya ba rnams sku mdog dkar po dang / mthing kha dang / dmar po dang / ljang khu
259b2(ya): dag phyag gis be tshon lcags kyu dang / thod du byug zhags pa dang / pad+ma lcags sgrog dang / rgya gram dril bu 'dzin pa dag phyung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
259b3(ya): rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / phung po dang / lha dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi tshogs
259b4(ya): thams cad bcom nas slar byung ba/ gzhal ya sa khang gi sgo bzhi shar gyi sgo dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su pad+ma'i steng dang zla ba'i steng du 'dod par
259b5(ya): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa 'gro ba rnams zhi ba chen pos rab tu 'dul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas
259b6(ya): de ma thag tu sku'i steng 'og gi gnas dang / phyag dang / zhabs kyi mthil dag na sa sprul pa'i dge slong chen po drug phyung nas spro ba mdzad pa ni dkar po pi wang
259b7(ya): 'dzin pa dang / sngon po mtshon tsha 'dzin pa dang ser po sil byed 'dzin pa dang / mthing kha po ti 'dzin pa dang / dmar po rin po che'i sgro ma bu
260a1(ya): 'dzin pa dang / nag po me dang chu'i rnam pa 'dzin pa dag/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas
260a2(ya): rigs drug tu snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyi rang rang gi sdug bsngal gyi dngos po thams cad sbyangs nas/ slar rang gi gnas su phyogs drug gi gdan la
260a3(ya): 'khod par gyur to// de nas yum kun tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mkha' ltar dag pa'i thugs//
260a4(ya): bsam 'das gnyis med thig le chen po las// rol pa'i cho 'phrul 'gro la rab bstan pa// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya cir yang sa le ston// mig dang sna dang de
260a5(ya): bzhin rna ba lce// yid chos gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang chos// dbang po tshogs brgyad dngos yul ma lus pa// ma spangs rang dag ye nas lhun rdzogs pa//
260a6(ya): rgyal tsha ba sras po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// bde gshegs mnyes mdzad mchod sprin lha mor bcas// yab yum thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug
260a7(ya): pas/ dges mdzad chags pas ye shes gnyis su med// gshin rje bgegs dang dag pa'i pad+ma dang // shes rab chen pos mthar thug sar phyin pa//
260b1(ya): khro chen rgyal po ye shes sgo bzhir gsal// bgugs 'dren 'ching sdom rab tu dgos par mdzad// lha dang lha min mi dang dud 'gro dang // yi dgas dmyal tshog/
260b2(ya): 'jig rten ma lus pa// nges don dbyings su ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // thub mchog sprul sku dge slong bla na med// ces gsungs so// de ltar dpal kun tu
260b3(ya): bzang po zhi ba chen po'i rol pas gzugs dang sgra'i chos thams cad/ snod dang bcud la nas rnam par dag pa phyogs bcu kun tu rgyu yongs su ma chad pa'i dkyil
260b4(ya): 'khor rten dang brten par bcas pa dag pa'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pas/ thams cad rtsol med lhun gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas so//
260b5(ya): zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
260b6(ya): kun tu bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs twa/ snyoms par zhugs
260b7(ya): ma thag tu kun tu bzang mo sa glu'i dbyangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gsal po dri me/
261a1(ya): pa/ byang chub sems ni rin po che// bla na med pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po
261a2(ya): chos thams cad gnyis su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// a ma sems ni lus kyi rtsa ba ste/
261a3(ya): lus kyang sems kyi snang ba'o// sems kyang tshig tu mtshon pa ste// tshig ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid// e ma kun tu bzang po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//
261a4(ya): zhes bka' stsal to// da nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas// byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med
261a5(ya): cing chos nyid med// nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
261a6(ya): mdzad kyis/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e mchos rnams skye ba med pa ste// yi ge med cing gnas med la// rtog pa'i dra ba rab spangs pa// bskyed par bya//
261a7(ya): ba'i don mchog yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyis// byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma dngos po 'di dag dngos med/
261b1(ya): de// chos kyi mtshan nyid yangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas
261b2(ya): bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med kyis/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma dngos po skye ba med pa la// dngos po med cing bsgom du med// nam
261b3(ya): mkha'i go 'phang thob nas su// de ltar dngos rnams rab tu brjod// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pas/ byang chub kyi
261b4(ya): sems 'di gsungs so// a ma chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med ci srog kyang med// sangs
261b5(ya): rgyas med de byang chub med// ces gsungs so// de nas sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi sems 'di
261b6(ya): gsungs so// a ma khams dang rigs dang rnam par shes// dbang po yul gyi snang ba kun// ma bsgribs snang ba med pas na// mya ngan 'das pa'i sal
261b7(ya): phyin// ces gsungs so// de nas rigs drug 'dul ba'i sprul pa drug gis// byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// a ma g.yo zhing rtsod dang 'gyur ba
262a1(ya): dang / 'dod dang rmongs pas sdug snga la spyod// 'di dag rang gi ngo bos stong // brtags na myong ba ci yang med// ces gsungs so//
262a2(ya): nas khro bo chen po bzhis/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma 'jig tshogs mthar 'dzin ltar// log 'dren bdud kyis ming btags kyang // yul gsum
262a3(ya): mtshan ma ma dmigs pas// gcad bya gcod byed yongs ma grub// ces gsungs so// zhi ba 'das pa rtsu ba'i rgyud las/ byang chub sems mnyam pa nyid rdul
262a4(ya): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po rab tu bstan
262a5(ya): pas/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs bskul te g.yo bar gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun
262a6(ya): tu bzang po gang na pa der gshegs nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthar bzhugs pas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad til gyi gang bu sa bon gyis gang ba bzhin
262a7(ya): du gnas par gyur to// de ltar gyur ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par 'bral pa las spobs pa dang 'dzin
262b1(ya): pa'i bdag nyid can gyi lag na rdo rje can zhig phyung zhing mdun du 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lag
262b2(ya): na rdo rje la gzigs te zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa de mdzad ma thag tu lag na rdo rje de nyid stan las langs nas/ rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das
262b3(ya): la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgya ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa
262b4(ya): mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum par mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
262b5(ya): pos thugs rje chen pos rdzas su gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' spru la to// nyon
262b6(ya): cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kun// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i// the tshom kun nas bsal ba'i phyir// da ni nges par bshad par bya// nga ni che ba'i rgyal po
262b7(ya): ste// 'chad na nyan pa'ang nga nyid yin// chos dang srid dang zhi ba kun// thams cad nga yi rang bzhin yin// de bzhin bcings dang grol ba dang / don dam kun rdzob snang dang /
263a1(ya): bya/ mnyam/ gzugs dang sgra dang mthong dang thos/ mtha' dang mtha' min dbus kyang nga // ye shes thig le nga yin te// dkyil 'khor 'khor/
263a2(ya): lo nga nyid do// ji ltar nga yi dkyil 'khor ni// sbrul dang bsgom dang bri ba dang // rin chen rnams kyi rtsigs la sogs// de nyid du ni 'jug pa dang // dam tshig tshul
263a3(ya): bzhin nod pa dang // ting 'dzin bsgrub la brtson pa dang // spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pas// mchog dang thun mong phran tshegs kyis// dngos grub chen po bsgrub
263a4(ya): pa dang // tshe 'di nyid la rnyed 'dod pa'i// skye bo sdig dang ldan pa'i rigs// phyi ma'i dus na 'byung 'gyur ba// da dag mthong nas rab dga' ste// rgod dang lha dang 'ju pas gzung

263b1(ya): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dpal chen kun bzang rdo rje 'chang // rigs kun bdag po rigs kyi gtso// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor che ba'i mchog/ rgyu
263b2(ya): 'bras dbyer med ldan rdzogs pa// sbrul dang bsam dang bri ba dang // rin chen rnams la rtsigs pa ru// gnas kyi khyad par gang dag tu// 'jug pa'i gang zag
263b3(ya): ji lta bus// ci 'dre ba yi tshul gyis 'jug/ rten sa bzhengs pa ji ltar mdzad// der ni ting 'dzin ci zhig gis// 'jug pa'i rim pa ji ltar 'tshal// dam tshig

263b7(ya): bya'i phyir// ji ltar khyod kyis spo bas pa bzhin// rim pa'i tshul gyis bshad par bya// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma

264b1(ya): mchog ldan grub 'og men du// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ngang gis gsal// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlabs te spul bar bya//

265a6(ya): ta ga ta bi ga na ma hA ba ling ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ me tog la sogs kyis mchod cing // gtor ma rgya chen byin brlabs nas// brtan ma 'byung po bgegs kyi tshogs// ma
265a7(ya): lus pa ni mnyes par bya// ba dan pa'i byin brlabs bkra shis brjod// de rjes sa rnams dag byas te// shing dang rdo sogs bsal byas te// tshad ldan stegs bu/
265b1(ya): rab tu bstar// stong nyid snying pos byin gyis brlabs// pa yi lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// rab tu sbar bas chag chag gdang// rdo rje'i srad bus thig gad pa ste//
265b2(ya): dang por nam mkhar dgongs thig gdab// de nas sa thig rim pa bzhin// dgu dgu'i bdag nyid bco brgyad du// cha yi rnam pa legs par bgo// khyad par
265b3(ya): dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// phyi dang nang du dbye bar bya// rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// rang gi rigs kyi thig gdab bo// de nas rin chen tshon sna lnga//
265b4(ya): srag sbyang bkru ba'i snying po yis// dag par byas te so so yi// rigs kyi sa boni bkod pa las// so so'i rigs su bskyed par bya// ya shas bkug ste gnyis med mchod// /
265b5(ya): bstod nas rab tu dgos par bya// sngon po ser dmar ljang khu nyid// shar lho nub byang rigs yin te// dbus ni shel gyi snying po'o// dkar sngo ser dmar ljang khu nyid//
265b6(ya): rtsig pa lnga las go rims bzhin// kun gyi phyir ni mthing kha'o// dra ba phyed dang pha gu dang // dar bu gad dang bar khyams rnams// legs pa nyid du bskor bar bya// ka ba
265b7(ya): brgyad dang 'khor lor bcas// pho brang 'khor lo de bzhin te// rta babs dang ni ta ra na// chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas// phyi rol rdo rje ma 'od 'bar// 'jig
266a1(ya): rten pa yi khor yug ni// kun nas rab tu bskor bar bri// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// lnga ldi za ra tshags kyis brgyan// mtshon cha

266a4(ya): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba thams cad thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//

266a7(ya): rje rgyu smos nas// phyi yi 'byung ba rim bzhin bskyed// gzhal yas lang ba rdzogs par bsgom// gdan stengs dkyil 'khor bdag po bskyed// dbyings
266b1(ya): nas spyan drang dbyar med pa stim// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mnyes par byas// bsnyen cing bstod de gsol pa gdab// dkyil 'khor pa dang dkyil 'khor
266b2(ya): bdag/ gzhan yang phyogs bcur ba zhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// khyed rnams

266b5(ya): po bri// shis pa'i rdzas bris chu yis dgang // lha yi grangs dang mnyam pa dgod// so so'i yum dang lha bskyed de// gnyis med spyan drang 'dza ba bsnyen

273a7(ya): gzhal yas gsal bar gyur par bsgom// sa sa he/ ha ha ti ka/ a a ra ga/ ma ma ra nyi/ ga g+ha ru rtsa/ ya shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// seng ge glang
