273b7(ya): bya raM ga ra ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ ta badz+ra ra haM/ k+Shi hi ra dza yaM/ hU~M lA s+ye/ tra a ga ra pa ya/ traM mA le/ hri pad+ma b+han+da ma/ ho gan+d+he hri girti/ dzi ku ru pa na hri/
274a1(ya): a nirta ra ga ya mi/ me d+ha ra ni/ dza du pa/ thI ni sa ra pa ya/ hUM puSh+pa/ hUM swa ra dza ya/ baM dI paM/ mu shri a raM ka la/ ho gan+d+ha/
274a2(ya): mu ni traM/ mu ni hUM tru/ mu ni sr-i/ mu ni br-i/ mu ni kA/ mu ni ya/ au ya man+ta krita/ pra dz+nyA ta kr-iti/ pad+ma ta kri ta/ karma ta krita hUM phaT/ a ku sha dza/
274a3(ya): pA sha hU/ s+pho Ta bau/ gar+the hau/ hri s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // dbang bskur byin rlabs rgyal bzhin bya// phung
274a4(ya): pho khams dang skye mched kun// ye nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor snang / badz+ra sa ma ya hU/ dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pa'i sku// ye shes dbyings nas gshes
274a5(ya): su gsol// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor lha// bdag la dgyes nas thim par bzhugs// dbyings kun rnam par dag pa las// sprul pa'i sku la phyag
274a6(ya): 'tshal lo// phyag rgya rgyal ba'i tshul bzhugs te// mnyam pa'i ngang du rtogs gyur na// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// phyag rgya'i sku las 'da' ba
274a7(ya): med/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus la// gar dbyangs mchog dang dam tshig rdzas// nam mkha' mdzod kyis ting nge 'dzin// rdzas mchog mi las
274b1(ya): 'das pa'i lha// rgyal ba chen po'i longs spyod mchog/ phyag rgya bzhi dang nyon mo ngas lnga// gnyis su med dang 'chi ba med// 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag gi
274b2(ya): med/ bsam sbyor dmigs pa las byung zhing // longs spyod 'byor tshogs ji snyed kun// ma lus ma nyes par bya phyir 'bul// snyan pa'i tshig
274b3(ya): dang 'thun pa'i don// che ba'i yon tan mtshon pa'i rtags// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnams kyis bstod// nges par gsal bar gyur pa dang // gsung
274b4(ya): dbyangs ngag gi 'phro 'du bya// de las gzhan pa bya 'dod na// gzugs brlan dang ni dbyings kyi bdag/ gtsang ma'i gzugs brnyan gnyis pa ltar// gnas
274b5(ya): su gshegs pas rim pas bsdu// gal te bcu dang gnyis dang gcig/ bsdus dang shin tu bsdus pa las// bskyed pa'i rim pa de bzhin bya// zhes
274b6(ya): gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bskyed pa'i rimA pa rab tu bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
274b7(ya): 'das gsung gi 'khor lo mo 'gags pa rnam par rol po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can don kun sgrub byed
275a1(ya): pa/ sngags kyi rgyal po gsang ba che// rang bzhin gdod nas lhun grub pas// dag pa'i gsang sngags gsang rab bshad// o
275a2(ya): badz+ra tsit+ta hU hU/ oM badz+ra sa man+ta b+ha tra a a/ oM bai ro tsa na dzi na dzika/ oM badz+ra d+h+r-ika badz+ra sa twa hUM/ oM rat+na d+h+r-i ga rat+na sarba traM/ oM prad+d+ha dzI/ a mai tA b+ha hA/
275a3(ya): o A no li ka/ a mo g+ha si/ d+hi a/ oM mr-i d+hA du shA ri hU/ o la te sha ra ti hU/ oM maM mo ha ra ti hUM/ oM bya rA ga ra ti hU/ ta bi dz+wa ra ti hU/ tsa ba'i sngaH
275a4(ya): kyi snying po'o// oM k+Shi hi ra dza hri da ya sA hA/ i a b+he tra ga ra b+ha ya sA hA/ oM hri tsAk+Sha paR+Ya ban d+hA ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra ni badz+ra pa ni ku ru hri sA hA/ oM me tri dar
275a5(ya): ni sA hA/ o thI ni s+phA ra pA ya sA hA/ oM sa ta pa tra sa man+ta sA hA/ oM many+dza shrI a ra ka ya sA hAM/ hI lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hri gi rti ra
275a6(ya): ho haM/ a nirti ri ga ya mi/ dza du ba pra be sha ya phaT/ hUM puSh+pe A ba sha ya ai i/ ba di pa A lo ka ba su ki ni sA hA/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta ho/ oM mu ni traM sA hA/
275a7(ya): oM mu ne tAM swA hA/ oM mu ne hU sru sA hA/ oM mu ne pra sA hA~M/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM muM ne ye swA hA/ oM bi dza ye hUM phaT/ oM ya mAn+ta krita hUM phaT/
275b1(ya): paR+YaM ta kri ta hU phaT/ au bi g+hAn ta kr-i ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+hing sha ri ni dza/ oM rat+na kro d+hi sha ri ni hU/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi shA ri ba/ oM karma kro d+hi gA ri
275b2(ya): ni ho/ e h+ye ha b+ha ga pan ma hA kai ru Ni ka ma hA bi ta ya pan tsa b+ha hri s+yA hA/ me hA kro d+ha mu ne sa ya sta/ a gats+tsha ya dza hU baM ho/ pad+ma maN+Da la hU/ a hi pu ho//
275b3(ya): pra tIts+tsha ho/ au UHhA su ra te pi po ka ma le ha ra na pra ti dza pa l-i ta pu tsa kha kha hU/ sa mra ya shud+d+ho sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hA/ rdo rje dam tshig chen po'o// gsang sngags
275b4(ya): las kyi de bzhin nyid// ma lus las kyi dngos grub ste// yang dag rdzogs pa'i gsang tshig go// bdag nyid dam tshig rab gsal ba'i// snying po
275b5(ya): mtshon gang de yi dbus// gsal ba'i dkyi kha 'khor phra mo'i 'od// rdo rje yi ge shin tu phra// o bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su ka dz+nyA na d+ha du a// zhes pas bskor
275b6(ya): bar bsgoms la bzlas// de nyid ye shes 'od zer ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba bzhin// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas khyab spro// yul
275b7(ya): gsum sgrib pa ma lus sbyang // thams cad ye shes spyod yul te// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi don// nyan thos zhi 'gog sa las bkrol// myur 'gro thabs
276a1(ya): kyi don gyi btsud// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams// shes bya bag la nyal ba yi// sgrib pa ma lus rdo rje yi// sa bcu ting nge
276a2(ya): 'dzin gyis sbyangs// 'phags pa'i thugs dam dbyings nas bskul// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas kyis// rigs kyi gtso bdag nyid du
276a3(ya): dgongs// 'od zer bcas pa slar 'dus pas// gnas dbus sa bon mchog la thim// rten pa de nyid la khyab pas// gnas gsum de nyid dag par bsgom//
276a4(ya): phyi rol bzlas pa'i sbyor ba'o// yab yum gsal ba'i skur bsgom ste// mkha' gsang byin brlabs sbyor ba'i tshul// bzlas pa shes rab sems dbus nas//
276a5(ya): de nyid thabs kyi gnas da ru// mthing nag yi ge 'bru tshad spros// dngos po sbyangs te badz+ra gzugs// rtse lnga'i dbus su gsal ba'i dkyil// oM zhes bya ba
276a6(ya): dkar por bsgom// thabs kyi dbus nas shes rab gsang // mkha' la til 'bru tsam du 'phros// sngar bzhin mdzad pa'i 'od gsal las// chu skyes ngo
276a7(ya): bzhi'i dbus dag tu// skye med byu ru'i mdog 'dra bsgom// dgug gzhug bcing dang dges pas bskor// rdo rje can gyi pho brang nas// de yi lam nas shu tra byung /
276b1(ya): shes rab klong du rab 'phros pas// sems ma'i dbus na thabs dkyil thim// 'od du gang gi lam du zhugs// rtsa chen gnyis gnas de la thim// dges pa
276b2(ya): dus gcig bstar bar bsgom// pad+ma'i khu ba dmar la dngas// rgyu ba stobs bcas bsgrub gnas zhugs// nyi shu tsa brgyad lam la brgyud// sku
276b3(ya): yi gsang ba'i lam nas phyung // mkha' las 'od dmar babs pa las// rdo rje'i sbubs nas rlung dang bcas// steng du drangs pas bdag por gyur//
276b4(ya): nas g.yas nas g.yon du thim// shes rab dbyings ma rab tu gyur// sgra dang bcas pa'i hUM gis drang // chos ma byang chub sems ldan pas/
276b5(ya): rlung gnas rgyud pa de la gsal// dkar dmar 'od 'dres bde ba che// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// 'di ni nang la dmigs pa'o// skad cig ting
276b6(ya): 'ja ni gas la bsgom pa'i// lus ngag yid kyi 'jug pa dag/ sku gsung thugs su shes pa yis// gnyis med grasang ba shes par spyod// rang gi drung
276b7(ya): gis grub pa ni// gsang bar rab tu sbyor ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi sgra dbyangs rjod pa ste// gas 'asngags dgongs pa gti
277a1(ya): phyung nas// rnal 'byor ngag gi che ba'o// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na
277a2(ya): nyid kyi rab tu sbyor ba paston pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po sems rnam par dag parang
277a3(ya): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kun//
277a4(ya): gsang sngags rol pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'phrin las mdzad pa sna tshogs pas// las kyi bye brag gsungs pa yang // 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub ste//
277a5(ya): mya ngan 'das la rtog mi 'gyur// de pas de nyid rtogs bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen lam// rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen por bshad// 'khor
277a6(ya): 'das dus gsum phyogs bcu yi// rdzas dang dngos po rnam par dag/ rnam shes 'byung ba phung po dang // yul dang skye mched gsang ba ste// 'di dag rdzogs
277a7(ya): pa'i rang bzhin pas// phung po lnga ni ya ba lngar rdzogs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum lngar rdzogs// rnam shes tshogs brgyad sems dpa' brgyad// yul brgyad
277b1(ya): sems ma brgyad du rdzogs// mu bzhir sgo bzhir gnas pa ste// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs thub pa drug/ yid kyi byed pa kun tu bzang // chos su bya ba kun bzang mo//
277b2(ya): ye nas mnyam du gnas pa la// phyi nas btsal zhing bsgrub bya med// sngar bzhin dbyings su gshegs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// ngo bo nyid
277b3(ya): kyi bde bas na// bde bar gshegs te rdzogs sangs rgyas// ma spangs pa nyid spangs pa ste// ma thob pas na thob pa mchog/ gtong ba dang ni mthu dang
277b4(ya): blos// theg pa gcig gi mthar thug par// go cha sbyor ma mchog ldan pas// sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin no// de yang snang la nges med pas//
277b5(ya): sgyu ma lta bus lus zhes bya// rang bzhin lam dang 'bras bu dang // sems nyid chos nyid de nyid kyi// ngo bo rtog pa'i dri ma dang // las kyi rnyog ma
277b6(ya): bral ba dag/ 'od gsal snang bar byung ba'o// dbyings dang ye shes thabs shes rab// stong nyid srid dang zhi ba dang // de la gnas dang lhag par mthong
277b7(ya): ma nyam par bzhag cing rdzas kyis thob// rtog pa dang ni bsnol ba'i chos// ma lus gnyis med sbyor ba yis// mnyam nyid zung du 'jug par 'gyur//
278a1(ya): dbyer med de la gnas pas na// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes su brjod// rten pa'i gzhi ni ga zhal yas khang // longs
278a2(ya): spyod mchod pa'i tshogs chen po// pha ma bu dang bu mo ni// yab yum sras dang sras mo ste// phyi nang 'khor ni nye du dang // bran 'bangs mngag gzhug
278a3(ya): l-i sogs yin// dang po nyid nas rdzogs pas na// chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya ste// snang ba sna tshogs sprul pa'i skra// rtog pa longs spyod rab rdzogs
278a4(ya): te/ mi rtog ye shes chos skur rdzogs// 'di la ma rdzogs zhes brjod pa'o// skal med de dag 'khor bar ltung // de bas rdzogs pa'i tshul shes
278a5(ya): pa'i/ rnal 'byor sems dpa' chen po ni// gnas gsum sbyor ba ci 'dra yang // ngo bo nyid kyi sku gsum rdzogs// ting 'dzin dmigs pa'i gdeng thob
278a6(ya): pas/ de dag myur du mngon dbyung phyir// rig pa'i spyod pa mngon du byung bya// sngon bzhin bshad par bya ba ste// dang por spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//
278a7(ya): phal pa'i 'jig rten mi mthun phyir// rang la gnod pa gzhan la spang // phan pa'i nga de bzhin bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni phan gnod bral//
278b1(ya): ma rungs bkran dang 'khrugs dang dang // dbang dang bag med log lha can// chags dang zhen pa yong mi dor// de nyid mchog tu gyur pa spang // 'phags
278b2(ya): pa snying rje'i gnas min te// lam gyi grogs su ga la 'gyur// rlom sems khengs grags phan yon dang // phrag dog can dang dbang med 'gyod//
278b3(ya): bsam pa dri bas 'bad pa yin// gnas dang snang ba snod pa'i yul// rang bzhin bsgrubs pas myong ba'i rgyan// bzod cing ma chags don dang bcas//
278b4(ya): dka' ba spyad nus spyod pa'i grogs// dus 'dir ma rung ma phan zhing // 'khrul pa'i gnas ngan yul yin no// thabs dang rnam 'phrul ma dag lta//
278b5(ya): stong pa snying rje can sbyor zhing // rlabs chen 'jug pa pha rol 'das// kun rdzob bden pa'i dag pa'o// dus gsum don yod bcas pa dang // phra mo'i
278b6(ya): rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs// 'tsho ba bdud rtsi bzhin du spyad// dran dang shes pa bag yod bsten// dge dang sdig pa'i byed pa bgrang // bsngo bya
278b7(ya): gzhan du gcig las min// sgyu ma sgra brnyan rmi lam bzhin// dus dang dngos po sems can dag/ dbye ba med pa yong ma grub// gus shing ma 'dres
279a1(ya): ltos pa med// nyon mo ngas med par spyad pa ni// thun mongs chos su spyod pa'o// dman pa'i bde 'bras mi smon zhing //
279a2(ya): gcig tu zhi la mi gnas dang // yul gsum dag par sbyor po ste// ma lus dbye ba med pa'o// khyad par 'di yi spyod pa ni// dkyil 'khor
279a3(ya): gsum dang mchod pa lta// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma lus pa'o// rtsu ba yan lag bcas pa dag/ rang gi de nyid yongs kos pas// rdzogs pa'i
279a4(ya): longs spyod de nyid do// brtul zhugs sna tshogs gang 'dzin pa'i// skyes bu dam pa'i rjes su zhugs// phyi dang nang gi gan du gyur pa// rab tu gsang
279a5(ya): ba'i dus dag tu// rang gi spyod pa yong mi dor// mkhan po slob dpon lha rnams dang // nyan thos rang rgyal sems dpa' dang // 'jig rten phal par bcas pa
279a6(ya): dag/ rang dang lhan cig tha dad min// gang dang gang gi dmigs pa de// mchog gyur sngags kyi spyod pa'o// de las rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu ni// gdod
279a7(ya): nas dag pa'i zhing khams las// dag dang ma dag gnyis med phyir// bral dang thob pa mi dmigs kyang // ming tshig rtsal gyi 'bras ni// ma po ngas
279b1(ya): skyes bu drang ba dang // lam don bsgrub phyir rab tu snang // rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin dang ni// ngo bo nyid dang spyod pa'i tshogs// ye nas rnam par dag pa la
279b2(ya): 'bras bu zhes su bshad pa ste// sgrub cing rtsol ba ga la yod// mtshan nyid mtshan gnyis spros dang bral// mtshan dang dper bcas gzugs sna tshogs// tha dad
279b3(ya): mthong ba 'bras bu ste// grub pa'i dngos po yod ma myong // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'og min gsang ba'i pho brang snang // zhing gi bkod pa sna
279b4(ya): tshogs dag/ med pa nyid kyis phyogs bcur khyab// lnga dang brgyad dang drug dag gis// rnam par phye dang myong ba dang // sna tshogs rigs kyi 'khor lo'i
279b5(ya): tshogs// rtog pa rang byung ngo bos lus// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro dang 'ong // yod med mtha' las rab 'das shing // gdod nas gnas dang bsgom pa dang //
279b6(ya): zhi dang tshom bu 'khor lo dang // thabs dang shos rab gnyis nyid kyis// brtags shing snang ba tsam du 'gyur// mchog gyur dman dang bar ma'i sku// sna
279b7(ya): tshogs las kyang sna tshogs te// rigs dang 'thun pa'i bdag po las// ches lhag yul du 'gyur ba min// gnas skabs mthar thug dus dang thabs//
280a1(ya): thun mong khyad par yongs su 'byung // ma lus pa dang ma nor ba'i// rang dang gzhan gyi snang ba yis// yod dang med pa'i mthar
280a2(ya): 'dzin pa// shes dang mi shes rtog pa spangs// de la sgrib byed kho na'i dngos// sdig to las kyi dri ma dag// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yis// las
280a3(ya): kyi mtha' yis de mi mthong // bslab cing sdom pa srung las rnams// dman pa'i las las cher lhag pas// nyon mongs pa las rang dga' bas// thar
280a4(ya): byed gnas kyi sgrib pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang sprul pa dang // sdug bsngal byed pa tha dad dang // shes bya yul dang yul can dang // mthong dang bsgoms dang /
280a5(ya): rtogs pa yis// gnyen po ril gyi stobs gyur pa// de nyid kyis kyang mthong mi 'gyur// kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin shes// bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gyi//
280a6(ya): ngo bo mngon du rgyu bas min// bag la nyal gyi rnam pa yang // ldang ba'i chos kyi de nyid mthong // gzugs brnyan mthong dang ma bsams dang // mnyam pa nyid du
280a7(ya): rtogs pa dag/ bya ba rjes grub sku gsung thugs// 'phrin las sngon 'gro rjes su byed// dus gsum kun tu ma chags shing // thogs pa med la brten du med//
280b1(ya): ma grub pa yis lhun gyis grub// ma bltas pa yis mthong ba ste// ma lus mkhas pas thob pa'o// shes dang shes bya skad cig ma// g.yos pa med pa rang
280b2(ya): gi gnas// ma bsams ma tho ba dman pa spangs// ma brtags ma shes mthar thug ste// 'du 'bral med pa 'bras bu yin// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi
280b3(ya): pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la sa/ skra gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// /
280b4(ya): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yum dang bcas pa'i byin brlabs kyi rnam par 'phral pa'i dkyil 'khor chan
280b5(ya): po'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa de dag dang / dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lag na rdo rje 'chang ba sras kyi thu bo chen po dang bcas pa
280b6(ya): rnams rab tu dges shing yi rang bas/ 'od zer gyi rnam pa dpag tu med par gyur nas/ yang khams gsum pa'i dngos po ma lus pa sbyangs nas// bcom
280b7(ya): ldan 'das kyi ska la thim par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid ni ya ba yum gnyis su ma da par sla ra ya chos nyid zhi ba 'i klong rnam par
281a1(ya): dag pa'i dbyings de nyid du rnal te bzhugs nas/ phyi ma'i 'gro ba'i don bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la rang bzhin gyis dgongs nas mi 'da'
281a2(ya): ba nyid du mdzad do// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dgongs pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar
281a3(ya): gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing bris te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// rgya rgya
281a4(ya): rgya'o/ shog sar shog bu nyer drug 'dug pa la zhus// rgya gar skad du/ shri b+ha ga ban ma hA he ru ka bai ru ta
281a5(ya): tan tra na ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog ha ru ka ya
281a6(ya): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas chos
281a7(ya): kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rnam par dag pa na/ b+ha ga yangs pa'i glong chen po nam mkha'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i
281b1(ya): gzhal med khang rnam par 'phro ba/ dur khrod chen po'i nang 'jigs par byed pa na/ sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa chen pos bzhugs pa'i tshe/ gsang ba
281b2(ya): chen po'i dkyil 'khor dpag tu med pa 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rnam par snang mdzad dang / rab tu mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin po
281b3(ya): che'i 'byung gnas dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / rdo rje rol pa dang / sa rdo rje ma dang / chu rdo rje ma dang / me rdo rje ma dang /
281b4(ya): rlung rdo rje ma dang / nam mkha' rdo rje ma dang / gzhan yang phyogs bcu nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum du snang ba dpag tu med pa
281b5(ya): dag dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / kun nas khro ba dang / zhing gi bkod pa rnam par dag parasnang ba dang / rab tu rdzogs pa'i gzhal med khang gi rnam par snang ba
281b6(ya): dang nya thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du snang ba dang / sprul pa dang / sprul pa'i yang sprul dang / bran dang / bran gyi yang bran gyi tshogs dang / brjod kyis mi lang ba'i
281b7(ya): yang brjod kyis mi lang ba rnams dang yang thabs cig go// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ska la rab tu bltas te/
282a1(ya): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ che ba'i tshe mchog kun gyi gtso// dpal ldan che btsan 'gro ba'i
282a2(ya): 'gon/ khyod kyi ska gsung thugs kyi bdag/ rnam par zhi las khros mdzad cing / nam mkha'i mtha' khyab gzhal med khang / dag pa'i rtsa ba'i ngang nyid las// dur
282a3(ya): khrod ltar mdzad ci yi phyir// chags med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// shes rab snyoms mdzad ci zhig lags// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid las// khyod kyis nges pa
282a4(ya): mdzad pa gang // gzhan yang khyod kyi chos nyid las// rnam par 'phral pa ma lus pa'i// don de ding 'dir bstan du gsol// a la la ho/ zhes gsol
282a5(ya): pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kya de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
282a6(ya): sems rab tu dang bas nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ sngon bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gang+gA klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i yang sngon rol tu/ bskal pa chen po
282a7(ya): 'dul ba rab tu dka' zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten khams rab tu sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba zhig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
282b1(ya): sangs rgyas/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron mer
282b2(ya): gyur pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
282b3(ya): ba chen po don gyi de kho na nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa dang / nges pa ma yin pa dang / sgra'i tshul du rnam par brjod pa dang / sgra'i tshul dang / rnam par ma yin par
282b4(ya): brjod pa dang / dgongs pa zab mo'i tshul du brjod pa dang / rung gi don sngon du brjod pa'i sgo nas chos bstan pas 'dul bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi tshogs
282b5(ya): dar 'dus pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa drag pos phyi rol gyi yul nye bar bzung na sa/ rgyu'i khyad par dang / 'bras bu'i khyad par
282b6(ya): dang ha las dang los kyi khyad par ma brtags te/ spang bar bya ba rnams ni blangs la/ blang bar bya ba rnams ni spangs te/ gsang ba'i tshig la ldog par lta
282b7(ya): par gyur pa'i dbang gis las mi bzad nga drag po nye bar gsang ba/ srid pa las byung ba'i sa bon rab tu rtsub mo 'phangs nas/ rab tu rnam par smin pa'i 'bras
283a1(ya): bus mnar med pa'i dmyal ba'i gnas su skyes par gyur to// yang de nyid du bdag sdug bsngal gyi dngos po 'di las thar par gyur na ci ma
283a2(ya): rung snyam pa dang / de'i 'og tu rab tu tsha ba dang / tsha ba chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rim gyis nyams su myong bar gyur to// de nas yang bdag tsha ba'i sdug
283a3(ya): bsngal 'di nas thar na grang bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa la sogs pa'i grang ba'i dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa nyams su myong bar
283a4(ya): gyur to// de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po ji snyed pa rnams kyi nang du bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ da
283a5(ya): las thar par 'dod pa dang / yi dgas chen po rnams dang byol song gi lus chen po dag tu skyes te/ bskal pa stong phrag gcig gi bar du sdug bsngal nyams su myong
283a6(ya): par gyur to// de yang las kyi shags mi pa zad pa de bag tsam srabs par gyur nas sngon gyi khro zhing gtum pa'i bag chags kyi rgyun 'thun pas/ nying mtshams sbar
283a7(ya): nas 'jig rten gyi bdag po dbang phyag chen po yab yum gyis gnyis kyi srid pa blangs te/ yum gyi lhums na yang 'jigs pa'i sgra drag po 'byin pa las 'thon pa
283b1(ya): dang nya yi dgas kyi gtso bo srin pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rab tu khro zhing gdug la gtum pa thal ba'i mdog can/ mig dmar ba/ ral
283b2(ya): pa rab tu 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa/ kha gdangs pa// mche ba gtsigs shing dri ngad dang kha rlangs drag pos gzhan smod par nus pa/ dus 'gro'i gtso bo dang /
283b3(ya): gcan gzan khro bo dang / srin po'i rgyal po'i pags pa lus la gyon pa/ mgo dang / skad pa dang / yan lag gi tshogs ni dug sbrul nag po kha nas me 'bar ba dang
283b4(ya): mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'jigs su rung pos dkris pa dang / lag pa drug drug gi g.yas na dri shUl dang / thod pa dang / cang te'u dang / thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang bcas
283b5(ya): pa'i dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri thogs pa/ g.yon na ni kha Ti kha dang / thod 'phreng rgya zhags dang / ma 'bar ba dang / dbyug pa chen po dang / lcags
283b6(ya): kyu dang / gri gug dag bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba ni lus gcig la mgo brgya stong dang / mgo gcig la lus brgya stong dang / yan lag dang
283b7(ya): nying lag/ dang / ba sma'i cho gas rnams las mtshon cha'i tshogs du ma 'gye par byed do// de'i las dang 'thun pa'i chang ma ni/ srin mo nag mo gi rti
284a1(ya): ma zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mdog gnag cing ral pa 'dzings pa/ kha dang mig nas ma 'bar bayan lag
284a2(ya): gi rnam par 'phral pa las kyang / las kyi srin mo za byed ma zhes bya ba dang / drag byad ma dang / chu byed ma dang / rlung byed ma dang / sham sham ma dang / skam pa
284a3(ya): mo dang ta dbyangs can mo dang / dri snom mo dang / chang 'thung mo dang / phor thogs ma dang / thod 'phreng ma dang / g.yang gzho ma dang / de dag la sogs pa byin pa

284a6(ya): dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams bran du byas te/ de dag thams cad 'jigs tshul drag po dang bcas te/ mtshon cha'i
284a7(ya): tshogs bzung zhing gdug pa'i nga ro sgrogs pa/ dbugs tsha ba dang rab tu grang ba'i rlung drag po phyogs bcur 'byin pa las/ rims dang / dug dang /
284b1(ya): dbyi ga dag la sogs pa nad dang mtshon gyi char 'bab pa sa/ gtsang ma rigs kyi lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang / dpang po dang / kham
284b2(ya): dang skye mched dang / ma rungs par byed cing pho nyar byas te/ gsod pa dang gcod pa'i las la 'god par byed de/ thams cad kyang phyag brnyan par byas te
284b3(ya): 'dag go/ las de lta bu des khams gsum gyi sems can ma lus pa rnams ngan 'gro'i las kyi lam mi bzad pa la sogs par gzhol ba de'i phyir/

284b5(ya): lta bu'i las skyes bu de gcig tu ma zad de/ bdag tu lta ba'i yid kyi phyi rol gyi yul dag la dngos po dang mtshan mar brtags nas/ bdag gir gyur pa'i
284b6(ya): las bzung ba ni snod bcud kyi dngos po thams cad la khyab par gnas so// yang nang du bdag med pa la mtshan ma'i mtshan mar brtags nas nga dang bdag
284b7(ya): tu bzung ba las gyur pa'i dran pa'i tshogs la gnas par byed/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu mtha' dag yongs su chad cing med par bzung ba las gyur
285a1(ya): pa ni ta sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i ngag gi yul dang ngag gi las nam mkha'i khams la dbang byed pa yin no// de'i

285a5(ya): drangs pas/ de nyid til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa de/ byang chub sems rdo rje'i ngo bor zhu nas gsang ba'i lam nas byung ba so sor snang zhing ma 'dres pas/ nyid
285a6(ya): kyi thugs yi ge'i ngo bor gnas pa/ dbugs dro zhing ring bar rgyu bar byed pa// rdo rje sna'i rtse mo las dril zhing tha mi dad cing dbye ba med pa// gsang ba'i
285a7(ya): pad+ma gi sar gyi rtse mo la yang rag cing 'phro bar mdzad nas/ yum gyi pad+ma'i dbyings su khyab pa/ rgya mtsho ltar bsnyil ba la byin gyis brlabs kyis nga'i phyag
285b1(ya): rgya'i ngo bor gyur nas/ khro bo rdo rje dbang phyug ma yang 'od kyi tshul du snang bar gyur pa mngon par 'a mdzad nas/ zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i sku nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams
285b2(ya): cad sreg par byed pa'i 'od dang bskal pa'i mchen po dang ldan pa/ khrag gi rgya mtsho chen po'i dkyil nas byung ba'i kang rus kyi ri rab chen po'i rtsal dur khrod chan

285b4(ya): po mngon du byung nas/ de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i rol pa'i cho 'phrul bstan zhing / de gdul bya'i phyir snang ba yin gyis/ khyad rnams nga'i ska dang / gsung dang /

286a1(ya): gshegs pa khyod nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje tshogs 'di dag chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong du gyur cing / khams

286a7(ya): las/ bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// khro bo'i tshul du sngon byung ba'o// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro drag gtum pa yi// 'o dod 'bod
286b1(ya): cing gdung bar 'gyur// mi ba zad chen po'i sdug bsngal de// dug gsum mkha' la mngon zhen pa'i// ji ltar mdzad pa'i thabs kyis 'dul// srid gsum

289b6(ya): 'joms ye shes lnga// khams gsum sbyong zhing dug gsum gcod// pad+ma da bzhi 'joms mdzad zhabs bzhi pa rmad// rnam zhal dbyings phyug khro mo ni//
289b7(ya): chos nyid rol pas dgyes par stob// gnyis med snang ba 'od kyi tshul// dril bu thod khrag 'dzin zhing stob// oM badz+ra ma hA shri he ru ka kro d+hau shA ri dz+wa la ni hUM/
290a1(ya): 'bar zhing gsal la rdzogs par lta// gal te 'dul bar ma nus na// hU ta spro zhing bsdu ba bstan pa las// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad

290a3(ya): bgrad cing // phyag dgu g.yas kyi dang po yis// chos nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin// dug gsum rtsad gcod kha T+wA~M la// chos kyi sgra sgrogs rnga bo che//

290a6(ya): mdzad/ zhing dbyug sngos pa'i phung po 'joms// nyon myongs tha ba rlig pa'i ga shol// nyi ma dang ni zla ba yis// ma rig mun pa'i tshogs rnams
290a7(ya): sel/ ri rab dregs pa'i ru tra gnon// khrag gi rgya mtshos gnas ngan 'khrug/ ma dpung las dang bag chags sreg/ dngos 'dzin dri ma 'thor ba'i
290b1(ya): rlung / bco brgyad phyag gi 'gro don rdzogs// cha mchog dpa' bo'i chas brgya dra ni// glang chan ko rlo na stobs bcu ldan// stag lngags 'phrin las
290b2(ya): rnam bzhi mdzad// sbrul rgyan gdug pa'i dug rnams 'dul// zhing lpags nyon mongs rtsa ba gcod// rak+ta'i thig les 'gro don chags// thal
290b3(ya): chen mtshan mas 'phrin las mdzad// zhag gi zo ris nyon mongs rngu ba// bskal pa'i me dpung rtog tshogs sreg/ 'bar ba'i spyan ni dgu phrag gsum//
290b4(ya): gzigs pas ma lus badral 'god// lha mi'i dbang phyug khro mo'i rgyal// zhal gsum phyag drug rdzogs pa la// sngar ba sha dau yab kyi phyag rgya 'dzin//
290b5(ya): kun nas rab tu bskyod pa'i tshul// sngon gyi 'phrin las ji bzhin du// gnas gsum yul du gsal bar bya// de yis gdul ba'i las rnams byed//
290b6(ya): gal te 'dul ba ra ma nus na// hAM b+ho s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ oM badz+ra ma hA shri ha ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Ta na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM pha Ta/ oM ma h+yA kro
290b7(ya): N+ye shwa ro dz+wa la ni de ra ma hU~M b+h+yo/ nga ni kun bzang he ru ka/ che ba'i tshe mchog dpal gyi sku// dbuni nyi shu rtsa gcig ldan// sa dang ye shes ma lus rdzogs//
291a1(ya): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag mtshan ni// ji wAr bshad pa'i sangs rgyas na// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rdzogs par bzhugs// zhabs brgyad barmad pasarba
291a2(ya): chen brgyad// byol song brgyad dang bcas pa gnon// ting 'dzin brgyad dang chos nyid sbyor// ral pa lam nag srid rtser 'bar// smin mtshams sna phrag glog stong
291a3(ya): 'gyur ta 'bar ba'i spun ni drug cu gsum// sdang mig zhe la gnon cing gzigs// shangs nas 'thor rlung por cing 'tshub// snyan nas drag po'i 'brug stong sgrogs/
291a4(ya): rngam pa'i zhal gyis khams gsum rngub// rno lcags mche ba zang yag gtsigs// le brgan ljags 'dril glog stong 'gyu// ba spu thu lum me stag 'gro// rdo rje
291a5(ya): gshog pas nam mkhar khyab// dpa' zhing sgeg la 'jigs su rung // dgod cing ga she la 'jigs par ston// snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba'i tshul// 'bar ba'i
291a6(ya): 'od kyis phyogs bcur khyab// khro mo 'dod chags ye shes che// he he dgas pa'i gzi me dngas can// rin chen pad mas rab rgyas la// mnyes pa'i sbyor bas
291a7(ya): rol par stob/ dbu dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// stong pa bco brgyad phyag dang ldan// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje yis// chos skra 'gyur med tshul gyis
291b1(ya): bzhugs// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag gsol// dug gsum ma lus stong par gsol// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'og ma na// ka ri ma mo brgyad 'phyar zhing //
291b2(ya): g.yon gyi 'og ma 'phra men brgyad// zhabs bzhis rigs bzhi dbyings su gnon// dur khrod dpa' ba'i chas la sogs// ji ltar bshad pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// 'jigs
291b3(ya): pa'i tshul gyis sku la 'khril// hU a oM hUM phaT a/ zhes nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor de lta bu de/ ded dpon dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams la de ltar snang bar mdzad do//
291b4(ya): bcom ldan 'das cha mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku'i dkyil 'khor che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa rtsa ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas kun
291b5(ya): bzang he ru kas// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dbyung ba'i phyir// mkha' dbyings rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM dang ldan// zla ba'i dkyil
291b6(ya): 'khor oM dang ldan// tshegs med pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba ad+mA ko nA ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU tsa badz+ra swa b+hA ba ar ma
291b7(ya): ko&ha/ oM badz+ra pad+ma swa b+ha ba yo gi pre ba sha phaT/ mkha' klong pad+ma'i gzhal yas su// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tsho ga se ma lus
292a1(ya): la/ rab dgyes mnyam pa'i sbyin pa bstim// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya pU tsa pra brtan badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad+ma ko&haM/ oM dang ldan pa'i
292a2(ya): thig le las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bskyed// hU~M gis mkha' la phab byas te// thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems// ma kha' la gsal dag bla
292a3(ya): ba'i 'od// sa ma yo ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ r-i ho haM ra ga ya mi/ byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// khro bo tshol pa'i dkyil 'khor spros// sangs rgyas mdzad
292a4(ya): pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ma lus bsgral// hU~M badz+ra kro d+ha bi shwa dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya da dA dza la hUM phaT/ a ha hUM b+h+yo sA ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/
292a5(ya): hUM hU hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hU hUM/ he ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ he hi he he ha ha he ha/ dza \u0f7f hUM baM ho/ nga yi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/
292a6(ya): rang las byung bas gzhan la gsal// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs tshul 'chang // rigs kyi khro bo mngon par byung // bcom ldan rak+ka he ru ka/ smyug nag
292a7(ya): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar zhal// tsakra ti ra khyung chen g.yas// ban dmar rgyu zhags pa su g.yon// ro kra kro d+hi shwa ri yum// tsakra ban+d+ha ste bo cing 'khril
292b1(ya): bcom ldan grA ya he ru ka/ sar nag g.yas mthing g.yon dmar zhal// rin chen ri rab dgra sta g.yas// thod khrag ri rab rgyu zhags g.yon// gu ya kro d+hi shA
292b2(ya): ri nita r-i ni chen ban dmar stob cing 'khril// bcom ldan bi sha ha ru ka/ dmar nag g.ya sa ma thing g.yon da kar zhal// pad+ma be tshon dgra sta g.yas// ba na
292b3(ya): dmar ri rab thong gshol g.yon// bi sha kro d+hi shA ri ma// pad+ma thod khrag stob cing 'khril// bcom ldan yak+ka he ru ka/ ljang nag g.yas ser g.yon dmar zhal
292b4(ya): rgya gram ral gri ragra sta g.yas// ban d+ha zong gshol g.yon gyis 'dzin// yak+ka kro d+hi shwa ri ma// rgya gram thod khrag stob cing sbyor// khro mo'i tshogs 'di thams
292b5(ya): cad kyang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis gtso bo'i mdog/ yab yum khro tshogs thams cad kyang // gtso dang 'thun pa'i chas kyis rgyan// rang gi phyogs nas
292b6(ya): mnyam par bzhugs// gnas mchog de yi phyi rol tu// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa 'dul byed pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan pa btu// mdog dkar/
292b7(ya): tri shul 'dzin// me dpal du byug tho 'dzin dmar sar// mthing nag thod dbyug dgra sta thogs// smug na ga ral gr-i zhags pa thogs// spu gri sbrul zhags
293a1(ya): thogs pa dmar// dmar skya ban d+ha rdza yab thogs// ljang khu rgya gram dril bu thogs// mthing nag dgra sna rtse gsum 'dzin// sngo skya mda' gcu
293a2(ya): 'gengs shing 'phen// dud kha tho ba zhags pa thogs// kun kyang brkyang bskam zhabs gnyis kyis// so so'i phyogs kyi drags pa gnon// ji ltar tha dag pa'i
293a3(ya): phyogs bzhi ru// shes rab ga shin rje pad+ma dang // stobs chen khro bo chen po bzhi// dkar po'i 'gugs byed lcags kyu 'dzin// ser po zhags pas 'ching byed cing //
293a4(ya): lcags sgrog sdom byed dmar po ste// 'degs byed dril bu can mdog ljang // sprul pa'i sras tshogs 'di rnams kun// rang gi rigs mchog dbu rgyan cing //
293a5(ya): khro bo'i ches dang nyams kyis ma dzas// mkha' la mngon par rgyan gyis 'byung // oM ma hA shri rak+ka he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM ma hAng kri gu ya he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM
293a6(ya): ma hA shri bi sha ha ru ka hU phaT/ o mahA shri ya k+ka he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rak+ka kro d+ha shA ri hU b+ho/ oM gu h+ya kro d+hi shwa ri hA b+h+yo/ au bi sha kro d+hi shwa ri hUM b+h+yo/ au yak+ka kro d+hi shwa ri hAM b+h+yo/
293a7(ya): oM me hA kro d+ha an+d+ri ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+hi ag+na da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ya ma pa tsa pa tsa hU phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ra kra ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA
293b1(ya): kro d+ha nA ga tsu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ba ya be tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM ma d+hu kro d+ha yak+ka n+ta tshin+ta hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha bi na ya ga bin+d+ha ban+d+he hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro
293b2(ya): d+ha pra me ni gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ba na be s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM pra dz+nyA na ta kr-i ta hUM pheMT/ oM ya man+ta krita hUM phaT/ oM big+h+nAn tI kr-ita hU~M phaT/ oM pad+mA na
293b3(ya): takr-ita hU phaT/ ru ru shr-i ti kri mu ru sod/ srog thun mugs sod/ ma ra ka du rbad ya sod/ kha rug sha sha ma rbad song/ srog thun rni rbad song/ d+h+r-i yo rni ya tsa thun sod
293b4(ya): sha rgyud snying byung / snying rgyud srog chod/ srog rgyud sbugs long / ma mthun thun song song/ srog la rngam pa'i tshogs kun gyis// stong gsum ma lus 'ja
293b5(ya): rten gang // oM AHhU~M/ oM hU swa hri ha/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta a d+hiSh+Tha na ya A baM sha yA/ pra be sha ya hU/ bud+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+mA karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ dza hU baM tsa
293b6(ya): badz+rA ga NA tsakra maN+Da la a a ra yi dza/ sa ma ya pA sha ho/ zhes gsungs nas/ rdo rje cha mchog gsang ba chen pos 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus shing / lus pa med
293b7(ya): pa nyid kyis sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba las byung ste/ khams gsum pa'i sa la snang bar mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtso bo dregs pa can rab
294a1(ya): tu gdul bar dka' zhing / 'jig par mi nus pa dag kyang dngangs shing skrag ste/ sa la 'gyel nas de sgra ngar ngar po 'don cing / yid
294a2(ya): kyis dmigs pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gang shegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid gseng ba chen po'i mchog tu gyur pa/ dpal he ru ka la phyag gis 'dud par
294a3(ya): gyur to// dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par spro ba'i sa ma ti'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas
294a4(ya): 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma kun bzang he ru ka/ ma 'ongs dus kyi sems can rnams// skal
294a5(ya): pa med cing gdul dka' las// gtsang zhing smra ba'i rtog pas bcings// khyod kyis dam par gsungs pa'i tshig/ bshang dang gcig bam sa'i rdzas// rdzogs
294a6(ya): par longs spud ma nus na// gtsang sbras grol bar nus sam ci// 'jig rten log rtog can rnams la// gsang zhing sprad pa ji lta bu// thabs dang
294a7(ya): yon tan grubo pa'i tshad// mkhyen pa'i thugs rje dpag med pas// myur du ston cig che ba'i mchog/ de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang //
294b1(ya): kun tu bzang po he ru kas// ma lus bshad cing bkrol ba'i dus// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di na// tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za// de dag grol
294b2(ya): bar ngas ma bshad// klu dang bram ze gtsang sbra spyod// des kyang grol bar ngas ma bshad// byol song rtswa mchog za ba yang // ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar
294b3(ya): du spyod// de yang grol bar ngas ma bshad// rga dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i skra// thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// don ram nges pa'i lung 'di

294b5(ya): khams thams cad kyi tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i rigs rnams dang / mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas
294b6(ya): kyi bu dang / de la sogs pa'i klu rnams dang / gzhon nu dang / smin drug dang / khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / rgyun shes

295a1(ya): sogs pa bram ze'i tshogs rnams dang / gzhan yang dri za dang / me lha dang / rlung lha dang / gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo so so'i 'khor dang bcas

295a5(ya): sgo nas bcud len cing / dka' thub dang tshangs par spyod pas 'tsho bar byed pa rnams kyi dal du bsdus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
295a6(ya): dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyis/ kun tu bzang po he ru ka blta bar mi bzod pa rnams kyis ston par bzhugs nas/ yang 'di skad ces bkab
295a7(ya): stsal to// thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi lnga// thabs dang ldan pas rig cing rtogs// chos nyid gcig la tha dad pa'i// rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid yon
295b1(ya): tan tshogs// 'di ltar rtogs na grol bar 'gyur// rang bzhin gdod nas dag pa yi// mnyam nyid dbyings su rab rtogs shing // gnyis med don gyis

295b3(ya): pa'i phyir// dri chen gser mdog rnam snang mdzad// sngon byang sprul pa chos kyi sku// byang chub sems ni dkar ba'i mdog/ dri med dag pa ya shes skra//

296a1(ya): 'brum pa na se// lha rdzas dge ba'i a ru ra// sha lnga zos pa'i yon tan ni// shes rab gsal zhing ting 'dzin brtan// dug lnga

296a7(ya): ya rak+ShA kha// 'khru bag nad rnams gso zhing gcod// dbang gi dngos grub thob par byed// 'byung ba bzhi yi byin brlabs las// sprin chan glog gi

296b2(ya): chu/ nags kyi chu dang chu sna tshogs// rtag tu 'gro ba'i don byed nus// dmyal ba tsha grang sdug bsngal sel// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs las//

296b5(ya): rtsa ba gcig la yal gA brgyad// yon tan stong dang bcas pa yis// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing // 'gro ba drug gi gsos su gyur// srid pa
296b6(ya): chags byed srubs shing gis// bdud rtsi rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las// bcud kyi rgyal po bdud rtsir gyur// chos bzangs lha yi 'dun sa na// rA hu la
296b7(ya): yis rkus te 'uthungs// brgya byin khros te ska bcad pas// khrag pa thig bdud rtsi sa la lhang // bskyed cing smin pas lha yi rdzas// rus min 'chi las
297a1(ya): thar par byed// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob// gser dngul zangs lcags de bzhin g.yu// rin chen bdud rtsi'i zags chu ni//

297a3(ya): dri bshang gci// chu klung gang+gA'i 'gram du skyes// nye'u shing dang ra mnye'u// nang grol don snying nad rnam sel// zag pa zad de nam mkhar 'gro//

297a7(ya): gnyen can// b+hu su ku ni rgya cher mdzad// 'dod khams lha yi gtso bor skyes/ bod pa mchis pas drag po khros// lha chen de yi dpral ba nas//
297b1(ya): mig gcig lhag par lug pa las// smin zhing bskyed pas sa stengs khyab// b+hu su lug mig rnam gsum gyis// mig gi mngon shes thob par byed// sa yi//
297b2(ya): snying po'i dngos grub thob// nga yi sngon gyi 'phrin las kyis// lha chen tshangs pa bsgral ba las// sna nas khrag zags bskyed cing smin// sna ma'i 'bras bu
297b3(ya): srin gyi shing // dri yi mngon shes thob par byed// nam mkha'i snying po'i dngos grub thob// 'das pa'i dus kyi sngon gyi tshe// rta mgrin dbang gi 'phrin las kyis//

297b5(ya): gser gyi mdun can ha le kri// spyad pas lce yi mngon shes dang // spun ras gzigs dbang go 'phang thob// nga yis srin po 'bum sna bsgral//
297b6(ya): chung ma srin mo dza mun ti// rna ba a sho kan d+har 'gyur// spyad pas rna ba'i nad rnams sal// sgra yi mngon shas mnga' bar byed// phyag na rdo rje'i dngos
297b7(ya): grub thob// til mar bu ma sbrang rtsi dang // lany+tsA mar dong snying po lnga// bdud rtsi spyi yi yan lag ste// rlung mkhris pang kan chu ser dang // 'du
298a1(ya): bu'i nad rnams spel bar byed// phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub dang / mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob// go ba dang le le dang /
298a2(ya): g+hi ha chu ha many+dza ha// me tog zos pa'i yon tan gyis// pad ma khris glo dang dug rnams sel// rigs kyi yum lnga'i dngos grub thob// shing thog rgun 'brum ka
298a3(ya): ko la a 'bras pa na bum sha lnga// sha khrag rus pa chu sar dang // lus kyi nad rnams sel bar byed// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang //
298a4(ya): 'brin las lnga yi dngos grub thob// nA ga ge sar shing tsha dang // sum smel ga na pa ta dang // skyu ru ra dang dri sna lnga// sha khrag rus pa chu sar dang /
298a5(ya): dug gi nad rnams sel bar byed// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgya spos dza ti pha la dang // ga
298a6(ya): pur tsan ngan li shi lngas// tshwa ba'i nad rnams sel bar byed// tshul khrims rnam dag dngos grub thob// 'bras dang so ba monu sran gre'u// nas dang
298a7(ya): gro dang til rnams ni// mu ge'i bkres pa sel bar byed// tshe dang stobs dang skrag mdangs gzi// longs spyod phun sum tshogs par byed//
298b1(ya): gsar dngul zangs lcags g.yu dang lnga// dbul zhing 'phongs pa sel byed cing // rigs lnga thugs kyi dngos grub thob// rang bzhin spyad pa'i yon tan
298b2(ya): gyis bsgrubs pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// kye ma tshangs pa drang srong dang // lha klu dri za bram ze tshogs// khyod kyi brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis//
298b3(ya): brtan zhing spyod pa'i rdzas 'di rnams// sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus nyid na// bshang gci khu ba sha khrag gis// ma bskyed pa dang ma byung med// thams cad bdud rtsi
298b4(ya): lnga rang bzhino// gtsang sgra nyams par gyur ta re// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de bor la// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'o// bka' yi dam pa 'di zung
298b5(ya): zhig/ taces bka' stsal pas// tshangs pa dang drang srong la sogs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ rang rang gtsang smer 'dzin pa'i rtog
298b6(ya): pa rnams/ bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / byang sems kun da lta bu dang / pad+ma lta bu dang / mi dang / rta dang / khyi dang / ba glang dang / glang po che'i sha
298b7(ya): dang / myos par byed pa 'bru bcud kyi btang ba rnams kyis klubs te/ rgya mtsho dang / chu bo'i rgyun lta bu dang / rigs kyi nang nas rdol pa khyi dang / phag dang / bung
299a1(ya): bu'i tshogs rnams kyi khu ba dang khrag gi glong chen por snang bar gyur nas/ brgyal te gtsang ba dang sme ba'i rtog pa drag pos gzir cing 'dug pa la/
299a2(ya): rang rang gi las 'dul bar ston pa/ 'jam dpal dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba chen po las phyung ste/ 'di skad du rigs kyi
299a3(ya): bu dag ma 'jigs shig/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang gting dpag dka' zhing
299a4(ya): rgya che ba'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa yang dag pa ste/ tshul 'di lta bu la longs spyad na/ blo mchog tu 'gyur zhing yangs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don rgya chen po
299a5(ya): mdzad do// da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang 'phrin las chen po spyod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur yang / sems can blo chung ba rnams kyi rmi lam du snang bar mi
299a6(ya): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag pa'i bya ba byas shing byang chub tu sems bskyed da/ smon lam chen pos 'gro ba'i don rnam
299a7(ya): par dag pa spyod pa la rab tu gzhol ba'i spro ba dang ldan pas/ sems can gyi rigs dang / khams dang / bag la nyal dang / las dang / bsam pa 'thun
299b1(ya): pa rnams 'dul ba'i dus dang tshad la bab pa ste/ skrag par yang ma byed cig/ 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa kun tu bzang po he ru ka nyid kyis/ bdag cag
299b2(ya): la sogs pa tshul 'di lta bus 'dul ba ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi don du mngon par sprul te/ don dam par chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong zhing 'dus ma byas pa/
299b3(ya): bdag med pa/ rnam par zhi ba/ zag pa med pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ de bzhin nyid las g.yo ba med pa las sprul pa tsam du zad kyi//
299b4(ya): the tshom za bar ma byed cig/ ces dbugs dbyung bar mdzad do// de nas tshangs pa dang drang srong bram ze'i tshogs de dag las bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sku gsung
299b5(ya): thugs kyi rnam par rol pa chen po mngon du bstan te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ tshangs pa dang drang srong la sogs pa rnams kyis
299b6(ya): thams cad la sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar mdzad pas/ de dag thams cad kyi rang gi lus ni rigs kyi lha dang lha
299b7(ya): mo'i tshogs su snang bar gyur la/ ngag gi ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin no// zhes sgra de brjod de/ phyi dang nang gi rnam par rtog pa las grol zhing //
300a1(ya): thams cad chos kyi dbyings chen por ro gcig par gyur to// mi gtsang zhing sme ba'i rdzas kyi dngos po rnams kyang dri dang kha dog ro'i phun sum
300a2(ya): tshogs pa/ blta na sdug cing longs spyod kyi gtso bo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu/ 'dod pa'i don ma lus par thogs pa med par 'grub pa/ dngos grub kyi
300a3(ya): rgya mtsho chen po mi zad pa'i gter chen por gyur te/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pas mnyes par 'grub cing / rigs 'dzin
300a4(ya): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang longs spyod dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'o// gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
300a5(ya): dpal gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// kye'o rigs kyi bu dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po nyid kyi rnam par
300a6(ya): 'phrul pa dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis tshul 'di dag nyid kyis 'dul ba ma rtogs pa nyid kha cig ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi rgyal po'i byin gyis
300a7(ya): brlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas don byed par gyur to// gzhan yang kha cig 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / lag na rdo rje dang / sa'i snying po la
300b1(ya): sogs pa rnams kyis don byed de/ gzhan yang kha cig la ni 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa chen po dang / rgyun shes kyi bu dang / de dag la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams dang //
300b2(ya): tsa ra ka dang / nam so dang / tha skar gyi bu la sogs pa gza' dang rgyu skar gyi dad dpon chen po rnams dang / g.yon phyogs kyi lha rkang gnyis spyod pa la sogs pa klu'i
300b3(ya): gtso bo dang / thang lha gnas dang me bzhin 'jug pa la sogs pa me lha dang / rlung lha'i gtso bo khyed rnams ni/ rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu las
300b4(ya): gyur pa rnams la longs spyod de/ dri dang ro nus mthu dang 'bras bu'i yon tan gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi rigs bsal ba'i phyir/ sngon gyi gnas kyi rigs
300b5(ya): rjes su bzung bar dran por gyis shig/ bram ze gzhon nu'i sprin la sogs pa rnams ni/ sman chen po'i bcu da len gyis sems can gyi rigs kyi tshe dang / kha dog
300b6(ya): dang / stobs dang // lang tsho dang / bkrag dang / gzi brjid rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir rjes su bzung bar gyis shig/ 'bras skyong gi bu mo dang / dzam+b+ha
300b7(ya): la dang rta ba shu'i bu mo dang / lha dang klu'i bu mo rnams kyis rang rang gi longs spyod pa'i rdzas gang gis longs spyad pa de dag la/ so so'i bcud dang
301a1(ya): byin gyis brlabs dang / dngos grub gsol ba'i phyir rjes su bzung bar gyis shig/ khyed rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phrin las
301a2(ya): yang dag par rjes su bzung bar gyis shig/ mngon du mdzad pa yin gyis/ don chen po las yal bar dor bar ma byed cig/ ces smras pa dang //
301a3(ya): tshangs pa dang drang srong la sogs pa'i 'khor de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// kya ho bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad thugs
301a4(ya): rje chen pos yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa'i kun tu bzang po he ru kA che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdug cag rnams ni khyod 'khor dang bcas
301a5(ya): pa rnams ji ltar brko ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag rnams kyis smin cing ltos pa las bdag cag 'da' bar byed re skan/ zhes bro dor to// sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa
301a6(ya): ma ya na rA ka na/ zhes brjod de tha tshig la gnas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dpal cha mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la sa/ dam tshig chen po nye bar
301a7(ya): sgrub pa dngos grub kyi rigs 'dzin pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis
301b1(ya): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dam tshig chen po rab tu gsal ba'i tshogs de dag/ nye bar bsgrub pa'i gnas dang / ston pa
301b2(ya): dang 'khor dang / yo byad kyi khyad par dang / de'i thabs dang / 'bras bu dang / yon tan gyi tshogs ji snyed pa dag dus phyi mi'i tshe na 'byung ba'i sems can
301b3(ya): nyon mongs pas rab tu dkris pa rnams kyis/ grol ba dang thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir thugs brtse ba chen pos nye bar dgongs te bstan du gsol// zhes gsol
301b4(ya): ba dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bdun dang / rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba'i
301b5(ya): byin brlabs yang dag par spro ba brgyad mngon par sprul te kun tu snang bar mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams//
301b6(ya): legs so legs so shin tu legs// khyod kyi dri ba 'di nyid kyis// bsod nams byas pa'i khyad par ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pas//
301b7(ya): bskal par gsungs kyang 'dzad mi nus// de bas rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// mthong zhing goms la brtul zhugs gnas// re zhing 'khos med gtsang
302a1(ya): pa ste/ zab cing mthar phyin dbang bskur la// thabs mkhas blo che brtan zhing gsal// ston pa nyid kyis rjes bzung ba// lus
302a2(ya): ngag yid kyi nyes byas zad// blo ldan gtong bde brtson 'grus che// mi phyed dang ldan rigs dag la// rtul phod ma zhum nges par spyod// nus pa bskyed dang smin pa'i
302a3(ya): dus// ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang // yon tan rgyan rtags ldan pa'i gnas// mi mdza'i phyogs kun rab zlog mdzad// zla ba phyed pa byung nas brtsam//
302a4(ya): tshogs bsag par chod bsal la 'bad// rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje yi// sngon gyi 'phrin las ma lus sbyar// gzho de bstan cing sbyang ba dang // bdag gir bya ba
302a5(ya): mchog yin no// dam tshig rdzas kyis mdzes par mnyam// rang gi rigs dang phyogs dang gnas// rdo rje ba su ta yis bcad// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil
302a6(ya): 'khor du// 'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'dugasal// srubs mad nor bu rin po che// rigs pa zang mtshan ma brgyan pa'i snod// nyid kyi phyogs su gsal bar
302a7(ya): dgod// rigs lnga rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga// yan lag dri deng kha dog gi/ sman pa'i sgrib med 'thun pa'i skyobs// rgyal po blon po dmangs dang bcas//
302b1(ya): ma lus pa ni thams cad kun// 'thun pa'i rigs kyis rab tu dbye// pho brang de yi rgyun dang brtags// dgod dang byin brlabs la sogs kun// ngas bshad
302b2(ya): don las 'da' mi bya// phyag 'tshal bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// dam pa rigs brgya'i ting nge 'dzin// byin brlabs dbang bskur cho 'phrul gyi// mchod
302b3(ya): cing bstod de sbyang ba dang // bsdu zhing bstim pa myur du bya// oM sarba pany+tsa dz+nyA na satwa kro d+ha mu na ye s+yA hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA shri he ru ke kro d+hi shwa ri ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/
302b4(ya): 'di la bstod cing bshags sbyang dang // ma lus pho brang dbab pa dang // 'ijig rten dman pa'i rnam rtog gzhom// snga ma phye ma dus kyi bdag/ gnyis
302b5(ya): med lta zhing ngag mi smra// oM A hwA sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sa ya na ta na dza ya gu ya sid+d+hi hU hr-itha/ rdo rje sems drapa'i nga rgyal 'chang // bskyed pa'i byin brlabs
302b6(ya): dngos la bsdu// 'phro 'dugasal stong rtags dang sbyar// rigs kun 'dzin pa dag pa'i phyir// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lngar bsdu ba// oM A hU swA hA/
302b7(ya): 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma rgya gram 'od dang ldan// dug lnga rgyud lnga sbyang zhing bgrang // gzha' tshon lta bus de mnyes bya// snying kha thabs dang
303a1(ya): shes rab 'od// sbyar bas 'phro 'du 'phros pa las// mnyes dang sbyangs pa bsdu byas pas// thim pas mi bzad 'khor lo'i dbyings//
303a2(ya): skra dang ya shes gsal bar lta// o AHhUM s+yA hA dz+nyA na pany+tsa sang ha ran phaT/ sa ha ra na hU/ phyag rgya lnga nyid mnyes par bskang // dngos grub bcud kyis gang
303a3(ya): bar lta// sngon gyi 'phrin las ji bzhin te// de nyid ldi ru snang ba yang // gcig nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du brtag/ rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo la// /
303a4(ya): oM A hU badz+ra satwa sa ma ya swA hA/ 'bru gsum la dog ldan pa yi// bskor zhing lhag mar bcas pa bzlas// kun gyi 'phrin las gcig gi dang // dang po bya ba
303a5(ya): las yin no// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor la// stong dang snying rje'i sa bon las// o A[:]hU sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hri tha/ zhes pa 'di yi bdag
303a6(ya): po nyid/ mdog dkar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa ni// bdud rtsis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin// gzhi nyid kun bzang yab yum
303a7(ya): mkha'// ngo bo bde ba byang chub sams// dkar dang dmar ba'i sprin tshogs 'dus// thugs rgyud bskul zhing mos pa bskyed// gnas ngan sbyong zhing sa la
303b1(ya): bkod/ yon tan thob cing gzhan don rdzogs// rab tu mnyes shing dbang sbyin stsal// 'bras bu blangs shing bar chad bzlog/ 'phro 'du 'dzam bu na ra bzhin//
303b2(ya): o AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na ra/ de las gzhan pa'i bya ba'i gtso// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// gtsang dang rnam rtog de nyid las// sbyang
303b3(ya): zhing bar chad phyir bsal phyir// o A hUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta mu sa la tri ha na a na ya ho pa ya hUM phaT/ da yi sa bye brag phyed par bya// gnyis mad bdud rtsi ba sbyang
303b4(ya): phyir// bcud bzhi mnyam pa nyid du sbyar// o A mr-i ta dza ga da b+hi hi la sho da ya/ rat+na tsa dang bi shud+d+he kun d+ha li swA hA/ rgyal ba'i mchod sbyin me lha'i tshogs// mnyams
303b5(ya): de yis mnyes par bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta mu sa la hU hri tha/ chos ma rdo rje mdzes ma yis// dngos grub spel phyir mnyam par gzhal// oM A hU
303b6(ya): sarba pa ny+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hri tha/ rgyas gdab byin gyis brlab pa dang // dngos grub rkyen du ma ngag pa rnams// nga yis bshad pa bzhin du bya// rgyal
303b7(ya): pab mnyes pa thabs rnams kyis// mchod de yan lag tshang bar spyad// rol pa chen po'i pho brang gsal// nga yi dgongs rgyud sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems kyi
304a1(ya): sprin tshogs las// stong gsum 'jig rten khro bcur gsal// stang phyogs rigs bzhi ha ru kas// dpa' bo gnyis gnyis zhabs kyis brdzis//
304a2(ya): slar yang gtso bo'i zhabs bzhis mnan// de stengs dbyings ma'i zhabs brgyad kyis// khrag 'thung g.yas g.yon bcu gnyis mnan// dbu ma de yi mkha' la rdzogs//
304a3(ya): de yi ljags stangs dag tu ni// de la rdzogs pa'i he ru ka/ zhabs kyis dbu brgyad brdzis mdzad cing // smin mtshams dbyings su gsang mchog rdzogs// de yi zhal dbus
304a4(ya): ljags stengs su// sras mchogs nu he ru ka/ mdog dkar gsal ba yab yum bcas// tshon gang de yi ljags dkyil du// 'bru dgus mi 'gyur don bskor la// oM sarba
304a5(ya): pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU hri tha/ de 'og dmigs pa'i pho brang du// rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i// gtso chen gsang ba'i yum bzhir bcas// bsdus pa'i mkha' la dbang gi lha//
304a6(ya): mdog dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas pad+ma g.yon pa yis// rdo rje rgya gram pho brang gnon// phyed tsam mkha' nub sbyor ba ste// 'phro 'du'i byin brlabs rab tu
304a7(ya): bskul// oM A hU sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hU hri tha/ sgra dang 'od kyi brtul zhugs kyis// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs 'khyil// sangs rgyas ma lus mnyes par lta// dkyil
304b1(ya): 'khor bdag po he ru ka'i// snying kha'i 'bru dgu'i 'od zer gyis// gtso bo'i dbu gtsug lam nas zhugs// lcags kyi 'khor lo'i 'phro 'du mdzad// phyag mtshan dkyil
304b2(ya): 'khor bcas pa yang // thabs dang shes rab 'od ldan te// gtso bo yum gyi zhal sgor bcas// de nyid he ru ka dpal lo// rigs bzhi dbang mchog khro bcu rnams//
304b3(ya): yum bcas de bzhin gcig tu gyur// slar yang pho brang chen po ru// rigs kyi bdag po rnams su gsal// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro// gnas mchog de yi phyogs
304b4(ya): kun nas// 'od phung 'bar bas dngos nyid spar// byin gyis brlab cing khro tshogs dang // dbang chen yum bzhir snang bar mdzad// de yis rigs bzhi gsang mchog dang //
304b5(ya): sku gdung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas dang // rigs bzhi gtso dang 'khor rnams dang // 'od sprin snang phyogs spar ba las// yum chen mkha' mnyam glong gi dkyil// gsal
304b6(ya): ba'i zhabs dang gsang ba'i dbyings// dbu ma'i byin brlabs gtsug tu 'bar// 'chi mang rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mthong // 'od byung phyag mtshan phyogs kun gyi// byin
304b7(ya): brlabs ljags kyi sbyor ba las// dbang gi dkyil 'khor yum dang bcas// 'phro 'dus ma lus khyab byas te// sbyang zhing bskul te tshar bcad nas/ gtso chen steng
305a1(ya): phyogs thim par lta// rgyun du gnas pa'i yan lag las// 'thun 'jug sprul sku'i mdzad pa yis// ma lus gzhan don rdzogs par dmigs// mnyes
305a2(ya): bya bskul zhing dbab dang bzlog/ 'phrin las rgyun du 'bad pa las// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par byed// mang du 'phel na grub rtags yin// oM A
305a3(ya): hU sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta gu ya sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma// gal te tshul bzhin ma gyur na// kun nas ba sogs te gsang zhing 'bad// dbab dkyil bsdu zhing bslang bar bya// o A hU
305a4(ya): sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A be sha pra be sha ya pheM pha kuN+Da li hUM hri tha/ ha la gri ba hu lu hu lu b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hU hri tha/ many+dzu shrI byA ba lo ki yo ti hU hri tha/ a ho su ka d+harma kA ya ne a mr-i ta hUM dziH/
305a5(ya): rdo rje slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis// me tog dor te gsol bar bya// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta ma hAs ma ho/ rdo rje rgyal po de yis ni// yid bzhin pho bra de de la bstan// oM a
305a6(ya): sU ma hA shrI he ru ka/ kro d+hi shwa ri stA/ sarba paN+ya a mr-i ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa A be sha ya a a/ srog gi snying po rgyud gsum po// gnas gsum byang chub sems la thim// o A
305a7(ya): hUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ka ya bAka tsit+taM a yu pha la sid+d+hi hU/ mkha' dbyings phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/ da pa l-i gyi dam tshig ga dmas pa sgrol// pad+ma sa ma ya pra be sha phaT/ don
305b1(ya): ram gnyis med thig le las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur// ma hA gu h+ye kA ya bAka tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hri tha hUM/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// kha dog dbyibs dang
305b2(ya): mtshan ma grub// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// rim pa'i don la 'jug par gyis// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang bskur spyod yul dam pa ste// dam tshig
305b3(ya): phyag rgya bsrung ba'i mchog/ bsod nams mchog tu phyin pa ste// bla na med pa myur du 'grub// de bas khyod kyis brtson par gyis// zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das che
305b4(ya): mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// rdo rje dam tshig chen pos byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gtso chen he ru
305b5(ya): kas/ 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// kun tu bzang po he ru kas// nga ni yon tan gtso bo ste// che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// 'di la the tshom ma za zhig/ dman pa'i
305b6(ya): 'jig rten chos kyi ni// rgyu dang las dang nyon mongs kyis// sdug bsngal phung po bskyed pas na// nga yi yon tan shes mi 'gyur// log pa'i brtson 'grus shes rab kyis//
305b7(ya): rags pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dag/ che longs rtogs te phra ba min// dka' thub brtul zhugs mchod sbyin dag/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs yod med// nga rgyal snyoms 'jug
306a1(ya): mngon shes lung // tshe dang bskal pa thob zin yang // srid pa'i sa bon ma zad pas// nga yi yon tan rtogs pa min// rgyun zhugs mi rtog rang rgyal bas//
306a2(ya): lha dang bsgom pa spang bya ba'i// kun nas ldang ba rags pa tsam// spangs pa'i dgra bcom thob zin yang // bgyu byed phra mo bag nyal bas// nga yi yon tan ga la rtogs// kun rdzob don dam
306a3(ya): tshul shes pas// shes pa nyid dang nyon mongs pa'i// sgrib byed spangs te ston pa'i sa// brlabs chen pos kyang cung tsam las// yang dag mthar thug shes pa min// bya ba lus
306a4(ya): ngag rab spyod pas// mnyam pa gzugs brnyan gsum dag gis// phyag rgya'i mchod pa snang mod kyang // thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor ba'i// bad chen ro de ma myong zhing //
306a5(ya): 'dod pa'i lom la rgyab phyogs pa'i// nga yi yon tan ma mthong ste// gang dag chags bsogs srid pa'i gzhi// rigs gcig pa dang tha dad dang // nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon
306a6(ya): mongs dag/ rang gi de nyid yongs spangs shing // bag chags dang bcas kun gyi gzhi// rnam par shes pa'i yul tshogs rnams// zag bcas zag med 'dus ma
306a7(ya): byas// rang bzhin 'byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das// dbang pos longs spyod yul gyur rnams// de nyid shes pas yongs grub pa// nga yi yon tan mthong ba yin//
306b1(ya): nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ji bzhin du// ba cings pa med cing grol ba'ang med// dbyer med mtha' gnyis mi gnas zhing // chags med chags dang bral ba med//
306b2(ya): rnal 'byor bzhi dang sku lnga dang // ye shes 'phrin las ma lus pa// snang med tshul gyis snang ba de// nga yi yon tan shes pa yin// de bas rigs kyi bu khyed
306b3(ya): rnams/ nga yis ji ltar bshad pa yi// yon tan chen po 'di long la// dman pa mi bya mchog tu gyis// yul dang dngos po sems rgyun dang // khams
306b4(ya): dang byed pa'i las rnams kun// nga la dman pa yong med pas// de bas nga nyid kun tu bzang // ma hA'i mchog de mchog tu gyur// ces gsungs so// bcom
306b5(ya): ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la sa/ yon tan gyi tshogs nye bar bsdus pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gtso chen
306b6(ya): he ru kas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// khyad par sgrub pa rgyal ba'i bka'// snang srid snang bar shar ba'i sku// rgyu rkyen gsum las byung ba
306b7(ya): yi/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'di// bde chen mnyam nyid thugs kyi ngang // bdag 'dzin rnam dag shes rab sku// chags pa kun bral skye med
307a1(ya): dbyings// gnyis med don las sna tshogs ston// 'di ni don gyi bdud rtsi'o// ma skyes kun bzang che ba'i mchog/ bde chen klong 'dus
307a2(ya): dbyings phyug ma// nyon mongs rnam dag rigs kyi gtso// ye shes lnga rdzogs sku lhur grub// dug lnga rtogs pa rang grol ba// 'di ni ming gi bdud rtsi'o//
307a3(ya): gdul ba'i thabs mkhas khro bo'i sku// sgra tshig sbyong mdzad khro bo'i gsung // 'chi med las kyi bdud rtsi'o// chos nyid rig pa byang chub sems// 'dres dang ma
307a4(ya): 'dres yongs su rdzogs// nyon mongs ma rig mi gtsang nad// chos nyid ye shes nus pa sbyong // tshang lugs brgyad ldan chos kyi ro// shes pa brgyad kyi don
307a5(ya): bdud rtsi// sman rnams bdud rtsir dmigs pa ste// sgom pa brgyad nyid dam rdzas so// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// bdud rtsi de nyid rnam lnga ste//
307a6(ya): so so rang rig rtsa ba brgyad// dbyibs dang kha dog phyi dang nang // thabs dang shes rab ro dang 'thun// skra dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang // yon tan 'phrin
307a7(ya): las yan lag stong // rang dang rang bzhin bdag nyid sku// dus gsum de nyid shes par spyod// bdud bzhi nyon mongs nad sel 'joms// skye shi 'du
307b1(ya): 'bral med pa'i don// lha spyod dam tshig 'phrin las dang // ye shes dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i lung // phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba dang // sems dang sems nyid
307b2(ya): chos dang ni// chos nyid gsong ba de nyid do// bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dang // 'khor 'das chos dang gtsang mi gtsang // log rtog spong len sems su rdzogs//
307b3(ya): sbyor ba don gyi dkyil 'khor brgyad// mnyam nyid thugs chung glong du bzhag/ skye shi med cing ma bcos la// phung po snod lnga ye shes lnga// rang byung kun bzang yang
307b4(ya): sum ste/ 'di ni dag pa'i dgongs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal cha mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rnam par dag pa'i dgongs pa khyad par can nye bar bsdus
307b5(ya): ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gtso chen he ru kas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad bshad// spyi dang khyad par bye brag gis// yongs
307b6(ya): su rdzogs dang so so yi// nus pa gcig pur dbyung ba'i phyir// dam tshig rtsa ba rnam pa lnga// yan lag yon tan bcas pa ni// nga yis sngar bshad de dag la// rang
307b7(ya): gi rigs 'thun gnyen po dang // grogs dang gnyen po'i khyad par las// rgyal po blon po dmangs lta bu// skad cig thug phrad rten pa yis// tshe ring nad mang bde ba
308a1(ya): dang / lang tsho kha dog stobs dang gzis// 'phel zhing dbang po rig pa gsal// mkha' la 'gro zhing pha rol gyi// nus stobs gnod pas
308a2(ya): mi tshugs shing // kun gyis bkur sti'i 'os su 'gyur// khams kyi zas dang ma 'brel zhing // gos mad mkha' la ga car bur spod// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis
308a3(ya): kyang // rig pa 'dzin pa'i gral thob 'gyur// de nyid ma rag par du yang // nad dang mu gas mi tshugs shing // bar gyi bskal 'jig la sogs thar// gzhan yang phan
308a4(ya): pa sgrub la sogs// yon tan chen po dpag med thob// de bas rnal 'byor che rnams kyis// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung bzhin myur du 'bad la sgrub//
308a5(ya): kun bzangs lnga dang rigs lnga yis// bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // bka' 'di 'jam dpal rnon po yis// tshangs dang 'jog po l-i tsha byi// drang srong bram
308a6(ya): ze rjes gzung phyir// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin long la// dam pa'i rjes su sgrub par gyis// bstan pa 'di bzhin gang bsgrub pa// 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog 'ching ba
308a7(ya): las/ 'di nyid du ni grol bar 'gyur// da ltar thub pa chen po yis// 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa yi char// tshul 'di nyid kyis bstan gyur kyang // blo dman skal bzhan
308b1(ya): pa yis// gtsang sbra dka' thub spyod pa ston// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan par gcig/ gsung gcig ngag gis nges bstan yang // rang gi rnam pa'i tshul gyis
308b2(ya): bdi ni bdag gi don spyod ces// 'thun pa'i gdul bya ba cig lta// de bas rig pa 'dzin pa'i blo// sems dpa' chen po khyed rnams kyis// gang la gang gis 'dul ba
308b3(ya): yi/ rin chen snying po de bzung la// lha dang drang srong bram ze dang // mkhan po slob dpon cha byad kyis// nus chen gang yin de nyid las// ji ltar 'dul ba de ston cing /
308b4(ya): phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag la// nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di dag/ mos dang mi mos 'dal mi 'dul// tha dad so sor 'byung 'gyur te// gsang zhing bstan pa'i tshul 'di nyid
308b5(ya): skad cig dus la rig par gyis// zhes gsungs so// longs spyod rdzogs pa sku'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su sbyor ba dang bcas pa de dag 'od zer gyi spro ba chen pos
308b6(ya): yongs su drangs te/ rdzu 'phrul lus kyi phyag rgya rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten khams la sogs pa rnams su sprul pa'i sku sna tshogs snang bar mdzad nas/
308b7(ya): sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i don grub par snang ngo // sa chen po la rtogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag ni/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i mdzod chen por
309a1(ya): zhugs nas/ nam mkha'i khams lta bu'i dbyings nas 'tsho zhing gzhes pa las/ rig pa chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams rjes su yi rangs te
309a2(ya): mngon par bstod do// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa rang rang gi rigs kyi ston pa dag
309a3(ya): la dus de nyid du dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs pa'i tshig gis mngon par rab tu bstod cing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig yan
309a4(ya): lag gi yon tan rjes su bstan zhing gdams pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud de rdzogs so// /
309a5(ya): sa/
309a6(ya): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// /
309a7(ya): rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka b+hai ru ge du tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal 'jigs byed chen po
309a8(ya): khrag 'thung he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka chen po/ gsang ba chen po'i mkha' dbyings
309b1(ya): rnam par dag pa'i pho brang na/ 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ bud d+ha he ru ka dang / rat+na he ru ka dang / pad+ma he ru ka dang / karmA he ru ka dang / bud d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri
309b2(ya): ma dang rat+na kro d+hi shwa rim dang / pad+ma kro d+ha shA rim dang / karma kro d+hI shA ri ma dang / hU ka ra dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / ni la dar+tha dang / ya man+ta ka dang / Ar+ya a
309b3(ya): tsa la dang / ha ya grib dang / a pa ra tsit+ta dang / a mr-i ta kur+b+ba li dang / trai lo kya bi dza ya dang / ma hA ba la dang / ke ru rim dang / tso'u ri maM dang / pra mo ha dang / be ta li dang /
309b4(ya): pu ka si dang / g+hasma ri dang / sma sha ni dang / tsaN+Da li dang / sing ha mu kha dang / byAg+ni mu kha dang / sri la mu kha dang / shon mu kha dang / gri D+ha mu kha dang / kang ka mu kha dang
309b5(ya): kA kA mu kha dang / u lu ka mu kha dang / A gu sham dang / brnam dang / s+phoT ma dang / gan+d+he ma dang / las byed pa'i ma mo bdun phrag bzhi dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bsam gyis
309b6(ya): mi khyab pa dang thabs gcig tu rol pa chen pos bzhugs so// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor de rnams kyis/ dpal he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom
309b7(ya): ldan he ru ka/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// thugs rje zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// khyed nyid khro ba ci zhig lags// he ru ka ni ji lta bu// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba
310a1(ya): gang / ma 'ongs dus na skyes bu yis// khyod dang bdag cag lhan cig tu// nye bar byed pa'i thabs ci lags// thams cad khyod dang gcig pa yis//
310a2(ya): 'gro ba'i don kun ji ltar bsgrub// gdul bar bya ba'i don chen du// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas dpal chen he ru kas//
310a3(ya): 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa ni//
310a4(ya): gdug pa ma lus 'dul bar byed// thams cad dbang du gyur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' nyan bran bzhin gnas// ha ni dgos shing bzhad pa'i gsung // ru ni kun la chags
310a5(ya): pa'i thugs// ka ni mnyam nyid ye shes sku// shri ni snying rje bdag gzhan rtogs// ma skyes dbyings ni shes rab ste// ma 'gags sprul pa de yi thabs// dus gsum dngos po//
310a6(ya): thams cad kun// mnyam nyid gnas pa'i sbyor ba yin// phung po lnga ni he ru ka/ kro d+hi shwa ri 'byung ba lnga// ma mo rnam par shes pa brgyad// de yi yul brgyad 'phra men 'gyur//
310a7(ya): 'du shes bcu nyid khro bor 'gyur// 'gyur ba gzhi ni khro mo ste// sems las byung ba mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// thams cad nga yi sku gsung thugs// ye nas gnas shing lhun gyis grub
310b1(ya): 'dus ma byas shing g.yo ba med// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag bcas// sgrib byed de yis gnas ma mthong // gal te bdag nyid shes 'dod na// yang dag sgrub pa gcig pu nyid
310b2(ya): sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa// rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bad mchog bde// 'gro ba sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul// don dam nges pa'i lung
310b3(ya): 'di nyon// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gi zhi'i don bsdus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas 'khor
310b4(ya): gyis yang zhus pa// dpal chen he ru ka yirje/ ma 'ongs sems can skal med cing // garul bar dka' ba gang zhig la// ji ltar nges pa'i don bstan yang // myur du rtogs
310b5(ya): pa ma yin pas/ sgrub pa dang ni chen po dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba dang // las kyi khyad par ma lus pa// rim pa bzhin du bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas//
310b6(ya): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyi rus snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe// blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// dur khrod dgon pa'i phyogs dag gam// nges par brtags
310b7(ya): pa'i sa gzhi la// rdo rje dur khrod bdag po'i lus// rab tu nyam thag bsgyel ba ste// nga yi sngon gyi 'phrin las yin// mkha' ltar brtan zhing gsal ba dang // g.yo
311a1(ya): zhing bsreg pa rab snang ba// dkyil 'khor lnga ru byin gyis brlabs// lus dang lus kyi phung po la// gdug pa'i khrag 'byung tshogs rnams bsgom/
311a2(ya): phun sum tshogs pa'i sa blangs la// lag gang ba la sogs pa yi// rgya cher bskyed la bdud rtsis gdab// sha rus khrag sogs mtshon pa yis// rim pa'i bye brag 'di lta ste//
311a3(ya): mthing kha dkar ser dmar dang ldang // dbus dang phyogs bzhi rab tu mdzes// gnas pa'i pho brang lnga 'am dgu// bcu drug gam ni lnga bcu brgyad// drug cu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa'i//
311a4(ya): tshogs pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa la// dmigs pa gsal bar rab tu bsgom// bdag dang ye shes sems dra ba' gnyis// so so ma yin tha mi dad// mchod bstod mnyes
311a5(ya): pa bzlas pa dang // dgug dang gzhug cing bstim pa dang // bcing dang dbang du bya ba dang // dgyes pa bskyed cing las la sbyar// thun mong dang ni mthar thug pa'i// rang gi
311a6(ya): de nyid yongs shes shing // gnyis su 'dzin pa ma lus dor// yod med skye 'gag rtag chad dang // 'gro 'ong la sogs spros pa'i mtha'// ji skad pa ni rang gi blo// de
311a7(ya): dang bral ba'i sgrub pa po// nga dang nga dang 'dra ba yis// sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi sras// kun nas rab tu bsgrub pa yin/ khyams pa dang ni snying rje yis//
311b1(ya): khams gsum gnas pa ma lus pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad bsgral 'dod cing // nga la bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa che// rnal 'byor ye shes rang gi ngang // yi ge sngags
311b2(ya): kyi 'gro 'du yis// smra bsam brjod med tshig las 'das// 'dzin med brag cha lta bus mnyan// sems can rnams kyi phyi dang nang // gsang ba yongs su shes 'dod
311b3(ya): pas/ 'dus pa'i sems su bzhag nas ni// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// bsnyen par gnas pa'i dbang thob nas// bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad bstan//
311b4(ya): o ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo hUM/ dbang mcho ga thob nas 'khor dang bcas// ston pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du// bsgom rgyud gsal bar ci nus bya// de yis nga la nye bar
311b5(ya): bsnyen/ gang zhig bdag gzhan don gyi phyir// phung po mchod rdzas bya ba dang // rtsi bcud bdud rtsir bsgrub pa dang // bstan la rab sdang bsgral ba dang // lus bral
311b6(ya): ngang du drang ba dang // nga nyid kun rdzob gnas pa dang // chags can gnyen pos gdul ba'i phyir// de nyid dbang du bya ba dang // brtag dang dpapa la sogs kun//
311b7(ya): nga la nges par byas pas 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ he ru ka'i las yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis
312a1(ya): pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// mgon po he ru ka dpal rje// skal med sems can gdul dka'
312a2(ya): bas/ shin tu snyigs mar gyur pa'i lus// nyon mongs pa yi sems can rnams// shes rab phun sum ma tshogs shing // rab tu 'bad pa chung bas na//
312a3(ya): shin tu bsngas min rgyas min paro// khyod kyi rang bzhin bsgrub pa dang // gtso dang 'khor gyis bsdus pa'i gnas// rang gi rigs dang 'phrin las dang // bsgrub
312a4(ya): dang mchod dang bsgral ba dang // bskul zhing gnas dang drang ba dang // bsdu dang sbyang zhing bsad dang gso// las dang las la mngag pa rnams// mchog dang dman
312a5(ya): dang bar ma'o// blo dang yid la gang rigs pa'i// 'bar ba'i rgyal po sku bzhings la// rol pa'i cho 'phrul rab ston cing // gsung gi yi ge 'khor lob gi nad//
312a6(ya): 'od zer rab tu khyab par mdzad// thugs kyi gsang ba glong brtol nas// ma 'gags thabs kyi rang bzhin la// sa dang 'gro ba smin pa'i chos// da lha nyid du bshad du
312a7(ya): gsol// zhes gsol pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka chen pos/ de bzhin gang shegs
312b1(ya): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje btsun ma'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i glong / dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhus
312b2(ya): nas/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs byang chub kyi sems rdo rje khro bo chen po longs spyod rab tu rdzogs pa'i sku/ 'jigs byed 'bar bar kun tu bstan te/ dgyes
312b3(ya): pa chen po'i gad mo'i sgras stong gsum gyis 'jig rten gyi khams sgras rab tu gang bar byas nas/ rdo rje drag po chen po'i thugs gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po thams
312b4(ya): cad kyi ngo bo rab tu gsal bar mdzad de/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// a ma 'das pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dang po mnyam pa'i
312b5(ya): gzhi nyid las// 'das dang ma 'ongs bcings dang grol// brtan dang g.yo ba srid dang zhi// yongs su grub dang kun tu brtags// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa yis
312b6(ya): nga nyid gtso bo ltar bur snang // phung po lnga dang rnam shes brgyad// yul brgyad dang ni 'du shes bcu// 'gyur ba bzhi dang bcas pa kun// yang dag mthong ba
312b7(ya): gong ma'i gnas// yid las byung ba rtog pa'i dngos// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// bdun phrag brgyad phrag bzhi bzhi dang / khaco brgyad dang ni drug cu ba zhi// bzhi
313a1(ya): dang bdun dang bzhi gnyis dang // grub par shes pa 'og ma'i gnas// nga nyid ngar snang rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas gti mug de bzhin gshegs// nga
313a2(ya): rgyal rin chen 'byung ba ste// pad+ma chags rab he ru ka/ phrag dog las ni rab tu bsgrub// gzugs dang rnam shes tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed lnga rang bzhin//
313a3(ya): ma bcos pa dang zhi ba dang // rab tu rgyas dang dbang du byed// tshar gcod drag po ji bzhin 'grub// ngang nas shes shing gnas pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal
313a4(ya): khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gnas dang rigs bsdus pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas he ru ka dpal gyis// 'dus pa'i 'khor/
313a5(ya): la 'di skad gsungs// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ lus ngag yod gsum bsgrub 'dod pas// shes rab kyi ni blo phye nas// snum pa yi ni dam tshig dang //
313a6(ya): gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs bcas// srog lus yan lag rdzas rnams kun// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// dngos grub 'dod phyir gsol ba gdab// blo
313a7(ya): zhan shes rab chung ba yis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka sreg pa na// de bas gzhan du bstan pa med// nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhi
313b1(ya): la/ phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// dur khrod sa ni rab tu brtag/ 'byung po'i gtor ma btang nas kyang // gsang ba'i don gyi las rnams spyod// rnam par rtog pa
313b2(ya): bgegs yin te// rnam rtog rang gi sems las byung // sems nyid ye nas dag shes na// gzhan nas bgegs zhes bya ba med// 'thun pa gnyen pos gdul don du// zhe
313b3(ya): sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' la khro bo 'chol pa spro// bskrad dang brdeg par gcad par bya// snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtag pa dang //
313b4(ya): slob dpon ji bzhin stan bder gnas// rab tu mnyam pa'i tshad gzhal te// rang byung bdud rtsi'i tshig chag gdab/ ba su ta yi thig gis bcad// re mig thod pa'i 'phreng ba
313b5(ya): bzhin/ pho brang zla gam chen po dgu// mthing kha dkar ser dmar dang ldang // rab tu dmar ba dag tu bya// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad brgyad gnyis bya// phyogs pa zhi sgo
313b6(ya): bzhi nang khyams bcas// 'od kyi rang bzhin rtsig pas bcad// phyi rol 'dod yon gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro dur khrod gnas chen kun// ji ltar gsungs pa
313b7(ya): bzhin du bri// sngon gyi 'phrin las shes par bya// rdul tshon gzhal yas khang de la// ji ltar dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// lha rnams rab tu 'byung ba yi//
314a1(ya): gnas rnams so so de nyid du// thod pa'i ru pi bris pa dang // so so'i yi ge 'phreng ba'i sngags// snang ba'i 'od dang bcas pa dang /
314a2(ya): g+ha zhal ldan pa'i phur pa rnams// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las rten// mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod nang du// 'bru bcud bdud rtsi rab sbyar ba// yon tan
314a3(ya): dngos grub 'byung ba'i rtan// rdzas kyi mkho ba mdzes par bzhag/ phyi rol bar chad bsrung ba'i rgyan// dmigs pa'i rten yang rnam par dgra mo// rdo rje slob dpon rgyal
314a4(ya): 'thab dang // shes rab ma dang las mkhan dang // gral gyi dgos pa tshang ba yis// phyi dang nang gi 'grul bcad de// lhag pa'i rtags kyis kun tshang nas//
314a5(ya): bsgrub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlab// rang gi gnas su ma gsol te// mchog tu bya phyir rab tu brtan// dmigs med stobs kyi gdeng can gyis// sku mchog
314a6(ya): 'bar ba'i tshul du bsam// khams gsu ma khrag tu dmigs nas kyang // dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam// zhi ba 'i tshul gyis bkab bsgo zhing // khro bo'i/
314a7(ya): las kyis bsrung ba ni// 'bar ba'i me dang mtshon cha lnga// khrag 'thung lha rnams sprul pa'i tshogs// lta ba rnam dag don rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba kun
314b1(ya): tu bsda ma// tshogs bsags phra mo'i kha skong gis// zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag/ basman pa'i don du 'di dag bya// da ltar bdag nyid brtan byas nas//
