314b2(ya): ye shes dkyil 'khor grub pa ni// dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid las// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// chos dbyings ye shes de nyid kyis// ma khyab pa/
314b3(ya): la thugs rje bskyed// dngos ni hU~M du byin parlabs nas// rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang // byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros// mos pa'i thugs la mnyes
314b4(ya): bsam ste// 'od 'dus thog ma'i hUM la gzung // sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yum lnga yi// mkha' dbyings rnam dag ba byung ba lnga// rang gi sa bon lnga las bskyed// /
314b5(ya): de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ phyag rgya che dang ldan pas ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom byas te// de yi nang du sngar bshad pa'i// tshad med gnas de bsgom bya
314b6(ya): ba/ sku gsum ldan pa'i thod pa ni// skam po shas ris thod rlon rnams// rmad dang rtsig pa kha bad la// lha chen phung po ka ba la// gza' ku rgyu skar rnams
314b7(ya): kyis phug/ dbang phyug dang ni 'khor los gyur// ba dan phyar zhing rgyal mtshan bsgreng // kun gyi tshul dang ma lus ldan// drag po'i gnas kyi dbus dag tu//
315a1(ya): ru tra nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// gnas gzhan rnams su sti ra'o// lha rnams rang gi sa bon las// phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dag/ brtan par gyur nas
315a2(ya): mkha' la bzhag/ bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'das pas// des kyang spro ba'i las rnams bya// nga yi rang bzhin lha rnams kun// so so'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang //
315a3(ya): bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom// de yi rim pa 'ang 'di lta ste// mi dmigs chos la blo ldan zhing // ye shes can gyi byin stobs kyis// thams cad dam tshig
315a4(ya): chen po yi// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon de// rdo rje pad+mo ldan byas nas// dbyings kyi bde chen las byung ba'i// rang gau ye shes de las bskyed// ji bzhin
315a5(ya): mkha' la gsal dag pa'i// sprin med nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'tsher// rang gi byin gyis brlabs las byung // rigs kyi bdag pos rang dbang bskur// las kyi khyad par
315a6(ya): brtags nas kyang // so so'i gnas su brtan par bsgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo bas// dam tshig zil gnon
315a7(ya): phyag bya dang // mchod dang stob dang za ba dag/ tshul rig goms pa'i blo dag gis// tso rigs su ni spyad par bya// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dang // bskul tshig
315b1(ya): dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes// 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad// zhag grangs dus ni brtag pa 'am// mtshan
315b2(ya): ma brtan po byung ba na// sgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i lebu
315b3(ya): ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i sku gsung thugs
315b4(ya): rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya byin gyis brlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can gyi khams
315b5(ya): thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ji skad pa thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i skur byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
315b6(ya): nyon// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ rnam par grol ba mtshon pa'i phyir// badz+ra he ru ka dpal gyi// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar ro// g.yas dkar g.yon
315b7(ya): dmar dbus mthing zhal// zhal gsum phyag dru gzhabs bzhir bgrad// rdo rje kha T+wAM rje chung g.yas// dung dmar rgyu zhags khyang khra g.yon// he ru ka ni ya shas
316a1(ya): rgyu/ shes rab dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa thabs kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar ga tso
316a2(ya): la stob/ kro d+hi shwa ri dbyings kyi rgya// bud+d+ha ha ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// smra ga nag mthing kha dkar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo stir khyad chen g.yas// ban
316a3(ya): dmar dbyug pa ba su g.yon// pud+d+ha kro d+hi yum dang sbyor// rat+na he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ser nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal// rin chen byi dbyug
316a4(ya): dgra sta g.yas// ban dmar ri rab rgyu zhags g.yon// rat+na kro d+hi yum dang sbyor// pad+ma ha ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // dmar nag mthing dang
316a5(ya): dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma ba tshon dgra sta g.yas// ban dmar thong gshol ri rabu g.yon// pad+ma kro d+hi yum dang sbyor// kArma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug
316a6(ya): zhabs bzhir ba grad// ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// rgya gram ral gri dgra stag yas// thod khrag ri bo phur pa g.yon// karma kro d+hi yum dang sbyor// yu mtshan
316a7(ya): rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis 'khyud// so so'i gtso bo sku mdog la// g.yas pa kha muM yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gcol
316b1(ya): stob/ taya ba yum 'di dag thams cad kun// nyi zla pad+ma ru tra gnon// khro bo'i gar nyams dgu ldan zhing // dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// ma mo rnams kyi phyag
316b2(ya): rgya ni kau ri bi na dmar byis dbyug sngo// tsau ri mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// pe ta byis za rdo rje gnag/ pu ka dasar ser byis rgyu 'dren//
316b3(ya): b+hasmA dung dmyur khrag bzung ljang // sgyu sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsar+d+ha sIr sgyu mchog lus 'brel// 'phra man rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// sing nga ser mo zhing za sar
316b4(ya): bya g+h+ri dmar mo lag bsnol stag/ sri la nag mo byis lngag wa// sho na mthing kha~M sha 'drad spyang // grib+hU dmar mo dung tr-i rgod// kang ka dmar smug zhing khur dur/
316b5(ya): ka ka bya rog bam gri gnag/ hu lu mthing nag rdor dbyug 'ug/ lha mo dang ni 'aza man rnams// khro mo'i tshul du cung zad zhi// khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// hU ka ra ni sku
316b6(ya): mdog sngo// phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gangs shing 'phen// rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog dkar// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon tri shul// dbyug pa sngon po sku mdog sngo// me
316b7(ya): dpal g.yas la dbyug tho g.yon// gshin rje gshed po sngo skya'i mdog/ phyag g.yas thod dbyug g.yon dgra sta// mi g.yo ba ni mdog ljang sngo// ral gri g.yas la
317a1(ya): zhags pa g.yon// rta mgrin can ni sku mdog dmar// spu gri g.yas la lcags sgrog g.yon// 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar skya'i mdog/ ban d+ha g.yas
317a2(ya): la rnga yab g.yon// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gnag ste// g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon dril bu// khams gsum rnam rgyal sku mdog mthing // rdo rje g.yas la sbrul zhags g.yon/
317a3(ya): stobs po che ni dud kha'i mdog/ tho ba g.yas la zhags pa g.yon// khro bo 'di rnams thams cad kyang // dpal gyi chas kyis rab brgyan pa'o// rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren//
317a4(ya): phag gdong sngon mo mche zhags bsdom// spre gdong dmar mo lcags sgrog 'ching // spyang gdong ljang khu dril 'khrol brdeg/ khro mo'i chas kyis cung zad brgyan// kun kyang gcol 'dud cing
317a5(ya): lta/ de nyid rigs kyi dbu brgyan cing // rang gi sems dpa' snying la gnas// gzugs su brtag pa'i dngos po kun// nga yi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so//
317a6(ya): dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
317a7(ya): thams cad kyi bdag po des// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par 'byung ba 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
317b1(ya): zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jigs pa'i sgra chen pos g.yo bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hU hU hU hU hU/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ he he heH
317b2(ya): hi he ha ha/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dza hU ba ho/ rtsa ba'i snying po'o// oM ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hU~M/ oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM/ oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hu/
317b3(ya): oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM/ oM karma shrI he ru ka hU/ badz+ra kro d+hi shA ri stAM/ bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa ra ste/ rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri sta/ pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri stA/ karma kr-i d+hi shwa ri stA/ badz+ra ko'u ri ha/ badz+ra tso'u ri ha/
317b4(ya): badz+ra pra mo he/ badz+ra pe ta li ha/ badz+ra pu ka sa~M ha/ badz+ra g+hasma ri ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da li ha/ badz+ra sing ha mu kha he/ badz+ra g+h+ra d+hI mu kha he/ dza pri la mu kha he/ badz+ra sho na mu SheShe/ badz+ra gr-i D+ha mu kha he/
317b5(ya): badz+ra ka ka mu kha he/ badz+ra kA ka mu kha he/ badz+ra A lu mu kha he/ badz+ra hU ka ra hU/ badz+ra bi dza ya hU/ badz+ra nI la daN+Da hUM/ badz+ra ya mAn+ta ka hU/ badz+ra ar+ya a tsa la hU/ badz+ra ha ya grI ba hA/
317b6(ya): badz+ra a pa ra tsit+ta hU/ badz+ra a mr-i ta kuN+Da la hU~M/ badz+ra trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ badz+ra ma hA ba la hUM/ badz+ra ar+ya ta dza ste/ badz+ra te dza te dza/ badz+ra pa sha hwA/ badz+ra lo ka ba/ badz+ra ba ya tai ho/
317b7(ya): rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shr-i he ru ka kro d+hi shwa ri stA/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya sta/ ra ho haM/ ra ga ya mi/ badz+ra sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+ha ba AR+Ya ko&ha/
318a1(ya): hU s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hU/ nges par 'byung ba'i snying po'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakrA ka ya a d+hi ta na yo/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma badz+ra b+hak+Sha a d+hiSh+Ta/
318a2(ya): / na a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra badz+ra tsit+ta a d+hiSh+Tha na hUM/ byin gyi sa brlab po'i snying po'o// o ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na a ta ri sha sa man+ta b+ha tra pra be sha tri ha a nu ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sA b+hA ba
318a3(ya): aR+Wa ko&ha/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ dbang bskur ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka kro d+hi sha ri a tsaN+Da sar+b+ba la a r-i laM hri nga hri dza dza/ bod pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka kro d+ha
318a4(ya): shwa ri a tsaN+Da la sa ma ya dza pra be sha tiSh+Tha au a/ ga zhug pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shri he ru kA kro b+hi shwa ri ka ru ni ma hA maM sa rak+tA a mr-i ta i da gr-ih+NA ba liM tA pi ba ta la kha khAH
318a5(ya): khyA hiHa la la ho/ ba ta ba tsang bza' ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+rA shrI he ru ka kro d+hi shwa rI ma hI bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+nyA na a ho su kha kA ya bA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM hUM hr-i hr-i/ dngos grub bsdu ba'i
318a6(ya): snying po'o// thams cad nye ba ni 'dis bya'o// o ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dag pa he ru ka nyid kyis// gnyis med don la rab brtson pas// dbyangs drug dag pas de na
318a7(ya): drug rdzogs// sngags kyi yi ge sgra bsgrags pas// dkyil 'khor lha rnams gsal bar bskyed// 'brug ltar zab cing sgra bsgrags pas// gtum dang gdug pa
318b1(ya): nir gyur// 'khor ba rmugs kyi rlung na tsal// khro ba rnam pa sgrub pa med// don chen po dun kyis// gdug pa can rnams tha bkod 'dul/ @
318b2(ya): ngamadu ba'i sgra 'atsun pas// tshigs pa'i tshogs rnams rtsul du rnyog/ tshangs pa' rgyas kyi 'dren rgyu ma gyis// rnams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// ces gsus
318b3(ya): dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rna ba'i rgyud las/ yi ge baphreng ba'i ngan yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u drug pa'o// / de nas bcom na
318b4(ya): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje rje yin nyid kyi snying zin chas thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa
318b5(ya): rnam par smra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi don dam pa lhun gyis grub pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen ba
318b6(ya): na gyis brlabs nas/ 'di skud ces bka' stsal to// em 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// da snying nga las ma 'das kyang // nyon mongs las kyi 'phrul pa
318b7(ya): brtags te la gzugs su mthong // sla da 'drir reg dang chos/ thos na tsho'i myong brtags shing spyad// skye bo dos ning mi mthong // ngal gzugs med
319a1(ya): mthong ba med// sgra med thos pa yod ma yin// ro dang reg med myong tshor med// yid chos rtog pa gang la yod// rten pa'i gzhi ni gzhal med khang //
319a2(ya): 'byung ba lnga ni dag pa'i yum// phung po lnga ni grol ba'i yab// dbang po dag pa phyag yin te// phyag mtshan du ni yul drug 'dzin// khams chen bco brgyad dpa' bo yi// nyams
319a3(ya): dgu dang ni ches brgyad do// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs dbu gsum ste// khams gsum zhabs su snang ba yin// de nyid stong zhing shin tu stong // rab tu stong pa chen po'i ngang // grol
319a4(ya): ning shes pas nga yi gzugs// dgyes shing chags pa'i thigs rje yis// snyoms mdzad yang shes gang yin pa// he ru ka dang yi sgra// tI ni dag pa phung po lnga// ro ni sku
319a5(ya): drug ye shes drug/ stobs dang mi 'jigs reg pa yin// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad de// sems can rnams kyi sems byung dang // ye nas 'brel ba nga yi rgyud//
319a6(ya): rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// cung zad 'khrul pa rgyud kyi gzhi// lam ni smin cing grol ba'o// rang gi de nyid legs mthong zhing // sar gnas dbang thob 'bras bu de//
319a7(ya): bsags shing thob la rten gyur pas// nga yi sku zhes brjod pa yin// yang dag mtha' dang ma lus pa// mi rtog pa yis rtogs pa ni// ye shes yin te nga nyid mthong //
319b1(ya): kye kye tshogs kun brtson pas nga la nyon// nga la gnyis su ma lta zhig/ nga dang so sor ma 'dzin cig/ bshang gcig khu ba khrag dang sha// nga yi tshogs rnams mchod pas/
319b2(ya): mnyes// dur khrod mi gtsang bam pa'i rdzas// ma byin bslangs te yid bzhin spyad// ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// nus dang ldan la mi tshangs spyad// blo chung shes
319b3(ya): rab dman pa yi// skal med rnams la brdzun du smra// log pa'i lam zhugs stobs can ni// ga ru Da yis bsad cing bsgral// spar zhing mchod de sbyang ba yis//
319b4(ya): nga yi ngang du gzhag par bya// e ma yul dang bsam pa'i dngos// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro 'ong dang // yod med rtag chad bral ba ste// rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab bsnyad
319b5(ya): nas / nga dang gnyis su med pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ snying po de kho na nyid yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste
319b6(ya): bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las
319b7(ya): sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje dngos grub nye bar gyur pa'i snying po rab tu bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs ma yin
320a1(ya): pa'i dngos po ma lus pa rnams yang dag par mchod pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brlabs te/ gtsang ba dang sme ba'i rtog pa ma lus pa zlog pa rdo rje dam tshig chen po rab tu
320a2(ya): blangs pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan zhing // tshul rims goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du
320a3(ya): 'gro ba'i las spyad de// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen yang // 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog/ dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs brnyan yang // re dang chags dang
320a4(ya): dogs pa yi// ngan pa'i don gyi sems mi dbyung // byin gyis brlabs pa ma lus bya// nga dang lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i// ji ltar bshad pa'i pho brang du// rin chen rigs lnga ban+d+ha
320a5(ya): lnga/ rnam par dag pa'i bcud kyi dngos// phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig ste// sdong po lo ma me tog dang // 'bras bu khan b+ha shug srabs dang // rtsa ba dang ni lkog pa'o//
320a6(ya): don snying lnga dang b+he ra la log/ lam gnyis brgya ni nang yin no// sems bcud dri ni gnyis po dang // go ro tsa na mam sa lnga// gsang ba yin ta rtsa ba brgyad// mngon
320a7(ya): pa phyi dang sbas pa nang // rgyal blon skyobs dang bcas pa ni// le tog shing tog me tog dang // rtsi thog 'bru dang rdo shing bcud// sems can bcud dang rin po che//
320b1(ya): ma lus lus pa med pa kun// dug lnga sman du bsgrubs pas na// dgag bya gang yang yod pa min// ro dang nus pa kha dog rnams// rnam dag rtsa ba yan lag bcas//
320b2(ya): spang bya gang yang yod ma yin// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas su bkod// snang ba chen po shar ba dgram// sgrub pa po rnams rgyan rtags gdab// so so'i gral du
320b3(ya): 'khod nas ni// khrol bu rtag btsag phye ma dang // gong bu skyo ma lde khu dang // ril bur byas pa so so yi// dus dang rtags kyi rim pa bzhin// lnga dang de nyid nyi shu/
320b4(ya): yis/ ta rab tu sbyang bar bya ba ni// man la ma bi dkyil 'khor la sa la gzhug/ tshangs pa dang ni drang srong sogs// spyan drang gzhug cing rtog pa bzlog/ mdzes
320b5(ya): dga' spro ba'i spyod pa rten// ngo bo rnam dag ngang du gsal// 'od zer 'phro 'du gsal ba dang // thams cad bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis sbyang // de nas rigs lnga'i
320b6(ya): dkyil 'khor dang // dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i sngags kyis sbyang // ya shas lha rnams phab nas ni// dbang gi rgyal pos bsrung bar bya// rdo rje rigs kyi brdungs shing
320b7(ya): sbyang / slar yang thabs dang shes rab kyis// 'thun pa'i rdzas rnams brtag cing btsag/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs// yi ge dgu yi sngags
321a1(ya): kyis sbyang // 'bras bu lnga bsgral bdud rtsir bcas// mu sa la yis bskrad cing bsgral// rgyas gdab mnga' gsol dbab pa bya// gcig tu bya ba'i
321a2(ya): tshul dag kyang // dkyil 'khor bdun dang sbyor ba brgyad// bzhu dang btul dang dbab dang dkyil// yi ge dgu yib phro 'du yis// mdzad pa'i tshul gyis 'gro don spyad//
321a3(ya): mchod bstod bskul dang bshags pa dang // bzlog cing bskul dang bcol sogs kyis// rtags dang ldan par mthar dbyung bya// rtsa bzhi'i rgyud ldan dgos pa bya//
321a4(ya): tshogs chen mchod pa rgyun mi bcad// gtsang sbra gsum la gnas par bya// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// rtag tu nyan thos rgyar bsags pas// bcu drug char
321a5(ya): yang mi phod de// mthar thug par ni de bshad bya// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// dngos grub chen po blang bar bya// mchod chen 'di ni yon tan mchog/ lha rnams nyer skongs
321a6(ya): las rnams 'grub// rigs 'dzin bzhi dang grub pa brgyad// thams cad nga yi gsung bzhin du// grub par 'gyur ta gdon mi za// gal te bsod nams yon
321a7(ya): tan la/ gzugs dang dngos por grub 'gyur na// 'jig rten srog chags ma lus kyis// brjod par nus par 'gyur ma yin// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchod chen te//
321b1(ya): phyi nang gsang bar ldan pas bshad// mdor na de yi bsod nams kyis// bde bar gshegs pa kun mchod pas// 'di nyid bsgrubs pa'i khyad par ni// lhag pa bas
321b2(ya): kyang chas lhag ste// 'dim rtogs pa'i mchod pa'i stobs// phyogs gzhan kun na yod ma yin// de bas rtag tu 'bad par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag
321b3(ya): 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mchod pa chen po'i las yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
321b4(ya): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khams gsum gyi dngos po myur du bde ba chen po'i
321b5(ya): sa la sgrol zhing dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa dang / rig pa thams cad rab tu bsgral
321b6(ya): ba'i zhing du byin gyis brlab ste/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos bdag gi bde ba dang pha rol tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yang dag par sgrib pa/ rdo rje dngos grub chen
321b7(ya): po'i las rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub myur du sgrub 'dod na// rdzas
322a1(ya): mchog mtshan ldan rtags la btsal// rdzas bzhi gang la brtags te sbyar// rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'i rigs// rje rigs la sogs rigs//
322a2(ya): btsun zhing // byed bzhin bzang la smin dkyus ring // skra ni bung ba ltar gnag la// so dang mchu ni bim pa 'dra// mtshan dang ldan pa bkra shis rdzas// lus bzang
322a3(ya): skad snyan tshig gsal zhing // skra kham shel mig so zug lhag/ skra mtshams nas ni sna rtse'i bar// sla ba bdun ldan skye bdun par// mi lus skyes pa'i rtags mtshan te// /
322a4(ya): dag pa'i lha rdzas yin zhes bshad// skyes pa gzhon nu 'bad rtsal can// glang po g.yul du zhugs pa de// sgrub pa mchog gi rdzas yin no// bsgral zhing spyad pa'i bsgrub rdzas ni//
322a5(ya): mi rta glang chen mkha' lding khyi// she lo gnag smug dang tsar sogs// thugs dam bskang zhing tshang bar byas// sgrub pa po yi rol ba'i rdzas// ma traM bsgral ba'i zhing bad+yA ni/
322a6(ya): dmigs kyis bsgral zhing mngon sum btsal// gzhan yang dbang phyug chen po yi// dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams pa// blangs te bsgrub par bya ba yang // rgyud bzang rigs
322a7(ya): btsun mtshan dang ldan// bkra shis gtsang zhing yid du 'ong // dus tshod rab 'bring tha ma la// dus la bab pas blang ba'i dus// bdag nyid khrag 'thung yab yum gyis
322b1(ya): rgyal 'theb karma ging gsum la// dbang bskur bsrung ba byas nas ni// mtshon cha bskur te pho nyar btang // srid pa'i rgyu mchog sgrub rdzas 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dngos
322b2(ya): grub rdzas// kha T+wAM mtshon cha thogs nas su// dpal chen khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// khams gsum zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// nyi zla'i spun gyis gsang bar bya// rdo rje'i 'gros
322b3(ya): kyis rab tu btsal// gshin rje'i khang khyim gzhom pa'i phyir// kha Ta rdo rjes la btab// 'chi bdag bdud kyang bsgral ba'i phyir// gshin rje gshed kyi phur pas gdab// dug
322b4(ya): lnga skye shi rtsed bcad phyir// rdo rje sngar mos blang bar bya// ro nyid gshad dang dpral ba'i phyir// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad tshad// stobs po che yi skur byas la// drag sngags
322b5(ya): brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// snga ma'i bdud dang phyi ma'i lcag/ gzugs dang mtshan mar bcas pa ni// phur bus btab ste snga gos dril// khur bur mnan te sde snod gzir/ kha phrin
322b6(ya): las bzhi yi gzir gnon bya// nor bu yid bzhin 'gyur bsams te// las kyi karmas khyer nas ni// rgyal 'thab kyis ni byin gyis brlab// gang gi 'phra man 'byon
322b7(ya): tshul bya/ dur khrod ma mo khro bo'i gnas// srin po stag dred 'thab pa dang // gcan gzan 'dab chags 'du sar drang // gnas de bsrung dang bskrad pa bya// sgrom
323a1(ya): du rtsal te rgyas gdab bya// las dang ye shes pho nya yis// de yi rnam par shes pa dang // 'dod yon rdzas su bcas pa kun// snga ma
323a2(ya): las ni gnas sgyur te// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// phung po rdos bcas bam po de// phyogs bzhir bro ba zhis sbyang bar bya// ye shes lha dang mkha'
323a3(ya): 'gro ma/ thugs dam bkang zhing bskul bar bya// khrus byas zla gam nub tu bzhag/ 'bru lnga bkod la lam lnga dgag/ de la lha rnams dgod pa ni// bdag nyid yab
323a4(ya): yum sa bon las// yan lag lnga la bsam pa ni// rigs lnga yab yum dgod par bya// mdun rgyab gnyis su dgod pa ni// A li kA li bsam par bya// rnam
323a5(ya): shes dbang po yul dus la// sems dpa' yab yum dgod pa bya// spyi bo rgyab dang lce yi steng // rkang mthil yan chad thub pa drug/ mtshan khung gnyis dang
323a6(ya): mkhal khung gnyis// sgo ma yab yum bsgom par bya// rnam smin brag bcas phung po la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// 'od zer 'phro 'dus sbyang
323a7(ya): byas te/ don gnyis mthar phyin phyag rgyar dgrol// cho ga lnga dang yan lag lngas// yang dang yang du sbyang bar bya// byang shar mtshams ca cang byas la// de yi
323b1(ya): bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'// de nyid khrag 'thung lha tshogs rdzas// glo snying dpal chen yab yum gyi// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung yab
323b2(ya): yum rdzas// bum pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dpung pa g.yas g.yon bzhag sha dang // rgyu mchi na 'og sha gsang ba rnams// rtsa ba'i lha dgu'i rdzas su bzhag/ go ro
323b3(ya): tsa na rgyas pa dang // rkang dang tshil bu sha dang khrag/ srog rtsa mkhris pa brgyad rnams ni// mu kha 'a phra man brgyad kyi rdzas// yan lag rnam thar bzhi rnams ni// ya
323b4(ya): shes sgo ma bzhi yi rdzas// sgal tshogs phrugs rar bsdabs pa ni// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi'o// na lag tshe 'phrar bsdebs pa ni// rang byung khro bo bcu yi rdzas//
323b5(ya): sha khrag rus pa rkang dang tshil// mkha' la 'gro ma kun gyi rdzas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ban d+ha ni// dpal chen bzhugs pa'i rten yang yin// dngos grub
323b6(ya): chen po bsgrub pa'i snod// de yi nang du btsal ba'i rdzas// go ro tsan dri chen dang // snying dang srog pa rtsa yi khrag/ maM sa mkhris pa dri chu dang // de dag mnyam/
323b7(ya): pa'i tshad sbyar dang // tshil chen snying po lnga sbyar ba/ bla rkang gnyis dang rje ra rkang // dung chen bud pa sgra yi rdzas// dpung pa'i rkang mgo rnam gnyis ni//
324a1(ya): / rak+ta sgreng ba'i gzar bu'o// ba su ta yi rgyu zhags ni/ thig gdab maN+Da la bskor ba dang // bi na ya kra bcing ba'i rdzas// shun chen zhing gi ga yang
324a2(ya): gzhi ni/ bla re bres dang dpa' bo'i chus// ya mgal ma 'gal gnyis po de// kha dam bya ba'i rdzas kyang yin// de dang sogs pa'i ma mdo ni// ya ma dam
324a3(ya): sri mnan pa'i rdzas// shar sgor dngos grub gsol byang dang // rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang // bdud rtsi bum pa dngos grub rdzas// de dag kun kyang bya ba ni//
324a4(ya): dngos grub rdzas dang ngo bo nyid// slob ma lha dang ru tra dang // sgrub pa'i rdzas su blta ba rnams// gnas su dgod cing lha ru dmigs// sman du spro dang rdzas su ba
324a5(ya): mchod pa dbul dang rgyan du dgram// 'bar ba'i srag dang bgags tsa mnan// nga yi spyod pa 'thun par spyad// ha ru ka dpal nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so//
324a6(ya): dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dngos grub chen po nye bar bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de
324a7(ya): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de/ khams gsum pa thams cad rang gi sku gsung thugs kyi
324b1(ya): nga du brtan par bya ba'i phyir// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por phyi dang nang gi dngos po ma lus pa snang bar byas nas/ chos kyi rgyal tshab tu
324b2(ya): dbang bskur ba bla na med pa'i sa nod par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / baphags pa'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams kyi sa bkur ba'i gnas/
324b3(ya): su 'os pa/ lha dang / mi dang / lha mau yin dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa drags shing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dul zhing tshar gcod par nus pa/
324b4(ya): rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad/ he ru ka rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'i don ma lus par
324b5(ya): byed pa'i thabs chen po 'di dag bka' stsal to// rdo rje rigs kyi gnas mchog ni// dur khrod dang ni lha rten gnas// ma mo bi khyim dang yid 'ong gnas// dar ni
324b6(ya): sa yi cho ga byas// skyes bu rtogs pa'i blo gros can// dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis// srog lus man chad rdzas rnams kuna?// ser sna med pa'i sems
324b7(ya): kyis dbul// tshul dgu ldan pa'i bla ma yis// rtag par dbang bskur dam pa bya// he ru ka nyid don gnyer zhing // 'jig rten dregs pa'i phyir ma yin//
325a1(ya): brtul zhugs spyod pa dngos nus la// khur chen khur du khur nus pa'i// ye shes rdo rje thob byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang snying po
325a2(ya): dam pa 'dir// bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bya// rin chen me tog gang gtor ba// gang la bab pa de yi rigs// gtso bo ltas pa sgrub pa ni// dngos grub myur bar the tshom med// ye
325a3(ya): shes dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan no// kun rdzob gzugs su bstan pa yin// 'di la dad pa rab tu bskyed// dngos grub ma lus mngon du 'gyur// dam tshig mchog ni 'di bzung bas//
325a4(ya): bla ma spun grogs lha dang 'khor// sngags dang phyag rgya gsang tshig rnams// bskur dang mi spang sgrub pa dang // rgyun mi bcad cing ltengs mi btang // 'di ni bzhi yi dam chog yin//
325a5(ya): spang bar mi bya dang du blang // spyad par bya zhing shes par bya// sgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnams// sems dang sems nyid 'dras pas na// mi bcing ba dang bsgrub
325a6(ya): pa dang / gcig tu dang ni lhun gyis grub// de las mi 'da' dam tshig yin// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed// dam chog bsrung/
325a7(ya): na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor du// slob ma rab gzhug dbang bskur te// bya bral rdzogs pa'i man ngag bsnam
325b1(ya): ting 'dzin bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// slob ma 'bring gzhug dbang bskur te// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i man ngag bstan// gzugs brnyan bsnyen bsgrub dkyil 'khor du// tha ma
325b2(ya): gzhug cing dbang bskur te// rim gyis blo sbyong man ngag bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po
325b3(ya): cha mchog he ru ka chen po des/ bcom ldan pa ngos dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang
325b4(ya): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam chog chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
325b5(ya): gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po des dbang bskur ba yongs su rdzogs shing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su sprul nas bzhugs par gyur te/
325b6(ya): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po de dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod
325b7(ya): pa la sogs pa'i he ru ka rigs lnga byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so// de'i tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings
326a1(ya): thams cad rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyam
326a2(ya): pa nyid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag por byin gyis brlabs so// dbang
326a3(ya): bskur ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa he ru ka zhal gsum pa dang phyag drug par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de'i
326a4(ya): tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad ji snyed du byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur ma thag tu/ thams cad kyis ba dang
326a5(ya): dang yid bde ba thob par gyur nas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ gsang ba byang chub sems la ngo 'thon du
326a6(ya): ngam zhing bstod do// gzhan yang de'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus
326a7(ya): te/ byang chub sems pa don thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba dka' ba dpag tu med pas byang chub kyi snying por gnas pa gang na pa dang gshegs te/ thams cad longs
326b1(ya): spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rab tu 'bar bar bstan nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par bya ba'i
326b2(ya): phyir dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la spro bar byed/ 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i ma yin zhing / mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan te/ rang gi sems nyid 'od gsal zhing dri ma med
326b3(ya): pa la gnas par byos shig ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad kyi phyag gis sri ba'i gtsug tu reg par mdzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' das bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
326b4(ya): byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis bskul nas dbang bskur bar rig nas/ phyogs bcun bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de/
326b5(ya): tshul de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje lho phyogs kyi shing sa la'i drung byang chub sems dpa'i yul stobs can dang lcang lo can
326b6(ya): gyi gnas su dbang bskur ro// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus su/ za hor ma ri'i bar ba dang / gnam lcags ma rI 'bar ba dang // ma la ya yi rtse mo dang //
326b7(ya): lang ka grub pa'i yul dag dang // chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram dang ni// ang ka mang ka ta yi yul// srin len tra'i yul du ni// byin gyis brlabs te dbang bsku
327a1(ya): 'gyur/ rta sngon tshe tshe rabs zangs med nas// dge ba'i las kyis brten pa'i lha// lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin par// da lta nyid du khyod la
327a2(ya): dbab/ oM/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// de bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i skur ni mdzad du gsol//
327a3(ya): oM bu da d+ha bai ro tsa na oM/ oM chos kyi ngag lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// de bdag byin gyi brlabs nas ni// rdo rje'i gsung du mdzad du
327a4(ya): gsol/ a mi tA b+ha hri A/ hUM dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rdo rje'i thugs
327a5(ya): su mdzad du gsol// hU badz+ra sa twa hUM/ 'di ni sngon du 'gro ba ste// phyi nang gsang bar yongs su sbyar// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang // me tog 'phreng dang phyag rgya
327a6(ya): dang / ban d+ha rdo rje dril bu dang // 'dod yon lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// rgyal po'i bka' rtags rnam par bdun// thun mong byin gyis brlab
327a7(ya): pa'i rdzas// khyad par nang du gyur pa ni// yid 'ong bkra shis rigs kyi yum// zhi rtags rgyan gyis mdzes par bya// thabs ni g.yas kyi phyogs sum+b+ha//
327b1(ya): de bzhin shes rab g.yon du'o// thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas lnga ru// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i snying po la// rgyas gdab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/ bde gshegs yab lnga'i
327b2(ya): dkyil 'khor gsal// de yi gzugs kyi phung po la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa ni// rgyal gdab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/
327b3(ya): bad gshegs yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// spyi bo'i gtsug dang lce yi steng // nu ma'i bar dang lte ba'i steng // gsang gnas yan lag rnams su ni// yum lnga
327b4(ya): sems ma sgo ma bsam// zhi ba dang ni khro bo rnams// spyang dang bstan pa'i tshul du bya// lha rnams brda sprad 'od zer gyis// dkyil 'khor spun drang mchod bstod nas/
327b5(ya): dbab cing bstim pa yab yum gnyis// rgyal po rgyal mor byin gyis brlab// ye shas dam tshig chen po yis// pad+mo rin chen ldan byas nas// bde mchog sgyu ma'i
327b6(ya): brdas mtshon te// dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung ba ni// rang rig ye shes de la 'od// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal dag pa'i// tshi med nyi ma'i bod pas 'tshar// byang chub
327b7(ya): sems 'di kun tu dag/ khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang // ma lus snying rjes khyab byas te// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// 'od 'a dus thog ma'i gzugs la
328a1(ya): bzung / rgyal po yab yum gnyis med sbyor// rang rig bde 'byung gsal ba'i rgyun// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i rin chen gyis// slob ma byin
328a2(ya): brlabs dbang bskur bya// de ni phan pa'i byin brlabs so// nus par byed pa'i byin rlabs ni// nyan pa dang ni bsgrub pa dang // las byed pa dang 'chad pa dang // nus pa
328a3(ya): chen por bsgrub pa'o// de yi khyad par bsgrub pa ni// zla kham gcig gam drug cu'i bar// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal 'theb dang // sbyor sgrol gyi ni las mkhan dang //
328a4(ya): sgrub pa grogs mchog dbang rnams ni// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te// rdo rje dril bus rig pa 'dzin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi// chos la 'dod bzhin
328a5(ya): byin gyis brlabs// blo bral 'di la gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang // bdag dang gzhan don mi byed pas// sgyu ma lhun grub yul la rol//
328a6(ya): rang gi mthu yis rig pa las// chos ni gzhan nas 'byung mi 'gyur// gcig ste rnam pa yongs su med// rnal 'byor nam mkha' lam la gnas// ma byung
328a7(ya): ma skyes snying po la// sgro btags chos kun ga la yod// dbang thob mdzes pa de dag gis// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas ni// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas
328b1(ya): khyod kyis srog chags gsang bar bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin pa yang khyod kyis long // pha rol bud med spyad par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis//
328b2(ya): sems can ma lus bskul bar bya// dka' thub dag gis gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni sangs rgyas byed spyod yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod
328b3(ya): thams cad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dag par gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyod ma 'jigs// gzhan yang dam tshig las sdang zhing // skye bo gang dag bstan la gnod/
328b4(ya): brtul zhugs khyod kyis de drongs la// khrag chen po ni btung bar gyis// skal ngan 'jig rten nyan thos la// nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste// skal bzang he ru ka dpal
328b5(ya): gtso/ khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ he ru ka byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i
328b6(ya): le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rab tu gnas par byed pa'i he ru ka chen po des
328b7(ya): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje ba spu'i bu gar bsdus te/ sku'i dbyig tu brgyud cing rdo rje'i lam du phyung ste/ yum gyi mkhab la phab nas byang chub
329a1(ya): kyi sems hUM gi reng bzhin du byas nas/ dpal he ru ka 'jigs byed chen po'i sbrul dur khrod chen po'i ches brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag na gdug
329a2(ya): byed kyi mtshon cha thogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ srid gsum gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// zhe sdang chen po'i skur bstan to//
329a3(ya): de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid nas// khro mo dbang phyug mngon du phyung / byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// chos kun gnyis med
329a4(ya): byin gyis brlab// dbang bskur thabs kyi ting badzin gyis// gnas mchog dam par byin gyis brlab// rol pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// sgrub pa'i bdag po//
329a5(ya): byin gyis brlab// shes rab snying rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// yum dang rgyu la byin gyis brlab// tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sgrub pa'i rdzas mchog byin
329a6(ya): gyis brlab// rigs kyi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// slob ma gsar bu byin gyis brlab// khams gsum yongs sgrol ting badzin gyis// ta na chen por byin
329a7(ya): gyis brlab// srid gsum bde sbyor ting 'dzin gyis// gan mkha' 'gro byin gyis brlab// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang chos kun byin gyis brlab/
329b1(ya): kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin gyis// snying rje'i yul rnams byin gyis brlab// rnam dag rgyu yi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi sems nyid byin gyis brlab// dbang chen mkha'
329b2(ya): dbyings ting badzin gyis// phyi nang 'byung ba byin gyis brlab// bsod nams ting 'dzin byin brlabs kyis// gzhal med khang pa byin gyis brlab// yi ga 'phro bdu'i ting
329b3(ya): badzin gyis// dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlab// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab// gnas gsum dag pa'i ting
329b4(ya): 'dzin gyis// mchod pa'i rdzas kun byin gyis brlab// shes rab rnal gyi ting 'dzin gyis// lhag pa'i rgyan rtags byin gyis brlab// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor ting 'dzin
329b5(ya): gyis/ sbyor dang sgrol ba byin gyis brlab// ces gsungs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i 'phrin las kyi bdag nyid byams pa dang snying rje
329b6(ya): rab tu brtan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi ngang las thugs chos nyid zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang / khro bo 'bar ba khrag 'thung chen po'i tshul du byung ba ni/ mi g.yo phyag rgya
329b7(ya): chen po'i ngang // chos kyi sku las bzhengs nas kyang // sems can thams cad khro ba'i phyir// rdo rje yang ni khro bar bya// zhes gsungs nas/ nyon mongs pa can
330a1(ya): gyi sems can rigs so so'i gnas nas drang ba dang / dngos grub kyi rnam par brdzu ba dang / gnas byung ba dang / bsgral zhing slar gso ba dang / las rab tu
330a2(ya): bsgrub par bya ba'i rim pa dag dang / gzhan yang dpal chen po'i ye shes sems dpa' 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa/ phyi nang gi rnal 'byor ma dang grub pa mo dbang phyug chen po dang bcas
330a3(ya): pa dbang du gsol to// gang zhig bstan pa la sdang ba thugs rje chen pos ma bsgral na ni/ rnal 'byor chen po'i sgor zhugs kyang tshul bzhin du ni ma gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
330a4(ya): gzungs ma bzung bar 'gyur bas/ rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su brgyal bar bya ba ni chos nyid kyi khyad par ro// thar pa chen po'i lam chen 'dir// thod pa can dag
330a5(ya): 'gro ba ltar// skal bar ldan pa'i nang na khyod// bde bar 'ongs so legs par 'ongs// bde gshegs thugs rje sgrol la mkhas// blo ngan sems can snying rengs can
330a6(ya): gnyis su med par bsgral bar gnang // khams gsum nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi
330a7(ya): gzugs la gzung // spo brdzu rdo rje thams cad kyis// sku dang ye shes mchog tu bsgral// las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus la bab pa'i sems can 'di//
330b1(ya): gnyis med phyag rgya chen po yi// dus la bab bo sa ma ya// oM ka re ka ha tsa re pa ho sa ma ya thAM/ mtha' med 'gog med mi 'dzin pa'i// rnal 'byor ma nyam nyid thod rgal du//
330b2(ya): khro gtum rngam zhing la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs ston yang sems mi g.yo// a tsa la saM ma ya d+harma d+hA du swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ khro bo'i mtshan med byams par gnas//
330b3(ya): gsod byed snying rje'i mtshan nyid de// bsgral nas btab pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor bta snyoms so// oM ma hA ka ru Na ma hA mai tri swa b+hA ba at+ma ko \u0f85ha/
330b4(ya): drod dbugs rlan las raM ya kha// bsreg cing gtor la bkru bar bya// rgyu shel dkyil 'khor skye med bsam// zhe sdang ser sna gti mug ni// dmyal ba byol song
330b5(ya): yi dgas lam// nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog ni// lha dang lha min mi yi lam// dge bcu bsam gtan snyoms 'jug ni// gong ma gsum du skye ba'i rgyu// de
330b6(ya): dag rang bzhin med shes shing // sems mi skye ba skye rgyun gcod// a Ni su tri pra ru dza// rgyud drug pa khor ba rtsad bcad nas// rgyud lnga lam gyi sgo dgag
330b7(ya): phyir/ oM A hU hrI swA hA/ so so'i skye gnas sgo dag gnas// mnyes pa lnga dang stong pa lnga// skong ba lnga ni sgrub pa lnga// 'bras ma rdzi pos 'di dag bstan//
331a1(ya): zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po sgrol ba bla na med pa'i phan yon yang dag pas bshad
331a2(ya): pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka de/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rab tu bsdigs
331a3(ya): pa'i phyir/ nyid kyi skul khro bo chen po nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zhal du rngub par byed pa'i khrag 'thung gi tshogs bya ba grangs med pa dang / khro mo dbang phyug gi gtso mo dang / ma mo dang / 'phra
331a4(ya): men ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo dang / sring mo dang / lu gu rgyud dang / pho nya mo dang / sa'i bdog mo dang / lang ka'i tshogs dang / gong gtso bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /
331a5(ya): 'bar ma dang / sring mo'i tshogs dang / bar snang yangs pa la rgyu ba'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams mngon du phyung ste/ de dag kyang sha za ba dang khrag 'thung ba la dga' ba rnams dang / mtsha ba can dang //
331a6(ya): gshog pa can dang / nu ma can dang / sder mo can gyi tshogs ji snyed pa dag gis/ gang dag 'da' bar byed pa rnams tshar gcod par dbang bskur te/ bran gyi tshogs bzhin du mdzad
331a7(ya): nas dam tshig gi byar la bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig gdug pa can gyi tshogs// nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di nyid// ma 'ongs pa na snyigs ma'i dus/
331b1(ya): shin tu gdul ba dka' bar 'byung // byams dang snying rje sa gzhi gzung ba'i// kun tu bzang po'i sa chen la// myur du 'bad pas bsgral bar bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs
331b2(ya): kyi bdag/ tshe lung rdo rje dngos grub gzhi// khyed kyis de la myur du gsol// nyon mongs las dang bag chags dang // rnam par smin dang snyoms par 'jug/ sprul pa
331b3(ya): dang ni chos kun gyi// nga yi sa la sgrib pa sbyong // rtog pa dang ni thugs rdza yis// gzas pa po dang bdag nyid dang // thun mong phal pa bsgral zhing gsol// rgyal po
331b4(ya): me dang chu dang dug/ sbrul dang gcan gzan khro bo dang // mi rgod chom rkun gdon rnams kun// nga la gang ltos zhi bar gyis// tshe dbang dpal dang dbang phyug dang //
331b5(ya): grags pa dang ni longs spyod tshogs// gang 'dod de la rgyas par gsol// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // rgyal po rje dpon tshul dag gis// ma lus de yi dbang du
331b6(ya): bsdus/ stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs dang bdud// mi dang mi ma yin gyi tshogs// nga la mi mthun mngon du spyod// kye kye khyed rnams brtson pas nga la nyon//
331b7(ya): nga yi bstan pa 'di lta bu// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus rnams la// shin tu dkon zhing rnyeng par dka'// de phyir nga yis khyed rnams la// gdams shing yongs su
332a1(ya): gtad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// /
332a2(ya): / de nas dpal chen po nyid la sprul pa'i 'khor khro bo dang phra ma tshogs dag ma mo dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang / 'phra men ma dang pho nya'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gis
332a3(ya): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces bstod do// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rjes dgra zin mi mnga' zhing // gdug pa 'dul phyir
332a4(ya): dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'dzags byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces pa la sogs pas bstod de phyag 'tshal zhing zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/
332a5(ya): dpal chen po nyid kyi bstan pa'i gnyer gtad pa rnams pasrung zhing skyong bar khas blang zhing dam bcas so// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang 'phrin las
332a6(ya): rnams la ni rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par dga' ba'o// de nasu 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus pa de dag ni dpal chen po nyid kyi sku la 'od zer gyi tshul du thim par gyur to//
332a7(ya): dpal chen po he ru ka yab yum nyid kyang rol pa chen po'i ros tshim par mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po'i ngang skye ba mang po chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid kyi klong du thim par
332b1(ya): gyur to// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyang dpal chen po yab yum gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/
332b2(ya): chos kyi mig rnam par dag nas lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la rab tu nye bar gnas par gyur to// dpal khrag 'thung bdus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ byin gyis brlab pa'i tshe ba grul gyi
332b3(ya): dkyil 'khor rnam par bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das gsang ba dpal he ru ka'i gal po bsdus pa/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus
332b4(ya): pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
332b5(ya): phab pa'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o// // rgya gar skad du/ ya ma k+Sha ta bi ru tan tra na ma/ bod skad du/ gshin
332b6(ya): rjerdza gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
332b7(ya): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje thams cad kyi gshad/ sku 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po chen po de 'og min gyi gnas ri rab chen po'i khong seng dam
333a1(ya): pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' dang mnyam pa na/ sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs pa'i dus kyi tshe/
333a2(ya): 'khor 'dus pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi sras dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/ gshin rje gshed kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / myos byed 'bar ba chen po zhes bya ba dang / 'phags pa dmar po
333a3(ya): zhes bya ba dang / ral pa dgu pa zhes bya ba dang / rigs kyi sras chen po de dag gi sku la dgos par sbyor ba'i yum ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / gtum mo chen po zhes bya ba dang / 'od
333a4(ya): zer can ma zhes bya ba dang / dpal chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de dag gi 'phrin las rdzogs par byed pa/ sgrol ba'i yum nag mo chen mo zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags khrag gi bdag
333a5(ya): mo zhes bya ba dang / gling bzhi rab tu 'byams ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gshin rje'i gtso bo chen po'i tshogs 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang //
333a6(ya): dbang phyug rdzogs zhes bya ba dang / srid pa 'joms zhes bya ba dang / don gyi glang mgo can zhes bya ba dang / ya ba ti zhes bya ba dang / mig dmar zhes bya ba dang / rab tu dmigs pa zhes
333a7(ya): bya ba dang / shin tu rtil pa zhes bya ba dang / bdud 'joms zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / 'bar ba dmar po zhes bya ba dang / thod dbyug can zhes bya ba dang / de dag
333b1(ya): gi sku la rab tu sbyor ba'i yum nag mo ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / shel gyi gdong dgum zhes bya ba dang / khro mo shal mig ma zhes bya ba dang / dkar skya ma cha ba gtsigs ma zhes bya ba
333b2(ya): dang drad kyi ab sham can zhes bya ba dang / khrag gi ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / klu mo pus 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / spyan gsum mche gtsigs ma zhes bya ba dang / smag nag ral
333b3(ya): gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ral pa can zhes bya ba dang / dmar mo mgo dgu ma zhes bya ba dang / nag mo phag gdong can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gshin rje bya rgod kyi mgo can
333b4(ya): zhes bya ba dang / stag gi mgo can zhes bya ba dang / kang ka'i mgo can zhes bya dang / sbyang ki'i mgo can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gsod par byed pa'i pho nya bzhi dang / gcod par byed
333b5(ya): pa'i bdud bzhi dang / khram la 'debs pa'i rtsis pa bzhi dang / srog la dbang ba'i shan pa bzhi dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i dregs pa can pho dang mo'i rnam pa dang / rje dang bran gyi
333b6(ya): rnam pa dang / 'khor dang g.yog gi rnam pa dang / bu dang bu mo'i rnam pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi gzugs dang / nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang /
333b7(ya): kwa'i gzugs dang / gnod sbyin gyi gzugs dang / srul po'i gzugs dang / lus srul po'i gzugs dang / yaM dgas kyi gzugs dang / sha za'i gzugs dang / grul
334a1(ya): bum gyi gzugs dang / lto 'phya'i gzugs dang / dri za'i gzugs dang / srin po'i gzugs dang / dud 'gro'i gzugs dang / byol song gi
334a2(ya): gzugs dang / dmyal ba'i gzugs dang / sku'i sprul pa dang / gsung gi sprul pa dang / thugs kyi sprul pa dang / yon tan gyi sprul pa dang / baphrin las kyi sprul pa dang //
334a3(ya): rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa dang / de la sogs te thugs zhi ba chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i dbyings kyi ngang las ma g.yos kyang / sku dang gsung gi cha lugs dang / nga rob sgra/
334a4(ya): drag po dang / gtum po dang 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / gdug pa'i gzugs dang mtshon cha sna tshogs 'chang ba dang / ma rungs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa rnams dang thabs cig tu
334a5(ya): bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don rjes su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i 'phrin las kyi rol pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang // gzhan
334a6(ya): du med pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnas der rab tu 'dus par snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug de bzhin
334a7(ya): gshegs pa dang / zhe sdang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / nga rgyal de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'dod chags de bzhin gshegs pa dang / phrag dog de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
334b1(ya): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa dang / pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ral gri de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor lo de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
334b2(ya): dpal gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / grags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dbang phyug da bzhin gshegs pa dang // gzugs
334b3(ya): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / brtson 'grus de bzhin gshegs pa dang / bdud bcom pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
334b4(ya): dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la yang dag par bskul ba ni/ kye kye de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// duso gsum sangs rgyas thams cad
334b5(ya): kyi ta sku yi sku ste sku yi mchog/ rnam par dag pa'i dbang phyug che// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// ma lus thob cing yangs pa'i bdag/ bsags dang
334b6(ya): sbyang ba las byung ba// ji bzhin ma lus sna tshogs pa'i// mkhyen pa dang ni ye shes bdag/ rang dang gzhan dang phyi rol pa// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dang //
334b7(ya): tshe chung tshad ma'i skur ston pa// gang la dgongs pa der snang zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas sbyin pa// yang dag pa dang nges pa dang // dran pa'i gnas dang lam tshol dang //
335a1(ya): ji bzhin ma yin dgongs pa dang // ldem po dang ni spyod pa dang // sar gnas pa dang rdzogs pa dang // rang byung ba dang rtsol ba dang // rgyu dang rkyen
335a2(ya): dang byed pa dang // gzhi dang khams dang bsam pa dang // las dang rigs dang gnas la sogs// ma lus rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can// thugs rje cha la thabs mkhas
335a3(ya): pa'i/ 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug po// mthu stobs 'chang ba dregs pa can// yi dwags gshin rje kun gyi gshed// 'jam pa'i dpal las byung ba yis// 'jigs
335a4(ya): byed chen po'i sku bzhengs pa// khyod kyi zhing khams gzhal yas dang // sgrub pa nye ba'i bsgrub pa dang // mngag pa'i las dang yon tan rigs// rang ngo gtan tshigs bya
335a5(ya): brag dang // khyad par de yi dgos pa dang // gnas sbyong ba dang tshogs chen dang // 'gyur ba'i gnas dang rang gi mtha'// 'phrin las dang ni mthar thug dang //
335a6(ya): gsal bya rjes gzung yongs gcod dang // dmigs pa'i ched du bya ba dag/ rang gi 'khor la legs par ston// gdul bya yongs su smin mdzod cig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
335a7(ya): thams cad kyi// sngon gyi 'phrin las dam pa'o// zhes bskul te skad cig de nyid la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par gyur to// gshin rje gshad brangs pa
335b1(ya): rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gshin rje khro bo kun gyi gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa che//
335b2(ya): rab tu bstan nas 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor// nga ni thog ma med pa nas// ngang gis gnas de shin tu bgres// rang rig byang chub sems kyi gzhi// /
335b3(ya): spros med brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// nyon mongs sems can las kyis mnar// skye 'chi 'khor ba'i gshin tshogs la// 'dul zhing sgrol ba'i gshed yin pas// de dag nyid
335b4(ya): kyang stob pa'i rje// rang bzhin dang ni bgrod pa dang // grub pa dang ni las rnams kyi// gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// gdul bya sna tshogs snang ba ste// las kyi bad dang /
335b5(ya): zhi gnas dang // rang sangs rgyas dang 'gog pa dang // sbyong bgrod rab tu dga' spyod dang // 'gyur pa 'gog dang bzang ngan lta// dag pa'i cho ga gtsor spyod dang // brtag
335b6(ya): shes mthong ba'i khyad par yin// blo dang dbang po bsam pa yis// myur 'gro rdzogs pa'i don du bstan// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gshin rje'i tshogs// gnas ngan len tshogs
335b7(ya): de yis sbyong // thun mong ba dang khyad par gyi// phung po ma yin las las bzlog/ 'byung ba phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rten cing 'brel la sogs// rnam par
336a1(ya): dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ rgyus stobs ldan par skur byed do// gnas dag gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang dug gi yon tan
336a2(ya): tshogs// ji snyed ji bzhin ma lus pa'i// shes bya dang ni sbreng bya dag/ thogs med mkhyen pa grub pa'i mtha'// mi 'dod pa dang dbang med dang // gnod pa
336a3(ya): zhi dang sbyor ba dang // rang dbang thob dang tshar chod dang // de yi 'phrin las rdzogs yin// gsal bya rang bzhin rtags dang ni// thabs dang 'bras bu nges par
336a4(ya): byarang bzhin bde ba chen po yi// mtshan nyid bzhi dang mtshan nyid dngos// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// thams cad de nyid khor na'o// 'khor ba'i
336a5(ya): ga nas lugs shi ba'i gshin// kun gzhi rnam shes de yi rje// de dag 'dul sbyong gshed du 'gyur// rtags ni ma lus gzugs kyi sku// rang gi gdul
336a6(ya): bya gnyen pos 'dul// sgrub byed rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gnas gsum shes pa thabs yin no// mi gnas grol ba'i sku gsum gyis// dag pa gsum
336a7(ya): gyi bdag nyid ldan// gzhi dang lam gyi rtog pa 'joms// khams gsum 'gro ba rigs drug dang // khyad par gdug pa can gyi rigs// gnas ngan len pa
336b1(ya): che la so ga sa// bla mas tsa da ma lu sa gzung bya'o// ga nas sri de smral pa sa yo nga sa su gcod// du sa ga su ma ba de gsheg sa bla mas cad kyi// skA yi ba sgrub pa
336b2(ya): dmigs pa'i ched// 'di dag rigs kyi bdag po'o// de yi gsung du snang ba yang // a zhes bya ba chos kyi sgo// ma skyes thabs kyi rdzogs pa'o// kro
336b3(ya): zhes bya ba de nyid las// ma 'gags snang ba'i bdag nyi de yin// d+hi ni gnyis med rang byung ste// zung 'jug 'thun par ston pa'o// ka ni skra ste sna tshogs
336b4(ya): snang // rang gi ga dul byar gtogs pa'o// ya ni gsung ste stong nyid sgra// skrag pa med par brjod pa'o// man ni thugs kyi ngo bo ste// ma lus 'dul
336b5(ya): bi'i bdag nyid ca na// ta ni yon tan kun rdzogs te// srid zhi mthar thug rtogs pa'o// ka ni thugs rje shugs kyi rtsa la// 'jig rten cho sa la snang
336b6(ya): ba'o// ha ni 'phrin las grub pa ste// rang gi dmigs pa ched du byed// na ni ming gi sgro 'dogs te// sna tshogs btags pa ma 'gag sa ston//
336b7(ya): ma ni yid kyi rnam rtog la// ma lus skyob byed rab tu btags// tha ni 'gro ba'i ded dpon rje// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ b+ha na ni 'ching
337a1(ya): khyed rgya lngas grol// 'khor ba'i 'brel thag bcad pa'o// dza ni bdud las rgyal ba ste// byang chub sems kyi khyad par ro// oM na
337a2(ya): rigs kyi gtso bo ste// hUM gis rab tu brtags par sdud// phaT kyis las kyi phung po gtor// gsung gi dbang phyug smra ba che// ma 'gags rtsal gyi longs
337a3(ya): spyod byed// thugs ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid// rab tu spro ba ma g.yos chos// gnas pa'i 'khor lo g.yo ba med// sred pa'i 'khor lo longs spyod che//
337a4(ya): sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'gro don mdzad// gcod pa'i 'khor lo drag shul spyod// 'di ni rigs kyi 'khor du shes// zhes bka' stsal to// gshin rje
337a5(ya): gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rgyal po
337a6(ya): rdo rje 'dzin// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo bzhi// lta ba dang ni longs spyod dang // cho 'phrul 'phrin las ston mdzad phyir// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen
337a7(ya): la/ dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma nga ni yon tan tshogs// ma lus kun gyi ngo bor snang // yid bzhin nor bu ji lta bar// yang dag
337b1(ya): thugs kyi ye shes de// rab tu mchod cing bstod par bya// shes bya'i yul dang shes byed gzhi// sna tshogs nga yi thugs la gnas// bsam zhing 'dod pa 'di
337b2(ya): las 'byung // rang gi byang chub sems 'di nyid// thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag nyid de// sku gsum rdzogs par rang la gnas// rig pa'i rgyal pos dbang
337b3(ya): bskur dus// phyi dang nung dang bar mA dang // snang drang srid dang rtog pa dang // bsdus dang spros dang 'tsham pa dang // thams cad rang gi sems las byung // de
337b4(ya): nyid gnas su gyur pa yis// gzhi dang ngo bo rang bzhin dag/ ma bcos ma byas grub pa ni// sgros bral chos kyi sku yi gnas// de nyid gzugs su bstan
337b5(ya): pa ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan ma bkag tshol// ji ltar 'dod pa dang gis rdzogaso// longs spyod mi zad 'khor lo la so// bya dang byed pa snang ba'i dus// gnas
337b6(ya): gyur rung ba spyod dus na// thogs med 'dod pa yid la skye// don rig snang ba sbrul sku'i gnas// ye shes thugs ni nam mkha' bzhin// stong zhing snang ba'i
337b7(ya): mtshan nyid can// 'ba' zhig snang ba skye med pa// chos dbyings ye shes gnas pa'o// spro dang bsdus pa phyag rgya'i las// 'dod pa'i dngos po ma lus pa// /
338a1(ya): me long chu zla la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan snang ba dang 'dra zhing // shes dang shes bya ma lus gsal// sna tshogs snang ba'i
338a2(ya): dngos po de// ma bsgrubs rang gi ngang du gsal// gsal ba'i ye shes gnas pa'o// rang gi thugs la bkod pa yi// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang
338a3(ya): po lnga dang rnam par shes// yul lnga kha dog byed pa lnga// yab yum rigs dang 'phrin las dang // ma lus rnam dag ye nas gnas// so sor rtog pa'i ye
338a4(ya): shes gnas// de dag kun gyi gzhi dang yul// khams kyis bsdus pa'i sna tshogs lus// ma lus dbyings su ril gyis mnyam// mnyam nyid ye
338a5(ya): shes rang rig gnas// kun gyi rang bzhin byang chub sems// de las byung ba'i 'phrin las ni// nan tan spyod pas kun la khyab// ye shes bzhi ru
338a6(ya): gnas pa'o// sems nyid me long brtags pas na// sngar byas byang chub sems nyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang rang gi dngos// mi gnas mya ngan 'das
338a7(ya): pa yang // sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med// de nyid 'khor ba las kyi sa// mya ngan 'das pa ltar snang shes// rang gi thugs la de nyid gnas//
338b1(ya): don dam snang po byang chub sems// thams cad badren pa'i chos nyid do// brtags shing dpyad pas shes min te// nam mkha' lta bur spos dang bral/
338b2(ya): kun rdzob snang dang srid pas bsdus// log pa dang ni yang dag ste// rtog pa phyi 'gyur med snang yin// ma 'dres partags bzod gnyis su gnas// don gyi
338b3(ya): gnas lugs lta ba ni// mig gi dbang po ji bzhin du// mthar thug rdzogs par mthong ba yi// spang blang skyon yon sbyang tho ba dang // shes 'gro yul dang
338b4(ya): gnyen po'i tshogs// mu lus rtogs pa nyams su myong // yan lag nying lag bya ba bzhin// 'gro 'chag nyol 'dug spyod lam gyis// gnas dus yul
338b5(ya): gyi bye brag la// byas shing spyad pa chud ma zos// rang gzhan don gyi gnas spyod cing // yid la 'dod rdzogs spyod pa'i gnas// thun mong ba dang khyad par
338b6(ya): gyi// phyi nang rtsol ba ma 'gags pa// sna tshogs pa dang kho na yis// nges par spyod pa thabs kyi gnas// shes rab kyis ni blo phye nas// de bzhin nyid
338b7(ya): dang yang dag mtha'// gnas nyid skyon med phyogs kun rtogs// mngon par byang chub shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi sems zhi gnas// de nyid dang las
339a1(ya): ma bcos gnas// stobs kyi ye shes lhag mar mthong // phyin ci ma log spyod pa'i gnas// rlabs chen rnam par dag par sbyang //
339a2(ya): sems la sa rung ba'i ting nge 'dzin// dri ma med pa'i shes rab kyis// sku gsum mngon du gsal bar rdzogs// yang dag ye shes thugs kyi dngos// nges pa yi
339a3(ya): ni bkag pa dang // sgrub pa med pa'i chos thams cad// 'khrul zhing 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'o// las kyis ma lus gcod pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
339a4(ya): dag/ ye shes rig po'i mtshon cha yis// mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang du gcod// 'khor ba'i bag chags gnas ngan len// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
339a5(ya): med// rab tu 'brel pa'i ye shes kyis// nyon mongs bag nyal len zhing sreg/ brtse ba gsum dang snying rje las// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med pa'i// byung
339a6(ya): chub sems kyi 'od zer las// cho 'phrul sna tshogs snang ba yis// 'khor ba'i mun khang thibs po 'joms// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// don
339a7(ya): dam ma bcos rang byung me// 'khor ba'i nyon mongs spyir ma dang // mi gtsang ldan ldan ma lus skems// gnyis med thugs kyi 'khor lo dag/ 'phrin las
339b1(ya): thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// rab skor srid pa gsum gyi dngos// mi shes rmongs pa rab tu gcod// rtogs pa dang ni thugs rje yis// ba dag dang gzhan du snang
339b2(ya): ba la/ srid pa sgo nga mngal dang drod// de ma thag tu rdzus te skyes// gnas gzhi rtsa ba yongs gcod cing // sreg dang 'joms dang skems pa yis// thugs
339b3(ya): las byung ba'i nyi ma bzhis// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// dgongs pa dang ni ye shes tshogs// khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyi// las dang
339b4(ya): rgyu 'bros sdug bsngal dag/ gas la dang sar smin rgyu gzhan las// ma ltos pa dang rang las rdzogs// thugs kyi nyi ma bzhi yin te// gnas pa lta ba'i 'khor
339b5(ya): lo ste// me lus yongs su rdzogs pa'o// srid pa 'khor lo zhes bya ba// kun gyi lte bar gnas pa ste// gnas 'jig rten pa'i khar lta bu// dbang ga la gnad
339b6(ya): bcud rdzogs pa ste// de bzhin 'jam dpal mkha' las byung // gshin rje kun gyi gshed gyur pa// gnyis med thugs kyi ye shes 'chang // 'dod khams
339b7(ya): gzugs khams gzugs med khams// lha klu mi yi srid pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// dbang po lus ngag yid gsum dang // thig le
340a1(ya): gnas dang longs spyod gsum// rtag chad dbus ma mtha' dang bcas// skye 'jig gnas par gi ge zhi// ma lus sku gsum 'dus shing

340a3(ya): khre mon chud pa yi// ste ngo 'og par gsum zo chu'i khyud// las kyi shugs kyis 'khor zhing chags// stobs gzhan gyis ni bskyod mi nus// 'jigs byed chen
340a4(ya): po'i bdag nyid kyis// las kyi gshin rjes gzir ba yis// lto na srid pa gsum gnas shing // 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kyi// rnam par shes pa'i
340a5(ya): rten 'phos tshe// de nyid las kyi rgyal po yi// phyag gis 'du byed byas pa yis// las kyi 'phen pa gnas 'thun cing // nyin mtshams phung po nyer len pas//
340a6(ya): srid pa'i 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// kun gyis ma rig 'khrul pa la// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yis// chags shing zhen par rab tu brtags// srid pa'i rtse/
340a7(ya): mo man chad nas// las kyi mnar med yan chad du// los kyi dbang gi sa 'khor ba sa na// 'khrul pa'i snang ngo zad mi shes// las kyi 'khrul 'khor de nyid la//
340b1(ya): rtsa ba yan lag sna tshogs kyi// nyon mongs phra rags ma lus pa// rang byung shugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma lus mthar thug gcod par byed// shes pa'i srid
340b2(ya): pa gnas ma yin// zhi la mi gnas snying rje dag/ tshogs gnyis lam gyi yon tan gyis// ma lus gcod pa'i 'khor lo'o// de la yon tan sprul pa yi//
340b3(ya): 'khor lo'i cho 'phrul byung ba ni// sems dpa' gnyis kyi zhabs 'og nas// rmi lam sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin// ci dran ci snang ci spyod pa'i// las kyi rnam pa
340b4(ya): sna tshogs dag/ gshed chen rgyal po brjid pa'i zhabs// 'bar ba'i stobs kyis gnon pa ni// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs drug las byung // nyon mongs bzhi
340b5(ya): bcas 'gro ba drug/ snang ba yul gyi tshogs drug dang // sgo lnga lam gyi rgyud drug dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal chos
340b6(ya): dang ni/ la sa dang nyon mongs sprul pa drug/ rang gnas las kyi 'khor lo drug/ 'gyur med rang gi sar gnon cing // thugs rje thabs kyi sprul pa drug/ rigs

341a1(ya): gcig nas gcig tu kha brgyud cing // 'khrul zhing 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ste// nyon mongs drug po gcod byed pa// sna tshogs 'byung

341a4(ya): spel// dbang du sdud dang tshar gcod pa'i// lus kyi rnam bzhi'i dngos po gcod// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob// skyob pa'i bar cho de yis gcod//

341b1(ya): pas las// bcos med snying po'i don dang ldan// chos kyi sku zhes bya bar brjod// bsam byung srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// rten pa lus kyi ngo bo ste// snang ba rnam

341b3(ya): tshogs kyi las// nges 'byung sprul ba'i 'khor lo'i sku// gcod pa'i 'khor lo chos kyi las// brgyad dang drug dang bzhi gnyis kyi// yan lag las kyi 'phro

341b5(ya): spyod so sor ma gyur na// don dang ldan pa de mi na par// gsang ba'i sngags dang spyod pa dang // lta ba tshig tu tsam brjod kyang // mthar thug rdzogs par mi nus na//
341b6(ya): lta spyod ya bral gyur pa'o// cho 'phrul nges don ldan pa yang // phyi nang 'byung ba'i nus pa dang // yul sems 'phrad pa'i rtog pa yis// snang ba stong pa tha mi dad//

342a1(ya): kyi nus pa'i shugs bzhin du// gang la phog par 'joms shing gcod// gcig gis las kun grub par byed// ma grub srid du bsngags

342b1(ya): pa las// srog dang srog gi snying po las// ngo bo rang bzhin yon tan no// dge sdig gi sa ni ga sod pa dang // gso ba'i 'phrin la sa grub pa'o// mi sdug lta sa dang drag

343a6(ya): mtha' dang dbus su so sor bskor// tshogs bsags pa dang bsrung ba dang // bskyed dang spyan drangs bzhugs pa dang // phyag ba tsa la ba dang mchod cing bshag//

343b1(ya): rdo rje las la sbyar// gdug pa can gyi mtha' bsdus shing // phyi nang gsang dang bar du gsang // mtshams sbyor ba dang bsdam pa dang // gzhug dang gdags
343b2(ya): dang dbyung ba dang // yon tan mthar thug bsam mi khyab// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa'o// shes bya don gyi gan sa lugs te// nges pa don gyi lam mchog

343b5(ya): brgyud yul la kun nas ltung // theg pa dgu dang gnas pa gsum// sbyor ba bzhi la sogs rnams kyis// lam gyi rtog pa sna tshogs skye// rab 'bring tha
