343b7(ya): thams cad rdzogs pa'i rim pa las// nyan thos rang sangs rgyas pa dang // bla med sa la rgyu gsum gyis// 'bras bu gsum gyi ngo bor gnas// dag dang ma
344a1(ya): dag rnam par dag/ yul la nges par rab tu ston// gshin rje gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bzhi'i rim pa gsum
344a2(ya): bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dir bshad 'khor lo 'grub byed pa'i// rtsa ba bsgrub pa sku gasbyang
344a3(ya): thugs// yongs su rdzogs pa bka' stsal pa// thog mar mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma dag/ 'di nyid sku gsung thugs rdzogaso shing //
344a4(ya): yon tan ldan pas 'phrin las tshogs// sgrub 'dod pa sgrub rung smin 'gyur bas// nga yi rigs dang tshul 'thun zhing // mtshon nyid rdzogs pa'i gnas
344a5(ya): 'di ru// rten pa gzhi nyid rab brtags te// ba slang dang bsrung ba bdag gis bya// cho ga brtan bso rab sbyangs te// dur khrod rdzas dang bdud rtsi lngas//
344a6(ya): gnas la dmigs pa'i pho brang ba zhengs// bzhi dang bcu gnyis pa drag gis// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i dbyings su bya// rgyas dang bsdus pa'i khyad par gyis//
344a7(ya): rigs lnga rigs bzhi'i dbye ba dang // gsum dang gcig gi dbye ba yis// dkar ser dmar nag mthing kha'i mdog/ ji ltar rigs dang bsngags pa yis//
344b1(ya): bshad pa'i rgyan btag sa ma lus ldan// dmigs rten rdzas kyis mdzes par bya// yul gsum gsal zhing brten pa dag/ zhi gnas lhag mthong ting nge 'dzin
344b2(ya): gzugs brnyan rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang chos rnams ni// dbang po gsum gyi yul du 'gyur// rin po
344b3(ya): che dang 'bru mchog dang // sa sna lnga yi yo byad ni// rab 'bring tha ma'i 'byor pa ste// gang gis rtsom par 'gyur ba ste// phyi nang gsang ba'i yo byad kyis//
344b4(ya): phongs pa med pa'i 'bad pa dang // mchod cing btab pa'i longs spyod kyis// yongs rdzogs mnyes par bya phyir stsol// de nas rab tu bsrung bya zhing // mngon
344b5(ya): sum snang dang mi snang las// bka' ba sgo dbang bsdu mtshams btsod de// sbyang dang bsregs dang gtor ba dang // bskrad dang bcing dang mnan pa yis// ma lus
344b6(ya): tshar bcad rdzogs par bya// de nas tha mal rgyud sbyang phyir// dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mkha' la sprul// phyogs bzhi sgo bzhi gsol gdab cing // gzhal yas
344b7(ya): lta ba'i smon pa bya// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba yis// phyag 'tshal gsol ba gad pa ba dang // rgyu rkyen phyi nang gsang ba yis// mchod pa'i khyad par rim pa yis//
345a1(ya): mchog gi sku gsung thugs mnyes bya// de nas ba sgrub pa'i dam bca' zhing // lhag pa'i ye shes byin brlabs bslang // nyes pa bshags
345a2(ya): shing tshangs par spyad// rang gi byin rlabs yongs rdzogs pas// gnas sbyong rgyud smin snod bzang 'gyur// lhag pa'i lha yis nye bar bsnyan// de nas rab tu bsgrub
345a3(ya): pa'i phyir// dngos dang dngos min chos dang rten// ma lus rang gi mtha' la lte// de nyid ma rtog so snying rje'i yul// rgyu ba kun la dmigs pa bsam// rang gi/
345a4(ya): snying po de nyid ni// dmigs pa gsal rdzogs rgyu ru bsgom// de la spro dang bsdu ba yis// sbyang dang mnyes pa'i las rnams bya// tho ga ma'i gzugs la thi ma
345a5(ya): bsams nas// rang bzhin gnas dang grub pa yi// dag dang ma dag gnas gyur pa// ye shes 'byung ba lnga nyid kyi// rang gi sa bon rnam par bsam// e dang
345a6(ya): ya rA su ra ke/ mthing nag dmar ser dkar dang dmar// gzugs bral zla khamo gzhung 'dra zhing // gru gsum gru bzhi rab tu brtsegs// rang gnas de nyid ye shes
345a7(ya): lnga// 'phro 'du las kyi sbyor ba yin// bdag med stong pa'i ngo bor bya// kun rdzob nus pa rdzogs ldan zhing // rang gi mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin// 'ja' tshon sgyu ma
345b1(ya): tshul ltar snang // de yi steng du bsam pa ni// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan pa la// rgyu ni 'jigs byed rnam par snang //
345b2(ya): rang gi khams dang byed pa dang // gdul bya dang ni 'dul bar byed// gang la ba sngags pa der snang zhing // tshad med rdzogs pa nyid kyi sa gsal// ma bsgribs mnyam nyid
345b3(ya): brtan par bsgom// rang sngags snying po las kyi gzhi// byin pabarlabs cho 'phrul byung ba ni// a dang ma dang pa dag las// gsal la snying po bsil byed can//
345b4(ya): dag pa gsum gyis spyad par mnyes// ma he chu glang brjid pa ni// ha gi rnam par spros las byung // de dag steng du bsgom pa ni// hU chen pa ba ra ba'i 'od 'phros
345b5(ya): pas// 'jam dpal mkha' la byung ba ni// gshin rje kun gyi gshed gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur med pas// mthing nag 'bar ba'i 'od mdog
345b6(ya): can/ zhal g.yas dkar ba zhi ba'i ngang // 'phrin las drag shul gtsor spyod pas// g.yon zhal dmar nag brtsegs pa'o// sa dgu rdzogs shing gnon pa
345b7(ya): yis// spyan dgu sdang mig rab tu blta// chags pa'i thugs rje dang ldan pas// spyan rtsa dmar zhing phyogs bcur 'phrul// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa yi// mche ba
346a1(ya): bzhi ni rab tu gtsogs// sgrib pa'i bag chags gtor ba yi// shangs nas ye shes 'thor rlung gnas// ag tshom dmar po me 'bar
346a2(ya): bas// gdug pa'i tshogs kun zil gyis gnon// dregs pa dbang du sdud mdzad pas// zhal nas hUM sgra drag po sgrogs// rgyud drug dbyings su sgrol ba yis//
346a3(ya): phyag drug mtshon cha rang rtags 'dzin// g.yas pa dang po dug lnga'i tshogs// gtan nas 'joms mdzad be tshon bsnams// bar pa ral gri 'dzin pa yis// skye
346a4(ya): she'i 'jigs pa rtsa ba gcod// 'og ma dgra sta 'dzin pa yis// stobs kyi dug bzhi gnas bzhi 'joms// g.yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub kyis// gdug byed
346a5(ya): zil gru non 'bebs pa'i brda// bar ma thugs kyi ye shes kyi// 'khor ba'i gting 'byin mdung rings bsnams// tha ma dbang sdud thod khrag 'dzin// zhabs bzhi
346a6(ya): gyad kyi ngor stabs kyis// dregs pa ma mo dbang du sdud// sku gsum rang bzhin lhun grub pas// thod pa gsum gyi 'phreng ba sa brgyan// gdug pa klu yi dug
346a7(ya): 'joms pas// rigs lnga sbrul gyi lhu tshogs pa sda mas// blo yi theg pa sna tshogs rdzogs// 'phrin las bzhi yi cho 'phrul ston// ru tra ga dug pa sgrol mdzad pas//
346b1(ya): glang chen stag dang mi dbang po// pags pa sku yi na bzar gsol// dug gsum gtan nas 'joms shing 'dul// rak+ta thal byed khu ba yi sa// thig le tshom bu ri
346b2(ya): mor byas// mtha' gnyis spangs shing khyab pa yis// rdo rje ri ni chen gshog pa gdengs// nyon mongs rtsa ba yan lag tshogs// bsreg mdzad paskal ba'i me dbu//
346b3(ya): 'bar/ gti mu ga ma spangs don mdzad pas// ma he chu glang zhabs kyi sa gnon// skyon med gsal ba'i ye shes ldan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs//
346b4(ya): chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs pas// g.yon phyogs khro mo pe ta li// nag mo gtum chen dbyings kyi yum// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i spyan gsum ldan// khro
346b5(ya): gnyer rlabs kyis rab tu bskyod// 'khor ba ma lus gnas nas 'dren// dbu skra kha ma nag rab tu 'tsher// sku yi cha lugs gdug pa 'dul// za byed rngam pa'i
346b6(ya): rol pa'i stabs// zhal ga dang sa mche gtsigs lcags 'dril zhing // me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs// dug gsum rtsa da gcod dgra sta g.yas// g.yon/
346b7(ya): na ban d+ha khrag gi sa bkang // sgros bral nyon mongs zhal du rngub// sgrol mdzad ral pa gcig ma ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // dbu yi thor
347a1(ya): tshugs gcig tu 'khyil// chos dbyings yang dag ye shes dbyings// ma lus rtogs pa'i rtags yin te// g.yas kyi tri shul rtse gsum
347a2(ya): 'dzin// dug gsum 'dzin pa rtsad nas gcod// g.yang gzhi bags pa'i ru mtshon gyis// bdud bzhi'i rtog pa zil gyis gnon// g.yon na thod pa khrag
347a3(ya): gis bkang // 'khor ba'i nyon mongs dbang du sdud// 'gro drug dbyings su sgrol ba yis// khro gnyer drug gis rab tu 'bar// gtso la dgyes pa'i rol pa
347a4(ya): stob/ ha hi gsang ba'i nga ro yis// rang sngags gsang ba'i sgra sgrogasra shing // rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba sa// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro// yig
347a5(ya): 'bru'i rnam pa cho 'phrul gyis// 'dul byed rang gi sprul pa dag/ ji bzhin pa yi snang ba las// rigs kyi sras mchog 'byung ba ni// hU zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i
347a6(ya): gzugs// mthong kha 'od dang ldan pa dag/ rang gi gnas su ba skyed ba las// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i shar phyogs su// ya ma rA dza zhes bya'i sras//
347a7(ya): mthing na ga zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo ral gri lcags kyu g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra sta rgyu zhags
347b1(ya): g.yon// sbyor yum nag mo ral gcig ma// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// sgrol yum nag mo re ma ti// g.yas g.yon ral gri ne le 'dzin// lho
347b2(ya): phyogs su ni myos byed 'bar// ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas sgro g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// be chen ral gri dgra sta g.yas// ban
347b3(ya): d+ha 'khor lo lcags kyu g.yon// gtum mo ser nag sbyor mdzad ma// gtso la 'khyud cing dung khrag stob// ser nag khrag gi bdag mo ni// g.yas na spu gri
347b4(ya): g.yon snying zhags// nub phyogs 'phags pa ma ru rtse// dmar nag dbu ga sum phyag drug ldan// ga ya sa dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar nag/ bo chen
347b5(ya): dra byug to kha T+wAM ga yas// thod khrag 'khor lo rgyu zhag sa g.yon// ra smin can ni gnyis med sbyor// gtso la 'khyud cing dung khrag sto ba// gling bzhi spyi
347b6(ya): 'byam khros mi ni// dmar mo mi sgying thod khrag 'dzin// byang phyogs ral pa tshar dgu ni// ljang nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas mthing g.yon dmar
347b7(ya): dbus ljang nag/ be tshon gtun shing rgya gram g.yas// dung khrag 'khor lo rgyu zhags g.yon// re ma ti ni sbyor ba'i tshul// srin mo sngo nag mgo 'phyang ma//
348a1(ya): dgra sta 'phyar zhing dung khrag stob// sras mchog ya ba yum 'khor rnams ni// so so'i ris kyi sku mdog dang // rgyan bcas gtso bo yang
348a2(ya): yum gyi// tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs pa yi// phyi rol khyams sam 'khor lo la// gdul bya'i gshin rje ba skyed pa ni// steng phyog sa gnas pa'i gshin rje ni//
348a3(ya): nag po'i phyog sa 'joms zhes bya ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyi sa sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa rdo rje g.yo na da gra sta// nag po ral gcig yu ma dang bcas//
348a4(ya): dbang phyug rdzogs pa sku mdog ser// tshe bu mthong gshol phyag gis 'dzin// gdong dgu ma ni sbyor ba'i yum// brag 'joms mdog dkar g.yas rdo rje//
348a5(ya): phyag g.yon gyis ni 'khor lo 'dzin// khro mo shel mig ma dang bcas// ser nag dom gyi glang mgo can// phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon lcags kyu// mche
348a6(ya): gtsigs ma dang gnyis su med// sto nag yA ba ti zhes pa// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon lcags kyu// ab sha ma can zhes yu ma dang bcas// mig dmar
348a7(ya): smug nag g.yas ral gri// g.yon gyis ti ri'i dbyug pa 'phyar// dmar mo ral gcig yum dang bcas// rab tu dmigs pas dud kha'i mdog/ thod
348b1(ya): 'phreng ga las te lcags sgrog g.yon// klu mo bus 'gro yum dang bcas// gshin rje tel ba sngo nag mdog/ g.yas pa thu gri thod khrag g.yon// sbyor yum
348b2(ya): spyan gsum ma dang bcas// bdud 'joms smu ga nag phyag g.yas na// thod rlon g.yon na rgya gram 'dzin// skrag nag ral gcig ma dang sbyor// chos kyi rgyal
348b3(ya): bau zhes bya ba// dkar ser rdo rje khram shing 'dzin// rdo rje ral pa can dang sbyor// 'bar ma dmar mo g.yas kyis ni// rtsis byang g.yon na gtun shing thogs// dmar
348b4(ya): mo mgo dgu yum dang 'khril// thod dbyug can ni mthing nag mdog/ g.yas na rdo rje g.yon ti ra// nag mo phag mgo can dang sbyor// phyogs kun skyong ba'i
348b5(ya): gshin rje ste// khro bo gar dgu'i tshul dang ldan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rab tu mtshungs pa'i yum chen yang // kha T+wAM shel gyi lcags
348b6(ya): kyu dang // skar mda' khram shing tsit+ta mdung // thod rlon ral gri nyi zer dang // tri shul rdo rje zhags pa dag/ rim pa sa g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'dzin// g.yon
348b7(ya): ba dung dmar yab la 'khyud// rang gi phyogs nas brjid pa'i tshul// sgo ba zhi shar lho nub byang du// khro chen dkar mthing dmar ljang gdong // 'phra me na lta bu bya
349a1(ya): rgod dang // stag dang spyang ki kang ka'i mgo/ rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram rim bzhin g.yas kyis 'dzin// lcags kyu dbyug
349a2(ya): ba lcags sgrog dang // rdo rje dril bu g.yon na bsnams// khro bo'i gar dang ldan pa dag/ rang sngags gsang ba'i don gyi sa dra byung // khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen
349a3(ya): dag/ nga dang gnyis med dus gsum gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// chos dbyings me long mnyam
349a4(ya): nyid dang // so sor rtog dang nan tan gyis// rang gi ye shes ldan par bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsgrub pa yi// lus ngag yid kyi nus pa yi// yul gsum
349a5(ya): gsal bar rab tu bsgom// de la brtan par gnas pa dang // gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor che// rang bzhin grub pa'i pho brang nas// khyad par nga rgyal snying po
349a6(ya): nyid// lhag pa'i gnas su sbyong byed pa// mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin can// dgug cing bstim dang dbab pa dang // mnyes dang mchod pa btab pa dang //
349a7(ya): rab tu bsnyan dang shin tu bsnyen// 'phro 'du las kyi sbyor ba dag/ zhi bar bya dang rgyas par spel// dbang du bsdu dang drag pos 'dul// 'khor lo bzhi yi longs
349b1(ya): spyod kyis// las kyi mtha' dang bcas pa dag/ mngon sum nus pa sab tu spyad// ces bka' stsal to// gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
349b2(ya): las sku'i 'khor lo rab tu rgyas par bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byang chub tshul gyi sbyor ba dag/ gsung
349b3(ya): gi snying po gsang ba yis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la rab tu bstan// lta ba spyod pa cho 'phrul dang // 'phrin las rigs kyi khyad par gyis// de rgyal gti mug
349b4(ya): 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang phrag dog snang ba yis// thugs kyi snying po de nyid ni// blo chen rnams la nges snang ba// mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings//
349b5(ya): so sor rtog pa'i shes rab dang // kun tu gsal dang nan tan spyod// gcig la kun rdzogs gcig gi ngang // gcig las sgro dang gcig tu bsdu// snang zhing
349b6(ya): rtog pa ji snyed pa// don gyi ngo bo de nyid la// mthong ba'i tshul du lta ba ni// yang dag nyid las yang dag lta// 'jig pa dang ni de las 'das// gang zag dang
349b7(ya): ni chos kyi rtags// tshu rol pa dang pha rol tu// srid pa dngon zhi ba'i chos// mnyam pa nyid kyis gang bsgoms pa// mtshan mar snang dang mtshan ma med// rgyu
350a1(ya): 'bras stong pa nyid la gnas// gang la gnas pa de bsgom pa'i// 'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang // za dang 'thung dang nyal ba dang //
350a2(ya): bya dang byed dang gnas pa dang // gnas gyur rtog pa'i khyad par spyod// ji ltar gang la cir spyod pa// 'jigs byed gshed kyi brtul zhugs te// dang po pa dang
350a3(ya): mnyam gzhag dang // bde bar gshegs pa kun spyod do// de dag kun gyi 'phrin las tshogs// ma lus sgrub byed gnas pa ni// dmigs pa'i yul gyi bya ba
350a4(ya): dang / lam dang gang zag 'bras bu rnams// thob byed gsang sngags 'di dag go// o A kro d+hi ka ya mA na ta ke ha na da ha pra tsa ma tha b+ha na dza hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i nye ba'i
350a5(ya): snying po'o// o hI[:]Sh+Tibi kr-i tA na na hU phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza se do ma ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya hUM phaT/
350a6(ya): rab tu gsang ba'i snying bi'o// oM a kro te ka hU phaT/ oM pe ta li re kA ma na hU phaT/ o e ka dza ti tre ga rakra snying kha ra ga mo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM ya
350a7(ya): ma rA dza sti tho la ya hU phaT/ o pre ta bi tri ya ma rA dza ma ra ta ka hU phaT/ o pre te b+ho dza la hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza ta ka la k+Shi pre to da ka ta hAM phaT/ o raka mo raka
350b1(ya): mo snying rtsa la sha ma b+h+yo/ oM ra ka mo raka mo khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo/ oM ra ka mo raka mo ting saM ma ma b+h+yo/ oM raka mo re ma ti ting ka la ma b+h+yo/ oM he ma he b+h+yo hUM phaT/
350b2(ya): oM ya ma de b+h+yo hUM/ oM nu ga de b+h+yo hU/ oM kha ra ga de b+h+yo hU/ oM ya ma rak+Sha kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma ma tI ti hUM phaT/ oM d+ha ya d+he ba hU phaT/ oM ya ma shri ku ru hU
350b3(ya): phaTa.oM ya ma a ti h+yA baTo/ mo ya ma a t+ya r-i rU phaT/ oM ya ma rak+Sha tsa li sU phaT/ oM la ma sarba sA ta d+hu phaT/ oM ya ma i maM la hU phaT/ mi
350b4(ya): ya ma d+har+m+ma rA dza ya hUM phaT/ oM ya ma de ba rA dza hU phaT/ oM ya ma hri sti hUM phaT/ oM ya ma raka mo ru lu b+h+yo/ oM raka mo rak+Sha ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma ya ga mo ya ma ru lu
350b5(ya): b+h+yo/ oM ma ma ya kr-i hri sti snying ru lub+h+yo/ oM ma ma rakra ma ti ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ra ka mo sta na ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma nA ga ru lu b+h+yoHo ya ba de ba ru lu b+h+yo/ au yak+Sho
350b6(ya): yak+Sho ma ma hI/ oM ma ma badz+ra e ka ma ru lu b+h+yoHo ka rak+ko ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ka ma sa raka mau ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ya ma a ku sha dza/ o ya ma paR+Ya hUM/ o ya ma sgo
350b7(ya): tha ba[:]oM ya ma gan+d+he ho/ rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu tra ya mAn ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hU dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti tra ka rak+Sha kha mun tra/ mu tra ma
351a1(ya): ma snying kha ra ka mo b+h+yo/ raka mo te kuM mdza dza/ kha la ma hi b+h+yo/ la ya lon tson d+ha na ma la b+h+yo dza/ snying kha ra ka srog la smyo b+h+yo/ bsgrub par bya/
351a2(ya): ba'i snying po'o// ya ma pe ta kle rA dza sa tau ru na yo ni re ya tsa ni/ a mu ka pra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT/ ya me to ru Na lo da ya/ a mu ka ra ka ta tsa ra ya ni sha ku
351a3(ya): ru hU phaT/ ya ta yo ni re ya k+She ya/ srog rtsa a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni hU~M phaT/ ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ a mu ka mA ra ya ni sha ku ru hA phaT/ 'phrin las kyi
351a4(ya): snying po'o// gshed chen lto ba dkrugs pa yis// srid sbyar ya ba dang 'khor lo bskor// bra ba dang 'phang dang las kyi mchog/ bzlog dang gzer dang dkrug
351a5(ya): par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i snying po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje
351a6(ya): 'dzin// sngon gyi 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad de// gang gis btul ba'i gdul bya ste// phyi ma'i dus na dgongs mdzad de// sngon du spyod pa bka' stsal pa//
351a7(ya): nga yis sngar bshad gnas dag tu// gsum dang gcig gi khru tshad kyis// pho brang dkyil 'khor mdzes par brtsig/ dur khrod rdzas kyis rab tu gyur// dbus
351b1(ya): la gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa// 'khor lo mu khyud ldan par bya// gtso chen sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// ji ltar rigs pa bsam zhing dgod// phra gro a ba brag shi ta/
351b2(ya): rang skad smra ba de dag gis// mtshan ngan snod du drag po'i rdzas// myos 'thibs gsod par nus pa dang // dran pa'i rten dang 'khor ba'i rgyud// mdzes shing
351b3(ya): mnyes par bya phyir dgod// mi rta khyung mchog glang po che// chu glang ma he'i dran dbang rten// gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo dang // spu gri gri gug gshan
351b4(ya): gri dang // mtshon lcags phur pa dug shing khram// shod d+he dkar nag dmar dang sngo// bzhi 'am bdun nam nyi shu gcig/ so so'i grangs dang 'thun par dgod/
351b5(ya): gzhan yang gying bdud shan pa dang // rtsis pa rang gi gzugs brnyan rnams// dus gzhan dag tu ngas bshad bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi rten du dgod//
351b6(ya): mchod pa mnyes 'gyur dam tshig rdzas// bzu' dang btung dang myang dang ldag/ bra ba dang bdug dang brdeg pa dang // bskrad dang bcing dang mnan pa dang // gtor
351b7(ya): dang sbar ba'i rdzas kyi sa star// ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa dang // las kyi rim pa bya ba dag/ gtso dang 'khor gyi gnas bsgyur te// maM las ma he bsnol ba'i
352a1(ya): steng // nyi zla 'khor lo gsal ba'i steng // ya hU rnam pa'i 'phro 'du las// gshed 'dzin 'jigs byed bskyed par bya// dmar nag ser ljang

352a4(ya): brtan pas bos shing bstim// gnas dang drang dang bos dang bskul// 'jigs byed dang gis bzlas par bya// ya ma rA dza sa to ma ya/ ya me to ru Na yo da ya/ ya ta yo ni ra

352a7(ya): thun dzaHma ra tr-i dza dzA/ ya yA/ thing thing / kro d+ha ni/ tro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ ga shu la ga shul/ d+ha sha gr-i ba/ d+ha sha gr-i ba/ ya krA gra ba lak+ka gr-i ba hUM phaT/ badz+ra
352b1(ya): badz+ra da ra li ba sa/ kha la mu ting snying gong chod/ mu la dung ting mA ra ya rba da/ badz+ra khrag ti ti ga sna rbad/ tsakra du tri rbad/ badz+ra shu tr-i da ra taM ya/ rbad pu rbad pu/ rba
352b2(ya): du rbad du/ da ra ka sha ta sa ma ya/ gdangs dang ldan pas bod par bya// nye dang bsnyen pa'i rtags thon nas// las la sbyar ba 'di dag go/ ging ka ra ging kar srog la rba/

352b7(ya): nr-i traM ba ra tr-i rbad rba da/ ging ka ra tsan d+ha ma ru rtse la sa la ya ma ya ma/ rtsa la rgyugs dbugs la hur thums/ srog la thun dza/ sha la gug thun/ bsdigs
353a1(ya): pa'i rdzas la bzlas shing gdab// byung na brtan dang las byed dang // grub dang mthar phyin rtags dang sbyar// dang po bod cing gzugs la

357b7(ya): ma g.yos kyang / thugs rje chen po dang byams pa chen pos gdul byar mi nus pa'i gdul bya dregs pa can rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs 'jigs byed
358a1(ya): chen por sprul pa 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad ni/ mthong nag gru gsum yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha'

359b6(ya): bzhin gsung gi bdag/ gsung gi ga tso ste gsung 'byung ba// gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i sku// ma chags mi chags chags med gsung // gsung gi dbang
359b7(ya): phyug smra ba che// bdag cag nyan par 'tshal lags kyis// khyod kyi sku yis ci zhig mdzad// de bzhin gsung gis ci zhig gsung // thugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu//
360a1(ya): khyod la yon tan ji zhig mnga'// mdzad pa'i 'phrin las ji lta bu// gzigs pa yi ni ci zhig lta// ting nge 'dzin ni gang la bsgom// dus
360a2(ya): bzhi yi ni spyod pa gang // thob par bya ba ci zhig lags// bdag cag rnams kyi the tshom 'di// myur du chod cing lha yi lha// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams//
360a3(ya): ljags kyi dbang pos khyab mdzod la// khams gsum ma lus thams cad kun// gsung dbyangs snyan pa'i sgras brjod de// gsal la rdzogs shing ma 'dres la//
360a4(ya): lhag dang chad pa'i skyon bral bar// legs pa nyid du bstan du gsol// zhes gsol te gus pa chen po dang bcas pas mdun du 'khod par gyur to//
360a5(ya): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug des/ chos thams cad kyi sgra'i snying po gsung gi phyag rgya'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba yang /
360a6(ya): dag par rtogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen po rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bstan te/ zhal gyi dkyil
360a7(ya): 'khor ljags kyi dbang po sa khyab par mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ nga ni thams cad sku yi brgyan// nga ni thams cad gsung gi klong //
360b1(ya): nga ni thams cad thugs kyi dbyings// nga ni thams cad yon tan tshogs// nga ni 'phrin las ma lus mdzad// nga nyid gzugs 'dzin bral bar lta// mnyam nyid
360b2(ya): g.yo ba med par bsgom// ma 'gags rtsol pa med par spyod// sku dang ye shes dbyer med par// nga yi sa thob par bya ba yin// gal te khyod kyi the tshom dag/ sel
360b3(ya): byed nus pa ma thob na// nga yis legs par bstan gyi sa nyon// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nga'i lus byin gyis brlab pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par dag
360b4(ya): pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can la thugs rjes rab tu chags pas sku dmar po'i kha dog dang ldan pa'o// rdzogs pa'i sku gsum dang ldan
360b5(ya): pas dbu gsum gyis mdzes pa'o// dbu ska ral pa gye na du ba rdzes pa ni ma rig pa tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i sbu ba sa gnon pa'o// sgri bo'i gtsu ga na rta mgo ldeng khu rta skad drag
360b6(ya): po 'tsher ba ni/ khyad par du dbang gi 'phrin las kyi sgo nas dregs pa can tshar gcod cing dbang du sdud pa'o// zhal nas hri dang phaT kyi gsung sgra drag po sgrogs pa ni/
360b7(ya): ma rungs pa'i leg par lta ba can rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa'o// shangs nas rdo rje'i rlung 'a tshub ma drag por 'dril ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yo zhing
361a1(ya): mi mjed kyi bdag po la sogs pa 'dul bar byed pa'o// lag tshom dang slar sal rgal ba'i me ltar 'bar bar snang ba ni/ mi shes dung
361a2(ya): mun pa'i phyogs ma lus pa sel bar byed pa'o// spyan dgu nyi ma dang zla ba'i zer ltar 'bar zhing 'tshor ba ni/ 'gro ba rnams la thugs rjes gzigs nas rang gi rigs
361a3(ya): kyi sa la dgod par byed pa'o// phyag drug gis ni mngon par shes pa drug sgrubs 'gro don mthar phyin par mdzad pa'o// rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa ni/ thAbs
361a4(ya): dradang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o// kha T+Ta khaM ni nyon mongs pa dug gsum gyi dngos po rtsad nas gcod pa'o// sbrul chen po'i zhags pa 'dzin pa
361a5(ya): ni/ gdug pa can rnams 'dul zhing thugs rjes 'dzin par mdzad pa'o// ban+da dmar po khrag dang zhag gis bkang ba gsol ba ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa thugs
361a6(ya): rje chen pos zad par mdzad pa'o// lcags sgrog gi rgyun 'dzin pa ni khams gsum thams cad thugs kyis mi sbyong par bde ba chen po'i ngang du 'khrid par mdzad pa'o// glang
361a7(ya): che'i pags pa dang zhing lpags chen po gsol ba na/ theg par mi bdag gi gong du byin cing thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa rgyun du 'phro ba'o// stag gi lpags pa sham thabs su
361b1(ya): dkris pa ni/ 'phrin las kyi khyad par ma 'dres par so sor grub par mdzad pa'o// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni/ ye shes dang las las grub pa'i
361b2(ya): ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dbang du sdud pa'o// klu'i rgyal po chen po rigs lngas brgyan pa ni/ gdug pa can gyi tshogs zil gyis gnon pa'o// zhabs bzhi
361b3(ya): brkyang ba skum dang dor stabs su bzhugs pa ni/ bdud dang mu stegs kyi phyogs 'dul ba'o// klu pho mo ga dan du bting ba ni zhe sdang dang gti mug rang sar sbyong ba'o//
361b4(ya): pad+ma dang nyi zla'i gdan bting ba ni/ ma chags pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogasabaskyed pa'o// yum e ka dza ti ral gcig ma dang gnyis su
361b5(ya): med par 'khril pa ni/ dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med par rang la gnas pa'o// sku mdog dmar nag la 'od 'phro ba ni chags pa dang bde ba chen po gnyis
361b6(ya): su med pa'i rang bzhin no// zhal gcig ni chos sku mnyam pa chen po gcig tu mtshon pa'o// phyag gnyis ni snying rje dang stong bzung du 'brel pa'o// kha T+wAM ga ni sku
361b7(ya): gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba'i don rgyun du mdzad pa'o// thong khrag ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par stob pa'o// gnyis su med
362a1(ya): pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa ni/ thabs thugs rje'i rol pa chen pos 'gro don rnam par 'phrul bar mdzad pa'o// nyon cig pad+ma he ru ka/ nga yi sku
362a2(ya): yi rang bzhin ni// chos kyi sku ste spros dang bral// nga yi sku yi ngo bo no// longs spyod rdzogs te mtshan dper ldan// nga yi sku yi mtshan nyid ni// sprul pa'i sku ste 'gro
362a3(ya): don rdzogs// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'o// sems can khams kun thams cad la// nga yi sku ni re re gnas// gal te 'khrul pa'i
362a4(ya): dbang gyur pas// ma mthong ma rtogs las kyis nongs// 'di la goms par byas pa ni// nga dang gnyis su med par spyod// mthong dang rtogs pa lta ci smos//
362a5(ya): zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku rnam par dag pa'i dbang phyug gsang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas
362a6(ya): bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ khams gsum pa thams cad yi ge'i sgra'i rtog pa rnam par spong ba'i 'khor lo yongs su
362a7(ya): gcod pa'i dbyangs stong zhing grags pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par mdzad pa de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hriH/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
362b1(ya): thugs rdo rje'i snying po 'di spro ba chen pos smras so// oM pad+ma ta kr-i ta ha ya gr-i ba e ka dza Ti sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo hU a ra li dza/ rab tu bzlas pa'i snying po'o// hri b+h+yo
362b2(ya): dzAdzardza/ hri hri hr-i hr-i/ hri hr-i hr-i hri/ b+h+yo b+h+yAM b+h+r-i b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dzaHrU ba ho/ hahahaha/ haHhaH/ hai/ he he he he/ mu muM mu mu/ mu mu mu mu/ mu mu mu mu
362b3(ya): phaT phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hU hU hU/ N+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rgyu rab tu grub par byed pa'i snying po'o// o ha ya gr-i ba hU dza/ o e ka dza Ti hU dza/ oM pad+ma hr-i he ru ka pU dza/ oM pad+ma kro
362b4(ya): d+hi shwa ri hU dza/ oM badz+ra tsakra rat+na pad+ma karma hU dza/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi ha na ha na/ ha ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ba na d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tshin+na tshin+na/ b+hin+na
362b5(ya): b+hin+na gardza gardza/ s+phoT s+pho Ta hU dza dza/ oM badz+ra Ang+ku sha dza/ oM badz+ra pA sha hU/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ba/ oM badz+ra gar+b+he ho/ oM a ra li hI hr-i dzi dza/ ming gis bong po'o// a
362b6(ya): ru lu ru lu sha ta ma tag tu ga te tsit+ta ba bi la ru tra/ yo he sa ma ya/ k+Shi na ro shaSha/ ma ra pra be sha/ pra ta tse la la/ b+ha ru b+hi ta nag b+hin du hi ra la dung dung tsa/ dung sha ka pa
362b7(ya): shaka ma hA ka ma la hU/ ha ho hU pra be sha phaT ma hA b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha tig sna pra be sha na ga le dum pa le a ka le s+pho ta le/ a kaR+Sha ya in d+ha b+ha ha b+ha ha phra ma phra ma/ pra pra yak+Sha sa ma ya pra
363a1(ya): be sha phaT phaT/ bsgral te dbang du bya ba'i snying po'o// ta ki na ta ki na hU/ ta ke ta ka phaT/ b+ha d+ha b+ha d+ha choms/ tig sna tig sna shig/ rak+Sha
363a2(ya): rak+Sha hU/ tshin+na tshin+na phaT/ kro d+ha kro d+ha ra/ ha la ha la baM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ba/ dz+nyA na tsakra ke du tra/ rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir bsgreng ba'i snying po'o// e kro d+hi shwa ri maN+Da la hUM/ a ya
363a3(ya): karmama? rak+ka hU/ ra rak+ta dza la maN+Dal hUM/ baM ti ga na maN+Da la hU/ ra badz+ra dz+wa laM raM/ ke nau ri dza la ma N+Da la kaM/ b+hU bi sha bi shud d+he dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la hUM b+h+yAM/ gzhi rab tu bskyed pa'i
363a4(ya): snying po'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sa'i khams ma lus pa'i rdul gyi cha dang mnyam pa'i tshad kyis rang rang gi gsung gi tshad dpag tu med pas bskal pa
363a5(ya): khri phrag bcu'i bar du nga'i ga smyung gi mtha' brjod par mi leng ste/ hriM hUM zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po yang
363a6(ya): dag pa'i sgra'o// 'di ni phyogs bcu ma lus par khyab pa'i sngon du lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs dbang gi rigs 'thun pa'i 'dod pa'i yon/
363a7(ya): tan lnga'i lha mor gyur te mchod pa dang stab pas mnyes par byed cing / sems can gyi khams kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len mtha' dag sbyangs shing zad par byas
363b1(ya): nas 'od zer gyi tshul du spros pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang bar byed na/ oM hriHe ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi gsung ni dpag tu
363b2(ya): med/ i ha ha yi yan lag ni// dregs pa can rnams dbang du sdud// ces gsungs so// rab la dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsung rnam par dag pa dbang phyug
363b3(ya): gsang ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs
363b4(ya): kyi de kho na nyid rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa la snang zhing gsal bar mdzad pa de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thog ma med pa'i
363b5(ya): dus nyid na// byung dang mthong dang myong ba dang // gnas dang dran pa ma lus pa// snying po byang chub sems yin te// 'di las g.yos pa ci yang med// gzugs dang kha
363b6(ya): dog mtshan ma dang // ming dang brda dang tha snyad kun// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin te// snang yang 'di la 'gyur ba med// 'on kyang rang las byung zhing snang // byung
363b7(ya): ba nyid kyang rang byung la// snang ba de yang rang las snang // rig pa'i dus na rang gis rig/ rnam par shes pa mi gcig pas// rtogs dang ma rtogs tha dad snang // 'on kyang
364a1(ya): gang gi gang nyid la// gang du ji ltar ji bzhin du// rtogs su yod pa ma yin te// tha snyad tsam du rtogs zhes brjod// kun rdzob don dmarang

364b1(ya): glog/ snang yang mkha' la g.yos pa med// de bzhin nga yi thugs kyi bdag/ ma skyes mi skye skye ba med// ma 'gag sa mi 'gag 'gag pa med// ma g.yos mi g.yo
364b2(ya): g.yo ba med// snying po don gyi gzhi nyid las// rang bzhin du ni lhun gyis grub// rtogs pa tsam gyis mngon du 'gyur// rtsol med rgyud ni yongs su sbyangs// rang la

364b5(ya): thams cad kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa rab tu snang ba sgrub par byed pa'i don rnam par dag pa'i che ba 'di nyid ston pa 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul cir yang
364b6(ya): 'gyur zhing ston pa thams cad la snang yang gcig tu ma nges pa'i phyir thugs kyi che ba nyid dang / gsung gi che ba nyid dang / sku'i che ba nyid la sogs pa gang yang ma 'gags
364b7(ya): pa'i sgo nas byin rlabs sna tshogs su 'byung ba ni/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i don zab pa dang rgya che ba/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyis theg pa chen po
365a1(ya): bltas pas ma mthong ste/ 'dul ba'i dus la gnas pa'i sgo sbyong ba sa gnod sbyin mthu bo ches rgyud nye bar bzhag pa dge ba'i cho sa la spyod par nus
365a2(ya): zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam chog la bzhag par sla'o// nyan thos kyi skyes bus ni smad par bya ba rnams 'dul zhing rang gi sa la dgod nus par zad kyis/ bla na med pa'i
365a3(ya): lam la spyod par mi nus pa rnams kyang / nga'i thugs/ gsung dang / sku'i yon tan thogs pa med pa'i spyod pa la ni rgyu tsam du mi nye'o// de ltar dbang gi rgyal po'i thugs nyi ma'i dkyil
365a4(ya): 'khor 'od kyi thugs rjes stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams la 'od snang ba bzhin/ sems can gyi khams rnams kyi sems kyi rgyu las snang ba thams cad bdag
365a5(ya): gi ye shes la snang ba 'byung ste thub pa chen po ya na chad yin no// ri rab kyi rtse mor rnam par snang mdzad gang+gA'i mtsho chen po'i lus lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu'i
365a6(ya): tshe na/ nga'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen por sems bskyed do// bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams// mtho ni mthing lcang lo can bsgyur te/ bar snang khams kun rab
365a7(ya): snang zhing // phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og kun// khro bo khro mos bkang byas te// rin chen rtsal chen seng ge dang // rta dang glang chen nam mkha' lding // grangs
365b1(ya): med gnon pa 'o ga min gnas// rdo rje khro bo rnam pa ra rgyal// zhab sa 'bring rdo rje rol pa mo// bye ba khrag khri ga rjes su 'brang // lus dang yan lag thams cad kun//
365b2(ya): thod rlon 'phreng dang sbrul gyis brgyan// spyan dgu 'bar ba'i se dgu gzigs// dbu skra ral pa me stag 'phro// rin chen 'bar ba'i zur phud lnga// sen mo do dang do shal dang //
365b3(ya): mgur chu chun 'phyang za ra tshags// de bzhin zhags kyi chas brgyad kyis// khro bo chen po brgya 'dul bas// tshangs dang brgya byin smros ci dgos// dbang chen nga yi 'khor
365b4(ya): rnams kun// bka' bzhin byed pa'i yon tan yin// gzhan yang nga yi yon tan ni// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dang // khams dang rigs dang yul dang dngos// dman dang bar
365b5(ya): ma mchog tu byed// bya ba'i chos dang byed pa'i yid// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes phung po'i tshogs// dbang po yul dang skye mched mchog/ de ni//
365b6(ya): nga yis rab tu byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rigs 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal lha rnams kyis// yon tan tshogs kun ji snyed pa//
365b7(ya): de la de nyid mnga' ba ste// tshig dang ming dang rnam grangs dang // dpe dang tshad kyis brjod mi lang // gzhan yang nyon cig he ru ka/ nga la gzugs dang tshad dang dbyibs// yod dang
366a1(ya): dngos por ma lta zhig/ nga la rigs dang rgyu dang rkyen// byed pa po ni ga la yod// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyi grub/ thugs rje mkhyen pa thabs dang ldan//

366a3(ya): nga yi sku// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dman pa nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// 'di las gzhan pa'i phyi rol pa// dbang phyug dang ni tshengs pa dang // drag po gtum
366a4(ya): po gzhon nu dang // lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // seng ge glang chen ri dag sa dang // 'dab chags srin bu la sogs pa// gang gis gang la gang gi phyir// ji ltar nus pa'i dbang
366a5(ya): mdzad cing // rang dang gaunyis med mnyam sbyor ba// nga yi sgyu las rnam sprul sku// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod las 'das// shes pa sbyongs shig he ru ka/ zhes gsungs so// dpal
366a6(ya): dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yon tan rgya chen po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des/ dus gsum
366a7(ya): gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin la sa ma lus par sgrub par byed pa dang / de la nye bar byed cing skal ba can du byed pa dang / myur du 'grub par byed pa dang / legs par 'grub par byed pa
366b1(ya): dang / yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang / bde bar 'grub par byed pa'i thabs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gsang ba dang / gsung gi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi gsang ba chen po
366b2(ya): nye bar sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ nyid kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rang nyid la rdzogs par gsal bar mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye kye dbang chen he ru
366b3(ya): ka/ me 'ongs shin tu snyigs ma'i dus// tshe dang dus dang longs spyod dang // las dang lta bas mnar ba'i tshe// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag rog ser sna dang //
366b4(ya): rab tu gzir cing nyon mongs pas// gdungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir// nga yi bsgrub mchog bshad par bya// byang chub sems dang ldan pas nyon// dper na nam
366b5(ya): mkha' la 'gro ba'i lus// de nyid kyis ni 'dul ba ltar// nyon mongs tshogs rnams de nyid kyi// rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs kyi sa 'du la// de bas blo ldan skyes
366b6(ya): bu yis// thog mar nga yi sgrub pa'i gnas// nub tu kha bltas dben pa'i gnas// brag dmar chos zangs 'dra ba ni// rang gi rigs la shis pa'i gnas//
366b7(ya): chags can mdog dmar shos rab can// sgrub pa'i grogs la bsngags pa yin// ting 'dzin yo byad phun sum tshogs// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// khams
367a1(ya): gsum pa ma ba tud// snang zhing srid pa 'di dag kun// me dbyung 'bar ba'i 'ong bzhin pasam// nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil
367a2(ya): dbus/ srog rten snying po yi ge hri// sgo dang bsdu bas rnam par bzhag/ yul dang de yi yul can kun// ma lus dmigs pa rab tu bya// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
367a3(ya): dngos// so so'i las kyis rab tu sbyang // nga dang motshungs par gyur pa na// mi g.yo chad kyis brtag par bya// de yis thog mar bsnyen po yin// bsnyen pa yi ni tong
367a4(ya): 'dzin to// de nas nye bar bsnyen pa'i phyir// skad cig tsam mam yud tsam gyis// rang gi las kyis nus pa gsum// dbang chen sku gsung thugs su blta// bar chod

374a4(ya): mthus// gar mkhan sgyu ma thabs kyi rgyal por grags// gar dbang rta mchog pad+ma dbang gi rgyal// zhe sdang dpal 'bar khro bo'i hUM sgra can// che bas 'phags pa dbang
374a5(ya): phyug che ba'i dpal// 'bar gsal lha 'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang chen gnyis med rnal 'byor zab mo'i sku// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med 'brel mdzad cing // 'gro don
374a6(ya): yid bzhin thugs la dbyung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du sbrel mdzad ma// rab mchog gsang ba'i yu ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// hrI/ dbang gi rta gdong 'phrin
374a7(ya): las mgyogs pa'i mthus// ye shes myur mgyogs shes rab pha rol phyin// rtsal gyi brlabs kyis sa gsum tshig char bgrod// 'tsher skad gdang snyan gsang ba'i thugs
374b1(ya): dam bskul// rngam pa'i khar rtsal 'khor tshogs dbang du sdud// stabs drug 'gros kyis rgyud drug thabs kyi 'dren// rol pa'i rta bros bdud bzhi thal bar rlog/ 'jig
374b2(ya): rten sgrol mkhas mi bsgyel thabs kyi mchog/ rta skad rngam pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// hrI/ dung chen rang bzhin sgyu ma'i khong seng can// yul drug dbang po rtogs pa'i
374b3(ya): rgyun du che// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten nas// skal med 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i skye 'gro dang // zhe sdang shugs kyis myos pa'i srin po dang // gti mug
374b4(ya): ljongs pa'i dbang 'gyur gnod sbyin dang // nga rgyal dregs pas khengs pa'i bdu da rig sa dang // dbang bsdus drag po'i shugs kyis bsgral ba rnams// che ba'i thebs
374b5(ya): ldan thabs kyis brgyan mdzad phyir// gdug byed so so'i ban+d+ha bcad nas kyang // lhun gyis brjid pa'i 'dzegs byed rgyan du sprul// dur khrod gsang ba chen po'i rdzas kyi
374b6(ya): mchog/ dbang phyug gsang ba'i sku la rgyan du klubs// tho rus me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// ral pa dmar po dbu gtsug ma ltar 'bar// skye med chos sku
374b7(ya): yon tan tshang bar rdzogs// dbang chen thabs kyi rgyal la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pas/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des/ 'khor rnams la nyid kyi rang
375a1(ya): bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ dbang sgyur thabs kyi phyag rgya de dag gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu myur bar mdzad de/ hUM hrI dbang chen rdo rje ser chen 'bebs
375a2(ya): hrIHdang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skams// mtsho tshon gnam lcags 'bar ba'i
375a3(ya): mthu rtsal gyis// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i dgra bgegs 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis kha ru// gdug pa 'dul zhing dug gsum rtsad nas gcod//
375a4(ya): srid gsum 'dul ba'i bdag tu dbang bskur ro// o ha ya gri ba sarba bi nA ya ka a ti ta na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a a/ zhes dregs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa 'dul zhing tshar gcod par
375a5(ya): dbang bskur ro// 'jig rten las 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyi rgyal por gzhag go// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
375a6(ya): rigs kyi bdag po rnams kyis/ dbang gyi rgyal po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na oM/ hUM badz+ra sa twa hU/ swa rat+na d+h+ri ka/
375a7(ya): hrIHpad+ma/ a mi de ba hI/ ha pradz+nyA karma d+h+rika/ de nas 'jig rten gyi bdag po lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po yab yu ma 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying
375b1(ya): po 'di phul lo// oM ma hA de ba u ma de ba la pra ma ni rak+ka kang ka sa ya hU de ba rA dza ga na dza hU/ de nas gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM ya me
375b2(ya): tak+She ra sa to ma ra ma tsa na hri tr-i bi tr-i sta ya ma snying ya ma khrag baM ril rbad/ de nas klu'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya nA ga rA dza he phu la phe sha
375b3(ya): na phos phos shig shig chu chu hu ya ti ya dza dza/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di smras so// oM yak+Sha a ba ma ra b+ha ru d+ha ri ma g+ha la bak+ka ru tra ma ru trah+ma/
375b4(ya): dza/ de nas bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM rak+Sha mu la sa muny+dza ru traM hur b+h+yo rak+Sha mu lo shig tI sha hu ra dza/ de nas 'jig rten gyi ma mo'i tshogs
375b5(ya): rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// o tra ga ra kA snying kha ra ka ma tsit+ta ma srog tsa khrag la breng breng / kha la du na ting mu la sod/ de nas gza'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying
375b6(ya): po 'di phul lo// oM ba sha mi ki ru ru ma ti dza la ti a tra bi hri pa tra ra hU la hri nge ni dza/ de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di smras so// ma ma tra ka rakra
375b7(ya): snying khrag la hu ba sa badz+ra ma ni snying la thun raklo myogs rbad/ gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can ji snyed pa thams cad kyis kyang rang gi ming dang snying po phul te/
376a1(ya): thams cad kyis dbang gi rgyal po nyid kyi sa ba ka' ji ltar stsal ba bzhin las sna tshogs bsgrub cing bsgo ba mtha' dag nyan par khas blangs so//
376a2(ya): dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ji ltar bsgrub pa'i 'phrin las kyi khyad par bsgrub pa'i ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dbang
376a3(ya): gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbrul pa'i bdag nyid can du bzhugs te/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bor mdzad
376a4(ya): nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// nga yi sku yi ngo bo ni// rang rig byang chub sems las snang // rta mgo skad gsang
376a5(ya): mthon po yis// bde gshegs gsung gi dngos grub sdud// yang dag don nges chos kyi sku// gzugs su snang ba mtshan ma'i rtags// dper na rta yi 'gros dgu
376a6(ya): yis// ji ltar smon pa'i sar 'gro zhing // theg pa'i rim pa dang gis bgrod// rtsol med rab tu rdzogs par snang // rta skad yon tan mang bltar// lam lnga dang ni sa bcu
376a7(ya): dag/ yongs rdzogs de nyid ngal mnga'// dpe dang don gyi rtags rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyi// gsang sngags lam gyi bye brag shes// gdul bya'i lam
376b1(ya): du snang ba yang // chos rnams dkyil 'khor lhun grub cing // snang srid ma lus bsgral ba'i rgyu// bka' sdod 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// sngon gyi tha tshigs dbyings
376b2(ya): nas bskul// brda sbrad klong rdol dbang sgyur te// ma lus 'dus pa nga yi thabs// ye na sa mo bcos nga yi sku// thabs dang shes rab dbyings ye shes// don dam kun
376b3(ya): rdzob snang dang stong // gnyis med ngo bo don yin no// dbang gi rgyal po bsam sbyor bas// khros pa'i phyag rgya gsung gi sgra// 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen kun//
376b4(ya): dbang med skrag pa'i tshul bzung zhing // myur du 'phrin las gnas bzhin byed// dbyings nas gzugs snang thams cad kun// dbang sgyur snang ba mnyes mdzad de//
376b5(ya): 'gal ba de nyid dang du sbyang // bsrung dang bzlog dang tshar bcad pa'i// rig pa'i rgyal po spu gri'o// oM thub thub myug myag mug mug/ shor shar da ha kla ga kla ga du hang du hang
376b6(ya): rbad rbad dza dza hU hU/ zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus brtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dgongs pa yang dag pa'i 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
376b7(ya): / de nas dbang gi rgyal po yis// rab tu bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// nub tu phyogs pa dbang gi las// shi sa pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i drung // chags ldan rigs kyi khyad
377a1(ya): par gyis// yid dang 'thun pa'i dkyil 'khor rtsig/ sku gsung thugs kyi gnas byin brlabs// phyi nang gsang ba mnyes pa'i rdzas// ci 'byor pa yis
377a2(ya): rgyas par dbul// sngags tshig bstod pas mnyes gyur nas// dmigs pa'i ched dang sbyar ba ni// sgrub pa po nyid bsrung ba dang // pha rol gzhan gyi nus pa rnams// bzlog cing
377a3(ya): bshigs dang gtor ba dang // ba sreg cing mnan dang 'phang ba dang // bskrad dang bcing dang dbab pa dang // dgug cing mngag dang dbang du bya// oM pad+ma ta kr-i ta badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha \u0f7f
377a4(ya): la gr-i ba hu lu hu lu ma hA ka s+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha s+thA hA/ a khri sarba ma ma ra tsathun b+h+yo ba zlog/ kro ma ri sha sha thun b+h+yo bzlog/ e ka pa ra ke du phra ma ya thun b+h+yo ba zlog/ ru tra sro ga ti rbad thum
377a5(ya): thum/ tsa ba shi li sa ma ya shig shig/ ma ma e ka dza Ti phyung ya ma rbad/ ro du ro du ra ga mo tsit+ta rbad rbad/ nag hu ya nag po ti pa tsa ya/ tsa re tsa du la dug sha ga yam/ nA ga

377a7(ya): a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ hu lu hu lu dza dza na ga badz+ra yak+ka kI li kI li ma ra ya phaT/ a mu ka s+ya rbad sha twA ma hA ya rba da nr-i hu ra thu mas dza/ ma hA ba sha ta ki dz+wa la dz+wa la ra ra/ bi sha tsakra ha
377b1(ya): la hA la stam pa ya nan nan/ d+ha ru nan d+ha ru nan/ a mu ka ha li mu nyod sod/ tri bu mA ra ya sod/ nr-i rak+Sha ya kra ka li ra dza na ga tAM du ma ra ya sod/ a ni lu traM krang ka ri krang ka ri/
377b2(ya): mi tsi mi tsau ri ra tra tra/ tr-i tr-i gaM ga gu gu u pA rU dzA ya ha she ba ho/ nA ga rA dzA ra tsa sru sru tra ri sri sri la la/ sarba a pasma ra b+hin+na b+hin+na b+han+na b+han+d+ha/ ti li ti li/ ma ta ma ta/ pra
377b3(ya): b+ha na pra b+ha na/ pe tsa pa tsa/ da ra da ra/ tshin+na tshin+na/ ha na han/ hu lu hu lu/ ku to ku ta/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tr-i ta tr-i ta/ ma rai ma r-i/ mA raM ya mA ra ya/ rba da thu na rba da thun/

377b5(ya): ta thu na rbad/ ra ta ra ta thu na rba da mo ta mo ta thu na rba da/ sarba b+hA ta mA ra ya mA ra ya thu na rba da/ ya ra ya ru thun rbad/ ma ra tr-i sod so da/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i sngags//
377b6(ya): ji ltar bsngags pa'i rdzas dang bcas// zla gcig drug gi sbyor ba yis// gang la dmigs pa myur du 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpa la dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
377b7(ya): las yi ge 'phreng ba drag po'i snying po brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungo
378a1(ya): bdag nyid chen po des/ nyid kyi 'khor rnams la gsung gi sgra chen pos rab tu go bar mdzad de bka' stsal pa/ kye ma 'ongs pa'i dus phyi ma'i tshe snyigs
378a2(ya): mar gyur pa na/ rigs kyi bu gang dag nga dang nga'i bdag po/ snang ba mtha' ya sa dang spyan ra sa gzigs dbang phyag la sogs pa pad+ma'i rigs 'chang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /

378a5(ya): su shes par 'dod pa'i yon tan la bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / spro bar longs spyod par nus pa dag gis ni/ nga dang dus gsum du phyogs bcu dag na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i
378a6(ya): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs mnyes par byas shing gnyis su dbyer med par bsgrubs pa yin te/ nga'i tshul 'di lta bu la ni gang zag dbang po dman pa dang /
378a7(ya): blo chung ba dang / shes rab rtul ba dang / yid mi gzhung ba dang / blang ba dang / dor bar spyod pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / log
378b1(ya): par lta ba can dang / skal ba chung zhing myos pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bri ba dang / bklags pa dang / blta ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / bstan

378b3(ya): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rig pa 'dzin pa rang bzhin grub pa dang / sa la spyod pa dang / tshe ring bar dbang ba dang / de bzhi ni gshegs pa dag gi thugs nye ba'i sras
378b4(ya): su gyur pa khyed rnams kyis yang dag par zung zhig/ longs shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 'di ni nga'i bstan
378b5(ya): pa bla na med pa'o// gong na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mamu tshungs pa med pa/ depe med pa/ bla na med pa/ zla me da pa/ mchog tu gyur pa/ ra ba dang / gtso bo
378b6(ya): dang / phul dang / dam pa ru gyur ste/ rnyed par dka' zhing ngo mtshar ba ni/ 'di khyed rnams la rjes su ga ta da kyi sa/ nga'i bstan pa 'di yal bar ma dor cig/
378b7(ya): 'di nyams par gyur ta re zhes gsungs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa rgya chen po dag 'od zer gyi tshul du spro ba mdzad de/
379a1(ya): yang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i klong du rab tu bsdus nas/ rol pa chen po'i 'od zer gyis khyab par
379a2(ya): mdzad de/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa/ mnyam nyid g.yo ba med pa la rab tu bzhugs par gyur to// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
379a3(ya): rgyud las/ yongs su bstan pa'i rgyud nye bar gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs
379a4(ya): so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

379b1(ya): 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba mchog gi dbyings/ 'phrin las rgya chen po rnam par dag par rol par mdzad pa'i dur khrod chen po rab tu 'khrug cing skrod par byed pa'i rlung

379b5(ya): mchog tu gyur pa/ bud+d+ha kI la ya dang / rat+na kI la ya dang / pad+ma kI la ya dang / karma kI la ya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi rgyal po hU ka ra dang /
379b6(ya): rnam par rgyal ba dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / gshin rje gshed po dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / rta'i mgrin pa can dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil
379b7(ya): pa dang / khams gsum rnam rgyal dang / stobs chen por gyur pa dang / rol pa'i yum chen mo sgra 'byin ma dang / mnyes ma dang / sder mo ma dang / dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang /
380a1(ya): gtun khung ma dang / ga tu ma mo chen mo dang / mda' snyams ma dang / rlung 'byin ma dang / gsong byed ma dang / skyod byed ma dang / de dag
380a2(ya): thams cad kyang sprul pa dang / sprul pa'i yang sbrul dang / sprub pa'i pho nya dang / pho nya'i pho nya dag dang bcas pa rnam kyis ma dun du bdar zhing bskor te/ gzhan byis pas so

380a5(ya): 'jigs pa dang / rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// de na sa bcom ldan 'das nyid sku'i rnam par sprul pas/ khro bo
380a6(ya): chen po drag shu la can du snang bar mdzad kyang / thugs rab tu zhi ba chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thugs gsang ba chen po las byung ba'i khro bo chen po rnams kyis/
380a7(ya): nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas chen po dang bcas pa la rab tu spro zhing ngo mtshar ba'i sgo nas dga' ba chen pos yang dag par mgrin gcig
380b1(ya): tu mngon par bstod pa/ e ma ho/ mthu' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// rlung nag rdo rje rgya gra ma 'khrigs pa ste// khrag gi rgya mtsho rba glong 'khrug pa'i dkyil/
380b2(ya): kang rus chen po ri rab brtsegs pa'i steng // gser gyi sa gzhi zhing chen sti ras gtams// me ri dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i glong // nam mkha'i mtha' dang
380b3(ya): mnyam rdzogs gzhal ya sa khang // ri ni chen 'bar ba thod pa gsum gyis brtsigs// lha klu ti zla gza' skar sbrul gyis brgyan// ye shes tshad med gru bzhi sgo bzhi
380b4(ya): rdzogs// phyi nang me dpung rin chen 'od dang ldan// dregs pa'i gdan dang nyi zla pad+ma'i dbus// med pa'i rgyu las byung ba sngon 'byung ba// bde gshegs dpal chen 'phrin
380b5(ya): las rdzogs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bsku ma bzhugs// g.yas kyi zhal mdog dmar bar bstan pa ni// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku mthar
380b6(ya): phyin cing // g.yo na zhal dkar nag sbrul skus 'gro don mdzad// yongs rdzogs sku dang dbus zhal mthing na ga nI// skye med chos kyi sku las 'gyur po med// ral pa gyen
380b7(ya): brdzes dbang drag dus gcig rdzogs// ye shes lnga bdag rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// spyan dgu sa dgu mi dmigs dbyings la gzigs// snyan drug rgyud drug nyon
381a1(ya): mongs 'khor ba 'dren// shangs nas stong gsum sgrol ba'i rlung nag 'dren// zhal gsum nyon mongs dug gsum dbyings su sgrol/
381a2(ya): mche ba sa bdud bzhi rtsa ba gcod// le brgan ljags 'dril shes rab mthar phyin gsal// gsung gi nga ro sa 'jig rten mthu chen sngangs// phyag drug phyag mtshan rang
381a3(ya): rtags yon tan rdzogs// rdo rje rtse dgu sa dgu'i yon tan rdzogs// rtse lnga rgyud lnga rtsad bcad rigs lngar sbyor// me dpung 'bar bas nyon mongs dug lnga bsreg/ kha TA rtse
381a4(ya): gsum du ga gsum rtsa da nas gcod// rdo rje phur pa srid gsum dbyings su 'debs// zhab sa bzhi tshad med bzhi yis 'phrin las mdzad// dpa' bo'i ni bza' ba rgyan
381a5(ya): gyis che ba ni// glang chen ko rlon theg mchog stobs bcu sa bgrod// stag gi sham thabs 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// zhing chen g.yang gzhi thugs rjes 'gro ba sgrol/
381a6(ya): sbrul gyi chun pos dpa' bo gdug pa 'dul// thod pa'i 'phreng bas sku gsung ngang la ga nas// don dam bcud brgyan 'jigs brji de sa la 'god// rak+ta'i thig le
381a7(ya): tshogs med pad+ma'i spyan// thal chen mtshan mas sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs// rdo rje'i gshog pas ma lus zil gyis gnon// rin chen gshogs pas dgos 'dod
381b1(ya): re ba skong // ye shes me pung rnam rtog bag chags bsreg/ gnyis med yum chen don dam dbyings su sbyor// yon tan mtha' yas kun gyis rab brgyan pa'o//
381b2(ya): 'phrin las rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings skye med ngang las ma g.yos kyang // sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston mdzad pa// thugs rje'i thabs kyis
381b3(ya): gdug pa 'dul slad du// drag shul spyad pa'i 'phrin las kun gyi bdag/ don dam byang chub sems la 'gyur med kyang // ting 'dzin longs spyod thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad//
381b4(ya): byin rlabs phyag rgya 'od zer 'phro 'du'i klong // rang bzhin spros bral nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pas/ slar yang rol pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa
381b5(ya): yongs su rdzogs shing snang bar gyur to// 'phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas yang 'khor chen po de
381b6(ya): rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// 'phrin las
381b7(ya): khyod mdzad ci yi phyir// rdo rje zhes ni ci phyir brjod// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// gzho'ur grags pa ci zhig lags// dngos por snang ba'i chos nyid la// khyad
382a1(ya): par phur pa ci phyir 'dzin// thugs rje zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// khro zhing 'jigs par ston mdzad cing // drag po'i rgyan chas mdzad pa gang // gzhan
382a2(ya): yang khyod kyi sku gsung thugs// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba// rmad du byung ba'i tshe 'phrul la// bdag cag the tshom skyes gyur te// ji lta ji ltar mdzad pa yi// don de
382a3(ya): bdag la nges ston cig/ ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin la sa mdzad par bya
382a4(ya): ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi ngo bor bzhengs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi yon tan gyi tsho ga sa thams cad sngon du 'gro bar
382a5(ya): mdzad nas/ nyid kyi gsung gi gsang ba chen po/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa la bsgrub par nus pa'i yang dag pa'i snying po 'di sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba las
382a6(ya): byung ngo // oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nA na baM hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos par gyur to// gang dag sangs
382a7(ya): rgyas rnams kyi thugs zhi ba chen pos 'dul bar mi 'gyur pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dregs pa can rnams kyang / rab tu 'dar zhing dngas skrag ste/ brgyal zhing sa
382b1(ya): la lhung nas/ shi ba'i dus la ma bab tsam du gyur pa dang / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer de dag gis lus khyab par bkye nas/ thams cad kyang lus
382b2(ya): dang ngag yid bde ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams zhi ba dang gdung ba'i sems
382b3(ya): kyis gnas nas/ gsung rjes su sgrub pa'i bran bzhin las byed par khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor chen po 'dus pa de
382b4(ya): dag la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang
382b5(ya): 'dul ba'i// sangs rgyas 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir gsol ba'i// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje yi// 'dus byas rdzas las ma grub cing // dus
382b6(ya): gsum kun tu 'dus ma byas// spros pa'i mtshan ma kun dang brag/ gdod nas ma byung skye ba med// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i ngang // de ni sra mkhregs rtsal shugs ldan//
382b7(ya): cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje yi// dper na pha lam rnon po bzhin// sus kyang 'joms par mi nus shing // stong nyid snying por ldan pa yi// go cha mchog gi rdo rje'o//
383a1(ya): dus gsum bzhugs pa ma lus pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// dang na rdo rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro ba mi bzang ga/
383a2(ya): skusgyu yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ myur du sprul pa'i gzhon nu ste// nga las bgres rgud yong mi mnga'// skad cig nyid las byung ba'o// oM shrI badz+ra ku mA ra kI li k+Shas pa/ sarba
383a3(ya): big+h+nAn b+he d+hU baT/ thabs kyi shes rab yum dang sbyor// byang chub sems rgyun me shes che// oM da b+ha ta tsak+Shu ru lu mA rba b+h+yo/ gnyis med ye shes 'od zer gyis// 'gro
383a4(ya): gsuMl ba'i byin rlabs las// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// zing pa rdo rje grub par mdzod// sring pa rdo rje phur pa'i g+ha// ye shes khro bo grub par mdzad// oM prad+d+ha
383a5(ya): kI la~M kI la ya d+hu phaT/ mo raN+Da kI li k+ShI la ya ng+ku ra// oM badz+ra krI si kI sa ya b+hu Ta/ oM kaR+Sha kI li~M kI la la d+hu baT/ oM badz+re k+Sho d+b+ha s+thA kA ra n+tu/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+h+r-i da
383a6(ya): badz+nyA sh+tsa laka rba d+hu/ oM badz+nyA mu shrI khA mi Sh+Ti d+h+yA/ gairba kAr+dz+dza d+hU ba~Mn+tu/ a badz+ra kod+b+ha bidzi e hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+d+hihU~M/ sa~M badz+ra brAg+h+ra su b+h+rUM/
383a7(ya): ba gr-i b+h+ra mra She d+hu/ na can rgyal/ mi badz+ra kro d+ha nI la gai d+hu/ ma badza lo hrI hU~M/ oM badz+ra ma ma su 'dzu/ oM badz+ra kro ka mra
383b1(ya): oM badz+ra kUd+d+hA ya s+thAn+ta kaD+D+h+ya/ oM badz+ra kro d+hiSh+mA shUn pa tI n+tu/ oM badz+ra \u0f7fri mya hU~M/ oM badz+rad+ha s+yA mu kha d+g+ha/ btsa ban+dan+tu phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+d+ha ar+b+ba a tsa la d+hu/ oM badz+ram
383b2(ya): d+hIr+dz+dza ya tI hUM/ oM badz+ra bya kri la mu kha hU/ oM badz+ra ya ti mu khri hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU/ oM badz+ra kr-ir+N+Na tsin+d+ra mi tsU/ oM badz+ra paka shu ta mu kha h+yA/
383b3(ya): oM badz+ra pa tsa la mu khwa hU/ hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a ba ra dzi ti hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi mu ha la hUM/ oM badz+ra shA na mu khwa hU/ oM tsan+d+ra mu kha hU/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha
383b4(ya): a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ba ya ba ti hUM/ oM badz+ra siM he mu kha hU/ oM badz+ra ti ti la mu khi hUM/ tshon+na tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dzi ya hU/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi m+bA ra ya hUM/
383b5(ya): oM badz+ra rak+Shi sa mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra na ku la mu khI hUM/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi muN+De ma hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ri krA sa mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra ka si ka mu khi
383b6(ya): hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+nyA pa shu ta mu kha hUM/ a ku sha dza/ oM badz+ra ye b+he hUM/ bA na hU~M/ oM badz+ra ba ya ti mu ka hI s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra mA ra na mu kha g+ha na d+he ho/ hI s+pha ra
383b7(ya): phaT/ sa ha ra na sU/ 'di ni srid pa'i tshul du 'byung // yab yum byang chub sems las bskyed// yi ge 'phro 'du'i rkyen las byung // rang las byung ste dbyings su 'debs//
384a1(ya): srid pa'i phur ba zhes su bshad// snang zhing gsal ba'i chos rnams kun// ma lus 'di yis legs par btab// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
384a2(ya): 'das// 'ung chub 'dus pa phur ba ste// kun rdzob rtags su nges par bzung // yon tan tshogs chen las byung zhing // ma lus 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad phyir// phyogs
384a3(ya): bcu dag gi sangs rgyas zhing // kun rdzob mdzad pa rdzogs spyod phyir// sems can khams kun longs sgrol ba'i// 'jin rten khro bcu 'byung ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug
384a4(ya): zhabs bzhir bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa gnon par mdzad// phyag drug dang po gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje dang ni thod khrag 'dzin// tha ma phur pa 'dril zhing sdom//
384a5(ya): chen sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs// rnam rgyal 'khor lo tri shul dang // dbyug sngon me dpal dbyug tho 'phyar// gshin rje gshed ni mithing kha ste// thod dbyug dang ni dgra sta ste/
384a6(ya): mi g.yo ljang ston ral gri zhags// rta mgrin zhags pa spu gri dmar// 'dod pa dmar skya ba dan g.yog/ bdud rtsi ljang nag rgya gram dril// khams gsum sbrul zhags rdo rje
384a7(ya): mthing // stobs chen dung kha tho bzhags// yum rnams yab kyi mdog ldan zhing // sgra 'byin ma ni g.yas be con// snyems mas gri 'dzin pa mdzad// rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu'o// dur khrod
384b1(ya): bdag mo thod dbyug 'dzin// gtun khung ma ni tho ba'o// rdo rje gtum mo spu gri 'dzin// rdo rje mda' snyems tho ba can// rlung 'dzin ma ni dgra sta'o// rdo rje gsod ma gri gug dang // skul byed
384b2(ya): rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag g.yon rnams ni thod khrag stob// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kyi// srid pa'i phur pa spros pa las// rang gi sku mdog dang 'thun pa'o// zhal gcig phyag
384b3(ya): gnyis lham dral tshul// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnas shing // yab yum phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin// g.yon gyis mtshon byed phur po 'dzin// sngon gyi 'dul gzhi las byung
384b4(ya): ba'i// so so'i gdong gi khyad par ni// stag dang bya rgod bya rog g.yag/ sha ba 'ug pa gzig dang khra// byi la pu shud sbyang khyi khra// seng ge pha wang srin bya dom// phag dang dmigs cu
384b5(ya): byi ba dred// rim bzhin du ni rang gnas lha// phyogs bzhir pu shud skye ka dang // srin bya khra yi mgo can rnams// kha dog dkar ser dmar dang ljang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags
384b6(ya): sgrog dril// rim bzhin g.yas gnas phur bu 'dril// nye ba'i sras mchog phur bu ni// bde gshegs rin chen pad+ma las// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gnyis brlad//
384b7(ya): dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba'i mdog/ khyad par phur bu kI la ya// zhal gsum mthing nag g.yas dkar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje rgyu zhags g.yas// g.yon pa dgra sta ral grig
385a1(ya): sras mchog rat+na kI la ya// zhal gsum dkar dmar dbus ser zhal// g.yas pa beng dang ral gri'o// g.yon pa dgra sta be chen 'dzin// dbang rga
385a2(ya): kI la ya zhes pa// zhal gsum dkar ser dbus dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung // bar pa gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs// 'phrin las mdzad
385a3(ya): pa'i sras mchog ni// zhal gsum dkar dmar ljang khru ste// g.yas pa mdung dang lcags kyu dang // g.yon pa gri gug ral gri'o// tha ma'i phyag gnyis thams cad
385a4(ya): kyis// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po yi// ri rab phu ba rim bzhin 'dzin// 'di dag mya lus thams cad kun// dpal brjod dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyi rol dngos
385a5(ya): po'i chos rnams kun// gzugs su snang dang sgra ru grag/ dran dang bsam dang rtog sbyong tshogs// 'di rnams kyis ni sku gsung thugs// 'di dag nyid kyang de dag ste//
385a6(ya): chos nyid khyab pa'i phur ba'o// de nyid thabs kyis shes 'gyur zhing // shes rab nyid kyang de yi thabs// don dam gnyis med phur pa ste// kun gyi dam pa 'di zung zhig/
385a7(ya): rtog pa'i 'ching bas 'ching byed cing // grol ba yang ni de nyid do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen 'di// rtogs pa dang ni shes bya'i yul// khyed kyis the tshom ma skyed
385b1(ya): cig/ ces gsungs so// 'phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'phrin las rtsa ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas
385b2(ya): khro bo'i rgyal po yis// dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di bshad do// ngo bo rig pa'i byang chub sems// kun gyi sa la ma lus 'dre bas// chos nyid ye shes gnyis su med// sems
385b3(ya): can kun la gdab par bya// de nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du'o// ma lus mkhyen pa de yis ni// dngos po chos can de bzhin no// rnam rtog tshogs
385b4(ya): la chos kun gdab// yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa'i lha// kun rdzob snod bcud snang la gdab// thugs rje chen po thabs kyi mchog/ ma lus sems can khams la gdab/
385b5(ya): mtshon byed rdzas kyi sa gnod pa 'joms// ji snyed btags pa'i ming tsam mo// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// spros med gsal bas phyogs dang bral// chos nyid
385b6(ya): rig pa'i ye shes te// skye 'gag med pa'i klong du'o// snang zhing srid pa de yi yul// gnyis med sems su rtogs pa'i thabs// de las de nyid 'char zhing stong // mthong
385b7(ya): yod sems las ma 'das pa// de nyid kyis ni yon tan yin// dkar dmar snang ba byang chub sems// mnyam nyid mkha' la gdab pa yi// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med
386a1(ya): skye 'gro rigs kyi sras su grub// sngon gyur longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'gyur med gsal ba 'bras bu yin// snying rjes sems can thos mi dor// ma dag
386a2(ya): sdug bsngal sbyang phyir gdab// rgyud drug yul te tshad med bzhi// dag pa'i go 'phang snang bar byed// 'khor ba'i gnas ngan spar ba yin// de nyid rtogs pa sprul pa'i sku// 'og
386a3(ya): min bde chen lhun grub gnas// rgyud dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// de yi bdag po de 'dir gnas// bsgom bya rnam par rtog pa'i lha// snang zhing nges pa sprul pa'i tshogs//
386a4(ya): zhi rgyas dbang drag bye brag gis// rang gis dmigs pa'i yul la'o// sngags rdzas ting 'dzin 'di yi grogs// yon tan rtogs dang 'bras bcas pa// mthar phyin de yis
386a5(ya): byed pa'o// rigs bzhi sras kyi mchog gyur pas// dmigs pa'i ru tra sems kyi rten// gnas gsum rtsol bas de bsgral mtshungs// gang 'dod las la sbyor bar nus// byin gyis
386a6(ya): brlabs pa'i rtags byung nyid// phyogs dbus rigs lnga ye shes lnga// tshad med bzhi dang rnam thar brgyad// stobs bcu mi 'jigs rig pa bzhi// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sku
386a7(ya): gsung thugs// sprul par bcas te rdzogs pa'o// 'di nyid rten dang brten pa dang // phyag mtshan pho nyar shes par bya// shes rab blo che dbang po rno// 'dod chags lam rgyus
386b1(ya): brtson 'grus che// dad ldan snying rje gzhan don brtson// blo bcad zhe sdug brnag par ldan// 'di dag don byed nus pa'i rgyu// rdzas bzhi so so'i nus mthu bsgrub// chu shel me
386b2(ya): long bdud rtsi dang // yungs kar dmigs pa'i rdzas yin te// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor thig le dang // ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs brnyan dang // de nyid bsnyan bsgrub gsad pa
386b3(ya): yi// lha dang sprul pa pho dang mo// lha ni gcig lnga brgya rtsa brgyad// sprul pa phyi nang gsang ba yi// sku li phyag rgya gsung yig 'bru// gru gsum rgya mdud e khram bcas//
386b4(ya): 'chol dang lus dang bsad pa dang // bang rim gsum pas mtha' bsdus te// 'dus byas rdzas su snang ba yin// 'di dag nga yi tshul shes pas// ji snyed mkhyen pa'i
386b5(ya): shes pa dang // ji ltar gnas pa'i mthar thug don// de 'dir rig par bya ba yin// zhes gsungs so// 'phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thugs rnam par dag pa'i
386b6(ya): dgongs pa rab tu bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rim pa'i bsgrub pa'i'ang gsungs so// shin tu dben zhing
386b7(ya): gtum pa'i gnas/ byang gi phyogs su gzhol ba der// 'thun pa'i rdzas dang yo byad dang // bla ma mnyes byas grogs kyi mchog/ gang la dmigs pa de ldan zhing // re dang
387a1(ya): dogs pa'i sems spangs shing // brtul phod spro bas 'jug par bya// phyi nang srung bas 'bad pa brtsam// rnal 'byor cho ga yongs rdzogs nas//
387a2(ya): nam mkha' sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// oM ma hA shU n+ya twA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ chos rnams de nyid yin mod kyang // sdug bsngal spyod la thugs rje bskyed/

387a4(ya): thigs pa shar// 'bar bas mi rtog yi ge hUM// rtog pa bskal pa gsum gyis sbyangs// ye shes 'byung ba yum gyi mkha'// rnam dag dbyings las shar ba'i b+h+rUM// 'phrin

387a7(ya): ste// dpral bar rnam par rgyal ba'o// mgrin par rta mgrin dbang can to// snying khar bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgom// lte bar gshin rje gshed po ste// gsang ba'i gnas su stobs po che//
387b1(ya): dpung pa g.yas su dbyug sngon can// g.yon du khams gsum rnam rgyal lo// rkang pa ga la sa la mi g.yo mgon// g.yon du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// yan lag mthil bzhi sgom
387b2(ya): bzhi// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyang // hUM sngon 'bar ba'i rdo rje bsgom// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// steng 'og gnas gsum sku gsung thugs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
387b3(ya): hUM ldan pa'o// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// spyi gtsug ye shes rgyun sbyor ba'i// dri ma bsal ba'i rigs chen lnga// snyoms mdzad byang chub sems kyi

387b5(ya): rab ye shes gsal ba'i dbang // gnyis med thim pas dbang bzhi rdzogs// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// ma lus mdzod pas kun drangs te// rgyal ba'i sras su bya ba
387b6(ya): las/ ba sad cing gnan pa ma yin te// 'phro 'du las la kun sbyor ba// 'di ni mnyes pa'i mchog yin te// gsol 'debs dbang bskur rab rdzogs pas// mkha' dbyings
387b7(ya): gsang gnas byin brlabs shing // mnyes mdzad bsrub po'i bo dpung las// 'gro 'dulas kyis gsal bar shar// su su~M mu chu/ hU~M ts+tshi dU ts+tsha hU~M b+h+yo d+ha ts+tsha hU~M b+h+ya ts+tsha ts+tsha hU~M b+h+yaH
388a1(ya): / b+h+yon+dun+yAn+mab+h+yo/ ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he ha he/ dzaHhU baM hoH/ srid pa'i phur pa mngal skyes tshul// rang gi ming gi 'od kyis dra byung //

388a3(ya): ming las 'byung ba'i steng // 'khor bcas rdzogs pa'i lus su lta// bdag nyid gsal ba dam tshig gi/ snying kha'i 'od 'bar hUM sngon las// srid pa'i phur pa sgrub pa dang //
388a4(ya): dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // 'thun pa'i gzugs la rab tu dbab// oM badz+ra ku ma ra kI li kI la ya ga na tsakra e a ra li/ hUM hU
388a5(ya): rje rje/ sa ma ya badz+ra tiSh+Tha/ dza hUM ba ho/ srid gsum gdug pa bsgral ba dang // nga rgyal bdud rnams gzhom pa dang // dpal po rdo rje 'khor bcas la// rtse gcig yod
388a6(ya): dang lus kyis 'dud// thun mong dang ni khyad par dang // khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// mnyes mdzad byin gyis brlab pa'o// oM AHhUM badz+ra rU be hUM/ badz+ra puSh+pe hU/
388a7(ya): badz+ra A lo ke hU/ badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ badz+ra nai bi d+ya hU/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ badz+ra mA le tra/ badz+ra gIrta hri/ badz+ra nirti a/ oM AHhUM/ badz+ra muM da du sha ri/ bya ra ga ra ti/ ma mo ha
388b1(ya): ra ti// ta badz+ra ra ti/ pU tsa ga na tsakra sa ma ye hU/ o AhUM/ ma hA bA ling ta i da na gr-i h+Na sa ma ye kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA maM sa gro ro tsa na ba su ta tsit+tit+ta/ sa ma kha kha sarba
388b2(ya): pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hau/ oM ma hA dza ga da ma ma gi ti sarba kha kha khA hi khA hai/ ma hA rak+ta rak+ta/ ru ru ti kha kha khA hi khA hi/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin nam// 'dod pa'i yon tan
388b3(ya): sbyin pa yis// btab cing gsal ba nyid du bya// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa'i// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos
388b4(ya): grub stso la// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlabs mdzad cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// grub par byin gyis brlabs pa yi// dkyil
388b5(ya): zhing rgyan yangs dkyil ba dang // sems kyi chos la sku mi mnga'// sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes so// srid gsum 'joms mdzad mnyam
388b6(ya): nyid dang // khro bo rdo rje 'du 'a bral mdzad// khro bo 'gro don mdzad phyag 'tshal// dgug cing ba snga ma dbab phyag rgya yis// nam mkha'i khams dang gnyis med sbyar// de nyid
388b7(ya): bdud rtsi btung bas mchog/ sngags la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor des// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa tsam// sngags 'od yum gyi zhal sgor zhugs// sdig bral dbu ma'i
389a1(ya): lam brgyud de// dbyings nas gsang ba'i lam la thim// de nyid dbyings nas hU la bskul// lu gu rgyud kyis brjod par bya// rten 'brel lugs las
389a2(ya): bzlog pa'o// mtshan ma du byung ba'i bzlas pa ni// gtso chen yab yu ma thugs bskul te// chos sku spyan drangaso zhal du thim// dbu ma'i nang ba rgyud pad+mar bcas// 'phro 'dus
389a3(ya): sras mchog 'dus kun rdzogs// kI la ya yis nges phyung ste// gtso dang 'thun pa'i sku mdog la// sku smad zur gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyan ldan 'bar ba'i glong na bzhugs//
389a4(ya): ye shes 'khor lo de 'dral dbab// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyi// mnyes pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin bya// 'bru nag dug khrag bdud rtsi yis// dbang byin brlabs te las la mngag/
389a5(ya): snying dbus sa bon las sngags spro// tshul 'di gzugs la nges par bstim// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAn pa hUM phaT/ ldeg 'phang 'od dang sgra 'byin dang // bzang po ma mthong
389a6(ya): bar du'o// skyo du bathun mtshams bya ba'i dus// 'di ni bsgrub pa bla med pa'o// 'phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa bstan pa rtsa ba'i rgyud le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
389a7(ya): / de nas bcom ldan khro rgyal gyis// nyid kyi sku yi cha lugs kyi// yon tan khyad par 'di bshad do// glang chen ko rlon theg mchog stobs// dpa' brtul za byed stag gis/
389b1(ya): brgyan// mnyen lcug 'khril yum sbrul gyi chas// byang chub sems ldan tsa ma ra// thod 'phreng gsum ni sku gsung thugs// thugs rjes chags pa rak+ta'i rgyan// gdul bya'i 'phrin las
389b2(ya): thal chen no// zhag gi ri mo don dam bcud// rgyu yis mtshon na don drug ldan// glang chen rjes che rgyab yangs// lus rags rin thang che 'gyur zhing // phro ma brtags gzhan gyi dpung
389b3(ya): 'joms nus// theg chen 'dir ni lam kun shong // dge dang mi dge mnyam pas 'degs// mtshams med la sogs byas pa'ang shong // nyon mongs 'dod yon ma spangs 'grub//
389b4(ya): lam 'di yon tan dpag tu med// ma rig zag pa myur du 'joms// stag lpags brjid cing dpa' bar 'dzin// rtsal ldan sha rus mi phyed zag// ri dgas chen po'i gnyen po
389b5(ya): 'gyur// gcan gzan phra mo zil gyis gnon// dug lnga rigs lngar shes pas dpa'// nyon mongs ye shes grub pas mdzes// thugs rjes dbye ba sre ye mi mdzad// bag chags
389b6(ya): stug po dus gcig 'joms// dregs pa ru tra'i gnyen por 'gyur// dman pa'i spyod pa zil gyis gnon// sbrul 'jigs brjid la gdug pa che// mnyen zhing lU ka la ri mo
389b7(ya): 'byol// kha dog gsal zhing du mar snang // spyod pa 'di nyid dpa' zhing 'jigs// nyid la brjid cing gzhan la gdug/ rang gzhan don la 'dud cing rten// 'bras bu'i
390a1(ya): khyad par gsal zhing mthong // bskyed rdzogs che dang lam 'bras bu// gang zag blol sna tshogs ston// dug gsum lam gyi lha log 'dul// thugs
390a2(ya): rjes zin pas sman mi gtong // zheng lpags mthong 'jigs yid mi 'jigs// tshil khrag chu sar ba spur bcas// drang gnyen rlung skyo ba yan lag tshang // 'di ni zag pa'i spyod
390a3(ya): rlabs pas// ngan pa'i lta ba 'jigs pa bskyed// dman la mos pa lid skrag 'gyur// gnas dang 'pho dang zhi ba dang // khro ba ston yugs bskrad bsdu dang gtor// rgyas zhum
390a4(ya): 'pham rgyal dbang du bya// rdo rje theg mchog 'di la gnas// bstan pa dang ni nges pa dang // sgra tsam sgra min dgongs pa dang // thal 'byung dang ni ye shes dang // spyi dang gapa smras
390a5(ya): brda dang thabs// bla ma mnyes la drang zhing gnyen// las kyi rlung dang g.yul ngo bzlog/ bzhi lam 'bras bu lta spyod dang // dam tshig byin rlabs yan lag tshang // skam rlon
390a6(ya): ra rI dbang po tshang // ring ldan pa dang zlum pa ltar// spros pa nyer zhi chos kyi sku// dus gsum dgongs pa tshang zhing gtsang // longs spyod rdzogs sku ral ba sgra// dag pa'i sa
390a7(ya): mA d+hi la snang // khyim na spyod pa'i cha lugs 'dzin// gzhan don sprul pa drug la sogs// sku gdung ring bsrel lhag mar bcas// rigs mnga' pha ma gnyen 'dun dang // 'khor dang
390b1(ya): bstan gnas pa'i tshad// phyir mi ldog dang skye ba gcig/ thogs pa tsam dang srid tha ma// mngon par byang chub gsal bar ldan// sems dpa' che ba'i mam thob nas// yongs
390b2(ya): rdzogs srid kyi phra dang rags// mi rtog pa la rnam mi dmigs// mtshan ma'i spros las dben pa'o// thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel zhing // skabs don rdo rje'i theg par gsal//
390b3(ya): rak+Sha rlan gsher dmar na ga ldan// ser 'dres bsgo sla bsgyur bar nus// mi dmigs thugs rjes chags zhing rlan// chos dbyings ye shes kun la ga dang // nye bar mi gos ngang la
390b4(ya): gnas// che ba'i yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan// ye shes phra rags skad cig mkhyen// tha dad snang zhing gzhan bsgyur bas// gdul bya'i rigs la 'tsham pa'i rkyen// lhag par
390b5(ya): rtags kyi don ldan pa'i// dkar zhing gsal snyan zhib sgor bsdur// phyir gsal sla ba 'phrin las don// thog ma'i mun pa ma lus sel// ye shes snang ba'i tshogs kun bskyed//
390b6(ya): drag po la sogs myur du 'dul// khams dang bag nyal tha dad yang // ji ltar 'tshams pa de bzhin ston// des 'byung skal ba yod pa yi// rnam grol gau 'phang myur thob byed// bag
390b7(ya): chags cung zad mi gnas pa// 'byin pa'i don de nye bar gnas// bcud mchog snum zhu na reg bya mnyen// mgu bo'i nad sel gsal mi 'gyur// dri dang kha dog rab gsal bzhin//
391a1(ya): rdo rje theg mchog gya nom pa// reg pa can gyis gnyen por 'gyur// nyon mongs lnga dang drug nyid kyis// yan lag nang du gyur pa sel// grangs med par
391a2(ya): du chud mi za// blo ngan shes rab chung ba yis// 'di la nges 'byung skal med de// dus la bab na sar gnas byed// 'di dag rdzogs phyir rab tu brgyan// gzhan yang nga yi bstan pa
391a3(ya): 'das// rdo rje thug pa che ldan zhing // khong du chud pa'i mthu mnga' bas// glang chen ko rlon rab tu gon// rgol ba 'thun pas tshar gcod phyir// stag gi sham bus dkris pa'o//
391a4(ya): lto 'phye'i dug 'joms sbrul gyis brgyan// sems gnyis mi 'gyur tsa ma ra'o// sku gsung rang gis thod 'phreng dkyus// zhi ba'i snying rjes mi gnas chags// gzhan don gzigs
391a5(ya): par rak+ta'o// dge ba 'phel byed thal chen te// kun gyi sems rtogs bcud kyis brgyan// gzhan yang gti mug 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang 'jig tshogs phrag dog dang //

391a7(ya): bcas/ bi na yag glang chen gzugs// mkha' 'gro chen mo stag mgo can// mtha' yas klu dang lha chen po// bsgral ba pags bathod 'phreng dang // khra ga zhag dang ni thal bas

391b5(ya): phyag mtshan no// bri sa tsha sgo can dag gis// ro bsregs thal ba sa nag dang // rnga mo bung bu'i bdud rtsi sa byugs// 'bru nag me tog nag po dgram// tsha zhing rtsu ba la rno ba'i

394a7(ya): par byed// de nas kha sbyar rab tu dbye// gzhan bsrung ba la dbye ba ni// sngags pas thun bzhi 'bros par 'gyur// de nas gzugs la bsdu ba ni// dngos grub par chad byed pa'i bgeg//

394b2(ya): phaT/ ha na ha na hU phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ ta tha ya ta tha la hUM phaT/ phur pa dang ni 'bru thun brdeg/ ha sa ya ra na ha ta tha ga hU phaT/ dug khrag sbyar ma'i thun gyis brdeg/ shi kr-in
394b3(ya): ha na ya hUM phaT/ dud pa dang ni thal ba sa brdeg/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ mtshon cha drag pos gtub par bya// a be sha ya a be sha ya hUM phaT/ b+hin+na ya b+hin+na ya hUM phaT/ 'di
