394b6(ya): phyung // gzugs la bsdu ba'i gnas yin no// gdab pa'i gnas ni 'du byed kyi// lag pa yum bzhis byin brlabs nas// rnam dag skye med yi ge yis// snang ba gsum nyid gsal
394b7(ya): bor lta// rgyu gsum ldan pas dbyings su bzla// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun no// oM badz+ra ku mA ra kI li kI la ya hU hU a a/ sras mchog hUM mdzad la sogs dbab// de yi phyogs
395a1(ya): bcu'i 'jig rten khyab// gnas ngan sbyangs pas slar la bsdu// kun gyis mthu dang gzi byin bskyed// byin gyis brlabs te dngos grub stsal/
395a2(ya): gnas bkru ba'i las yin no// phaT kyis rab mtshan sras kyi mchog/ 'bru dgu'i rjes la gze ma spar// dngos bcom dbus su 'dus pa yang // sa bon drug la 'od kyis
395a3(ya): btag/ 'bras bu pho nyar bcas pa dab ba// phur pa'i gnas su bstim par bya// khyad par las su ra ba bshad do// bdag nyid sra sa dang dmigs pa dang // gsal ba gsum
395a4(ya): gyis byin gyis brlab// pho nyas btab cing bskul ba ni// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs// khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i// mngon
395a5(ya): spyod 'phrin las myur du mdzod// de yi snying po sa gnas bcur gdab// hA na ha na badz+ra/ da ha da ha badz+ra/ ba tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ ma thA ma tha badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ su ru su ru
395a6(ya): / badz+ra/ mu ru mu nu badz+ra ka ta ka ma/ \u0f7fka le/ badz+ra a tsi ta a pa ra tsat+ta badz+re/ ma ra sa ni pra ma da ni hUM phaT/ 'khor tshogs kun yang sngags kyis dbab// drag po'i rdzas dang phur pas
395a7(ya): brdeg/ khrag rlung bsnol te rul myags bsam// gsang dang gso ba las kyi mchog/ ma lus gnas 'dir rdzogs par bya// zab cing rgya che'i don yin no// zhes gsungs so//
395b1(ya): 'phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ga dan 'pho ba bsgral ba'i 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// drag tu bsgral
395b2(ya): ba gsungs pa las// mtshon rnon gdug pa byin gyis brlabs// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa
395b3(ya): tshal pa brgya ru khos// zhes brjod yan lag nyid lag dang // kho ga pa don snying bcas pa dag/ bcad cing gtub pa nyid du bya// de nas sngags mtshon brjod pa ni// sbru ma ma pa sha ku
395b4(ya): ma ma ku ru ma taMnya/ A dz+nyA ka ra ku ru nya/ i nai do ti ma ma shri tra/ ka ra ya ya hU phaT/ ta da ya tha ta da ya tha hU phaT/ gzugs sgra ba se ma pa 'dus pa yis// ma lus rdul phran
395b5(ya): bzhin du dmigs// de nas lhag par gnas pa yi// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul dbrog pa ni// gdug cing snang sem so ldan pa yi// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // bdag la bar chad
395b6(ya): byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyis// snying po 'di yang brjod par bya// sarba A na ya hrI phaT/ tad ya tha ta da ya tha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ pha rol mthu dang rdzu 'phrul
395b7(ya): phrogs/ bdag la bstim pas de ldan pasam// bag chags sa bon phra ba yi// gal te lha ga lus brdung ba ni// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtu na// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtung
396a1(ya): khang du// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// kha tha kha tha/ ha na ha na hU phaT/ mud ka ra mud ka ra/ A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya
396a2(ya): hUM phaT/ byin rlabs dbyings mchog gru gsum du// gsang byung rdo rje tho bas brdung // gnas sgo drag po gsum gyi las// rten dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis// hU hU hU/ sgra
396a3(ya): brjod de dag thugs kha nas// mkha' las sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// phaT phaT phaT/ de dag thugs khros drug shul gyis// badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha hU/ slar yang thugs rjes
396a4(ya): shin tu khros// lha mo thong bkang sha khrag stob// kha kha khA hi khA hi/ phul bas zhal du gsol bar dmigs// ha ha hi yis mnyes par bsam// mthar phyin brdung ba'i 'phrin las
396a5(ya): bya'o// rang bzhin khyad par bzlas pa yis// slar yang rim pas gso ba dang // chos nyid bden pas gso ba ni// chos nyid don dam bden pa dang // gsang sngags mthu yi byin
396a6(ya): rlabs kyis// sangs rgyas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'o// rdzu 'phrul 'byin pa'i las yin no// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAn pa hUM phaT/ bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/
396a7(ya): snying khar dril zhing btab pa yis// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs su sprul// de dag sras kyi sku la 'jug/ brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas/ bdag nyid steng
396b1(ya): gi gnas su dri la// slar 'dus sbyor ba sngon pas lhag/ rdzas dang bdag nyid gso ba yi// ngas bstan lung bzhin gnas pa yin// yab yum sbyor ba'i sems phab pas// pha rol
396b2(ya): sems rgyud nam mkhar gnon// hUM phaT ces pa'i sgra yis ni// rang bzhin gnas nas gsol ba gdab// dbang bskur ba ni 'od 'bar 'gyur// yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi mkha'// hU
396b3(ya): las sku gsal phaT kyi sa gnon// slar yang bsdu dang gtor ba yis// 'og mi ni ga nas la gsol gdab cing // dbang bskur 'od zhu hU~M du dmigs// phaT kyis sbyor ba'i lhu mas su
396b4(ya): 'phang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bar bsnyen// sgrub pa bsgrub pa chen po yi// rdzogs pa'i skur ba zhengs phyir byon nas// dbu rgyan ldan pas dbang bskur te// phaT kyi sa 'og min gnas su
396b5(ya): 'phang // dus btab rgyal tsha ba dam pa yis// bcu bzhi mdzad pas 'gro don rdzogs// rdo rje gnas lung sbyor ba'o// srid chang mdze can mtshon shi ba'i// thod rus nang du dmigs
396b6(ya): pa gzhug/ shis pa'i gnas su mnan pa ni// oM la A laM hUM laM sta pa ya nan/ mo ha g+ha ya shri kr-i bi kr-i badz+ra hU ka ra hUM hU hUM phaT phaT phaT/ rdo rje ri rab khros pa yis// rab tu mnan pa'i
396b7(ya): sbyor ba bsam// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// gnas ngan bag chags yong mi len// rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// 'phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
397a1(ya): rlud las/ drag shul mngon par spyod pa'i 'phrin las kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// drag sngags

397a3(ya): / mnyes dngos grub ba zhu// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ d+ha ti ma ma karma a tsi te tra/ ma ra sa ni/ pra marta na ye/ sarba big+h+nan baM hU phaT/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // kun gyi
397a4(ya): rtsa ba 'phrin la sa dang // yab yu ma bcas pa'i thugs kha nas// mgal me lta bu'i 'od 'phros pas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan zhing gsal// rgyud bskul byin rlabs dbang
397a5(ya): bskur byas// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ d+ha ti ma mo karma a ti ta/ a pa tsi re ta/ dza ye bi dza ye/ ka taM ka ye ma re sa na pra marta ni/ sarba big+h+nAn ba hU phaT/ 'di ni ga zhan gyis mi
397a6(ya): thub cing // rnam par rgyal po'i 'phrin las so// bdag nyid khro bo rdzas kun gyi// drag sngags sgra yi ge nam lcags kyi// zhun ma sa la brdabs 'dra ba'i// 'od 'phro ga dug pa tshar
397a7(ya): gcod byed// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ a dzi te/ a bar dzi ta/ dza ye bi dza ye/ ka ta ka ye/ ma ma ba sha ku ru ma ta nya sha ra a naM/ d+ha ti ma ma karma/ ka ra yi nan/ shing tra kar ta ye/
397b1(ya): mar s+ye ni prarta ni ye sarba bi g+h+nA na baM hU phaT/ 'di yis gdug pa ma lus kun// tshar gcod las la 'dzud par byed// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kun// sro gnas drangs pas
397b2(ya): bsgrub pa che// gtso chen 'phro 'dus thams cad bsgral// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ ba ra b+hi dan ma ra sa na pra ma ra ta na ye hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+nAn a na ya/ ha na ha na/ da ha ha nga / pa tsa

398a1(ya): badz+ra/ shi kran ka ra nye ya/ ma ra sa na pra mar ta nI ya/ mar tsi ta kha hi ma sha rbad// ma hA ga ya pUr thu myags rbad// kang ka sha ya/ ma ra ya rbad/ 'di

400b7(ya): cing las la rbang // sgrol ba'i sbyor ba rab tu bskul// o sha na shan sril sr-i ka/ mu ka hU dza/ trag rak+ta ru tra/ bi ru bi na na na mug ti ba/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// pad+ma da ri ru ma ti
401a1(ya): tsit+ta la b+h+yo/ ru lu ki h+ya mu se na dz+dza/ mu ti du ru tsa la mi dza dza/ ya ma k+She yak+Sha/ d+he ba k+She ya krA d+he ba k+Sha/ ba ra hI k+Shi drug tshal pa dum bu ru shag b+h+yoH
401a2(ya): so so'i gnas nas drang bar bya// badz+ra sho na sho na sri la sri ka/ kA la tsit+ta nr-i dza sha la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma hA yak+kha/ sti ga na na ga mo du na b+h+yo/ ma ma nri shra tsi ta la dza/ rba da long kA mA ra ya b+h+yo/

401b2(ya): cing brdeg pa 'bang sreg dang // gzir ba'i las kyis tshar bcad pa// 'dir ni lus ngag yid gsum ldan// shin tu dmigs pas myur du 'grub// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags

401b6(ya): rnams/ kun sbyor nyis brgya lnga bcu rdzogs// khro chen phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du// ya ba yum nye ba'i sras bzhi la// sprul pa lnga ni nye bar sprul// thugs kyi bdag dang bcas
401b7(ya): pa yis/ brgya dang bcu yi lha rnams dang // mngon par spyod la sogs pa yi// 'dus byas lnga rnams gzugs brnyan la// khro chen zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// so so'i rigs
402a1(ya): kyi gtso chen lnga// gang gis 'dul ba der snang zhing // zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa yi// so so'i 'phrin las ngor byung ste// dbyibs dang kha dog rdzas
402a2(ya): dang sbyar// sku smad rang gi rgyu las grub// mgo gnyis skad pa zhabs kyi dbyibs// zlum po gru bzhi zla kha ma dang // gru gsum rnams kyi khyad par yin// steng 'og zhi ba zlum po
402a3(ya): ste// logs bzhi rgyas pa skad pa dbang // zur rnams drag po nyid yin no// gong ma'i gnas la gzhal med khang // 'khor lo rtsib sa brgyad ldan pa la// lte bar gtso bo yab yum
402a4(ya): bsgom// rtsibs la phyogs mtshams khro bo brgyad// yab yum steng 'og gnas su ni// hUM mdzad dang ni stobs po che// yab yum sras dang bcas pa yis// skyed pa zla kham
402a5(ya): gnas su ni// khro rgyal bdud kyi sras kun gnas// 'og ma'i gnas log sa bzhi la ni// 'phra me na sgo ma 'byung ba zhi bsam// rtsa ba la sogs gnas de la// 'jig rten
402a6(ya): gnas pa bcu gnyis po// lcam dra la nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// dbyibs dang sbyar ba'i gnas su bas ma// grong ma'i gnas kyi logs bzhi ru// rigs dang 'phrin las rab
402a7(ya): phye la/ lhag ma'i sras mchog bsgom pa ste// bdun cu rtsa brgyad phyung ba ste// rdzas la dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// de dag me long gzugs brnyan bzhin//
402b1(ya): rang bzhin ma grub snang ba ni// chos sku skye med bur ba'o// ma lus sku la rab rdzogs pa'i// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phur pa grub// ba spu'i bu ga'i tshul thams cad//
402b2(ya): 'bar ba'i khro chung bltams pa yi// bdog gzhan ma lus don byeng pa'i// phur pa sprul pa'i sku yi mchog/ sku gsum yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor che// rang byung ye
402b3(ya): shes gnas la 'dus// 'di ni sku yi dkyil 'khor yin// rigs lnga 'brung dgu k+Shi la ya// thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsal// bris te yig 'bru
402b4(ya): dgod pa dang // phur bu dgod cing dngos grub blang // thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba lnga// bris te phyag mtshan so sor dgod// mchod cing las bcol dngos grub blangs//
402b5(ya): gtso mo yum gyis dpogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor gnas su bri bya zhing // lha dgod rdzas spyad bskul ba rdzogs// bsgom zhing dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bskul zhing yon
402b6(ya): tan ldan pa yi// rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du// nyi shu rtsa gcig oM yi dbyibs// tshad dang ldan pa'i rdzas bkod cing // dngos grub blang ba tha dad do// rdzas
402b7(ya): bsags bskyed cing tshad ldan bri// rgyan rtags bkod pas 'tshol ba rdzogs// stong dang rtsa brgyad 'chol ba rdzogs// stong dang rtsa brgyad sgrub pa'o// dkyil 'khor byang
403a1(ya): chub sems las 'byung // las kyi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa dang // sreg mchod bsad pa'i rgyu dang ni// chos ldan pha rol bskul ba yis// gzugs bsreg
403a2(ya): gnas sbar las rnams kyis// ma lus 'dus pa brgyad du bstan// rigs can lnga la kun sbyar bas// bsnyen zla ba sku gsung thugs kyi dang // thig le gcig tu rab tu 'dus/
403a3(ya): zhes bka' stsal to// 'phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ khyad par gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// /
403a4(ya): de nas 'phrin las rgyal po yis// rang gis 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// shin tu gdams pa 'di skad gsungs// kye ma sras mchog 'khor tshogs kyi// sprul pa pho nyar bcas pa
403a5(ya): rnams// snyigs ma'i sems can gdul dka' bas// thugs rje'i thabs chen sna tshogs kyis// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ thams cad du ni snang zhing ston// bdag gi
403a6(ya): don du bzhugs so snyam// rang gi rnam rtog nye bar gnas// kha cig tu ni dge sbyong che// nyan thos rang rgyal spyod pa ston// kha cig byang chub sems dpa' yis// spyod pa rlabs chen /
403a7(ya): nus pa mdzad// kha cig tu ni longs spyod rdzogs// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad brgyad cu ldan pa'i sku// dul bar gnas pa zhi ba dang // gdug po can la khro bo ste/ zhing
403b1(ya): khams rab tu bkod pa dang // gzhal med khang pa'i pho brang rdzogs// gnyis med sbyor ba'i tshul can dang // rgyan gcig ldan pa sgyu yi rigs// yab dang yum gyi rnam pa canA//
403b2(ya): glang gis 'dul ba de snang zhing // rigs drug sems can kun la yang // rang rigs gang yin der 'byung bas// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug dang // gnod sbyin mkha' lding
403b3(ya): mi 'am ci// lha min dri za mi rnams dang // byol song yi dgas dmyal ba rnams// so so gang 'dul ngo snyed kyi// rang gi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// dman pa rnams la rim pa ste//
403b4(ya): brtags pa ma yin sdug bsngal dang // mir skyes sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang // phun sum tshogs pa rnyed dka' dang // skya bas 'gro ga so sbyong bslab pa bcu// kun rdzob don dam rang
403b5(ya): bzhin gyis// sem sa dbang sgyur te bdag med pa'i// rtag pa rab rdzogs dbu ma ston// de nas lus ngag byang ba dang // spyod pa rab bsgrub rnal 'byor te// bskyed pa'i rim pa rnal
403b6(ya): 'byor che// de nyid rjes su rnal 'byor dang // rab tu rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ thabs dang shes rab 'jug pas don// sku lnga chos lnga ye shes lnga// lam lnga rigs lnga dag pa lnga/
403b7(ya): sa bcu stobs bcu ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad nges par 'byung ba dang // bskal pa chen po grangs med gsum// skad cig tsam la rdzogs par byed// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dag/ tha ma 'bring
404a1(ya): dang mchog gyur pa// tshad med rnams kyi mchog gyur gyis// brtan dang thob pa dus gcig gang // tshe gcig srid pa bar ma dang // gsum mam lnga 'am
404a2(ya): bdun dag gis// rang gi sa la gnas pa ston// 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi mthu// phan tshun log par 'byin srid de// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// dus la bab pa gang gzigs
404a3(ya): nas// sangs rgyas rnams ni cung mi 'da'// nga yi ye shes tshul 'di la// khyed rnams 'jigs par ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal pas/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams kyis// bcom
404a4(ya): ldan 'das de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po/ khro po'i rgyal po chen po de nyid kyi 'phrin las kyi rnam par rol pa chen po'i sgo nas/ yul can 'dul ba'i rigs
404a5(ya): rnams kyi don rab tu rdzogs par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ba rgya chen po'i sgo nas mngon par bstod pa ni/ e ma bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo rje// dus gsum sangs rgyas
404a6(ya): rnams kyi spyi dpal he ru ka/ rigs bdag sku lnga ye shes lnga rdzogs lhun grub cing // dkyil 'khor gsum lnga brgyad kyi ngo bo sku la rab 'dus rdo rje 'chang // 'phrin las bzhi dang gtso chen
404a7(ya): drag po sngon 'byung bzhi mdzad pa'i// gzhon nu lnga ldan myur 'byung 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdus
404b1(ya): sku la 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po snang bar mdzad nas/ mi gnas pa'i dbyings chos nyid mnyam pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i ding la dgyes pa chen pos bzhugs par gyur to// 'dren
404b2(ya): las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud mas/ phyi ma'i tshul nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams
404b3(ya): cad kyi 'phrin las 'dus pa bur brtsa ba'i rgyud laswA/ bi ti ta ma la 'bum sde bsdus pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas
404b4(ya): dang // bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpa'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gta rgya//
404b5(ya): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ma ma sa mA dza bi ru mU la tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ ma mo 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs rgyal po he
404b6(ya): ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa mngon par
404b7(ya): rab tu rdzogs pa'i rdo rje he ru ka zhes bya ba de/ thig le chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du srid pa'i chos kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas pa// rin po che
405a1(ya): las grub pa'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo lha'i rgyal po'i gnas/ bde ba chen po'i glong // yum chen mo de kho na nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa mu kha me dgongs pa ma
405a2(ya): lus par shar ba'i klong / b+ha ga yangs pa'i glong dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa'i gnas na snyoms par zhugs te/ bzhugs
405a3(ya): nas rab tu gsang ba'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi rdo rje shugs chen po 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i glong chen po dang gnyis su med pa'i glong chen po dang gnyis su med ba'i 'gro
405a4(ya): 'du dus gsum du rgyun mi 'chad par skye ba las/ byin gyis brlabs kyi cho 'phrul chen po dpag tu med par snang ba 'di sa ste/ sa chen po dang / me chen po dang / chu chen po dang /
405a5(ya): rlung chen po dag gis gnas pa dang / thog pa dang / gsher ba dang / bskyod cing g.yo bar byed pa'i mthu chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par snang bsas sring ba'i 'jig rten bskyeng pa'i sa
405a6(ya): bani dang rtsa bzung bzlas pa/ dbus ma dang 'bras bur bzlas pa/ yan ton dang nus pa rdzogs pa/ sgyogs dang dus rab tu rtse ba med par ba zhugs pa sa/ dkyis kyi yum kun tu bang
405a7(ya): mo sring pa thams cad kyi bdag mo/ he ru sa thams cad kyi yum chen mo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang phyug sa/ 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa thams cad kyi
405b1(ya): gtso mo/ de kho na nyid kyi gzhi mu kha le zhes bya ba de nyid rol pa chen po gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skul ba'i dbyangs kyi sgra chen pos
405b2(ya): gsol ba btab pa/ e ma ho/ bla med mngon rdzogs rgyal po he ru ka/ snang stong gnyis med kun la snang ba'i sku// mtshan med spros bral mi rtog grag pa'i gsung // bde chen zag
405b3(ya): med zung 'jug khyab pa'i thugs// ma lus rang la rdzogs pa'i yon tan mnga'// 'phrin las mdzad phyir rol pa'i sku bzhengs shig/ a la la ho/ zhes bskul ba mdzad pas//
405b4(ya): bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang // mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang las mi g.yo zhing // ma rtogs 'khor ba
405b5(ya): ngang gis sgrol ba las// 'khrul pa'i blo la dngos por yong mi snang // gdul bya'i bsam pa rnam dag som nyi med// dus la ma bab zhi bar gnas par bya// zhes bka' stsal to//
405b6(ya): de nas yang yum chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po las// mnor ma lus mi zad mkhyen pa las// rtogs dang ma
405b7(ya): rtogs log pa'i blo can la// so so'i ston pa rig dbang thugs las phyung // ye shes rtsal gyis dgongs pa dpag med las// gang la bsngags pa'i bstan rab sgo dbye gsol// zhes bskul
406a1(ya): bas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas/ dbyings kyi yum chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ srid gsum 'jig rten kun na
406a2(ya): rab bde ba'i// kha sbyor dga' ba skad cig gnas skabs bzhi// 'dod chags chen po mthong ba zhad rig cing sbyong // blo dang ri ga las khyad par gang snang ba'i// mthar thug rim bzhin du sa 'byung
406a3(ya): nus par ldan// mkha' bzhi pad+ma byang chub sems kyi gnas// nam mkhas khyab pa mnyam nyid sbyor mdzad phyir// ze 'bru 'dab bcas pad+ma rgyas mdzod cig/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya sta/ hoH/
406a4(ya): ra ga ya mi/ sa ma ya badz+ra pra be sha ya phaT/ ces bskul nas/ yab yum gnyis gzi ges pa dang / bzhad pa dang / reg pa dang / bskyod pa'i rol pas snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer
406a5(ya): gyi 'phro 'du chen po g.yos pa las/ phyogs bzhi dang dbus kyi b+ha ga yangs pa'i snang ba chen po khams gsum parnams la gsal bar mdzad de/ phyogs lnga dang / 'od lnga
406a6(ya): dang / rigs lnga dang / bsam pa lnga dang / rtsa ba lnga dang / 'bras bu lnga dang / nus pa lnga dang / khams lnga dang / byed pa lnga dang / las lnga dang / khyab pa lnga dang / dbang lnga dang / rgyu lnga dang /
406a7(ya): rkyen lnga dang / bag la nyal ba lnga dang / kun na sa ldang ba lnga dang / shes pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / grol ba lnga dang / yul lnga dang / 'dod pa lnga dang / spyad pa lnga dang / bsrung ba
406b1(ya): lnga dang / blang ba lnga dang / dor ba lnga dang / sgrub pa lnga dang / yon tan lnga dang / yan lag lnga dang / spyod pa lnga dang / ma 'dres pa lnga la sogs pa thams cad yum chen mo nyid kyi mkha' gzhi
406b2(ya): dbyings dang lnga las snang zhing gnas par sprul pa mdzad do// gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhing gi bkod pa rgya chen po dang // dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs
406b3(ya): pa dang / yab dang yum snyoms par 'jug pa tsam dang / rgyan so sor snang ba dang / zhi ba'i rnam par snang ba dang / khro bo'i rnam par snang ba dang / khyab pa dang / rdzogs pa dang / tha dad pa'i sku
406b4(ya): rnams dang / khyad par du sku'i rigs dang / gsung gi rigs dang / thugs kyi rigs dang / yon tan gyi rigs dang / las kyi rigs dang / dregs pa'i rigs dang / sgrub pa'i rigs dang /
406b5(ya): rbad pa'i rigs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bla med rgyal po he ru ka chen po des
406b6(ya): mnyam pa nyid las bzhengs te/ cho 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshogs chen
406b7(ya): ma lus ngal nyon// khyed kyi khams dang byed pa dang // lus dang rigs kyi khyad par dang // 'phrin las grub pa'i mtha' la sogs// thams cad nga las byung zhing snang // lus dang ngag dang rnam par
407a1(ya): shes/ nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang // gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba byed// sku dang ye shes rig pa'i ngang // bsam pa longs spyod la sogs pa// dgongs pa'i
407a2(ya): cho 'phrul nyid las byung // gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ nga yi rang bzhin shes par gyis// nga las ma rtogs chos gang min// btags pa tsam yang yod ma yin// de bas nga yi don rtogs phyir//
407a3(ya): gus pa'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yum chen mo kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to//
407a4(ya): kye ma bcom ldan he ru ka/ 'di ltar bdag dang gzhan gyi chos// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // gsang ba chen po sa rab bsdus pa'i// b+ha ga 'di la ci phyir dga'// phyogs dang rigs kyi khyad par
407a5(ya): gang // 'od lnga kha dog ci yi phyir// bsam pa'i 'bras bu rtsa ba dang // nus pa rnams ni gang las byung // khams dang byed pa las ni ci// khyab pa dbang dang bcas pa gang // rgyu dang rkyen gyis ci zhig bya//
407a6(ya): ba ga la nyal ba gang lta bu// kun nas ldang ba'i chos nyid ci// shes par bya ba ci zhig yin// phung po lnga zhes gang la bya// stobs lnga zhes pa su la mnga'// su zhig grol bar 'gyur ba yin// yul lnga
407a7(ya): yang ni gang zhig yin// 'dod spyad bsrung ba ji lta bu// blang dor bsgrub pa ji lta bu// spyod pa'i yon tan yan lag dang // ma 'dres chos kyi khyad par rnams// khyod las snang ba ci yi phyir// zhing dang
407b1(ya): zhing gi bkod pa dang // 'khor lo rdzogs pa gang las byung // kha sbyor bde ba gang gi'i phyir// ci'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyis// so sor rang la rdzogs par 'gyur// rang gis rig pa'i snang
407b2(ya): ba gang // ma lus snang ba'i don ched cing // de lta bu la gzhan dag gis// thob par bya ba'i thabs ni gang // bdag cag rnams la legs par ston// zhes gsol to// gleng gzhi mngon par byung/
407b3(ya): ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs rgyal po bla med he ru ka chen po de sprul pa'i cho 'phrul mngon par spyad pa'i don du thugs rdo rje mnyam pa nyid
407b4(ya): kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dra ga shul spyod pa'i cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po rab tu 'bar bar bstan nas gsung gi nga ro drag po'i shugs phyung ba'i sgra chen pos gang bar
407b5(ya): mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi gtos thams cad sku'i rang bzhin gyis khyab cing / gsung gi brda'i sgra chen por grag la/ thugs zhi ba byang chub kyi sems kyis dgongs nas bka
407b6(ya): stsa la pa/ nyon cig srid pa'i rgyal mo che// khyod ni mu kha le zhes bya// sku yi dbu dang tsit+ta la// zhal lnga rtse mo lngar snang zhing // phyag drug zhabs brgyad mkha' bzhi dbyings// phyogs bzhi dbus
407b7(ya): dang lnga ru grags// shar lho nub byang dbus dag gi/ mche ba gtsigs po'i zhal lnga las// dkar zhing 'tsher dang sngo la gdangs// dmar bzhad ljang gtsogs mthing nag khro// ljags kun
408a1(ya): rdo rje rtse dgu dang // ren che na ke ke ru 'bar zhing // pad+ma dgu brtsegs rgya gram can// 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan par snang // skyed dang srog dang snum pa dang /
408a2(ya): g.yo zhing khyab par byin gyis brlabs// sher gser ke ke ru dag dang // in+d+ra nI la bai DAR+Ya// 'od 'phro khyod kyi ral pa'i tshogs// ba de gshegs rdo rje rin po che// chags po dang ni 'phrin
408a3(ya): las kyi// so so'i rigs kyi dam pa'o// thugs mchog rig pa skye med dbyings// rnam shes ye shes lnga phyung srid// sbas pa gnyis dang phyag bzhi yi sa// pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs nas//
408a4(ya): gtso mo drug rnams dbang sdud cing // bdud rtsi lnga la rol cing sbyor// rnam par thar pa'i zha bas brgyad rdzogs// blo na mo brgyad kyi bran byed brdzis// mkha' bzhi phyogs bzhi dus bzhir
408a5(ya): gnas// cha snyoms byed pa gcig yin te// brtan dang smin dang gsher ba dang // skyod byed yangs pa'i bdag nyid de// drod 'dzin rlan rtsub chags pa yis// shel dang mar gad pad+ma dang //
408a6(ya): nI la bai DUR+Ya dag go/ gsang ba'i mkha' la 'od 'bar zhing // rdo rje ri na chen byi ru dang // lcags zangs ze 'bru'i rnam pa las// du sa chen bzhi dang 'byung ba lnga// gtso bo'i skra yi phyed kyi
408a7(ya): sbyor// so so'i rigs su snang zhing 'dus// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// gsang ba'i bde chen 'byung ba'i gnas// skye dang 'chi las rab 'das shing // de la sdug bsngal long med
408b1(ya): pas// mya ngan 'das ma zhes kyang bya// blang bya dor bya med pa yis// kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya// rnam par shes pa ma lus pa'i// mthar son pha rol phyin ma'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i
408b2(ya): 'byung ba'i tshogs// rang bzhin sku las byung bas na// rang byung rgyal mo'ang khyod yin no// dus bzhi dbyings wa sa shar bas na// 'byung ba dus bzhi cha snyoms ma'o// phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs
408b3(ya): ba yis// srid pa'i rgyal mo'ang khyod nyid do// rigs kyi gtso bo mkhar nub pas// rigs kyi gtso bo nyid yin no// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab pa yis// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'ang khyod
408b4(ya): nyid yin// pho dang mo dang ma ning dang // rgyal po rje dang bran dang dmangs// rang gi ngang gi skye 'gro'i bdag/ ma yi tshul gyis thams cad skyed// mo yi tshul gyis thams cad sdud// ma skyes
408b5(ya): skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mi 'gag 'gag pa med pa'i glong // ma ni thebs mchog 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med glong // de bas khyod ni mu kha le// skyed po'i ma mo chen
408b6(ya): mo ste// rtag par gnas pa'i bu mo lnga// sems drod chu rlung bkrag las skyes// mkha' dang dbyings kyi dngas ma'o// kun gzhi yid kyi rnam par shes// nyon mongs yid dang sgo lnga yi//
408b7(ya): rnam par shes pa bsam pa yin// chags sdang rmongs dang sreg pa dang // snyems pa las ni rtsa bar 'gyur// rgyu lnga'i 'gro ba gnas skabs dang // dag pa'i sku lnga mthar thug gi/ 'bras
409a1(ya): khu'i tshul du snang ba yin// de yi don gnyis nus par 'gyur// dngos po brtan dang g.yo ba dang // 'phel 'grib rang gi khams yin no// gzugs rtog 'gyur ba
409a2(ya): skye ba dang // 'gag pa dang ni byed pa yin// tshim zhing ldang dang 'gro ba dang // 'byung dang 'jig par byed pa'i las// las dang skye ba sems dang chos// dngos dang bsam pas rab tu khyab// ma yengs
409a3(ya): spro ba shes pa dang // myur dang rig pa dbang po mchog/ bskyod cing byed pa lhan cig skyes// skal ba mnyam dang kun 'gro bas// ma lus rgyu zhes bya ba yin// bdag dang dmigs pa de ma thag/ yul
409a4(ya): dang bsam pa rkyen du 'gyur// khams dang shes rig las nyon mongs// rang bzhin gyis ni bag la nya la// 'du byed dmigs yus rnam par spros// bde sdug rtog pa kun nas ldang // sems las
409a5(ya): snang ba yon tan dang // gzhi shes de yi rang bzhin ni// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam shes ma dag phung po ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang // rnam par grol dang
409a6(ya): ye shes kyi// rang bzhin shes pa dag pa'i tshogs// dad pa'i mchog dang 'dzin pa dang // dran pa bzang dang shes rab dang // stobs snga dag kyang de yi dngos// phung po lnga dang rigs dang las//
409a7(ya): 'dzin pa las grol yon tan tshogs// gzugs sgra dri ro rog pa dag/ yul lngar snang ba 'dod cing spyod// dbang po'i bye brag tha dad do// sgrol sbyor ma byin len pa dang // brdzun dang ngag brlang spyad pa
409b1(ya): lnga// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba las// sdom dang slob dang spong ba las// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa bsrung ba ste// dman pa'i yul dang rten pa'i rdzas// gsang ba'i spyod pa grogs dang bcas// dge
409b2(ya): bcu yan lag phra dang bcas// don chen mthar thug bslang bar bya// 'jig rten chos dang de bzlog pa// dor bar bya ba nyid yin no// thun mong ba dang mchog gyur dang // rang bzhin don dang spyir
409b3(ya): 'gro dag/ sgrub par gsung ba nga nyid yin// gnas skabs gsum dang mthar thug gnyis/ bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu lnga// yon tan tshogs su gyur pa'o// de dag gis ni phan par bsgrub//
409b4(ya): yan lag dag tu snang ba yin// bdag dang gzhan dang bar ma dang // dman pa mchog gi spyod pa ste// rigs dang las dang rtog pa dang // ga na sa dang rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams// ma 'dres pa yi
409b5(ya): mchog yin no// gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba dang // 'khor ba ba dang mya ngan 'das// phyi dang nang du brtags pa dang // sems dang sems las byung ba dang // rig dang ma rig yod med mtha'//
409b6(ya): rtag dang chad dang 'gro dang 'ong // skye 'gag gnas dang stong pa dang // rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yi// nus pa dang ni yon tan tshogs// 'phrin las ma lus spyod pa rnams// thams cad
409b7(ya): khyod kyi rang bzhin te// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// khyod kyi 'byung ba spros pa'i dngos// 'jig rten srid pa snang ba'i gzugs// 'pho 'jug bsdus pa'i mtshon nyid la// sa bon tshul
410a1(ya): du gnas pa las// rang gi thig le mnyam sbyar nas// dmigs med rnam dag ting nge 'dzin// skye med chos kyi dbyings su thom// dngos med pag chags rnam pa
410a2(ya): las// de bzhin nyid kyi bsgom pa'o// de nying mtshams su sbyar ba las// snying rje nam mkha' lta bur khyab// ma lus kun la khyab cing snang // khyod kyi sems kyi rnam pa las//
410a3(ya): rgyu yi mchog gyur hUM gi dngos// mi 'gyur rtsa ba 'od kyi gzho// khyod kyi nam mkha'i ngo bo las// e zhes snang ba stong pa'i bdag/ khyod kyi drod kyi ngo bo las// ra zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i
410a4(ya): 'od// khyod kyi dbugs kyi ngo bo las// ya zhes bya ba bskyod cing 'degs// khyod kyi chu yi ngo bo las// kha zhes bya bas dag cing tshim// khyod kyi sha yi ngo bo las// su zhes bya ba brten
410a5(ya): pa'i gzhi// khyod kyi rus pa'i ngo bo las// ke zhes bya ba gnas pa'i sa// khyod kyi b+ha ga'i dbyings phyug las// b+ha ga bcom ldan bde chen po// pad+ma 'khor lo gsang ba'i dbyings// sa bon
410a6(ya): lnga dang bcu bzhi las// gtso chen sprul pa lnga bcu brgyad// ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi yab// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' 'gro kun gyi gter
410a7(ya): zhes bya// mkha' glong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// skye 'gro srid pa thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i phyir// mnyam bzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// mi dmigs pa las
410b1(ya): dmigs pa che// bcom ldan chu skyes dkyil 'khor ni// thabs las dbyings phyung bla na med// bdud rtsi chen po char du 'phro// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// sbyor mdzad gnyis med
410b2(ya): bde ba che// mkha' 'gro brtan pa'i sems mchog ma// mi 'jigs pa yi dbu gsum gyis// dus gsum dbyings su stong byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya los// mchod sbyin rtag
410b3(ya): tu rgyas mdzad ma// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bzhugs// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems mi'i mchog
410b4(ya): thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum thig le'i sgo 'byed cing // sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang khu bai DUR+Ya// rdzu 'phral zhabs dang mthar son
410b5(ya): phyag/ mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ rol pa chen po'i dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thor pa'i sgo 'byed cing // dmigs pa med pa'i sku mdog la// dmar po dbang gi
410b6(ya): na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang mthur son phyag/ 'od gsal 'bar ma sems ma'i mchog/ stobs dang ldan pa'i dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thar pa'i sgo 'byed cing //
410b7(ya): snang du med pa'i sku mchog la// rin chen nI la'i na bzas brgyan// phyag drug gdengs shing zhabs bzhi bgrang // mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal mnyam nyid ma// 'gyur ba med pa'i dbu
411a1(ya): gsum gyis// sku gsum 'bras bu'i sgo 'byed cing // cir yang gsal ba'i sku mdog la// gtso ma bser mdog na bza' gsol// pha rol phyin pa'i phyag
411a2(ya): drug dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs dang ldan// sa yi bdag dang gnod pa sbyin// chu bdag gshin rje brgya byin dag/ rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyis brdzis par snang // kun kyang bla med gdan
411a3(ya): yin no// rdo rje ba na d+ha dkrug mdzad cing // de gra sta gtun shing brdeg pa dang // seng ge mchog chen 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma ba na d+ha dkrug pa dang // zhags pas 'ching dang tri shul 'phen//
411a4(ya): lce spyang dang ni zhing chung stob// rgya gram ba na d+ha 'bar ba dang // dbyug pa dang ni rgyu 'phreng 'dzin// sbyang ki dang ni zhing chung snyod// rin chen ban d+ha 'bar ba dang // me dpal dang ni dbyug
411a5(ya): tho 'phyar// stag mo dang ni zhing chung stod// 'khor lo ban d+ha 'bar ba dang // rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin pa yis// kha ga dang ni zhing chung stob// mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che//
411a6(ya): bzhad pa'i tshul gyis snying rjer ldan// khyod kyi lus las bskyed pa yi// srid pa gsum du bde 'gro zhing // khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku mdog la//
411a7(ya): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir brga da// dang po 'khor lo rin po che// bar pa ga yang gzhi lan dmar stob// tha ma ga'u lcags kyu 'dzin// nyi zla stong gi thod 'phreng can// mdog dkar
411b1(ya): sprin gyi na bza' can// 'ja' tshon spel ma'i cha ga can// lcags bzangs 'phar ba'i snying zhags 'phen// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// dkar mo shel gyi go zu can// lag
411b2(ya): na shel gyi spu gri 'dzin// khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog nag mo thod khrag 'dzin// bdud rtsi sdeb sbyor khros ma ni// dmar nag bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin// srid gsum
411b3(ya): 'tsho byed khros ma ni// ljang nag zhing lpags rgyal mtshan thogs// srid pa kun gyi rgyan byed ma// dkar mo skra yi zhags pa thogs// dbyings phyug rgyal mo zhes bya ba// sngon mo zhing
411b4(ya): gi dbyug pa thogs// srid pa'i bdag nyid chen mo ni// dmar mo rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'dzin// nam mkhar gcig pur spyod ma ni// ser mo g.yang gozhi chen po sdebs// dkar mo mig
411b5(ya): gcig ces bya dang // mthing nag mche ba can gyi bdag/ dmar mo chen mo dbang gi rgyal// ser mo las kyi bdag mo che// ban d+ha zlum po sul mangs dang // lcang lo can dang rgya gram
411b6(ya): thogs// sring ba thams cad chags byed ma// mthing nag g.yang gzhi rlon pa gyon// mchog chen snying rlon 'dzin cing za// srid pa kun gyi cha snyoms ma// dmar mo stag lpags rlon pa
411b7(ya): bgos// thod pa khrag bkang 'dzin par byed// 'dod khams gtso mo chen mo ni// sngon mo stag gi g.yang gzhi gsol// lag na khram shing nag po 'dzin// ma mo e ka dza ti ma// dkar
412a1(ya): sprin dkar 'ja' tshen bgos// kha T+wAM kha dang stir 'dzin// gling bzhi stong gi spyi phud ma// dkar mo shel gyi na bza' can// lcags kyu 'od 'phro 'dzin cing 'gugs//
412a2(ya): rin chen ri rab srid 'degs ma// sngon mo mu ti ge gu zu can// ri ni chen g.yu yi ge'u 'dzin// rdo rje pad+ma ka ra dbang ma// da mar ser mgo la gu zu can// thod pa khrag bkang lcang lo
412a3(ya): 'dzin// ha ting dkar mo dun ting nag/ sha na ting dmar mo gru ba ting 'dzin// dkar na ga dmar ser gu zu ru na// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil 'khor 'dzin// skam pa mo dang phor thog sa ma// g.yang
412a4(ya): gzhi ma dang za ba mo// gsod byed ma dang za byed ma// snom byed ma zhes bya ba rnams// da kar dang sngo dang dmar dang ser// rang gi mdog ldan gu zu go na// thod khrag dang ni mtshon cha thogs//
412a5(ya): mche gtsigs ma dang kha' byam ma// mchu 'jib ma dang rkang ba ldag ma// dkar nag dmar ser thod khrag 'dzin// lha dang gshin rje klu gnod sbyin// dkar mo dmar ser sring mo bzhi// rdo rje
412a6(ya): thod dbyug sbrul zhags dang // ne le'i rgyal pa rin chen 'dzin// 'di dag kyang ni ma lus kun// nga las byung zhing khyod las snang // de lus rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te// rab tu grub par bya ba yang //
412a7(ya): phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ ma lus 'dir ni shes pa dang // rang bzhin srid pa'i dkyil 'khor de// gnyis med ye shes dbab par bya// gsang chen sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni// rtsa
412b1(ya): bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs drug/ dbyings chen drug tu dbab par bya// rten cing 'brel 'byung chos bcu gnyis// bya byed yid chos rtog par bcas// rje dpon mo ni bcu bzhi dbab//
412b2(ya): sems las byung ba'i rtog pa dag/ de dag ma lus 'khor ba dag/ de dag ma lus 'khor du skyo// de nyid der shes dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid kyang ni yang dag pa'i// dngos po'i mtshan
412b3(ya): ma ngang gi sa stong // dbyings las 'char zhing dbyings las thim// gnyis su med cing gnyis su snang // du ma las ni gcig dang bral// zhi ba dben pa rtag cing bde// bdag med
412b4(ya): stong nyid mtshan ma med// smon med mngon par 'dus ma byas// thams cad shes shing thams cad snang // ma bcos snying po bsam mi khyab// re gas kyi rgyal po rtag pa'i gzhi//
412b5(ya): tshogs kyi gtso mo srid pa'i bdag/ de las dman pa'i rigs can dag/ rang gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug/ gnyis med brtan pa'i sbyor ba'i chos// cho ga mnyam pa nyid du bya//
412b6(ya): gnyis su snang ba tsam gyi phyir// sgo lnga'i ngo bo gsum dag gis// mnyes pa chen po ma lus byas// ji ltar rigs pa de nyid kyis// sku gsung thugs mnyes gyur pa yini// byang
412b7(ya): chub sems kyi cher chen dbab// gang la gang gis rtog pa yi// ngo bo de nyid brtag par bya// brjod pa ma lus de bzhin te// snying po sngags su shes pa yin// de ltar khyod kyi he ru
413a1(ya): ka/ srid pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs shes na// mngon rdzogs bla med go 'phang thob// ces bka' stsal to// mu kha le ma'i rang bzhin srid pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan
413a2(ya): pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// nang gi lus la gnas pa ni// rtsa phran bye ba phrag brgya las// gnas pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis//
413a3(ya): bsdus pas brgya dang nyi shu ste// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba bzhi la gnas// de nyid rnam pa gsum du gnas// g.yas g.yon dbus kyi dbu ma'o// mi bskyod snang ba mtha' yas dang // sems
413a4(ya): dpa' chen po kun sbyor te// dang sa ma gsum gyi rang bzhin rgyu// yan lag dag tu grags pa yang // steng gi tshangs pa'i gnas dag tu// sum cu rtsa gnyis rab tu gnas// 'og ma 'dod pa
413a5(ya): spyod pa'i gnas// grong khyer bcu drug dag tu grags// mi yi srid pa brgyad nyid ni// rnam par shes pa'i rten chen no// ngan 'gro srid pa dgu pa ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam grangs te//
413a6(ya): rtsi ba ma dang ni dra ba dang // pad+ma'i khri'u lta bu s+ye// rang bzhin gcig cing tha dad do// ma hA a ha ngo bo dag/ rang gi rigs kyi kha dog ldan// g.yas dang g.yon dang zung 'jug dang // thabs
413a7(ya): dang shes rab dbu ma dang // dkar dang ser dang mtshon du med// nyi ma zla ba 'dres dang bskyod// bde ba che dang longs spyod rdzogs// chos dang sprul pa zhes bya ba// ri rab dang ni dpag bsam
413b1(ya): shing // nyi ma zla ba'i mtshams na gnas// rgya mtsho'i gting du gnas pa ni// rgod ma kha yi me 'byung ba'i// ri rab nub tu bzhugs nas ni// gnas skabs bzhi dang brgyad kyis so//

413b6(ya): gcig tu gnas dang spro ba dang // nam mkha'i khams kyi rgyal mo dang // 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo dang // gling bzhi stong gi spyi phud dang // srid pa 'degs byed rin chen ma// gar gyi
413b7(ya): dbang mo gnyis las ni// srid pa'i gzhi 'dzin brgyad yin no// phyogs bzhir gru 'degs byed ma dang // las kyi dmag dpon chen mo bzhi// bcu drug gi ni sum cu bzhi// gzugs
414a1(ya): khams ma yi 'khor lo'o// las kyi srin mo brgyad dang bzhi// dbang chen bzhi dang gdong mo bzhi// sa bdag mo dang ma mo brgyad// gsang ba gsum dang ponya
414a2(ya): gsum// nag mo'i chung mar grags pa gsum// 'jigs byed ma mo chen mo gsum// sum cu gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis// ngan 'gro'i srid pa dgag pa'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi 'khor
414a3(ya): lo rdzogs// bya dang byed pa bdag po gsum// kun gyi gzhon par bcas pa ni// ri rab dang ni yongs 'du'i shing // srog shing tshul du gnas pa yin// 'di dag ma lus khyod kyi lus// dkyil
414a4(ya): 'khor bzhi yi bdag nyid kyis// phyi yi don du snang ba ni// longs spyod 'dod spyod dkyil 'khor la// dbyings drug lha drug rtsa ba ste// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// de yi 'khor
414a5(ya): du rtogs pa ste// ri rab steng gi 'khor lo yi// gnas chen bsam gtan bzhi la ni// bcu drug rang gi bdag po ste// bya dang byed pa'i tshul gnyis kyis// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dod pa
414a6(ya): bsdus// drug cu bzhi la zug rngu med// bde chen 'bras bu'i 'khor lo rdzogs// gling bzhi dang ni gling phran brgyad// lam rten chen po 'dzin pas ni// 'dzam bu gling du grags pa la// chos
414a7(ya): kyi 'khor lo zhes bya rdzogs// dmyal ba'i srid pa nyi shu dang // de yi nyon mongs nyi shur bcas// byings gnas pa dang 'thor ba dang // sgrib pa gnyis bcas drug cu bzhi// nyon mongs las ni
414b1(ya): sprul pa yi// rab tu 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs// phyi li rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyis// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// gnas dang yul du snang ba ste// nyi shu rtsa bzhi kun la khyab// lus
414b2(ya): la rdzogs pa phyi dang nang // tshul de ma rtogs gzhan ma yin// rnal 'byor chen po grol ba'i tshul// 'khor lo bzhi la gang gnas pa// sang ldog 'bar 'dra 'du zhing 'char// zag med skyed
414b3(ya): pas bde bar 'gyur// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// pha rol skye ba par mdo// drug gam bdun gyis bslebs par brjod// de nyid g.yo dang rang gi khams// gzugs brnyan dag dang gsum yin te//
414b4(ya): 'phar dang 'phro dang brten pa dang / khrod rgal rab tu 'bar ba'o// rtsa ba lnga dang ya na lag lnga// ngo bo ming gi bye brag go/ bsam gtan srog rtsol dbyung rngub dang // ba dud dang 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin// ldang
414b5(ya): 'jug gnas pa gcig dang gsum// lus dang shes pa g.yo ba dang // rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyis 'gyur// srog 'dzin me mnyam thur sel dang // gyen du rgyu dang khyab par byed// chos dang
414b6(ya): sprul pa gsang ba dang // longs spyod bde chen rang gi gnas// 'brel 'byung 'dzin 'phro sgyur ba'i las// zug rngu sgra 'byin 'gro 'ong gcod// smra zhing 'khor ba 'dzin par byed// stong dang gsal
414b7(ya): dang ring ba dang // thung dang bde bas lus khyab dang // gnas skabs rang gis byed par 'gyur// rgyu dang rab rgyu shin tu rgyu// mngon par rgyu dang yang dag rgyu// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// ba spu'i gnas/
415a1(ya): kun khyab pa ste// mthong dang thos tshor myong rig ste// bsam pa de nyid rtogs par byed// dor zhing bsla ba dang bsgom pa yis// rtsa ba yan lag kun la khyab// snang
415a2(ya): dang dran rtog byung rgyal dag/ mos pa lhag bsam mnyes pa dang // yang dag thun mong lta ba dang // rten cing 'brel pa'i byin rlabs kyis// longs spyod snyoms 'jug bde ba bsgom// rgyas
415a3(ya): ba'i rten gyi sa nyi zla gnyis// g.yas g.yon mdun du ring dang thung // gsum gsum dgu dang bud dang rngub// khor yug gsum gyis sbubs su sba// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab bsdams nas//
415a4(ya): dpag bsam shing gi yal ga bcing // nyi zla steng gi phyogs su 'phang // gleng bzhi gling phran tshags su gzhug/ glog dbyung 'brug sgra bsgrags par bya// glang chen stag dang sbyang ki wa//
415a5(ya): 'og ma'i gnas nas rim bzhin 'phang // rnam par gol bas lus la dgram// dbab dang dkyil dang zlog pa dang // bgos pa ska rags zhags pa dang // 'khor lo nus pa'i 'dug stangs
415a6(ya): kyis// bdud rtsi'i don du 'gyur ba'o// yul ga nad dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'dra// dgu dang drug dang gcig tu bsdu// me dang thog dang shing dang srub// de'i yi 'khor lo thig le ste// rang gi
415a7(ya): lam bzhin skyong ba'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gnas su byung // gtso bo brgyad kyi oM dang bcas// rab tu 'bar ba de nyid bsam// phyi nang gsang ba'i gzhon pa las// 'degs byed 'byung dang
415b1(ya): snyoms pa dang // 'jigs dang gcod dang bying ba dang // las byed 'bigs dang kun tu khyab// dang po rgyu yi bye brag go/ gye na thur 'gro dang dngas snyig sa 'byed// snying rje med dang snying rje
415b2(ya): dang // snyoms dang 'byed dang snyoms pa dag/ rten 'gyur byang chub sems yin no// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya dag/ 'byung dang 'jug dang gnas dang gsum// bcu drug re re skad cig ma//
415b3(ya): 'byung zhing 'gro ba'u khral dang grol// ma lus de yi byed pa'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dra bas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor las byed pa// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad de// shar lho nub
415b4(ya): byang mtshams bzhir bcas// lha klu phyogs dang zhing skyong dang // me chu shing dang sprin dang ri// skra dang ba slu so sen mo'i// zil dang rlangs dang 'phro ba yi// rang gi 'phrin las nges sgrub pa//
415b5(ya): rtags dang yon tan skyed pa'i tshul// sdig dang 'bral dang spong ba dang // tho ba dang rdzogs dang snang dang 'grub// bcom ldan b+ha ga las skyed cig/ spang bya ba grod bya gnas bya dag/ lnga dang
415b6(ya): bcu gsum gsum dang lnga// bdag nyid rdzogs pa der gnas so// de bas nga ni mngon rdzogs pa'i// rgyal po bla na med pa'o// mu khaM le zhes bya ba yang // mthar thug don gyi gzhi yin
415b7(ya): te// de nyid kho na'i bdag nyid do// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le phung po lus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang
416a1(ya): khyod nyid kyi// byang chub sems la gnas pa ni// thun mong dang ni khyad par te// don dam kun rdzob rang bzhin gyis// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud//
416a2(ya): sdom dang bsdam par bya ba dang // bslab dang shes par bya ba dag/ snang dang rtog pa rig pa'i tshogs// sgyu ma rmi lam smig rgyu dang // mig yor sprul pa dri za'i grong // gzugs brnyan brag
416a3(ya): cha sgra brnyan tshogs// ji srid tsam du mtshon pa la// skye mtha'i srid pa man chad du// smon lam tsam du dam 'cha' zhing // lus ngag yid kyi sa rab 'jug pa'i// rtsol dang bsgrub pa
416a4(ya): gang yin pa// phung pos bsdus pa'i shes pa lnga// kun gzhi khyod kyi bdag nyid la// mkha' bzhi dbyings lnga nyid dang bcas// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang yid rnams de yi
416a5(ya): yul// bskyed cing mched pa bcu gnyis kyi// rang bzhin bya ba yid kyi dngos// bcu bzhi 'khor gyi rtsa ba ste// gzhan yang khams dang nyon mongs pa'i// nye ba las ni mngon gyur dang //
416a6(ya): kun 'gro lnga dang 'gyur ba bzhi// khyab pa gcig gis lnga bcu brgyad// gtso dang 'khor gyis rab bsdus pa// gzhan yang khams dang nyon mongs pa'i// thun mong sems kyi dkyil 'khor
416a7(ya): bstan// de las khyad par gyur pa ni/ don dam shes rab zla ba'i gnas// byang chub sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'dod chags gtso mo yu ma dang bcas// mkha' bzhi las ni dga' ba dang // skad cig gnas pa dbyings
416b1(ya): ma lnga// gnas skabs dang ni nus pa drug/ tshul gnyis kyis ni bcu bzhi ste// de dag 'khor du skye ba'o// de dang de las srid pa yi// brda dang gnas dang shes pa dang // 'phrin las byed
416b2(ya): ba la sogs kyis// rang gi chos dang longs spyod dang // bde chen sprul pa'i gnas dag tu// sgro dang bsdu dang bstan pa las// bya ba sna tshogs spyod pa dag/ chos kyi bdag tu 'dzin
416b3(ya): ba grol// der snang chos kyi dbyings dkyil la// rig pa'i ye shes sna tshogs pa// gtso dang 'khar du bcas pa grub// de yi 'bras bu tshul chen yang // sku drug las ni ma nor dang /
416b4(ya): ma lus mkhyen pa bcu gnyis te// don gnyis mdzad pa de dag dang // gzhan gyi rig par bya ba las// 'das byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa// gdul bar bya ba rnams la snang // dus

416b6(ya): gter du snang ba de// 'jig rten pa ru grags pa min// de bas ngos bzung rtag pa dang // bzlog cing dgrol bar bya ba ste// mnyam pa nyid du gang skyes pa// mnyam nyid skyes par
416b7(ya): de brjod do// snang ba dang ni sems nyid de// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu dang // gzhi dang lam dang rang bzhin dngos// lus dang longs spyod chud mi gson// stong dang gzhan gyi don
417a1(ya): spyod pa// so sor 'gro bas thar pa dang // ma lus mnyam par rdzogs spyod pa// rig pa'i snying po byang chub pa// bla na med pa yongs bzung zhing // rang bzhin
417a2(ya): mnyam nyid 'byung ba'i gzhi// thabs kyi gnas skabs 'bras bu gsum// stong dang mtshan ma smon pa med// rten byed lus la g.yas g.yon dbus// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis//
417a3(ya): 'byung 'jug go nas dang 'du ba bzhi// phan gnod btang snyoms sbyor la sogs// thog mar mnyam pa nyid du skyes// thabs kyis mnyam nyid skyes pa la// shes rab lhan cig skyes
417a4(ya): po yi// rang 'bring tha ma'i yul rnams la// 'du shes gsum gyis rab sbyangs te// sdug bsngal bral zhing bde ba dang // rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang // dngos kun ma lus gsal ba
417a5(ya): yis// stobs dang drod dang 'dren pa dag/ yan lag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rigs kyi don du snang ba yis// lus ngag sems kyi gzhan don spyod// ma dngas ldan zhen pa ched 'dzin bral//
417a6(ya): zug rngu 'bad pa rtsol ba med// mchog gi yum dang phrad nas kyang // rig pa 'dzin pa skems 'gyur zhing // ngan 'gro'i lus kyi rtog pa spong // skye 'chi las dang srid pa la// snga ma phyi
417a7(ya): ma rims kyis 'byung // gsang ba rig pa brtul zhugs spyod// dang po pa las spags pa yi// mngon par shes pa la sogs pa// rang bzhin yon tan rgyas pa yis// bar du gcod pa
417b1(ya): mtha' dag bzlog/ rtog pa'i spros pa nye bar zhi// 'dus ma byas shi lhun gyis grub// mtshan rdzogs dpe byad 'bar ba dang // mnyam sbyor yan lag yul dang bcas// zag med
417b2(ya): bde ba rgyuni mi 'chad// snying rje srid dang mkhyen par ldan// yul snang dag pa rgyun mi 'chad// mnyam nyid lhan cig skyes pa'o// rang bzhin rgyu 'bras tshogs pa yi// dbyer med lhan cig/
417b3(ya): skyes po'o// nga nyid mngon du rdzogs pa ste// chos dbyings rig pa'i ye shes dang // dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// dkar dmar mthing ka'i dbur bstan cing // dbyings las
417b4(ya): 'gyur med mthing kha'i mdog/ bag chags 'jogs byed g.yas rdo rje// chos kyi sgra sgrogs g.yon dril bu// gdug pa 'dul mdzad sbrul zhags g.yas// 'khor ba dbang sdad g.yon

417b6(ya): medang stag dang dom// tha ba rak+Sha thod 'phreng dang // me ri'i bar bas brgyan pa'o// mu kha le ni dbyings kyi yum// mi 'gyur mthing nag chos kyi sku// ye shes lnga yis zhal 'byung zhing // 'byung ba lnga li
417b7(ya): mkha' gsang can// rdo rje dril zhags bdud rtsi g.yas// dril bu ban d+hag yang gzhi g.yon// nyon mongs 'joms shing snying rjes 'dzin// 'chi med dngos grub gsol bar mdzad// bcud bsgyur bde
418a1(ya): bston pa dang // chos nyid mnyam par longs spyod pa'o// zhabs brgyad rnam thar brgyad kyi ngang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// don dam kun rdzob bden pa'i dngos// dbyer
418a2(ya): med 'du 'bral med pa dang // rgyun mi 'chad par spyod pa ste// don chen gab cing sbas pa'i gter// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs// dgongs pa'i khyad par gang yin pa'o// snang

418a7(ya): ma/ len tshor tshim pas byed pa dag/ bsnom byed ma dang ma mo bdun// yab kyi rnam shes tshogs dag las// ma mo brgyad kyi phyag g.yas la// yul brgyad 'phra men phyag g.yon la'o// phra thabs/
418b1(ya): bum bcas bsnams pa ni// phyag mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de yis 'jig rten dregs pa gzir// brgya byin gyi ni gdan dag la// sha las rnam snang gsal du bskyed// gshin
418b2(ya): rje drod la sa 'od gsal 'bar// khrag las gnyen gsal chu bdag ste// dbugs las yang gsal gnod sbyin gnon// mdun du bdud la tra ka las ni// de nyid gsal ma bskyed pa yin//

418b4(ya): las yum chen mo// bde ba za byed rgyas 'de bsam// tshe 'phel ma dang rmongs byed ma// khros ma bzhi dang dges sde bzhi// gdan dang dbang po sgo bzhi dang // rnam shes rig par bcas
418b5(ya): pa las/ khams gsum gdar sha gcod ma bskyed// chags byed cha snyoms bsgyel ba la// gsang ba'i rtsa las dug gsum dag/ dbang sdud ma mo bskyed par bya// e ka dza ti spun drug
418b6(ya): la// gzhung chen rtsa las skye shing dag/ rtsad gcod byed ma bskyed par bya// 'dod khams gtso mo spyan gnyis la// srog gnas pa yi rtsa la ni// pad+ma kro d+hI shA ri ra bskyed// nam mkha'i rgyal
418b7(ya): mo bsgyel ba la// lte bar gnas pa'i rtsa chen las// yak+Sha kro d+hi shwa ri bskyed// ma bdun gdan la snying rtsa las// rak+kha kro d+hi shwa ri ma// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi nyid dang // srid bzhi'i gdan la
419a1(ya): rkang lag bzhi// sa ma kro d+hi shA ri'o// dbang phyug ma mo nyi shu brgyad// nyon mobs yod kyi rnam shes las// gu ya kro d+hi shwa ri ma'o// bsgom bya ma mo bcu gsum

419b5(ya): shrI he ru ka hU a a/ oM gu ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu ya dz+nyA na kro d+hi shwa ri stAM/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo hUM/ oM nyid gzhi mu kha le kro d+hi shwa ri b+ha ga pad+ma rgyas bde glong 'dus 'dus na snying
419b6(ya): na sha snying dza sha yu ti ni hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM gr-i sa mu hU~M ha/ oM dz+wA la raM pa ha/ oM b+hi sha sa na ti ha/ oM b+hi yang yong ta ha/ oM ma hA la te ha/ oM kr-i d+hi shA ri b+ha ga pad+ma r+ya hUM hU/ oM badz+ra shan+ting pad+ma
419b7(ya): ka ru ting b+ho/ oM mu tri ni b+h+yo/ o a shan tr-i ni b+ho/ oM b+ha ga dun tri ni b+h+yo/ oM kha mun da na tri ni b+ho/ oM badz+ra sur+ya b+hi ta ma to ye/ oM badz+ra pad+ma b+hi ta ma to ye/ oM badz+ra kha ra ka b+hi ta ma to ye/
420a1(ya): a badz+ra srid 'argam dam N+Dam/ a ba dz+ra gamasaH/ oM badz+ra ta ka ta ke b+h+ya/ oM badz+ra nA~M pa aH/ oM badz+rA lan d+ha lan d+hA b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra ma gra mU ra sha badz+ra pa tha mu
420a2(ya): nab+h+yo/ oM badz+ra kha rag snying kha ra ga ma b+h+yo/ trag rak+Sha tra ga rak+Sha b+h+yo/ trag rak+Sha mu tra baM kha mu tra ba ra ka sha b+h+yo/ za ka ra ka ti b+hi tab+h+yo/ pra g+h+ri wa g+hi sha b+h+yo/ oM t+yu ka ri ka/ ba rod/ da ro

420b1(ya): dbus mthing gnyis med 'gyur pa med// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje ni// bag chags rtog pa ma lus 'joms// bar ma dril bu chos sgra sgrogs// tha ma sbrul zhags gdug pa 'dul//

421b1(ya): bar ma dbyug tho rgyu 'phreng 'dzin// tha ma spyang mo zhing chung stod// zhabs bzhi gnod sbyin steng du bgrad// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje mchu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam//
421b2(ya): sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ser mo btsom gser// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po 'khor lo ban d+ha 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha
421b3(ya): ma 'ug pa'i zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi bdud kyi steng na bgrad// yum chen rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga// dbyings kyi yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma chen srid pa bde 'gro ma// khams

421b5(ya): 'khor lo bskor// bar pagasang sazhi bsnams shing sdeb// tha ma tshe yi ge'u sbed// g.yon gyi dang po rin po che// bar ba ban d+ha dmar gyis bkang // tha ma lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams//
421b6(ya): zhabs kun brjed pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// ma cig nyi zla thod 'phreng can// sku mdog dkar mo 'od dang bcas// sprin dkar brtsegs pa'i na bza' la// 'ja' tshon 'od kyi chag
421b7(ya): can// nyi zla stong gi dbu thod can// phyag g.yas zangs lcags dkar nag la// snying gis brgyus pa'i zhags pa 'phen// g.yon pa nyi zla'i zhags pa bsnams// zhabs gnyis brjid
422a1(ya): pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' shel gyi go zu gsol// phyag na shel gyi spu gri bsnams
422a2(ya): khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' g.yu yi go zu gsol// phyag na thong khrag 'dzin cing gsol// bdud rtsi khros pa'i dbang mo che//

422a4(ya): bza' ser mo bai DUR+Ya// phyag na zhing lpags rgyal mtshan bsnams// dkar mo srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags pa thogs// sngon mo dbyings phyug rgyal mo ni// zhing gi dbyug
422a5(ya): bapa phyag na bsnam so// dmar mo bdag nyid chen mo ni// phyag na rgyu ma'i zhags pa bsnams// ser mo chen mo gcig spyod ma// phyag na zhing gi g.yang gzhi rdib// dkar mo chen ma
422a6(ya): mig gcig ma// phyag na ban d+ha zlum po bsnams// nag mo chen mo mche ba can// phyag na ban d+ha sul mangs thogs// dmar mo chen mo dbang sdud ma// phyag nuban d+ha ljang lo
422a7(ya): thogs// ser mo chen mo tshe 'phel ma// phyag na thod pa rgya gram bsnams// las kyi srid pa chags byed ma// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bzo' g.yang gzhi rlon pa gsol//
422b1(ya): phyag na tsit+ta 'bar ba bsnams// rnal 'byor srid pa cha snyoms ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// stag lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// lag na thod pa khrag bkang thogs//
422b2(ya): ma mo aM ka dza Ti ma// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' spri no gyi go zu gsol// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// kha TA dang ni zhing chen bsnams// 'dod khams
422b3(ya): gtso mo chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// sku stod stag gi g.yang gzhi la// sku smad zangs kyi sleb mas g.yogs// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing thogs// gling bzhi spyi phung
422b4(ya): bdag mo ni// dkar mo sgeg ma'i cha byad can// na bza' shol gyi go zu gsol// phyag na lcags kyu 'od 'phro thogs// rin chen srin 'degs chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo chen mo
422b5(ya): la// mu ti ga khu 'phang go zu gsol// phyag na g.yu yi ge'u thogs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku li cha byad dmar mo la// le brgan dmar mo'i go zu gsol// phyag na thong khrag
422b6(ya): bsnams shing gsol// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' gser gyi go zu gsol// phyag na thod khrag lcang lo thogs// ma mo ha ra ting dkar mo ni/
422b7(ya): sku la shel gyi go zu gsol// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo chen mo ni// sku la gser gyi go zu gsol// la ga na sa yi dkyil 'khor thogs// shan ti dmar mo
423a1(ya): chen mo ni// sku la byu ru'i go zu gsol// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nAg mo chen mo ni// sku la g.yu yi go zu gsol// lag na rlung gi
423a2(ya): 'khor lo thogs// srin mo chen mo skam pa mo// sku mdog dkar mo gu zu can// phyag na shel phur ba na d+ha thogs// srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// sku mdog sngon mo gu zu can// phyag
423a3(ya): na thod khrag bsnams shing gsol// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma// sku mdog dmar mo gu zu can// phyag na ba na d+ha thod khrag thogs// srin mo chen mo za ba mo// dmar mo phyag na pagra/
423a4(ya): rlon thogs// srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma// ser mo ban d+ha ral gri thogs// srin mo chen mo za byed ma// ser nag ban d+ha lcags kyu thogs// srin mo chen mo sgom byed ma// dkar
423a5(ya): mo ban d+harlon pa thogs// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// phyag na thod pa dkar po thogs// lho yi nag mo kha 'byam ma// phyag na ban d+ha sngon po thogs// nub kyi dmar mo mchu
423a6(ya): 'ji ba ma// phyag na ban d+ha dmar po thogs// byang gi ser mo rkang pa ldag ma// phyag na ban d+ha ser po thogs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring // dkar mo rdo rje rtse gsum thogs//
423a7(ya): mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring // sngon mo phyag ma thod dbyug thogs// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring // dmar mo sbrul na gzhags pa thogs// nag mo sngar chen gnod sbyin sring //
423b1(ya): ser mo ne le'i rgyal ba thogs// ma mo chen mo 'di rnams kyang // ye shes sngon du mnyes byas nas// 'phrin las tshogs kyi gtso mo ste// thugs ni dbyings las 'gyur ba med// gsung
423b2(ya): ni grag stong chos kyi gsung // sku ni sna tshogs sprul ba'i sku// yon tan ma lus phun sum tshogs// 'phrin las drag shul gdug pa 'dul// res 'ga' 'jig rten srid pa'i tshul// res
423b3(ya): 'ga' gab sbas gsang ba'i tshul// ris 'ga' rnal 'byor grol ba'i tshul// res 'ga' drag po sngags kyi tshul// kun kyang dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal
423b4(ya): bstod// ces bka' stsal to// mu kha le lus kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dgongs
423b5(ya): pa dag/ ma lus bkang bar bya ba yang // phyi ru thams cad gzugs kyis bkang // re rab ri bdun bcas pa dang // gling bzhi gling phran bcas pa dang // rgya mtsho khor yug bcas pa dang //
423b6(ya): 'dod khams lha dang shes ldan mi// mkha' lding bya dang 'dab chags tshul// cang shes rta dang theg chen glang // shel dkar lug la tshe ma ra// gcan gzan gdug pa zhe sdang khyi// mkha' la
423b7(ya): rgyu dang sa las skyes// tshu la gnas dang sa 'og 'dzul// sgra dang dri ro reg par bcas// ji ltar 'byor pa kun gyis bskang // nang du ma hA su kas bskang // lus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa bzhi
424a1(ya): / rlu chu bsams dpan bzung dag// dung sa dang rgyas byu da// dang rdzu smras skye dru dang // 'dun pas rgo snang ba dang // das nga
424a2(ya): kyi sna dang bkrogad smras// zung dang rlung gnas dgras pa na// sa paklung ba'i mtshag na'o// gas med sa cing du bsnang // steng ba myong ste// mas
424a3(ya): nyid tsam sa/ pa'i rnam pags pa // sa nan ma rta pa // mag ni sa kyis shes na gyis kyim / ni sa @
424a4(ya): mas dang 'ang // rgyal bzlas da na / na gas stsus / ma // na ldand// d+hi rlung nus kyi sa /
424a5(ya): na na / sa kyi/ dpa /
424a6(ya): rgyu na kyis / da sa
424a7(ya): thugs bcam ma sus pan // 'tsham pas kyang ba sa kyi mchog/ ma rgya brjirgya// tshogs ma gnas 'go// dzin mes das 'ad
424b1(ya): bskang bar bya ba nyid yin no// bsgrub pa chen po rgyun du ni// bskyed dang dgug dang gzhug pa dang // bcing dang gnyis su med pa dang // spyan drang ba dang phyag btsal zhing // mchod cing bstod pa bzlas pa yis/
424b2(ya): bskang bar bya ba nyid yin no// 'di la byang chub bla med phyir// smin par bya ba 'di nyid kyi// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// zhi ba byang chub sems shes byed// bum pa dang ni shes rab dang // kun
424b3(ya): rdzob don dam byang chub sems// rim pa dag gis yongs smin bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bskang ba'o// nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yi// snod bcud 'byung ba chen po dag/ rten sa
424b4(ya): ngag gi gzhal med khang // rten byed lha yi 'khor lo shes// lus kyi bya ba sngon song nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod pa'i tshogs// smra brjod tshig gi bstod pa dang // bzlas pa sngags
424b5(ya): kyi 'khor lo ste// sgra yi rnam pa ma lus pa// he ru ka yi gsung yin te// bzlas pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor yin// yid sems rtog pa bsam pa'i tshogs// myong rig 'gyur ba dran pa dang //
424b6(ya): blo dang bya byed 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// 'dzin pa dang ni gzung ba dang // bya ba dang ni byed pa'i tshogs// nga dang mu kha le zhes pa'i// dngos por gyur pa thams cad
424b7(ya): de// nga dang khyod las ma gtogs pa'o// chos gzhan gang yang yod ma yin// nga yi rang bzhin yongs shes shing // mtshan nyid go bar byas mtshungs shing // 'du 'bral med par thag chod
425a1(ya): cing // blang dor med par la dor nas// dmigs pa med par bsgom par bya// mnyams gtsang sbras gzhi gzung zhing // rim pa'i tshul gyis smin bya ste// byang
425a2(ya): chub chen po'i lam bgrod pas// ma lus thob par bya ba yin// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rigs kyis// tshe 'di dang ni bar mdo// brgyud pa'i skye ba tshun chod kyis// dam pa de nyid thob par
425a3(ya): 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i yum chen mo mu kha le'i sku'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings kyi ngang du bsdus te// yab yum gnyis su med
425a4(ya): po'i bde ba chen po snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ mngon rdzogs rgyal po yab yum gyi bka' rjes
425a5(ya): su bsgrub par gyur to// bstan pa'o tshogs thams cad ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs la gnas par gyur to// mu kha le sku'i dkyil 'khor yongs su
425a6(ya): rdzogs pa kha bskang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // ma mo 'bum gyi ti ka bsdus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon
425a7(ya): chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba bai ron+d+ra bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o//
425b1(ya): rgya gar skad du/ bi d+yA d+ha ra bi ru ta na tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa la
425b2(ya): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
425b3(ya): gsung gi tshogs yang dag par 'du ba'i ga nas/ ri'i rgyal po dang / grong khyer chen po dang / dur khrod kyi gnas ma rungs pa dang / mchod rten gyi gtsug la khang dag na/ rigs 'dzin
425b4(ya): gyi tshogs chen po rab tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gsung gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / thugs
425b5(ya): kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / yon tan gyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'phrin las kyi rig po 'dzin pa dang / sbod gtong gi r-ig pa'i dzin pa dang / sgrub pa'i rig pa'i 'dzin pa dang / drag shul
425b6(ya): gyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / phyag rgya'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / sa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / rab tu smin pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi rig pa
425b7(ya): 'dzin pa dang / dam tshig gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / sngags kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / slar gso ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs nye ba'i sras
426a1(ya): su gyur pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa du ma rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje 'dzin// chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi
426a2(ya): rgyal// thos dang gzung ba rnams kyi don// rang gi rigs kyi 'khor la bstan// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dgongs pa rab tu bsdus pa'i don// rtsa ba'i tshul du bshad pa
426a3(ya): ni// mchog dang bar ma dman la sogs// gdul bya'i khyad par gang snang yang // thog ma nyid du rten pa'i yul// sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi sras// gang gis 'dul ba de nyid la//
426a4(ya): de dang 'thun pa'i gzugs ston te// 'bad pas rab tu btsal bar bya// dper na nad kyis gdungs pa zhig/ gso byed sman pa tshol ba'i phyir// rab tu 'bad pa skyed pa ltar// 'dir ni nyon
426a5(ya): mongs rtsa ba dang // yan lag rnams kyi nad kyis gzir// gnyen po'i spyan ldan rdo rje 'dzin// thabs mkhas chen po ma gtogs pa// dman pa'i nad bcas de nyid kyis// 'joms shing
426a6(ya): gsal bar nus ma yin// gzhan yang bus pa btsas ma thag/ ma yis bor na skyes bu gzhan// mthu stobs long med ldan pa yis// gsos kyang 'tsho ba mi 'gyur ltar// thog mtha'
426a7(ya): med pa'i 'khor ba nas// yang dag don la shed ma bye// mi shes rmongs pa'i bus pa rnams// ma dang mtshungs pa'i rig pa'i dzin// snying rje dang ni nus par ldan// shes rab phun tshogs de
426b1(ya): yis gso// mig dang bral ba'i skyes bu ni// gsal ba can gyi sa ma khrid na// de nyid dang ni de 'dra bas// bkri zhing don byar mi nus ltar// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis// rab tu ljongs
426b2(ya): gyur rmongs pa dag/ ma lus shes bya rab gsal ba'i// mig ldan rig pa can gyis ni// thar pa'i lam la bkri dgos pas// rdo rje can dag nye bar bstan// de yi nges par bya ba dag/
426b3(ya): dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung // rig pa nyid du bya ba dang // yon tan ma lus thams cad dag/ gong nas gong du spel ba dang // nyon mongs rtog pa'i sgrib pa dag/ gnyen
426b4(ya): pos spang zhing sbyang ba dang // myur du brten pa ma mnyes kyang // 'phro mthud lam gyis bgrod pa'i phyir// bag chags bzang pos gnas par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems/
426b5(ya): dpa' dang // dgra bcom nyan thos rang rgyal dag/ so so'i skye bo dang po ba'i// yon tan phun tshogs ma lus pa// gong ma dag la brten pas 'byung // gsum dang lnga yi'i bras bu yis// drug dang/
426b6(ya): nyi shu la sogs pa'i// 'bras bu bcu dang lnga sogs bskyed// de dag 'di la rten nas sbyong // thun mong ba yi sangs rgyas dag/ grangs med gsum du thogs par snang // rnyog ma can gyi
426b7(ya): sems can dag/ tshe thung nad mang skal ba zhen// che gcig nus pa yod min pas// phyi ma rnams su 'phro mthud de// theg pa chen po dge pa'i las// stong du 'phel bas skye bo dag/ rang
427a1(ya): rgyud gnas la de mi shong // dang po sa gnas la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang phrad// de bas gnas skabs mthar thug tu// 'bras bu chen
427a2(ya): po thob 'dod pas// ngoms pa med cing sdug bsngal bsngo// skyo du ba med cing dka' ba bzod// gtong phod spong ba'i blo dang ldan// chog par mi 'dzin rtsol ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa rab tu brten//
427a3(ya): dper na 'jig rten skye bo gnas// las dang bzo la rtsol ba byed// 'dir ni thar pa'i pha rol tu// bgrod cing phyin par 'dod pa yis// rdo rje 'chang ba'i tshul 'dra ba// mtshan nyid ldan pacis
427a4(ya): mi rten// rigs bzang rgyud dul spyod lam zhi// thos dang yon tan brtson 'grus ldan// yang dag don rtogs ston par mkhas// bros pas mi khengs shes rab che// 'jig rten rnyed pa'i don
427a5(ya): mi sgrub// snying rje byangang chu bo sems kyis 'dzin// skye mad dka' ba ma lus bzod// gdams ngag ldan zhing lam la goms// gzhan rgyud rigs dang drod tshad mkhas// ma lus shes
427a6(ya): byi'i gnas kun rtogs// bslab pa'i gnas kun zhib par spod// tshe 'di'i yon tan don mi gnyer// de la sogs pa'i yon tan tshogs// mgus rim par ldan pa bsten// sten byed nges
427a7(ya): pa'i gang zag kyang // de nyid ldan pa'i don bsgrub po// 'jig rten gso spyad sgra dang gnas// rig pa nyid dang 'phrin las tshogs// gang bstan de nyid phyi yin no// 'tsho byed thabs sbyor
427b1(ya): lus dang sems// stobs bskyed pa dang 'jig rten pa'i// tshul 'thun ngo tsha khrel yod bcas// rten 'brel tsam gyis gnas skabs so// grogs dang phung po nad dang dgra// gnas dang 'brel
427b2(ya): ba longs spyod dang // bgegs dang sems dang brtson 'grus dang // lom gyi grogs gyur cha 'thun zhing // phyi nang gsang ba'i cho gas rten// rab tu smin par byed pa dang // thos pa'i lam dang
427b3(ya): rim pa gnyis// ldan pas grol ba'i chos mnyan zhing // mthong ba dang ni goms pa yis// gnas shing thob pa brtan byas pa// de dag de yi bye brag go/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rjes
427b4(ya): 'brang ba'i// kun nas bslang ba'i bsam pa ni// 'jig rten khengs grags rnyed pa dang // bkur sti gzhan gyi ngor spyod dang // ngo tsha khrel ta dbang med dang // chags dang dregs parang rgyud phyir// /

427b6(ya): ba'i yon tan dga' ba de dang // zhi ba phyogs gcig dmigs pa bzlog/ mthar thug rdzogs dang gzhan don spyod// nad pa sman pa sman nyid dang // nod sos pa dang de yi g.yog/ nyon mongs

428a1(ya): skyon rnams spangs te ma yengs shing // ma brjed pa dang gnyen po'i don// bsngags par ldan pa'i 'du shes so// 'di la ma 'ongs dus dag tu// lta ba'i thabs
428a2(ya): ni 'di lta ste// rdzogs byas sku yi bstan pa dag/ gnas pa'i dus su bab pa'i tshe// dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dag/ gnas dus mnyam pa'i bzhi pa yi// gsung tsam 'dzin
428a3(ya): pa'i dus su ni// rab tu lhag par blta bya ste// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// sku yi gdul bya rab zad de// ma 'ongs pa dag ma byung zhing // gsung tsam nyid la rten pas na//
