479b7(ya): mtshon ni khung zhugs dang // dug 'thungs thog babs bzhin du chag/ tha ra zhes bya ba ga dgas su med// bdud ni a btag sa srog la rgol// gshin rje 'khor ba'i
480a1(ya): 'khor los gcod// srin po ral gri'i so yis 'gems// gnod sbyin ka nam lcags thog gis 'joms// lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis gsor//
480a2(ya): ma mo dpag med mda' bsnyon 'bigs// gza' bdud stobs kyi sgyogs kyis rdeg/ klu ni sa 'og ral gri'i sos// thams cad 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags// mun
480a3(ya): pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skad// dra 'bo da lta bu gshin rje ste// ro len dur ba srin pos 'khrod// lce mdung drag po gnod sbyin no// bka' chad drag rtsa la lha yi dmod// dra
480a4(ya): 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste// 'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do// klu lis sbrul nag du ga gces so// 'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yis// phal pa rnams la dmod par byed//
480a5(ya): de ni drag sngag dmod pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags dmod pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
480a6(ya): / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// so so'i drag sngags dmod pa bstan// phung gshig bdud kyi drag sngags ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru// shel nag snying
480a7(ya): du nya'o rtsa la// dur khrod ras nag rgya yis gdab/ mtshon sna lnga 'am nag pos bcings// gri lcags spug ma srog rtsar gzhug/ yungs kar nyung nag til nag dang // skye
480b1(ya): tshe shangs tshe zir dang // zangs lcags rdo yi phye ma dang // dug khrag ngar dang bcas pa rnams// mu su ra yi thod par bsdu// bdud kyi srog tig sngags kyi sa bsngag sa//
480b2(ya): bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la tsho// ka la mu tri mA ra ya dgra bo snying la tsit+ta bu da/ ni zla khyigs/ ni zla khyigs/ br-i bra ri la 'dus/ zed smugs/
480b3(ya): dro sprugs/ bdud rjes chod/ bdud mos rol/ bdud bus gtor/ ba khyigs/ pra ma nri sha truM mA ra sarba// mun pa gling 'khrugs zhes bya ba// ma 'ongs
480b4(ya): bdud kyi rang skad do// drag tu brjod cing spug mar bral// gang la dmigs pa de myur du// snang srid bdud kyi srog nas 'dren// mi nag go mtshon bcas
480b5(ya): pa dang // sngags ba dag bu da med mon dang rdo// khyi nag rta nag bya na ga dang // rgod nog dre nag shel na ga dang // ri na ga mtsho nag shing nag tshogs// dmag
480b6(ya): dnga'akhrug pa 'thab pa dang // 'khrid dang gsod dang sha ba dag/ las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur// de nas nya'o btab cing bsgral// gri mtshon phur ba
480b7(ya): rnams kyi sa gtub// lhags ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyar// ku ku nag po'i zas su 'byon// rol par mi byed bskyar te sgrub// ru tra myos shing 'thibs nas 'chi//
481a1(ya): 'chi bdag gshin rje'i drag sngags ni// rgyud med pho mo'i ka pA la// za ma tog tu kha sbyar te// nang du de nyid tsit+ta gzhug/ pho thong steng
481a2(ya): nang spyi bo ra phu ba// kha cing dang dgab pa drang ba dag/ sngar bshang rdzas kyis brab cing brdeg/ ya ma me rta k+She/ rA dza sa ta me/ ru tsa na yo ni/ ro ma tsa naM/ sa ma rA dza kha
481a3(ya): mun snying khra ga rtsa la rba da/ ya ma sgrubs la rngu ba sa/ ro tsa ya ma rA dzA rA dzA baM ri le rbad/ ya ma rA dzA hri tri snying mgo cho da// ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag/ ya ma du baM ri la
481a4(ya): rbad gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i sngags// rab tu bsngags te tsot+ta ra brag/ sha khrag chen pos mnyes par bya// gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis// don
481a5(ya): snying rlon par ster ba dang // snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byung // de nas las la sbyar bar bya// gang la dmigs pa myur du sgrol// gtum khro sa srin
481a6(ya): po'i smod pa ni// myur sha'i thod par de snying nang // dmigs pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan de// ming sngags ldan po rtsal bya ste// le brgan kha dog dar gyis dkri// sde
481a7(ya): dmar skud pa'i dra bar gzhug/ sti reg sar pa kha phye la// dbang po don snying nang khrol gyis// srin po bskang zhing smod pa bzlas// sha khrag srin po sa mun dza// rag
481b1(ya): sha ru dra hu ra hu ra b+h+yo// ru snyan nag po da gra la b+h+yo// dgra bo mu le shi ga sod gto ra// ha ba le ho ba le kha thun b+h+yo// rak+Sha dza ti ta dza/ du ra du ra sha na dza/ rag sharbad/
481b2(ya): ni mA ra ya song/ smod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brjeg/ mi ni gshan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// khri de dang gsod dang don snying ster// la sa la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis//
481b3(ya): dgra bo'i dngos po myur du sgrol// drag rtsal gnod sbyin drag sngags ni// rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni// nya 'o gzhug pa'i snod du bsngags// rin chen
481b4(ya): la phug mu sa la// snying sna khrag sna sbyar bas mchod// gnod sbyin srog tig dmod pa brjo// lak+Sha ba hu da ri dze/ ma ga ma ba ga sha dza/ ru ru ma ru dra ma ti dza/
481b5(ya): yak+Sha snying la shad sha da dza/ yak+Sha srog la breng thun dza/ mi bi shar tshogs dang 'od dang sgra// rlung dmar dug dang bu yur 'ong // bsad pa'i rdzas kyi sa dra ga tu brdeg/
481b6(ya): lha ga ma bsreg cing rlung gI sa gtar// de nyid khrag gis skyugs te sgrol// drag rtsa la lha yi drag sngags ni// lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang du//
481b7(ya): brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bri// sdong dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// rje rigs thod ba'i nang du gzhug/ dar dkar gyis ni kha bcad la// tshon skud sna
482a1(ya): lngas bcing bar bya// bya rgod dar ma'i sgro rtsa ni// srog rtsar bcu ga la dkyil du btol// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus
482a2(ya): su gru gsum thar du bru// pra rdo gsum gyi sgyed bu la// gong gi thod pa gzhag par bya// 'thun rdzas bshos chang mngon cha dang // ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying //
482a3(ya): bya kar snying dang ru mtshon dang // ba dan dkar po rten du gzugs// yungs kar sngags kyi mda' mchog ni// thun gyi rdzas su gzhag par bya// drag sngags snying
482a4(ya): gi nang du bra ba// stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas// lha rnams 'dus pa'i drag sngags bsgreng // ma hA de ba ti dza he dza/ sa pra ma na rak+Sha kang ka sa ma la hUM/
482a5(ya): de ba rA dza ma hA ni dza/ dgra bo mA ra ya thun rbad/ thun rbad/ shAg le na dza dza/ shag len dza dza hU hUM/ tsa tu ra mu kha rak+Sha man/ kang ka ya ma hU/ ma hA de ba
482a6(ya): a mu ka mA ra ya sod/ 'jig rten dregs pa mthu rtsal can// lha yi sprod cad bsad gsum dril// drag tu bzlas shing snying la bra ba// rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon
482a7(ya): dang // skyes pa rtag chas dang thog dang // zhi ba can pho tshogs 'ong ba ni// srog gcod byed dang snying 'byin dang // dngos su snying byung 'phar ba 'ong // rtags byung
482b1(ya): snying na sa ling ga dbyung // mtshon gyi sa gtubs la me la sreg/ thal ba nya'o byas nas ni// thod par bcu ga la lha rten nam// 'jig rten lha chen gA nas sar
482b2(ya): mnan// lha yi dal yams dgral 'bebs// nang bdag ma mo'i drag sdug sa ni// ba rnol dri mo yi thod pa ru// de yi snying nang ling ga gzhug/
482b3(ya): mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la// thod pa tshon skud lnga yis bcing // dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum dbus// thod pa bcu ga la bsgrub par bya// nag
482b4(ya): smug gsum gyi snying khrag gis// ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa mchod// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe sogs// drag po'i thun rdzas tshogs tshad la// ma mo
482b5(ya): rnams kyi smod pa mngag/ ma ma snying kha rag sha ma ma raka sha ma ma/ tra ga rak+ka snying khra ga la phyob sa dza// snying rtsa la dun du na/ tra ga ra kA ma mdza dza/ dam
482b6(ya): dam dgra snying rbad pu na na/ ma ma nri snying tsiN+Da la thun thun/ tra ga ra ka sha rag mo thun thun/ mu ga sa mugs myos myos rbad rba dza dza/ ma mthun snying khrag thun/
482b7(ya): sha s+thi ta ma ma rag mo sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma mo'i srorga tig bsdus pa'o// bsad pa'i was kyi ngan sngags 'di// gri lcags las byas sbu gu'am// bya rgod
483a1(ya): sgro rtsa'i nang nas mngag/ ma sring mon mo bal mo dang // byi mo la sogs bud med tshogs// bya nag rgod nag tshogs chen lhags// dngos su sha dang mog sun
483a2(ya): ster/ tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dang // bsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang // snying la phur pas gdab cing bsad// dug shing me la sbyin sreg bya// thun khrag dmigs pa'i dgra la
483a3(ya): 'phang / thal ba blangs la nya'o byas// dur khrod dbus su mnan bar bya// rims nad rnams kyis dmigs pa sgrol// drag po gza' yi drag sngags ni// mon pa nag po 'am ra
483a4(ya): rog po'i// klod par snying nag ling ga gzhug/ srog rgyar gri lcags sbu gu gzhug/ yungs kar yungs nag badra lagra phye/ thun du bsngags te thod par bra ba// mA ra ya pa shang mi kaM du ru du ru/ ma ti dz+wa la ti dza/ tsa pa ma ni
483a5(ya): ru ru ra hu la/ a tra ta tra pad+ma sha ra sha sha sta a mu ka mA ra la hA phaT/ tri ling ka shang ka du hri/ dza dza ya ga sha thu na// bu hri la shi ni ba b+ha ba hi/ kha yag kha dun tri/ ru ti shu ta tri ka/ shu la pra
483a6(ya): ti mA ra ya dza/ dbang chen gza' yi drag sngags 'di// drag po'i rdzas la bsngags te brdeg/ sha ru la khra ga ru la btsos dang rjen// dkar gsum mngar gsum rdzas kyis mchod// nyi zla
483a7(ya): klad la 'khor ba dang // mon pa nag po 'ong ba dang // sbrul chen gshog can 'khyug pa dang // bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang // dgra bo dngos su khrid nas 'ong // rgod dang ri dgas gsod pa
483b1(ya): dang // don snying nang khrol ster zhing ro la// de 'dra'i gsad rtags rdzogs pa dang // snying dang ling ga ho ma la sreg/ gnod rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor// thod pa klu yi rten sar sba// chu 'khyags
483b2(ya): ser ba khrag tu 'babs// hur thums nad kyis blo bur 'chi// kha lkugs rkang lag rengs par 'gyur// gdug pa klu yi drag sngags ni// lung gsum 'dus pa'i
483b3(ya): dben gnas su// stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum bru sa// dgra yi pha mes mgo bo 'am// yang na mdze can thod pa ru// dgra yi ming rus bris te gzhug/ gtsang ma'i snod du dkar gsum
483b4(ya): dang // mngar ga su ma klusma na sna tshogs ba tsa la// rtag tu mchod cing bsngags par bya// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rA dzA/ dgra po he khu la/ phe sha na/ na ga phos pho sa shi ge shig/ h+ya
483b5(ya): ya hu ya/ ti ya ti ya/ ti pa tsa ti pa tsa/ a sha nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga rA dza dgra bo mA ra ya rbadA/ sha ga ti rbad/ srog ti rba da/ sna ra tirbad/ snying la ri li sha ma sha ma r+tha da/ i shin
483b6(ya): nag po phe ra na sha u ta na na rA dza na na// thi li na na/ phi li na na/ drag tu brjod cing bsgrubs pa yis// me chen 'bar dang chu chen 'brub// ba glang sba la sbrul sdom sdig tshogs// shing
483b7(ya): gco da ri nye le brag ral sogs// lus la shu ba srangs sngo 'byung // stobs ldan gnyen pos drag tu gcu na// de nas byang lta sa chu meg tu// b+ha yi btango zhing bden pa ba ra ra// thod
484a1(ya): pa'i ling gar bcas pa mnan// klu rgyal 'khor dang bcas la gtad// phung po lhag meng ba zhes par bsam// gnas su phyin la bsrung ba bya// dgra ni me
484a2(ya): dang rmugs pas 'chi// sde brgyad so so'i drag sngags kyis// 'jig rten las kyis mnar ba yi// gtan pa'i ru dra ga dug pa can// ma lus rnams kyi gshed du 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal
484a3(ya): to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dregs pa'i sde so so'i las la sbyar ba drag sngags kyi le'u sgra bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis//
484a4(ya): 'jig rten dregs pa can rnams kyi// so so'i rigs dang gtan tshigs dang // sngo dang las kyi byed pa dag/ sngon gyi 'jig rten khams 'di nyid// phung po nyon mongs la brten nas//
484a5(ya): nga rgyal dregs pa'i dbang gis myos// rang gzhan kun la 'tshe zhing gcod// gnas ngan len gyi kha 'khrid byas// legs pa'i lan du nyes par spyod// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gis// gti
484a6(ya): myug mun 'thibs bdud dang klu// nga rgyal stobs kyis dregs pa dag/ lha dang rgyal po zhes par 'gyur// phrag dog gza' dang gshin rje'i rigs// 'dod chags ma mo gnod sbyin
484a7(ya): rigs// zhe sdang btsan dang srin por gol// srog la 'bebs pas bdud ces bya// yi dgas gshin dzag rnams kyi rje// phra mor rgyu ba snang zhing dregs// de yi don gyis srin par byung/
484b1(ya): gang gis gnod pa sbyin byed pa'i// de yi rigs dang mtshan nyid do// gang las bskyed pa ma mo ste// skyob byed nus pa lha yin no// gdug cing gtum pas mi 'chor bas// gza' zhes bya bar
484b2(ya): brjod pa yin// blun zhing myos pas klu zhes bya// 'gro ba ri sa drug so so las// bdud dang lha ni lha min sde// gnod sbyin gza' dang rgyu skar dang // rgyal chen ri sa bzhi lha li sde// ma mo srin
484b3(ya): po mo yi sde// gshin rje yi dgas sde yin te// klu ni byol song sde yin no// bdud ris pho dang mo yi rigs// le nas gnas dang blo bur byung // 'thab dang myos dang dregs par byed// sred
484b4(ya): dang chags par byed pa ste// gshin rje las dang zhi ba ste// gzugs can gzugs med dbang can dang // dbang med phyi dang nang khyad par// las kyis rab tu bsgribs pa yi// srin po sha za
484b5(ya): gang mo can// sprul pa dang ni gzu lum can// rab tu rgyu dang gcig tu gnas// gnod sbyin gtso dang 'khor gyi rtags// grol ba dang ni rang rgyud de// tha dad rigs ni bco brgyad do// gnod
484b6(ya): cing 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can// lha ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can dang // gzugs med lha ma yin du gtogs// rab tu gdug rtsub che ba sa ni// lha min mi ma yin du grags// gang las
484b7(ya): byung dang gang las srid// gang gis bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa// ma mo zhes su grags pa ste// las dang ye shes bsdus shing phye// phra dang rags pa'i khyad par gyis// che chung gtso dang
485a1(ya): 'khor du snang // mkha' la rgyu ba'i drag shul can// las kyi phung po kho na'o// rgyal po bla rje bram ze dang // dmangs dang rdol pa can rnams kyis// nyi shu rtsa
485a2(ya): lnga'i yan lag 'gyur// tha dad rigs dang sde yin no// 'o di dag thog ma'i las kyis ni// dngos dang rang bzhin mtshan nyid kyis// ma rig 'khrul pa'i gzung 'dzin byung // bdag lta ba
485a3(ya): la nyal du gnas// g.yo 'gul phra mo kun nas ldang // 'khrug cing 'tshe dang rtsod par shar// khasod nam sa las dang de ma yin// las kyi mtha' gnyis g.yang sarI lhung // gnag cing
485a4(ya): mi dge zag par bcas// kha na ma tho lung ma bstan// log pa lus ngag yid gsum gyi// gnas ngan len pa'i rgyun chags 'thud// dus gsum phyogs dang bcas pa yi// rjes su 'gro
485a5(ya): dang ldog pa yis// 'khor ba'i gtan gzhi dam par btsugs// so so pha rol srog la gcod// longs spyod 'phrog cing rnam par 'tshe// gzi mdangs 'byor pa bde dang rgyas// gang yin
485a6(ya): 'joms shing brlag nus la// rgyud dang sdug bsngal skyed byed pa// ma rungs nyes pa 'byin byed las// srog len tshe 'phrog gcod dang sha/ myos 'thibs byin nad rims dang ya mas//
485a7(ya): gcod 'gyel gdug pa'i nad 'bebs shing // rme dang 'khrug pa rtsod pa dang // thor shod las dang dmod pa yi// rang gi sde las re re'ang // kun la khyab pa brgyad brgyad de// drug cu rtsa
485b1(ya): drug yan lag bcas// las kyi dbye ba bas ma mi khyab// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi// rang bzhin dgos pa'i bye brag gis// dus gsum sangs rgyas bstan pa dag/ tshul ldan
485b2(ya): bsrung ba'i dbang phyug can// drag sngags las kyi de mod pa las// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug gi sa// nus pa rdzu 'phral ma thu la sogs// rang gi rigs la gang ba sngags pa// de
485b3(ya): dang de la rab sbyar ba'i// las kyi mtha' la gang dmigs pa// rdo rje can gyis yongs 'grub ste// nga yi stobs dang nus pa dang // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan tshogs// lus ngag yid

485b7(ya): nags khrod ma rungs pa// dregs pa las kyi gnas yin no// mi rus ma bsod phung shul sa// dur zang po dang rus chang sa// smyon pa dri chen ma rungs khrag/ las kyi rten 'brel dmigs pa'i
486a1(ya): rdzas// rta nag dred nag ma he dang // chu glang dang ni stag seng dang // rta dkar rgod dkar te sa dang // dom nag skyug rta ba lang dang // 'bru chen rma bya rus sbal dang //
486a2(ya): khyi ku ku shel dang mi// rgyal mtshan thod pa snying dang khrag/ bdud rtsi 'bru bcud byang chub sems// rang gzugs snying po 'khor lor bcas// rgyun ldan bshos tshe 'thun pa'i rdzas// dam tshig
486a3(ya): mchod cing rten pa yi// so sor bsngags pa'i las khung du// thod don 'bya nag dug khrag g.yos// rgyu gsum phur pa mtshon cha rnams// bsad pa thun gyi rdzas yin no// rme khrag gsum
486a4(ya): dang dri ngan gsum// srog chags gsum dang rme rdzas gsum// thab rdzas gsum dang sreg rdzas gsum// rten sa gsum dang dris gsum// bzhugs sa gsum dang dbab sa gsum/

486a6(ya): spyad pas// gang la dmigs pa der gtad bas// chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rten khang la// steng 'og gnas gsum bdag po gsum// rgya mtsho'i gting dang ri rab zur// bar snang khams
486a7(ya): dang nam mkha'i dkyil// bsrung dang bzlog dang bsang po'i las// dmag dang dpung bsdu pal bskyed dang // rab tu khros dang sbyor ba gzhig/ las kyi pha rol dmod pa bzlog/ ngan pa'i thod
486b1(ya): ba sna gsum dang // shis pa ma yin sa brgyad du// rten cing 'brel par 'byung sbyor bas// dmigs pa'i mthu stobs gnon par byed// khyad par las kyi bye brag gis// rgyal po la rabs rje
486b2(ya): dpon dang // chung ma slob dpon mkhan po dang // rab byung khyim pa sngags spyod dang // pha rol phyogs dang chos kyi grogs// che btsan dregs pas snyems pa dang // nga rgyal ldan zhing skal

486b7(ya): kra ma sod sod// khra ti dza/ ma tr-i dza dza/ sho no tri dza dza/ yag sha dza da kr-i dza sha tr-i dza tr-i dza/ tsi t+ya pra ma ya a mu ka srog la dza la b+h+yo// tr-i dza ba la a shug me// a b+hi sha a b+hi shu tsakra ra ka
487a1(ya): sha sa ma ya/ dun thun ri li li/ rgyags myags stsogs srog la thun chad/ rag sha srog la phrig phrig/ a pa ta lo ka ni ye ma hI h+ni bi ti sta na/ gro ma ri ba kra srog
487a2(ya): la thun b+h+yo/ ma hA yak+Sha thum ril chad/ ma ru rtse d+ha sha gri ba pra ma ling / 'di dge srog 'byed 'phrog byed kyis// ma lus las la bsngags par 'gyur// nr-i hu ra thums dza/ sha tru mA ra ya
487a3(ya): rba da[:]a mu ka mA ra n+wa ya/ ka ma ru sod sod/ ga sad pa thun gyi dmod pa'o// bi sha mo tri ru ru ma tr-i ka ta dz+wa la a ta dzA swA hA/ tsa ba ti re hu la ma hA kro d+he ka pa shar shar sta shar
487a4(ya): sti hUM phaT/ tsa shu la ru ma ti sha dza la a ta/ ma hA tsan d+ha ra ka sha hri te bri ma ya ru tra ma sa ra tri byaM nA ga ra tsa be ka a nan tan rag shi ti san d+ha ra shi na tsi ta b+hasmi ku ru/ mu tri tsan d+ha dus
487a5(ya): dum bu kha la ra ka sha thu ma ri li ri li/ ma ma sa ma ya tra ka raka sha ma traM ga na ma sa kha ya ku ru te tso d+ha li te mu ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ kr-i ka ra mi tri du la du la/ ga ting khrag la ri se ri sa/
